Text: Eten was lekker maar veel te weinig vergeleken met de prijs. Hoofdgerechten worden geserveerd op koude borden en is meer een portie voor kinderen dan voor volwassenen.Prijzen zijn veel te hoog voor de kleine gerechten die je geserveerd krijgt, wij zijn allemaal met honger weggegaan. Restaurant is niet aan te raden!
Super
OMG this place is really very good awesome there food is so delicious can't explained in words Desert gulab jamun OMG mind blowing that was Already try once if you got time

I am surprised the reviews on Zomato are low, it's easily a 4+ restaurant. They have a very interesting type Indian food in tapas style with a modern twist. The portion sizes are small as with tapas. The presentation is nice and the food tasted good. I have been a few times to the place and always left happy.

Talvez pelas expectativas serem tão altas, que nos foram tão defraudadas. Jantamos num sábado à noite, e o ambiente era maioritariamente preenchido por estrangeiros. A carta oferece uma variedade razoável de pratos portugueses e espanhóis, e é para partilhar. Pedimos a tortilha, que veio ao ponto, ou seja, pouco “cuajada”, mas as batatas estavam duras e a tortilha fria e sem tempero. Depois veio o bacalhau à Brás, igualmente frio e sem tempero, onde o bacalhau nem se via... A seguir veio o polvo, tenro, mas mais uma vez, frio e quase sem tempero. A sobremesa foi uma experiência positiva, e embora não sentíssemos que torrão de amêndoa combinasse com o gelado de limão bastante ácido, gostamos dos sabores separadamente.  Não é para repetir porque não nos surpreendeu em nada e em nenhum prato houve o factor “Uau” que nos fizesse querer voltar para experimentar o resto da carta!  Quanto ao ambiente não achamos acolhedor. Parece que montaram o restaurante no rés-do-chão de um prédio dos anos 60 e aproveitaram o chão e o revestimento das paredes, onde nada combina com nada em termos de materiais. No entanto, damos mais valor à experiência sensorial da comida, e essa, como já referi foi sofrível.

Hambúrguer é sempre bom. Confesso já ter tido uma experiência ruim com o serviço mas em geral não deixa nada a desejar. Bons hambúrgueres e um espaço justo. Preços também. Vale a pena pedir o de carne dupla (se quiser sair da linha)

Sou fã da hamburgueria do bairro! Sempre achei que conseguiam apresentar uma qualidade de hambúrgueres superior à média, apesar dos preços baixos e espaços por vezes reduzidos.  A de São Bento não é excepção, atendimento rápido e simpático, hambúrgueres bem confeccionados e localização conveniente.  Os hambúrgueres com a melhor relação qualidade preço de Lisboa para mim!

(3.5) Se apetece um bom hambúrguer mas não apetece pagar preços de haute cuisine, a Hamburgueria do Bairro está aí para ajudar. Desde há anos a servir 160 gr brutos de boa carne, batatas bem fritas e maionese de alho viciante, o passar do tempo e a expansão da rede fez dela parte da paisagem nos bairros de Lisboa, um hábito de muitos e talvez por isso menos especial. Mas é de ressalvar a consistência e confiança que mantém: quando tantos tentaram e falharam nesta história dos hamburgueres artesanais xpto, aqui é sempre garantido o almoço rápido e saboroso, o jantar prático e guloso.

Excelente comida o prego de choco frito estava excelente. Cuidado na apresentação de todos os pratos que experimentei. Espaco muito agradável elegantes mas descontraído. Atendimento atencioso e simpático. A repetir a experiencia sem dúvida.

Sempre que apetece um bom hamburguer, é o sítio a visitar! Nunca me arrependo, seja sem pão, com batata frita doce ou normal, o sabor é sempre divinal, guloso e diferente. O espaço é pequeno mas faz parte do 'charme' do sítio. :-)  Recomendo pelo serviço rápido e pela simpatia de todos os que lá trabalham.
Provei o hamburger vegetariano Ba ba lu. Gostei muito do hamburguer, e gostei do tempero das batatas e do molho das mesmas. A dose enche bastante, o ambiente é bom, o staff simpático.

Domingo à noite e já fora de horas, sem jantar planeado acabámos num dos clássicos: o ponto de partida da Portugália. Se a chegada próxima da hora de fecho sugeria um serviço desleixado, o Sr. Luís Marques certificou-se do contrário e, parafraseando o próprio, cumpriu a sua missão de sairmos mais satisfeitos do que entrámos. Aceitámos a sugestão e optámos pelo pica pau. Não desiludiu. Mesmo a más horas mantiveram o serviço personalizado e a qualidade que os caracteriza.
Atendimento prestável, simpático e rápido. Relativamente à ementa, dado que é a Portugália Original sem dúvida que vale a pena experimentar o que quer que seja com o “molho Portugalia”
O ambiente é agradavel, a comida é boa mas não surpreende. Ponto negativo para o serviço que conseguiu esquecer um dos pratos pedidos e deixou-nos sem vontade de querer experimentar a sobremesa.
A comida é boa, mas acabas a experiência com a sensação de ter pago um preço extremamente elevado pela "experiência". Todo o menu e at...
Comida fraca e atendimento péssimo. Muito tempo de espera para tão fraca qualidade de comida e serviço.  Funcionários muito antipáticos. Como se estivessem a fazer um favor.  Não recomendo, de todo!

Sem dúvida das melhores hamburguerias no que toca relação qualidade preço! Frequentamos o espaço habitualmente e nunca desilude. Recomendamos o Camone e o Caco, dos melhores da lista (na nossa opinião hehe). O bolo do caco com manteiga de alho de entrada também nunca falha. Óptimo para uma refeição rápida, em 10/15 minutos a comida é servida.
Os hambúrgueres vegetarianos são cozinhados no mesmo grelhador que os de carne, e foi usada a mesma espátula para todos eles. Se é vegetariano a partida não se mistura com o que não é vegetariano.
Staff simpático, decoração original. Os preços têm vindo a aumentar, mas a qualidade tem vindo a diminuir, o que infelizmente acontece cada vez mais vezes com estes espaços.

O h3 no Colombo tem bastante afluência. A ganhar cada vez mais adeptos por apresentar várias opções mais saudáveis que hambúrguer no pão e ao mesmo tempp oferecer um serviço rápido. Sou fã das batatas da h3 e do hambúrguer tuga.

Se for ao jantar é preciso ter um bocado paciência para aguardar pela mesa, é um sitio giro e a comida é boa mas acho pequeno para a quantidade de pessoas que lá vão. As batatas fritas são maravilhosas, pena ter reformulado a ementa e terem tirado o hambúrguer de tofu.
Especially love their raviolis with the mushroom sauce! It is amazing! Als the location in príncipe real is brilliant as they have a great garden (which you would never expect from the outside)

Espaço bem decorado, com uma zona exterior bastante agradável. A comida é boa, mas ganham os cocktails. A carta de vinhos tem uma boa seleção de vinhos italianos. O atendimento por vezes não é o mais correto, justificável pela agitação de uma sexta ou sábado à noite.
Pizza razoável! Lugar privilegiado, jardim lindo. Atendimento razoável nada de simpático ou atencioso. Não é das pizzarias mais baratas, mas o sítio em que está localizado deve justificar.

Gostei! Os pratos são simples mas muito bem feitos. As doses são razoáveis e vêm com bons acompanhamentos. Quanto ao ambiente, não se pode dizer muito pois é partilhado com os outros restaurantes do Colombo. O serviço é rápido e simpático.

Pedi um Caril Thai de frango, como de costume, e veio uma tigela cheia de molho, mais de metade desta tigela cheia de arroz e apenas 4 fatias de frango. No fundo, junto com a imensa quantidade de molho, estavam os legumes. Comi as fatias de frango e um pouco do arroz. É, de certeza, um prato a não repetir.

De um modo geral é realmente muito bom. A qualidade da carne, o arroz... mas nas entregas através da app simplesmente entregam as sobremesas congeladas ao cliente. Quando contactado atraves das redes sociais nem respota dão.

Qualidade de serviço muito fraca. Falta de organização na cozinha. Fiz o pedido em conjunto com o meu namorado, recebi logo o meu prato mas tivemos 15 minutos à espera do 2 prato só porque ele pediu médio-mal passado. Ainda tiveram a lata de servir dois clientes os seus pratos antes de nos servirem a nós. A empregada do balcão respondeu-nos de forma rude e o meu prato acabou por ficar frio e o dele nem veio menos passado que o meu que era médio. As batatas estavam super gordurosas e moles e serviram-nos doses relativamente pequenas de arroz.

Fui ao Jamie's Italian num sábado à noite. O atendimento pareceu-me um bocado a despachar, mas em contrapartida os ravioli com porcini que pedi estavam divinais, à semelhança da sobremesa, que é deliciosa. Só o ultimate garlic bread deixou um pouco a desejar.

Sempre um clássico como já nos habituou a qualidade dos restaurantes portugalia. As doses podiam ser mais generosas. A cerveja sempre fresca e a carne tenra. Tudo o que se pode pedir de uma Portugalia. A ir caso se esteja perto
Restaurante com ótima qualidade preço. Pedi para levar porque queria comer ao sol (inconveniente não ter esplanada)  Empregados muito atenciosos Aconselho vivamente o Camone e limonada!
Localização é optima, assim como o ambiente. As pizzas são boas, mas os preços muito altos, visto que independentemente de tudo, continuam sendo pizzas.
Visitei o Tapisco num jantar de amigos. Fomos bem recebidos e optamos por partilhar alguns pratos da carta. Comida saborosa no entanto serviço um pouco demorado.

Já fui 2 vezes a este restaurante e achei a comida óptima! Da primeira vez pedi a Pizza Diavola e estava fantástica! Da segunda vez, fui a um aniversário e pedi uma salada pois estava a fazer uma dieta restritiva na altura e, apesar da salada estar óptima, achei uma grande falta de flexibilidade por parte da cozinha e do staff. Inclusive, quando a salada chegou o empregado disse “foi a senhora que pediu uma salada quase sem nada?!?”. Fiquei um pouco perplexa, pois alem de apenas não ter pedido queijo e bacon, acho q não há necessidade deste tipo de comentário e o que interessa é o cliente estar satisfeito.

Esta foi a primeira casa Portugália que conheci, e continua a ser a que mais gosto de voltar. Sempre fui fã dos seus bifes e especialmente do seu molho que são por norma fantásticos. Desta vez tentei provar algo diferente e não me arrependi. A açorda de camarão estava fantástica e as ameijoas à bulhão pato também. Não foi o serviço mais rápido (que se justifica pela casa cheia) e quanto ao custo médio podia ser um pouco mais baixo, porém a experiência de uma forma geral foi bastante positiva.

Jantar a 2 num restaurante que tem sido falado por bons motivos, no entanto foi algo dececionante. O espaço é acolhedor e moderno mas com as pessoas sentadas quase umas em cima das outras. E não havia necessidade se houvesse disponibilidade do Stags em possibilitar o acesso a outra sala, uma vez que o restaurante até é grande. Tive oportunidade de experimentar uma pizza é uma massa. As pizzas são cozidas a lenha, mas não deslumbram nem pelo preço, pelo contrário. A massa estava boa e os ingredientes eram excelentes(esparguete com camarões). Os sumos não alcoólicos aconselha-se. O serviço é lento e algo desorganizado. Nesta gama de preços espera-se e exige-se mais.
Pizzas com bons ingredientes e sabores muito variados. Não são as pizzas de massa alta como em Nápoles mas são deliciosas à mesma! O preço é um puxado

Gostei muito do espaço, tinha um bom ambiente e uma decoração fantástica. Pedimos a pizza Prosciutto Arrosto e Funghi e o calzoni clássico. Ambos estavam uma delícia. Foi uma pena não terem sangria, mas também já visitamos o restaurante um pouco tarde próximo da hora de fecho. Os funcionários eram bastante acessíveis. Sem dúvida que recomendo.

A paella do Tapisco é bastante diferente das paellas espanholas a que estamos acostumados, principalmente por o arroz ser diferente, contudo, tem uma excelente qualidade e um marisco 5 estrelas, sendo uma excelente opção a apostar para quem gosta de comer bem e com qualidade. O espaço é giro e o atendimento bastante simpático, recomendo :)
Depois de 45 minutos de espera, conseguimos ter uma mesa no restaurante. As entradas estavam muito saborasos. O pato pequim estava bom e a sopa de caril amarelo estava perfeita.

Todos falam tão bem deste restaurante, que tive que experimentar. Não sei se não pedi os pratos certos, mas não fiquei realmente surpreendida com nada. Quero voltar outra vez para obter a experiência incrível que já ouvi várias pessoas a dizer que tiveram.

Talvez o meu restaurante de eleição. O atendimento é incrível e para a comida não há palavras para descreve-la. Desde as entradas as sobremesas. O staff é muito atencioso. O ambiente é incrível. Um verdadeira viagem à Ásia. Obrigada!

Começando pela recepção até ao final foi uma enorme desilusão. Na recepção a hostess começou logo por dizer de forma muito pouco simpática “temos mesa na esplanada mas se chover não repomos nem comida nem bebida” . Massa das pizzas banal, pizza de presente e figo enjoativa, pizza trufa sem sabor, carbonara a saber demasiado a ovo, Margarita com molho de tomate sem sabor. Serviço pouco simpático. Uma enorme desilusão.

O melhor restaurante asiático de Lisboa! O prato que todos devem pedir é o excelente Caril de Frango com molho de coco ou o Pad Thai de camarão tigre. Sempre que visitou o Boa Bao fico feliz, e super satisfeita!

Provavelmente uma das piores experiências num restaurante que tive. Esperamos mais de uma hora na rua para ter uma mesa (apesar da previsão de 20min que nos foi dada). Sentamo-nos e quando começamos a escolher deparamo-nos com algumas dúvidas sobre o nome de alguns ingredientes e pedimos ajuda à empregada que nos estava a atender e que não nos soube responder a nada, não conhecia nem as pizzas e muito menos os ingredientes que estas continham para nos conseguir ajudar. A cada questão tinha de correr à cozinha para perguntar ao chefe. Pedimos então de 4 pizzas duas com menos um ingrediente cada (enchidos, neste caso) . O pedido foi para a cozinha e uns minutos depois a empregada retorna a dizer que se tinha enganado e que afinal os ingredientes não eram o que nos tinha dito no primeiro instante, confirmamos o que queriamos uma vez mais, focando na parte de que não queriamos enchidos e reforçamos a pergunta se não teria, o que nos foi dito que não, eram apenas aqueles ingredientes em específico. As pizzas vieram e, uma delas, com o dito enchido que tinha sido pedido para retirar, tivemos de voltar a chamar a empregada e pedir que a pizza fosse trocada e voltamos a referir que era uma pizza exactamente igual sem os enchidos. Desta vez retorna outro empregado à nossa mesa a dizer que se não queriamos enchidos teriamos de ser obrigados a pedir uma pizza vegetariana. Achamos hilariante e voltamos a reforçar que queríamos apenas a pizza sem o ingrediante específico que era o enchido. A pizza chegou finalmente , quando a restantes pessoas estavam quase a terminar as suas, e quando achamos que seria esta que viria decente, o ragu  que a pizza continha vinha frio (a pizza em questao era uma calzone Franschini). Comemos a pizza mesmo assim cansados do mau atendimento, da espera, de um pedido simples como tirar um ingrediante. O mais inadmissível aqui é que estamos a falar de uma pizza com um custo de 19 euros, não é um preço nem barato nem médio e deveria servir para ter uma pizza de topo. Pedimos as sobremesa, que salvaram o jantar, uma vez que duas das pizzas eram apenas razoáveis e uma tinha conteúdo frio. Pedimos por final a conta e procedemos ao pagamento achando que seria impossível esta experiência piorar, mas a verdade é que foi possível. Perguntamos se era possível dividir a fatura, visto que eramos dois casais, e pedimos que fossem passadas duas faturas com NIFs distintos. Foi-nos dito que sim e apontados os NIFs. O cúmulo foi mesmo que retornou uma fatura sem qualquer NIF. Voltamos a reforçar que queríamos as faturas e a empregada apenas nos disse que agora já nada podia fazer, a conta já tinha sido fechada. Apenas não insitimos mais cansados de tão mau serviço e tamanha incompetência, mas o que deveriamos mesmo ter feito era uma reclamação local no livro de reclamações. Toda esta situação é inadmissível e impensável, num restaurante com tanta fama, tão bem cotado e que ansiavamos experimentar e que, sem dúvida, não recomendaremos a ninguém, muito pelo contrário.

Situado numa das minhas zonas preferidas de Lisboa, este estaminé tem uma oferta diversa mas não excessiva (desconfio sempre de pratos a mais) de petiscos deliciosos, de que terei de destacar a salada de polvo e um dos melhores chocos fritos que o meu pato já provou.
Relativamente a qualidade e sabor da comida achei boa, mas o som ambiente é desadequado e com um volume exagerado para o tipo de restaurante de comida Asiática.

A Zero Zero iniciou a nova vaga de pizzarias em Lisboa e continua a liderar o leque de estabelecimentos da especialidade. Desta feita visitei o espaço do Príncipe Real e adorei o ambiente. A área exterior é bem mais charmosa do que a interior com trepadeiras típicas dos vilarejos italianos. Optámos por comer uma burrata e a pizza de tartufo e pecorino. Não sou grande fã de trufa negra mas soube-me muito bem. A minha perdição é a trufa branca, o óleo da trufa e espero que um dia possam fazer uma pizza especial com esta iguaria. Experimentei pela primeira vez o badalado Aperol Spritz mas não fiquei fã. Aconselho a visita, o Zero a Zero é uma óptima opção, sempre!!!!
Este restaurante é muito espaçoso e agradável tanto dentro como na esplanada. Gostaria que a pizza de cogumelos tivesse mais sabor e temperos, achei muito banal. Achei as pizzas demasiado grandes.

It's located in a nice place. The restaurant has nice decorations and staff is polite. My major reason for giving 2 stars is that I was disappointed by the price versus the food quality. The price of a pizza is too expensive and not that great for the price. In the price range I have better options.

Consistência é o que se procura quando visitamos a Padaria Portuguesa, os menus que já conhecemos, os produtos de padaria que conhecemos. Esta esplanada é muito bem aproveitada nesta localização, óptimo para um lanche numa tarde de verão.

Mais uma Padaria Portuguesa, que tem uma localização muito boa, uma vez que se coloca numa zona de muita movimentação empresarial/ laboral, mas também turística. Tem a mesma qualidade das demais e embora o espaço possa ter uma decoração mais simplista, é perfeitamente compensada pela esplanada e serviço simpático.
Conceito totalmente diferente das outras Padarias que existem. A montra tem uma variedade de bolos enorme e agora têm refeições simples e saudáveis. Recomendo

Um espaço giríssimo e muito bem adornado no Príncipe Real. Já conquistou o coração e o estômago desta Portuense 😅. Pedi a penne com molho de tomate e estava deliciosa! A sobremesa, um mil folhas recheado de caramelo salgado acompanhado de um gelado e um crocante de pistacho, era de comer e de chorar por mais! As pizzas também estavam soberbas e os cocktails não desiludiram. Recomendo 👌👏
O menu pequeno-almoço é bastante em conta e aceitável para a qualidade oferecida. Optei pelo brioche misto, sumo de manga/laranja e o café. O pão de deus também é delicioso. Tudo por 2.75€ 👌

De salientar o espaço que é super giro, principalmente a parte exterior!  O staff simpático! Quanto ao mais importante... experimentámos as pizzas e eram saborosas mas nada de extraordinário.  Vale a pena visitar pelo espaço.

When you think about eating healthy and good in a nice Place, Amélia could be a good suggestion. In general the brunch was good, the atmosphere was pleasant and the waiters were kind.   Regarding the food the only things we can suggest is adding a bit of lemon to the avocado toast to give it a zesty touch that combines perfectly with the salty fluffiness of the bread and the creamy avocado.   We loved the crunchiness of the bread on the outside and when you bite it you can taste and feel how fresh it it. The pancakes could be a bit less crunchy on the outside because when it starts getting cold and you mix it with the maple syrup can be difficult to cut and eat, however the taste is amazing.   The granola with fruits was really good but if they add a bit less of cinnamon, you can taste better the rest of the ingredients.   In general terms we totally recommend it for small groups and couple but as a lot of families go there with kids, it could a bit uncomfortable if you wanna have a chill Sunday brunch.   Thank you guys for the great service you offer us today! 😁
Óptimo ambiente e decoração. Apesar do tempo de espera, vale a pena. Desde as entradas, prato e à  sobremesa.

Love this place for lunch! With newly added seating areas (including couches and Adirondack chairs), there are also high tables on the patio and also sheltered indoor seating, making finding a comfortable place pretty easy! The food is casual but good. There is a good beer selection.It's a great place to hit a bucket of balls (or not), relax, and enjoy lunch and a cold one!

This restaurant is just off Oxford Street close to Selfridges. The menu has all the classic dishes. The olives as an appetiser were good, but i wouldnt recommend the crescenti- they seemed no more than small pieces of pizza dough to me. The veal with spaghetti was bland, the veal a bit dry perhaps because it was very thin. The lasagne was a large portion and piping hot which makes a pleasant change because so often it is not heated through properly. All in all not a memorable meal.

We went again to the Spaghetti house after a year from our first visits (a very good experience last May) and while bolognese was good and a decent quality, my pasta with clams and seafood was absolutely row, not cooked at all. I could have sensed a chef changing as the taste was not as same as lat year. A shame really, I like good quality Italian food but I think the next time we will try to look for a different place.

Just round the corner from the Palladium, we had booked an early pre-gig dinner at one of our favourite restaurants, which is family owned.This brance is smaller but the service was as good and the food nice. An attentive team and great fresh food is a winning combination!

Une arrivée très froide, on s’est tout de suite demandée si c’était une bonne idée de venir ici mais bon on s’est dit qu’on allait tenter. Le serveur (sûrement le directeur) se montre impatient et très froid, il nous a demandé plusieurs fois si on avait choisis et nous avons à peine eu le temps de répondre qu’il était déjà partis. Le seul point positif est la petite serveuse qui est venue pour prendre nos entrée et apéritifs. Sinon on est tout de suite repartis à Coffee Concerto un peu plus haut et clairement on voit la différence !
I've been for lunch with my family,  we had veal with lemon and it was really good, very tasty. chicken Caesar salad was good, too

Panini Internazionale serverar färdiga sallad tillverkade i butiken på morgonen. Mycket fräscht och gott. Dressing, bröd och vatten ingår i priset. Överbliven mat i slutet på dagen, ifall det är någon, skickas till stadsmissionen. Bra initiativ.

Looking for somewhere to eat prior to a show at the London Palladium, we stumbled across this gem of a restaurant. Altough very busy, the staff quickly found us a table even though we had not booked. We chose the 3 course set menu and each course was superb. in fact the pasta I had was the best I have ever tasted. This is a very busy family run restaurant so I think booking would be a good option. Without doubt, a jewel in the crown, fabulous food, fabulous staff, brilliant.

Leuk interieur. Mijn caesersalade was lekker en veel. Wel wat lastig om op te eten, kom wat te klein. Lekkere frites, vol au vent en kipfilet ook goed. Rekening loopt wel op doordat alles apart moet bijbetaald worden. Maar t was lekker!

on a découvert se restaurant par hasard et quelle bonne surprise !!les plats sont tres bon , le personnel est top et les prix très correct !!on y est allé meme deux fois pendant notre séjour !je recommande vraiment

Stopped by here for lunch on a Sunday. We were seated quick though it felt like the table shouldn’t have been there. It was like we were squashed in. Served quick we ordered minestrone soup to start which was really lacking flavour just tasted like veg in water. I ordered arrabiata which was lovely very rich. My husband had the lasagna which was also lovely. All in all it’s a nice place but perhaps avoid the soup.
Beste kip die ik ooit gegeten heb! Heel vriendelijk personeel, ook zeer attent, er hangt een fijne sfeer. Prachtig interieur tot in het detail. Zeer grote aanrader!

We visited here after a night at Phantom of the Opera so it was quite late on. We sat at our table ordered our food and drink and moments later our drinks arrived, I'm sorry to say the gin and tonic didn't taste too good and I can only guess it was watered down or something else suspicious, now I know I should have complained but as I said it was late and I couldn't be bothered. Shortly after our food arrived and it was really nice, it tasted fresh and was really well flavoured but because of the drinks we decided to not have desert or another drink and just paid the bill and just left. Now I don't want to be harsh because I realise the owner may not know he has a bad bottle of gin and me not complaining at the time doesn't help, but the food was tasty and the waitress was really pleasant.

De ambiance nodigt uit om te lunchen.Het personeel negeert bezoekers, het personeel zegt tegen de gast, wat een herrie hier hè!We moesten vragen om iets te mogen bestellen.Het eten was op het bord gekwakt.Jammer van het geheel.

So just had a couple of hours to kill in London after the Six Nations, and my son decided that spaghetti was the way forward. We were seated quickly with no reservation, despite the restaurant being busy. Order taken quickly, and the food presented quickly. The staff were spot on, and the prices exactly worth what we paid. The food itself was delicious, and authentic. Will visit this chain again for sure.
I wanted to try it. I see them everywhere. The ambiance is adorable. The food is ordinary. Kinda tastes like the pasta I make at home.
Heel gastvrij, behulpzaam en zeer lekker eten! Bedankt voor een perfect diner! Jullie hebben een echte indruk achtergelaten bij onze uitwisselings studenten!

Met moeder en zus een weekend Gent.Na het shoppen ergens een hapje eten dus na even wandelen ‘Croqino’s’ binnengewandeld.Achter de bar staat een jonge man die met een andere man (vaste gast?) aan het praten is.. wij wachten op reactie maar worden volledig genegeerd. Uiteindelijk contact na braaf wachten..we vroegen om een tafel voor 3 personen. We werden naar achterin de zaak gewezen. Daar enige tijd gezeten... geen contact.. (U heeft ons toch net zelf naar achteren gewezen?!) Na lang wachten nog steeds niemand die ons komt vragen wat we willen drinken of eten.De jonge man staat nog steeds niet veel te doen achter de bar.. (Het was niet druk)Uiteindelijk opgestaan en jas aangetrokken. De jonge man ziet ons maar negeert ons wederom volledig. Ziet ons vertrekken maar kijkt niet op. Wij stappen absoluut niet snel op in een restaurant, maar op deze manier wil je niet behandeld worden. Werkelijk te asociaal voor woorden.
Essen war soweit ok, Service ungenügend, um Käse und Rechnung musste ich - obwohl nur wenig Leute - insgesamt 6 Mal (!) nachfragen, auch Freundlichkeit hat grosses Potenzial
Zeer lekkere burgers tegen een toptempo aan tafel gebracht! Chapeau voor de keuken. De bediening liet wel veel steekjes vallen door verkeerde bestellingen te brengen aan andere tafels.
Lekker eten , de prijs is behoorlijk maar niet goedkoop . Vriendelijke bediening en zeer mooie locatie
Superbe decouverte . On y est allés pour le repas de midi. Très bon. Super qualité prix et le service est vrai sympa.
We had three different burgers and all of them were very nice. Good quality, a lot to choose and the service was great. A place I recommend!

I wrote an email to the Spaghetti House on 23rd February, complaining about the quality of the food at the Bryanton branch of Spaghetti House. I have had no reply...Unfortunately, the food lacked generosity and was poorly cooked - greasy and not well flavoured, so I can’t recommend this branch (unlike the Goodge Street branch the previous week). The serving staff, however, were pleasant but the restaurant was v quiet - maybe an indication of the food?To conclude: if I take the trouble to write to a company, I expect a reply!
L’un des meilleurs burgers que nous avons jamais mangé ! Original, copieux et excellent ! On recommande sans hésiter !
Envie de Burgers un dimanche soir avec possibilité végétarien et hop! On a choisi ce resto sympa, sourires à l'accueil et burgers supers

Samen met 2 vriendinnen ben ik op een dinsdagavond hier gaan eten. Personeel was vriendelijk, maar niet oplettend. Tijdens ons bezoek is een groepje jongens toegekomen, maar zijn ze uiteindelijk vertrokken omdat er niemand hun order kwam opnemen. Bij ons waren ze wel snel, maar ze waren niet op de hoogte van de ingrediënten van hun burgers. @Jilles mocht je dit lezen: als je van alle burgers een allergielijst kan toevoegen, neem dan ook die van het slaatje met saus op.Interieur is echt super, maar als je begon rond te kijken zag je toch in de hoeken enkele spinnenwebben.Burgers waren zeer lekker van smaak, maar het vlees zelf was zeer uitgedroogd. Alsof je ze zou opwarmen in de microgolf (je kent het wel: zo'n droog korstje). Dit terzijde valt de prijs van de burgers mee (startprijs rond 15 euro tot 19 euro), het drinken daarentegen... Als water al evenveel kost als een alcoholisch bier... (maar liefst 3,5 euro voor water). De onion rings zijn trouwens een van de betere die ik al heb gegeten, maar wel zeer vettig. Borden hebben duidelijk ook hun beste tijd gehad; van de 3 borden die wij kregen was er uit elk bord 3-4 stukken. En geen klein stukje, nee een stukken van 2cm. Als het lukt, reserveer dan niet om half 9. Het restaurant sluit om 9u en dan komen zo ook rond om dit te zeggen zeggen. Snel eten is de boodschap dan!

We turned up at Middletons for a work meal out, our original venue having cancelled at short notice. Despite being a large party of 15+, we received excellent service from our waitress Kayleigh and all the kitchen staff and had a thoroughly enjoyable evening.

Ate here for Sunday lunch a few weeks back, food was great.Decent service though they appeared to be a little stretched at times.Biggest down point was the draft from the front door every time another customer arrived.Will be back but will ask to sit away from that side of the restaurant!

Popped in today , nice feel to the place . Great big heavy Door to open to get in .  Nice buzz in the resteraunt . Me & the mrs had the meal deal 3 course nice ribs and steak baguettes 🥖 and fries . Desert sticky toffee and ice cream . £9.99 each and a peroni each very nice and will go back .

I was looking forward to going to Middletons as a relatively new restaurant in town. I ordered the seafood mixed grill and the fish was great but let down by the jacket potato which had clearly been microwaved. General opinion was that it is quite overpriced for the quality of the food and there is better restaurants in town.

We went to Ellis gourmetburger this week, I ordered the funcky chicken and my friend ordered the Ellis special 2.0. Had fries and onion rings as sides. The food was delicious en the staff was very friendly.

Today as it's my partners birthday, we drew a short straw for a dinner out and found ourselves at this surprise called MIDDLETONS steakhouse in Milton Keynes. This turned out to be a wonderful experience.First we were greeted and quickly shown to our table and had excellent service with our orders of food and drinks.Our server LISA quietly arranged a small birthday cake complete with candles. QUITE a surprise and excellent  service throughout. A good atmosphere and quality food.will certainly visit  again.
2 kinderboxen en 1 kip souvlaki streetbox. Meer dan voldoende en heerlijk gegeten. Lekkere frietjes, lekkere groentjes
Excellent food, Friendly staff who are attentive and a great atmosphere What more could you ask for Keep up the great service

Visited Tuesday afternoon..warm greeting..Fixed price menu is fantastic value for money..however I went for the Lobster..which was great..OH had fixed menu..ribs to start..chicken butterfly mains..summer fruit pavlova..service was very good and swift..RECOMMENDED
Ordered lobster with jacket potatoes, excellent taste. Would be happier if they gives discounts to students.

Came here one lunchtime so we could have from the set menu (which is fantastic). I had to haddock goujons for starter and burger for main both of with was very impressed with! No time for a dessert but would love to have one next time. Both my friends I went with both thoroughly enjoyed their meals as well. We will be back!

We had fantastic meal with all food of high quality and good portion sizes. Highlight was are server Marta who looked after us well, she is incredibly cheerful, positive and open. Deserves special commendation for her view on life and approach.

Nice place with friendly straff and good burgers. Besides your normal cheeseburger there is also some unusual combination which May be fin to try out. The fries however where disappointing. You will find better ones in the kiosk just outside.

I recently took a trip to this incredible  restaurant and at work of the set menu, the food was incredible and the service even better! We were served by the lovely Jade, she took great care of us and was attentive. She went above and beyond to make sure our visit  was the best we could possibly have. The starters came out quick and were  to die for... highly recommend!!!!

N’ayant jamais été au Ellis Burger, j’ai décidé de m’y rendre avec des amies par un temps ensoleillé. Nous étions assises en terrasse, sur la place. Après avoir commandé nos plats, les calamars sont arrivés près de 20 Minutes après alors que nous avions fait part au serveur qu’il s’agissait de plats pour certains, on s’attendait donc à ce que tout arrive en même temps. Les verres étant vieux et sales, je demande alors une paille au serveur, paille qui m’est refusée! Je ne peux pas boire dans un verre ou 45 personnes ont bu le jour même, alors soit vous proposez des pailles en carton, soit le resto ne possède pas de pailles du tout mais le serveur n’a pas à exposer ses opinions politiques. Nos Burger sont arrivés 45 minutes après les calamars ! Le soleil s’était déjà couché, on a donc mangé, mais c’était sans goût, je pense que c’est l’un des burger les plus fades que j’ai mangé de ma vie (et sans exagération).Vu la réputation de Ellis, je croyais que ça allait être très bon ou du moins correct mais là c’était froid, sans grand intérêt... j’ai payé 15€ pourtant j’avais encore faim apres... en tout cas, je ne reviendrais plus jamais de ma vie ! (Mais le maïs est bon c’est le point positif)
Un déjeuner original et bon marché. Un service rapide et sympathique. Les plats sont bons. La déco est moderne et de bon goût.
Amazing service with Evie and staff !!! The food was beyond expectations and the staff was so accustomimg
Great service from Kelly and AMAZING fillet steak, the best I’ve ever had. Cooked to perfection, thank you Chloe

Been here a few times with family and the food is always great and very prompt service by all staff but Summer was very efficient and always popping over to see if everything was ok, would definatly recommend to friends and family and we are back there again in April for a birthday meal!
30 min wachten voor 1 falafel wrap, tafeltjes plakten en wc niet schoon. Hun systeem van kassa en bediening is niet echt efficiënt. Eten wel lekker!

Serveuse qui dansent entre elles. Mettent de la musique sur leur téléphone, qui sonne quand on les appelle (oui.. ça sert à ça un téléphone). Qui chantent en nous servant.Qui nous demande 3 fois si on a bien pris notre commande. En débarrassant nous indiquons vouloir un dessert. Qu’à cela ne tienne, ce sera sans serviette, on a quand manger proprement. Nous avons tout de même réclamés des couverts. Ne connaissent pas la carte (confondre des pancakes et des bananes c est fort)On nous propose une carafe d’eau au moment de régler l’addition. Bon... vous aurez compris, on ne tari pas d’éloge même si la nourriture n’est pas non plus à fuir (même si c’est pas le must quand même)A vos gardes !
It is difficult to be disappointed by a simple coffee, but it is worth saying it when it is good ! Capuccino and Macchiato are good there !
Excellent food. Great burgers & grills. Juicy steaks. All served buy Jess who did a fantastic job of looking after us all. Thoroughly recommend this place & will definitely be back.

Had a party of 10 table booked, our waitress Jess was very patient and understanding when people arrived late for our table booking, she was very polite and supplied us with everything thing we needed , all round good service. Food was very good , all brought out at the same time and presented well. Would recommend this to anyone!

Visited this restaurant for a early mother’s day and found the service was very poor and inattentive. Some of the food was Ok, ribs were nice, but the lobster was really poor, small Portion and over cooked to the extent it was rubbery and tasteless. Have driven past this restaurant many times and always looks good from the outside and was looking forward to eating there. However unfortunately for the Middleton I doubt we would bother to return.

I’ve been to this Spaghetti House before and they disappointed me this evening. They were busy but service was very slow (we waited 30 mins to order drinks and our food)- the starter arrived before our drinks. At the end we waited 40 mins to order cheese. In the middle my lasagna was dry, they brought the wrong order for my friend and the tomato and onion salad arrived as we were finishing our food. Not a great experience. They reduced the bill but still wanted to charge for service (what service!?)

We visited today after a gin making class round the corner. Beautiful setting, and good choice of food. Two of us opted for the set menu and it was well worth the money. The others chose from the main menu and were not disappointed. Will definitely be returning.

Visited today and thoroughly enjoyed our visit. All of the staff were extremely friendly and the service was extra fast. Food was delicious, I had the £9.95 3 course set menu and I couldn’t fault it. In a great location and the restaurant itself is gorgeous. Deffo recommend

We dined here for lunch and were not disappointed. Service was slow, the servers seemed in no rush to do anything - although not unpleasant I would note! Food wise, we ordered the potato dips to share as a starter - highly recommended!! They were like a chip and a roast potato got triple cooked and had a baby together, covered in cheese and peppers, and served with delicious dips. Burger wise, I had a Bacon Eli (think that was the name) and my boyfriend had a Cheesy Nelson. Both were outstanding, really high quality burgers - not greasy or McDonald’s like at all. We shared a sideOf chips also (good portion siZe to share if you had a big starter also and aren’t starving). The beer recommendations with every burger are a nice touch. My boyfriend went with the recommended choice for his and loved it. Definitely worth a visit when in the area - just maybe not if you are in a rush.

gewoon slecht.we kregen ons eten in 3delen...eerst 2 van de 5 bestelde burgers..10min later kregen we de zoete aardappel wedges..nog eens 5min later de rest van de burgers.wat zeer raar is want in de open keuken wordt niet gekookt!! enkel opgewarmd!!!!! de burgers waren allemaal koud,smakeloos en de broodjes half verbrand. de 5 zielige stukjes zoete aardappel waarvoor je 4.90€ betaald(wat wil zeggen dat je 0.98€ betaald voor 1wedge)waren bijna rauw aan de binnenkant en nogmaals smakeloos.iedereen is met honger van tafel gegaan.dit zijn de duurste veggie/vegan burgers van alle burgerrestaurants in antwerpen en ook de slechtste!!! het meisje in de verschrikkelijk vuile openkeuken liet zeer duidelijk merken dat ze haar job niet graag doet. wij komen hier nooit meer!!!! veel geld kwijt en nogsteeds honger en ern barslechte service.

First time trying this restaurant. Got a walk-in table at around 7.30, even though it was quite busy. Initially good service offering drinks, but these then took a while to arrive. Ordered our food and then had to wait over an hour for it to arrive. When it finally arrived, the food was ok and not badly priced, but we probably wouldn’t return due to the poor service and wait time.

Music way too loud, could barely hear each other. Staff seemed rushed off their feet, dropping glasses often. Barpersons we're throwing empty bottles into the bottle bin right near us so we'd hear a huge CLANG whilst eating.We ate quite late so they must have run out of mushrooms as we all got 2 small button mushrooms with our steaks. The food was still delicious,and our waitress was lovely but super stressed - We go to the Norwich Middleton's loads, it's a much better experience, this Watford branch really let's the brand name down.
Great experience: good quality meat, well cooked, great sides, good and reasonably priced wine list, discrete service - would highly recommend.
Great menu. Attentive staff. Food was prompt, well presented and extremely tasty. Our group of 4 all had different meals and we were all impressed with our choices. Good atmosphere.
Been to Middleton steakhouse few times always good meal staff very friendly and helpful lunch time set menus good value

Visited Saturday evening for a birthday meal. Enjoyed the steak and the staff were very attentive. Two veggies in our party were adequately catered for and the evening was good value for money. Would certainly visit again on a future trip to Leicester

This place is overpriced and overrated. No atmosphere/terrible ambience, food is clearly pre-cooked as it arrives so piping hot that it is impossible for it to have been cooked on a spot (eg a carbonara is never boiling - the sauce is cold and the pasta itself is never piping hot). Left us feeling stuffed and nauseous.

I live in Middleton and visit middletons regularly. I always go with high expectations and am let down by the steak being over cooked and poor service. I know that recently they have been working hard to improve both- and my god has it worked. The past few months it has got better and better, and it was perfect on my last visit. Service was fast and friendly, a really nice atmosphere and a very good selection of food. If you like your steak, the quality of the meat is absolutely exceptional- best I’ve ever eaten. Seasoned perfectly and you can taste the quality of the meat. All the steaks we ordered were cooked to perfection, and the sides and sauces were brilliant too. I recommend the ribs or haddock Goujons to start, and a prime grill or an 8oz fillet for main. Also probably best to book in advance. It’s a must if you like your steak, grills or fish. 10/10

We visited Middletons on Sunday 24th March 2019 to celebrate three birthdays. We were a party of eleven and had booked for a meal at 5pm. The restaurant wasn't busy and we received good service for drinks and starters. When we got to our main course two of our party had ordered the beef Wellington to be served pink. Unfortunately the fillet steak was well done. The staff made apologies on behalf of the chef and took both dishes away stating two new dishes would be ready in eight minutes. Twenty minutes passed and I had to enquire how much longer we had to wait. When the new beef wellingtons were finally served the fillet steak again was not pink but rare. They were again taken back to the chef and put back in the oven. As you can imagine the other nine people of our party had now finished their meal. The beef wellingtons were finally returned, heated through until pink. This was totally not acceptable and ruined what was supposed to be the celebration of three birthdays.Middletons manageress did not charge us for the beef wellingtons or another steak which had not been cooked to order and also gave us 15% off the bill.The food was generally OK but the on duty chef was obviously not up to cooking certain orders of steak. It was a Sunday so maybe the main chef had a day off.Our meal had been spoilt and I will not be rushing back.

My first time here and it won't be my last. A huge menu and more than just steaks available. The food was superb and every member of staff knew their job and enhanced my enjoyment of the evening. Kimberley, well done. Decent drinks options too and although prices could be considered at the 'dear' end the food was so good it was worth it
Not bad but not excellent either. Service is not bad but they should be a bit nicer and more friendly.Good place if you run out of alternatives..

We received a warm friendly welcome on arrival and were seated straight away in the basement, where the music set a nice relaxed mood. The menu choice is huge, separated, for example, into: Steaks, Grills, Vege, Seafood, Burgers, etc. Almost everything we ordered was excellent, with only one minor issue with a particular dish which was resolved in an extremely polite, friendly and prefessional manner by our lovely hostess, Kayleigh - thank you kindly.

Disasterous! they forgot to put our order through, when I enquired about our food they pretended it wasn't to the chef's liking and he was cooking us fresh dishes......we weren't convinced. We were offered 50% off the bill as a result but it ruined our evening.  The staff didn't seem to know who was doing what, or whether customers were satisfied or not.

Had the steak and sticky combo which was great and the building is amazing, it's just a shame that the service let the side down. The side order of onion rings were forgotten and only half a lobster was sent out instead of a full lobster. It took ages to get a server to help sort the issue out. Once we did we were offered some extra sides but as we had all finished our food already it seemed a bit pointless...
Standard italian fare. The cooking is OK but not very interesting and the service is very indifferent

A year after our first visit, we returned to Ellis as heavy duty shopping had left us feeling in need of a proper lunch. We left it late, so were offered a seat in the rear terrace, which was FAB - properly heated and very comfy. Service was swift and efficient as before, the waiter switching to English at our glazed response to Flemish. Tried their new "meatlover" burger. WOW. Properly cooked, nice and juicy, just a little pink in the middle. The salmon burger was also declared excellent. A surprise hit was the homemade strawberry lemonade - with real bits of strawberry in it. And of course the best fries in the universe. Not just for carnivores though - they do a good range of veggie and even vegan burgers. And other stuff - but I stopped looking after I spotted the Meat Lover.

We were given a very warm welcome on arrival shown to our table asked if we needed drinks menus already at place settings given plenty of time to order Katie interduced  herself a very helpful young lady orders taken all came out together we had brought a bday cake which the staff kepted in the kitchen  5 had steak 1sea bass it was great food as usual when it was time Katie lit the candles and brought the cake for my granddaughter a great time had by all
Oprecht vriendelijk personeel. Heerlijk eten, smaakte en zag er ook fantastisch uit (ik nam de curry).
J'adore cette chaîne de resto, stylé, sur un mode de partage et surtout hyper bon. Je recommande vraiment.
Vive les boulettes sous toutes leurs saveurs, vive ce concept et vive le personnel. J'ai tout adoré c'est un vrai coup de coeur

We decided to try Sunday Lunch and we were not disapointed the meat was cooked just right and there was enough to satisfy. the service was excellent, not too fussy. I have eaten here before and enjoyed it but this is the first time for sunday lunch, it will not be the last.
Restaurante descolado, com bom atendimento e muito boa comida. Quem gosta de almondega não vai se decepcionar com esse bom restaurante!

Nice new restaurant in Chelmsford.Shared the Middleton Board for starter between 3 of us and was plenty. Followed by an amazing burger. Wasn't going to have dessert but after the standard of food we all couldn't resist and had a great cheesecake to finish too. Very friendly staff and a nice atmosphere.Will be coming back.

The food here is always delicious with good waiting time and polite staff. We got served by Kayleigh who was great and had some banter with us whilst showing us to our table. I always look forward to eating here as a treat!

I ate here tonight with my brother and mum. The food was good, it’s a steakhouse and they have got it right, all the meat was cooked well. My brother particularly enjoyed his 32oz porterhouse. A solid four stars.However Kayleigh who served us easily pushed this up to five stars. Excellent service.

Took a chance on an ad hoc visit . Took a while to be seated and drinks arrived after the starters. However staff were friendly , food was tasty and cheap as we took advantage of the early bird 3 courses for £10 . Happy to recommend

Food: ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️⭐️  Service ⭐️⭐️We went to the steakhouse tonight to celebrate a birthday after reading amazing reviews on TA. We met family there who were already seated and I was surprised when we arrived that nobody greeted us at the door, we found the table ourselves and as we passed the bar I noticed it was overflowing with dirty glassware which again, caught my attention and surprised me. After sitting at the table a few minutes, nobody came to see us and I was told the others had asked for children’s menus and none had arrived yet. I went back to the front to collect children’s menus my self and had to wait several minutes to get someone’s attention, it seemed to me at this point that maybe they were short staffed?! All staff seemed to busy in various ways but didn’t seem attentive to customers.We finally ordered drinks and starters but our starters arrived before our drinks and I had to ask for our drinks to be delivered. The starters of calimari, garlic bread and garlic mushrooms were delicious!Our mains eventually arrived and again were delicious, but we barely ever saw our main server, it actually seemed like he was practically avoiding us! The waitress who brought us our main meals was very friendly and I wished she could’ve served us. We’re not in a hurry to return which is unfortunate because our meals were very tasty.The restaurant was NOT busy when we arrived, there were plenty of tables filled, but that wouldn’t be enough to make the service as poor as it was. I wish we would’ve conplained to the manager when we were there, however it was very busy when we left.

The idea is really original for me. Big tables, only meatballs for eat, but with some variations. They change the filling and you can choose salad or mashed potatoes. Staff was very attentive explaining how it works. You have water and apples for free in the tables. Price, you may think a bit high for a meatball, but dish is more than enough for dinner

Having heard mixed reviews I decided to try it for myself. I was so surprised! Emile served us and his attention to customer service was exceptional. He recommended wine and it was one of the best I have tasted. He also helped us choose our meals. Try it for your self, we were not disappointed.
Good atmosphere, great service ( thanks to Summer) and excellent food. Meals substantial and steak cooked as ordered. Excellent fries. Will return next time in MK.

Found this place using the Happy Cow app and was not disappointed! They had the beyond burger and vegan cheese and it was delicious! The staff were lovely and friendly and prices were reasonable. Fast service and would definitely return if in brussels again.

We went there for Dinner on a Saturday night. Luckily we booked a table because it was very busy (how it should be). We didn't have a start and went all in for the main course. Steak of course. I had a wonderful Fillet Steak. Taste wise fantastic. Seasoning on the outside great. The inside I would have wished a bit more rare but it was Ok. As a side I chose Coleslaw. I know it sounds awkward but that was probably the best Coleslaw I have ever had. It was almost the star of the show. Loved it. They have a good wine selection. We went for red wine Pinot Noir. Perfect with the steak. Staff was very attentive and friendly. It is indeed a great Steakhouse. Fantastic atmosphere, nice people, good food and drinks. Well done. Price wise, living in London, it is more than Ok ;-)

Had lunch here today , staff whilst polite were not very interested in their customers  . What we had , lasagne and Pollo Milanese  . Well the lasagne could have been frozen from a supermarket  as totally bland   and the other dish was absolutely tasteless served with oven chips ! couple of drinks and a starter to share £55.00 . Never concerned with what the price is at all so long as food enjoyable , this was certainly not .  Should have gone to pizza express next door .
El sitio estupendo,el personal súper amable,atento y te atienden rápidamente,la comida todo 10,la mejor hamburguesa que me he comido en mi vida y la cerveza excelente sabor

We visited with friends, good service, food is very good quality, quite expensive in our opinion though, service was good, we would visit again on one of there special offer deals as we do not feel its good value

Just had a delicious lunch here. Great service by Marta, lots of choice on the menu and lovely surroundings! This is the third time we've been and the service and food have been brilliant on all three occasions!

super accueil contrairement aux autres restos du coin avec une bonne ambiance burger super bon même si le steak avait un côté trop cuit j'ai bien aimé la composition et le pain même si les frites était basique j'ai tout de même apprécié la sauce mayonnaise faite maison  si je ne me trompe pas je recommande !

Place was very busy but we still had a great meal, steak cooked to perfection and the service was fantastic (many thanks Lisa). Staff were very attentive and couldn't do enough for you.  Would highly recommend.

A small selection of gourmet burgers including a selection of vegetarian burgers. Nice open setting with some outside seating available. Tried the blue cheese burger, nice but the cheese overpowered the taste of the meat, my wife tried the Ellis Classic 2.0 which was more of a traditional burger.

I went for a meal with my 82yr old mum & my sister to celebrate my graduation.Nice atmosphere - right levels of music & buzz to keep it lively but we didn't struggle to hear conversation. Ate from the set menu which was fantastic value for money & really tasty. Substituted our dessert for a cocktail 😍 Marta looked after us, making sure all was well (& my mother wanted to arrange a night out in Glasgow with her!)Recommended x

Finalement assez déçu par ce restaurant. L'accueil et le service sont plutôt efficaces, cependant côté nourriture c'est décevant. Le Burger Ellis est bon, mais la viande manque franchement de goût, alors que le pain devient trop rapidement imbibé avec le jus de cuisson.Les frites quant a elles sont bonnes et bien cuites.Un point important: dans le kid menu à 9 euros (burger + dessert + frites) le burger est de taille franchement trop petit. Pour un enfant de 8 ans c'est une entrée, pas un plat principal.Donc un restaurant, avec un service efficace, mais côté goût c'est vraiment trop juste.

Firstly I would like to thank Lisa, for looking after us. Made me feel very special when she bought my desert out with a candle.Food was gorgeous, staff were amazing.Thank you so much for a fantastic eveningAnd I can't thank you Lisa enoughHaving a bad time at the moment and our friends came together to get us out of the house.

Although the restaurant was not busy, everything took an age to arrive, including drinks throughout the meal. One of the starters was incorrect, although the staff did make every attempt to rectify their mistake. I’d asked before I’d ordered if there was any butter or oil on the vegetable sides (as I didn’t want any) and was assured there wouldn’t be. They arrived glossy! My steak was delicious, blue as I’d ordered it. My husband had asked for his well done, and blackened it certainly was, and one of our friends who’d asked for his medium, left a lot as it was on the very rare side. Not an unpleasant meal or evening, I just don’t think it was worth the prices we paid.
We were served by a brilliant lady called Summer! The food selection is great and we were very happy with our choice. As a vegetarian, I was more than happy with the variety.
Thank you Middletons for yet again a Lovely lunch with my Mother. Summer was really polite and the service was great.

A surprise visit to Middletons for an early Mother’s Day treat from my daughters today brings this review! A nice welcoming atmosphere greeted us, the service was friendly, swift and efficient by Chris, our waiter, and the food was very enjoyable and tasty. Well done Middletons, our family will definitely return again. Thank you !
Excellent value set lunch menu. Special mention of the polite and efficient young staff on a very busy Saturday.
Lovely anniversary meal with my husband tonight. Steaks cooked perfectly and Lisa our waitress was such a breath of fresh air. So friendly, nothing was too much trouble. Thank you all!

Wilden vandaag als walk-in met 2 personen in deze zaak gaan eten.Slecht 2 tafeltjes waren bezet. We hebben staan wachten om een tafel te krijgen,Maar de diensters hadden geen oog voor ons.Na we ze zelf aanspraken kregen we het antwoord om nog even te wachten.Haar collega zou komen.Maar de collega had nog steeds geen oog voor ons.We voelden ons alles behalve welkom.We zijn dan maar weer vertrokken  en gaan eten bij een Aziatisch restaurant wat verder.

I would definitely recommend Sunday roast! Very tasty, well cooked meal! Friendly and attentive staff.  Our little girl loved kids meal especially brownie with ice cream! We plan to visit again soon.   Thank you
Excellent meal, steaks delicious. restaurant was busy, service by Marta was very good. Will definitely return.

Middleton’s is improving all the time, I love it. The wine is very good value, steaks are great, atmosphere very nice and welcoming! Our servers were Kimberly and Sinnitta  and both were very good. We’ll be back!

This was my first visit to this restaurant and I enjoyed my 3 course meal. Food was delicious. The main took a while to come out however as we were talking it didn’t seem to bother us greatly. The decor inside is lovely. Would definitely recommend and come back.
i go there frequently, ingredients are excellent, service is friendly, the place is very nice and there is also seats outside, on the jourdan place.

We walked in on a busy Saturday evening the day before Mother’s Day without a reservation and the manager Michael did a great job sorting out a table for the three of us. Lisa was our waitress and she was lovely; friendly, knowledgeable, efficient and simply great customer service. The steak was cooked to perfection, carved at the table and the sweet potatoe crisps one of the best I’ve had. Great atmosphere and decor. Highly recommend this restaurant when in MK.

This is the first time we have used Middleton’s steak and Grill.  We went with friends who live close to Chelmsford it was a very nice atmosphere food was excellent  and very reasonably priced  staff were very friendly practically our waiter Kim  highly recommended

Der Service und das Ambiente versprechen auf den ersten Blick ein gutes Bistro Erlebnis, doch die Speisen können absolut nicht überzeugen. Geschmackloses Essen aus der Tiefkühle zu dann doch recht hohen Preisen. Wir waren leider sehr enttäuscht, sind aber auch der Meinung, dass wenn die Qualität der Speisen angehoben werden kann, dass das Croqino‘s ein tolles Bistro werden kann.

On recommendations from several friends we went to Middleton's in Milton Keynes.  The whole experience was so good. The food was amazing and the staff were friendly and professional. Special praise for our waitress, Summer, who worked so hard and was always smiling.

Food is okay, service fine, building is nice however I found the price of the food and portion size quite shocking. I ordered the Halloumi skewers which you get with 1 side dish for 11.99, when it arrived I had 2 skewers full of peppers and mushrooms with skant halloumi there mjust have been 50p worh of food on them! Along side was a dish with 6 onion rings. For desert I ordered a Baileys and white chocolate cheesecake which was a very small slice at just under £6.00!! It was the oddest cheesecake I ever had very strange consistency bit like wall paper paste thats been standing too long, nothing line cheesecake.  It was average and I felt cheated at the portion size and prices. I would not visit again. I did not order of the set menu which is cheaper and you expect a bit less I ordered off the main menu so was very disappointed.
Lovely as always - service was great, food was delicious. We had a mixture of Sunday roasts and steak meals - all were so good. Cannot fault Middletons. Desserts are good too if you have room.
Peut mieux faire ....Le bœuf pas vraiment top.Ne demandez pas saignant il sera trop cuit de toute façon. Par contre le burger à base de porc est pas trop mal.

We thoroughly enjoyed our Mother's Day lunch at Middletons, with many laughs with the fantastic staff.  Marta was amazing and made us laugh so much - could not have been more helpful.  The food was lovely, and the atmosphere great.  Will definitely return.

Visited last night as part of my sisters hen party. Booking was seamless, pre ordered our food, so very little waiting. We provided decorations which they were happy to assist with prior to our arrival. Our server mollie was lovely, nothing too much to ask for! Food was delicious and reasonably priced. Thankyou for a lovely evening!
Superb value one two or three course lunch! Great selection to suit all tastes. Been twice and enjoyed both times.very friendly staff. Best to book but large restaurant with many tables

Great food, excellent service! I took my mum out in mother’s day, despite the busy restaurant Summer looked after us and always had a cute smile on her face. Really appreciate her making my mums evening even better. :)
Had a lovely late lunch, with friendly staff. Great fire pit upstairs to keep you warm from the cold.  Burgers were great and were not rushed.
Came out for a meal with family for my birthday, everything thing was spot on, good food, good atmosphere and looked after well by the staff. Will return again

Leuke manier van lunchen hier, het is allemaal simpel en straight forward. Niet te veel nadenken maar gewoon doen, hou ik persoonlijk wel van. Iedere keer kan je kiezen uit een alternatieve gehaktbal, meestal neem'k hier de stoemp mij. In de 5 keren dat ik hier geweest ben, nog nooit teleurgesteld naar buiten gegaan. Voor 20 euro vind ik dit best prima eten, porties zijn royaal. Fijn om gratis water of een appel te krijgen, zo hoort het. Eerlijk eten op restaurant = top. Voor service moet je hier niet zo heel veel verwachten, bij een hallo en ik wil dit eten blijft het bij. Op zich niks mis mee, maar het is anders dan gewoonlijk. Je gaat ook geen persoon aan je tafel zien, behalve wanneer ze het gerecht komen brengen.

I visted here in mid-March as a large group with work.  Due to the large sizing we were sat in a quieter area downstairs which was a good choice!The menu was a simple Italian one withe some general options too.The group had a mixed order, some with starters and the staff were knowledgable about the food and wine.The presentation of the food was ok, but this was reflected in the price.All the meals were well received and tasty and the value was certainly good.A good place to have a cheap, smile meal which tastes good.

I visited on Mother’s Day with my family there was 6 of us and I couldn’t have chosen a better place. The staff was friends and accommodating while the food was amazing. Tasted so fresh none of us could have faulted it. The restaurant was very busy as we expected it to be but you wouldn’t have noticed from the speed of the food and service. Amazing I would highly recommend.

We came to Greenway after a weekend partying at Rampage and needed some good food inside us! They didn’t disappoint, the Mexican smoked jalapeño burger was delicious and super filling. I had the gluten free option bun, which was great! As a side we had the sweet potato wedges, unfortunately they didn’t have the parsnips but this was still yummy :) Also, the fresh juice (carrot, apples, lemon and ginger) was much needed after two hectic days of raving! Will definitely visit again and highly recommend.
Had a lovely meal at Middleton's great service quick and efficient. Food was great both had a steak cooked to perfection! Cocktails are also amazing i believe these were made my Jade!
We have just had a wonderful meal and could not recommend here enough. Richard gave us superb service and could not have been more attentive. A great place to celebrate tonight 😊
Promised ingredients not on burger.Overpriced...cheap bun...We won’t come back again.Starter and main course were served at the same time.

At the time of booking I advised we were wanting to leave at 7 as we were going to the theatre. When we were seated at 5:30 I confirmed this again. It was over half an hour before we got our first drinks. The food was good value for money but unfortunately no time for dessert. I am not sure what market Middletons are aiming for, but we won’t be rushing back.

On arrival we were greeted with a smile and seated in a booth by Vicky the manager who served us throughout our meal. We had a 3 course lunch from the set menu which was very nice. Very customer friendly. Highly recommended.
Charmante serveuse et resto idéalement placé dans la capitale. Mets de qualité suffisante avec vins au verre excellents.

I walked in about 7:30 in evening.  I was seated and glanced over the menu.  I chose their standard burger.  There were lots of combinations one could ask for in a burger.  I chose a nice be abbey beer to accompany the burger.  I was satisfied with the meal.

Another good experience with Middletons - Consuelo was friendly and made Simon chuckle, he said he will be back again and thoroughly enjoyed the English banter. He said next time he's in England he will pop in for a bite -

Prima service, vriendelijk, vlot. De gekende burgers, frietjes, cole slaw: it does not get any better! En de mayonaise: geweldig! Voor de echte vlees burger experience is de dierendonck eenzame hoogte. We eten weinig vlees, maar als je het doet dan meteen goed.....
Beef Wellington and Fillet Steaks were very good.  Excellent service from Lisa, very friendly, efficient and helpful, definitely coming again, many thanks.

The spaghetti house seemed like a nice spot for lunch during a shopping trip. It was a nice spot with a large menu and reasonable prices. The food was good with large portions. The staff weren't very attentive. It was a good option when we didn't fancy junk food.

Nous avaons trouvé le concept très original, chacun fais sa sucette gaufre à son goût. Un choix multiple par rapport au chocolat ainsi que pour l'accompagnement au déçu.  La gaufre n'est pas la meilleure qu'on est pu manger et ce n'est pas très pratique à manger. Tout de même nous recommandons tout simplement pour l'originalité 😊
We just had a wonderful meal for a work incentive and could not recommend here enough. Excellent service from Agnieszka (Aga) and the food was excellent as always. Will definitely be returning.

Had a lovely meal last night, the staff couldn’t be more attentive and welcoming. Starters of mussels and garlic mushrooms were to die for, absolutely delicious, followed by mixed grills - both the meat one and the fish one - the meat was incredible, beautifully seasoned, tasty and tender, and although we enjoyed the fish one aswell, the salmon and sea bass were a little over cooked and dry, we would definitely go back and try it again thoughAll washed down with a couple of bottles of wine and finished off with a gorgeous ‘birthday’ black forest gateaux, al in all was a lovely meal and a lovely evening
This was a friendly and welcoming restaurant. The food was delicious, my steak was so fantastic and fresh, we were served by a lovely waitress Vicky. We will come back for sure! Thank you

Had a great time ,lovely restaurant ,food was cooked and presented beautiful ,great value for money and excellent welcome by waitress Martha was very attentive and polite. Will definitely be going again.

We were based in Bruges for 6 nights and came here on the first & last nights of our holiday. It was quiet late on a Monday night (as you'd expect) and busier of course on a Saturday night. We both enjoyed our dinner very much both times...I had a delicious veggie burger & there was plenty of choice to satisfy my carnivore boyfriend. Delicious fries and coleslaw too in more than adequate portions...I couldn't finish all of my fries. Service was quick and staff really friendly.
Good atmosphere, good place to work and meet, excellent location close to main roads, good bitterballs.

Gekende bowling, zéér groot met een best-wel OK keuken waar je goed en verzorgd kan eten, atypisch voor de meeste bowlings. Is ook gekend als businesscenter, dus waarschijnlijk net daarom. Zeer ruime parking en vlak aan afrit Wemmel.. vlot bereikbaar en zeer zichtbaar.

Très bon hamburger accompagné d une délicieuse salade et de frites pour ceux qui le souhaitent. Cadre sympa et pour chaque burger ils proposent une bière différente pour l accompagné. Un peu cher mais les produits semblent de qualité.
Voor ieder wat wils. Knappe jonge charmante barman die je meteen thuis laat voelen en je op je wenken bedient.

Came to Middletons for the fixed price lunch after having a delicious dinner (great food and service) and the Peterborough Middletons. Again the food was delicious, service was polite, friendly and speedy, and the restaurant is a very pleasant place to be. The fixed menu is incredible value for money at 3 courses for £10, even though the starters and desserts are slightly smaller than if you ordered off the main menu. Our waitress, Summer, couldn’t have been friendlier and have some good recommendations from the menu.Would highly recommend for any occasion.
Food was brilliant, atmosphere is great, price is very good and service was excellent, thanks Summer

Balls & Glory was one of the places that impressed us the most during our trip to Brussels. Home to the most varied meatballs we've ever tasted, this place was our favorite with its unconventional, fast service and friendly staff.

23 of us went to Middletons for my partners 30th birthday and it was absolutely brilliant! None of us could fault the food or drink and the service was great! A special thanks to Ivan the waiter who really looked after us all. We will be returning and recommending you to family and friends. Daniella
Bad service, bad food, bad manners - all round just bad. Don’t go. Management needs to go on customer service course.

Arrived on semi busy Friday night. Shown to our table promptly. My wife had a nice view but I was just staring at a bleak entrance way. Pot luck I guess Pre meal drinks and food order was quick and efficient My spicy chicken wings were nice but not spicy in my book Mains arrived and before I had even tried a piece of steak I was asked twice how my meal was . Wish they had asked a few mins later as we realised we had been given each other’s by mistake. However the steak ( ribeye and sirloin) were delicious and my wife was impressed with the little side salad . The pepper sauce in my opinion was too bland and gloopy to do the steak justice Ordered a cheese board ( nice selection ) between us to finish the lovely bottle of red we  ordered . When it came to the clearance of the plates we were asked about our meal by our main waitress Summer who has been great all night. We have the above honest feedback which she thanked us for We said we would still come back as overall we had a wonderful night . Bill came and our dessert cost was taken off as a gesture of good will which I thought was I nice and unexpected touch . Will return .

Nous avons attendu 45 min avant que quelqu'un vienne prendre nos commandes (nous avions juste eu les boissons), pourtant nous avons interpellé les serveurs au moins quatre fois. Le restaurant n'était même pas bondé. Une fois la commande passée, celle ci a été servie au moins 30min après, pour des burgers fades et tièdes. Le serveur s'était de plus trompé dans la commande et nous avons reçu le mauvais plat. A la caisse, une serveuse désagréable nous prend de haut et refuse de diviser l'addition. Les prix sont fort elevés pour une qualité si médiocre, tout cela malgré une carte qui semble alléchante.

Visited this place twice in two days. Good service, provides fresh nice meals. I enjoyed their fries a lot. Today I came for seconds 😁. I would really recommend this place for a nice light meal and beverages (hot or cold ). Is just a pity , they offer their hot beverages only in small cups , don’t do big cups.

So glad we decided to stop here for dinner. The two ladies who served us were amazing. Efficient and polite without being clinical. The food was great and the venue itself is amazing! If we are ever back in town, we will be back!

We noticed the Lunch Set Menu board outside the restaurant and decided to give it a go. Such a great choice of starters mains and desserts and for 3 courses £9.95! The food was excellent as was the service and well worth the price. Would definitely visit again if we were in Multon Keynes.

De systeem van bestelling was nogal verwarrend. We moesten eerst het eten bestellen aan de toonbank dan pas zitten. Gelukkig kon de man ons een uitleg geven. Hij kon ook in Nederlands spreken en dat was wel een grote pluspunt. Zeker in verfranste Brussel. Het eten was prima. De prijs was wel beetje te duur maar het is wel normaal. Zeker in Brussel. Gelukkig was het water inbegrepen.

Given the impressive venue, the food was incredibly unimpressive... oily chicken wings, underseasoned food, super oily and soggy battered haddock with which they didn't even give tartar sauce until asked! The dauphinoise potatoes were odd, i had to leave mine. The skinny burger came with a pathetic little pile of lettuce.... no real salad or replacement for the bun. The desserts were so bad we sent them back.... black forest gateau was in a cup with more cream and yukky syrup than cake. The only positive was the waitress who was attentive, prompt and absolutely lovely throughout.

First time here. Are daughter booked this restaurant.Me being a very fussy steak eater was not sure.But I need mot have worried.I had the 12oz rib eye and it was cooked to perfection as I oreded. And the taste was amazing. Full of flavour  and juice.My wife had the sirloin which again was beautiful cooked and full of flavour...All in yes well served well presented. And yes I would come againPriceing perfect for the quality of steaks you are getting.Well done...

My partner and I had a fantastic meal at Middletons the other night, our food was delicious and the service was great. Our server Summer was so helpful and welcoming. Overall a brilliant evening and I’d recommend it to anyone!

Lekker, leuke plek om te zitten, keer wat anders. Tof concept en voorpret om de naam :) Wisselde menukaart ook als ik de serveerster goed begreep. Grote porties ook! Dikke tip om hier te eten na het museum aan de stroom, zit er praktisch naast.

Nous sommes venues à 4 entre amis, j'ai pris un burger végétarien qui était tout simplement délicieux et les frites ainsi que la mayonnaise spéciale. C'était un des meilleurs repas que j'ai pu manger ! Et les boissons maison à volonté sont à prendre évidemment 😍😍

Food good and price fine too but a poor review because of the cramped seating. Our table was next to another couple a metal screen between us. Felt more like being in prison.The other side was a narrow aisle between the next group of seating. I suppose this maybe necessary to make the business feasible. This is a difficult balance as we won't return. However as the restaurant was rammed it'll do fine without us!
Excellent food and Excellent service.  Martin was great. Very friendly and remembered exactly who had ordered what when bringing food/ drinks to the table

Visited Middletons on Saturday 6th April for a birthday meal. The restaurant was busy with a good atmosphere. We were seated quickly and our waitress Maya was very helpful and knowledgeable. The food came quickly and was tasty and although one of the table had an issue with their steak it was rectified quickly and replaced with no issue. We had a lovely evening and the staff made it even more special. Maya is a credit to the team.

Good evening,I visited the restaurant yesterday during lunch time. I ordered lasagna bolognese (12.95), pana cotta (5.95) and the bread (4). The pasta did not seem fresh at all and for that price it should be, in my opinion. The portion of the pana cotta was ridiculous, four pounds for frozen bread, come on ... There was not any passion in the food the were serving.The staff were like robbots, correct in their procedure but not friendly at all. When the waiter presented the lasagna, he asked if i would like cheese, however this was reflected in a way that looked forced and robotic, without interest or genuine care. after providing the cheese, I felt almost intimidated to ask for more, as the tone of voice and body language of the waiter was far from friendly.Feel free to see for yourself and determine if you can relate to my experience. A seemingly enjoyable lunch can turn out to be an overpriced mistake.Regards
Wasn't a bad venue for a stag do, but pricey. Lights were too dull and the food was a small portion but each to their own. Probably might return.

We went to Milton Keynes to go to Gulliver’s land and then wanted a nice dinner after. Being American Im a huge steak fanatic and always eager to try different places.The decor was great, staff was friendly. We went early which was nice but the place filled quickly while we ate.Awesome children’s menu that includes a steak option for kids. Which came out cut already so we absolutely loved that and so did my kids. Its also a fixed price and cheap even including a small dessert. Both our little ones devoured their meals with delight.My spouse ordered a steak/rib combo with scalloped potatoes and she enjoyed it and found the ribs to be very tasty, while not US bbq great, for Europe definitely not bad.Her steak was good and the potatoes were delivered as I snuck a bite or two.My meal was good i had the 12oz sirloin with a baked potato. The baked potato was small bit cooked well. The steak was tasty and good to a perfect medium, but seasoning was lacking. I don’t even think they salt and pepper them before searing which is disappointing. The garlic butter though was key and rescued the steak as i layered it on and enjoyed the flavour it added.I had a baileys cheesecake slice for dessert and enjoyed it very much. My wife had the chocolate  lava cake and loved it as well.Overall a good experience with fair pricing but would highly suggest to season the steaks or at least offer it as an extra.
