Evelina gave me fast polite service good food, the steak I had was done nice and tender free chips with my main was a nice surprise mushroom delicious

A long-time favourite in London's Midtown, with a nice seating area outside in summer months. The food is always reliable and delicious (by no means just pasta) and the staff friendly, making it a perfect place for a relaxed meal with friends.

Went for midday snacks, decoration is nice, quite pleasant, staff is helpfull.Wonderful lemonade!!! Great starters offer, we ordered the tasty bruscheta + little 3 piece hamburgers and also the pork belly nachos,which i didn't realized it had godzilla sauce..... i almost died hahahhaha it was extremly spiccy , my eyes began to water and i could hardly feel my tongue, they were super attentive and asked if we wanted another without the the spicy sauce because we barely ate the other one, but we were alreay full, they were kind enough to not charge it (although it was our own distraction when we ordered).Minus poits:I was a little bit disapointed with dessert, brownie was quite regular and it wasn't even that appeeling to the eye...however the vanilla ice was quite tastyWe waited quite a while for our food to be served....But overal a positive experience, I will go back :)

Went there with friends and tried it, food is OK but had much better 1 star or non star restaurants before. Service is good its a ni e pla e but  its just overpriced.Wouldn't go there second time for style of food and price.

Repas en famille le soir. Rien à dire sur l'accueil, avec le sourire comme le service. La carte est bien fournie. Des explications si nécessaire vous sont données très gentiment.  Les plats sont plutôt bons préparés avec des produits frais. Par contre prix élevés pour la prestation proposée.
Called in for a meal but dogs are no longer allowed - except guide dogs. Disappointed as we were all looking forward to trying it.

This pasta joint serves you overcooked pasta with sauces that lacks a punch. We ordered the seasonal "the (im)possible bavet" and a spaghetti based on the "hot tomato sauce" 🍅. Both were severely underwhelming, with overcooked pasta so far from al dente it felt more like mush than 🍝. The bavet was under seasoned and lacked spices. The hot tomato was so mild that the ketchup gave it a run for it's money, it also tasted like the tomato base came from a can and it looked like the parmesan came pre-grated in a bag. There was also plenty of water accumulated in the bottom of the bowl, unfortunately I didn't order a minestrone soup. The spaghetti seemed like your run of the mill dry pasta from the supermarket, while dry pasta is fine and can be flavorful and delicious you need to treat it right (like your partner), unlike what this place does.

I treated my sister to her last evening in Amsterdam before returning back home abroad. We spontaneously, so without reservation, went to Ron Gastrobar. When we arrived the hostess informed me there was no table available as "the restaurant was full". Once I checked online and confronted her with the fact there were plenty tables available online, she eventually let us in. Once we entered we were served properly by the staff and the dinner was what we expected; delicious! I recommend the food, but beware of the discrimination at the door.

We hebben na 40 minuten wachten vertrokken zonder te eten we waren maar twee in de zaak mijn man en ik.Want al de afhaal bestellingen hebben voorrang we hebben onze drank niet moeten betalen want begreep dat we weg wilden weggaan.We waren er al eens geweest en was het wel dik in orde ik begrijp dit niet, dan was de barvrouw iemand uit Maastricht

If there is no other option you can go to this place. After we were seated, we have been told that there is no pizza today.The waiters, especially one of them, need to be trained on customer service, she was rude and has no professional skill in handling customer requests.  The food taste and quality are not good.

We wanted to eat lunch after a very busy day on Oxford street  ,We found this restaurant  ,it was just what we needed  ,it was a bit Expensive but the food was REALLY GOOD  ,Loved the service 😊😊😊Would definitely come back next time.
Marta showed excellent service and was very friendly - in-fact all waiters were.  I would recommend coming here for a quick bite to eat. Both courses Served within 30 mins

The Ghent festival meant the town was crazy busy, but this was a small oasis with outside shady seating and the food was actually excellent. Chicken breast with yummy sauce and frites that were superb plus a berry tea that hit the spot...all delicious. It was difficult to get a server's attention to order more, to get a bill or napkin or silver ware or anything, but it was super busy the day we were there. I'd go again just for the good food.

After a long wait we ordered from a special menu. starter came out and it was so small compared to ordering from the main menu. The pudding sizes were a joke two fork fills and it was gone. If you order from the special menu it shouldn’t mean you  get a considerable less amount of food.I’m not a big eater but this was just ridiculous . Will not be going back

We zijn de eerste keer in Bavet komen eten. We gingen aan een tafeltje op terras zitten en er kwam direct een enthousiaste, vriendelijke serveerster aan onze tafel om uitleg te geven over de menukaart. Nadat onze bestelling was opgenomen, bleek er een probleem te zijn: er was slechts 1 portie glutenvrije spaghetti over en iemand anders had op dat moment ook glutenvrije spaghetti besteld. De serveerster heeft het probleem goed opgelost door de andere persoon te vragen of hij/zij een ander soort spaghetti wou nemen. Daarna werden we snel bediend. Mijn man had The Billy Bunter Horse genomen, ik de Bavet Special Dog. Het was allebei heel lekker, ruime porties.

Onze eerste ervaring hier was super, nu weer eens zin in een heerlijke hamburger, maar wat een teleurdtelling. 19.30 hr en wij werden weggestuurd hoewel het terras bijna leeg was, foto's als bewijs. Onder het mom dat ze toch zooo veel vertraging hadden. Begrijpen wie kan. Jammer genoeg ons laatste bezoek. Terwijl we bijdeburen genoten van een lekkere maaltijd werden niet minder dan 20tal potentiele klanten weggedtuurd.

Kan je niet kiezen voor een geschikte restaurant en heb je geen puf meer om lang te staan? Kies dan dit restaurant. Bijzonder lekker hamburgers te kiezen, vooral met ahornsiroop is waanzinnig lekker! De bediening is super gezellig en voor mannen is er sport te bekijken..ook een leuke plek voor kinderen.

We hebben hier heerlijk gegeten. Het beviel zelfs zo goed dat we een paar dagen later nóg een keer hier zijn gaan eten. Hele vriendelijke en attente bediening en leuke inrichting. Het enige minpuntje is dat de bediening ons soms een beetje leek te vergeten met onze tafel in de hoek.

Já é a segunda vez que fico muito mal disposto a seguir a beber o sumo de laranja natural na Padaria Portuguesa. Ainda quis acreditar que tivesse sido um mau dia numa loja específica, mas aparentemente é recorrente e transversal a várias lojas. Serviram-me de um jarro, apesar de terem a máquina disponível. Pelos vistos, sumo que já teria estado ao ar. Não repito, nem o sumo nem uma Padaria Portuguesa.

We have been to middletons endless times and every time I have had fantastic service. The staff are second to none. Steak is cooked excellently and I keep coming back because the food is so brilliantly. We had surina serving us this evening and she was brilliant. Thankyou so much!

Yet another lovely meal at Middletons. It’s our 3rd visit now and always been really nice. We are from the 3 course for £9.95 menu. Don’t know how they can do such a great meal for that price, but glad they do. We’ll be going again very soon.

Cadre morose mais on est au centre commercialService très souriant et attentionné Burger excellent dans un pain légèrement grillé. Vraiment bon Entrées et desserts basique 4* pour le burger et le serveur3* pour le reste

Went as a table of 16 for a friends birthday, so I understand there was a lot of us but still we were in for over 3hours while only having a main. Drinks took over a half hour to arrive, and the even staff were admitting they were understaffed. For the price you are paying they need to hire more staff, will not be returning.

I’ve been here a number of times and I can not knock the food, it’s been great every time. Only negative I have had on a few visits is the service hasn’t been the best, very slow and made to wait quite a long time for food.

We’d a lovely and fast lunch here on the weekend ahead of theatre bookings next door. Sat at the bar, walked in and got seats luckily and the food was mind blowing with awesome service. We’d the beef kabab (juicy, lemon goodness), masala naan (the authentic kind), sev puri (Mumbai flavours), bhajiya (simply great)and Keralan chicken (kfc with a twist)  and 2 cocktails (tarbooz and colada) - all super amazing flavours, and the service a delight. We paid £65 in total for the meal, worth every penny and more. TOP TIP - just go!

Padaria com ótimos pães. Atenção especial para o croissant prokorn. Tem menus de café da manhã por 4,95. Vale a pena. Tem que pegar senha para ser atendido. Sempre lotada, mas os funcionários são super rápidos e à espera nunca é grande.
Comida muito boa, espaço da esplanada muito agradável, pessoal muito prestável e simpático, sem dúvida para voltar

You need to book because it’s very popular. They have an early and late sitting. Food is modern Indian fusion . Not very spicy, no chili at all. Good though, and not too expensive for London. We paid £30 each for the shared meal. One small gripe, they automatically add 20% “discretionary” service to the bill. For a restaurant with very harried waiters who give very scant attention to each table, slapping the food down and running, and removing plates while people are still eating, 20% is too much.
Absolutely LOVE this restaurant. 3 courses for under a tenner (before 6pm). Such delicious food, and lovely service from the tentative Patty. It cannot be better than that. Thank you Patty!
Nice menu, not too big, not too small, truly great burgers, small space but accommodating. Interesting drinks.

Family birthday 6 of us , crowed restaurant noisy , tables too close together Waiters .... not enough ! Starters were ok only , drinks expensive! When we finally got some ...50 mins after being seated On a  positive note .... steak is amazing !!
Relaxed atmosphere for delicious comfort food at reasonable prices. Apps and entrees are generous and created with freshest ingredients.
Nice set up, Good location. Staff friendly.Levels up with the other new premium burger chain in town.
We had a lovely meal food was lovely & cooked to a high standard & hot staff are always very friendly restaurant is always very clean would definitely reccomend middletons 5*****

Went here on my birthday with friends for lunch., the food was very good, fresh and cooked well, but I’m afraid the service was very poor. We arrived at 12.45Didn’t leave until 3.20Not that we wanted to rush but one of my friends did have work to go to, was never asked if evething was ok, had to ask for more drinks, it wasn’t busy by any means but it took the waitress so long to get back to us and other customers.
É uma padaria tradicional portuguesa, onde podemos encontrar diversos tipos de pães. Desde os mais leves, como os mais rusticos.Os preços praticados são moderados.
Leuk zitten op het terras, vlotte en sympathieke bediening en heel lekkere nacho’s en spaghetti!Leuk dat je zelf je spaghetti kan samenstellen.Vrij druk altijd, maar het gaat vlot.Een aanrader!

Supergute, frische, leckere, Burger, Fries und Shakes! Egal ob Veganer oder Meat lover, hier ist für jeden was dabei! Mein Favorit: Selim's ABC, Sweet Potato Fries mit Trüffel Mayo und ner Homemade Limo!

Met een groep van ongeveer 20 collega's een hamburger gaan eten. We zaten op de bovenverdieping alleen met onze groep. Aangezien het er met zo veel nogal luidruchtig aan toe gaat, was dit de beste oplossing. Even moeten wachten op het drinken, wat te begrijpen is met zo een bende, die dan nog allemaal speciale drankjes koos.Eerst namen we wat voor gerechten om te delen (nacho's, calamares,...), dewelke bij iedereen in de smaak vielen. Mijn lamshamburger met guacamole was zeker lekker. Als sidedish koos ik voor de jacked patato met zure room, welke ook zeer lekker was. Ik kreeg deze wel pas nadat mijn burger op was, maar dit stoorde mij niet, want de bediening was echt wel constant in de weer om alles naar tafel te brengen.Nadien geen klachten gehoord van de collega's (allen aan het werk in een ander restaurant in Aalst)Lekker eten, sympathieke bediening,... Een plek om terug te komen.

Got very good customer service from here and cooked the steak to perfection and had amazing taste. Also had a chicken Cesar salad and that is one of the best one I have had. They really do care about there customers here and would definitely recommend coming here.

Juste bon ! Vous avez le choix entre plusieurs burger ou wrap tous vegan et dégoulinant de sauce, miam miam ! Les serveuses étaient très sympathiques et patientes car on ne connaissait pas. Les desserts sont cools aussi, vegan bien-sûr : brownie, gâteaux, yaourt, moi j'ai pris un granula sur yaourt au soja. D'habitude, je n'aime pas le goût de céréale dans les desserts au soja, mais c'était vraiment bon ! On vous le conseille ++

Arrived for a late lunch with the grandchildren. Drinks arrived and when waitress came to take food orders, she went around the table to actually talk to the 7 year old and take his order directly. A nice touch I thought. Main course very good, Staff good to respond. Paid bill etc, but noticed a problem when we got home. An e-mail to head office was replied to next morning. Was advised to phone the resturant directly, they knew all about my e-mail and head office response, so everything was dealt with immediately without any problem at all. A later phone call from head office to check that all was well and to discuss other generalities. All in all, a very nice company to deal with. We will be going back again.
Had organised an event at the restaurant  for 25 people, the food was amazing and the service was exceptional! Definitely will be a high contender for future events
The place is amazing and the vegan food is next level. The brownie and cakes are so so yummy! You would always love to go here again and again. The staff over there is also so good.

My wife always frequents this, or similar Spaghetti Houses, when she visits London and always comes back saying how good they are. Since we were in London together I bowed to her suggestion that we visit this particular establishment but, in my opinion, it was a mistake. I ordered the special Lobster starter and was dismayed with what arrived: two miserable bits of lobster on top of a load of Marie Rose sauce containing about 5 small prawns and one other minuscule piece of lobster - possibly 1 oz of Lobster in total and at an excruciating price of £14.50 - and I know it's London but this is an outrageous price for a rip-off dish.To be fair the Pizza our grandson had looked very good and my wife's veal escalope also seemed fine.However, to top it all, my wife volunteered to pay the bill and, without looking at it properly, added a further 10% to the total - and the waitress surprisingly (or not) failed to point out that the 12.5% service had already be added!! I wonder how many tourists are scammed this way. Needless to say, I most certainly won't be going back EVER.

Mooi aanbod, ruime keuze in smaken, voor elk wat wils.In vergelijking met Ellis Brugge is er hier veel meer aandacht voor netheid en vriendelijkheid.De porties zijn voor mij meer dan voldoende, maar al bij al is het toch duur voor een lunch of snack.

I was in a party of four and chose to have a meal here following a matinee performance at the Palladium. Well my experience of this chain is very positive, and this branch is not letting the side down. We ordered four different dishes from the menu and all arrived within ten minutes. Portion sizes were good and without fail we all enjoyed our choice. Dessert was ordered and served promptly - so to be fair what else could you ask for? This is a very good choice if you are in the area and even though the restaurant is very busy the operation seems to work very smoothly.

Ce restaurant est très sympathique de par son concept et son organisation.La gestion du règlement est pratique.Les plats sont excellents, goûteux et copieux !!!!!!Juste un petit bémol pour les plats un peu longs à préparer.Nous y retournerons !!!!

Went into Middletons on Tuesday evening and was very disappointed.Only 2 staff members and the food was poor.We used to go in at least twice a nonth but wont be rushing back.The waiter didn't listen to us and even served the wrong drinks.Two of us had pate and the bread served wasn't even toasted.My wife had the vegetarian option which was bland and not as per Menu.In all, a poor serving and not a cheap meal.I can now see why it was quiet in the restaurant.

rude help, selling food past its expiration date, amazingly slow service while staff talks amongst themselves, horrible play lists. coffee itself ls average.avoid this bad version of starbucks at all cost. +it aint cheap.especially avoid those  on kinkerstraat.  horribly managaed chain stores.
Just a place to serve tourists, not good, not bad, neither anything to highlight, simple mediocre. The wine again nothing to said about it. The pizzas just ok

Still sitting at the table at Ellis while writing the review. Burger is ok, not more. Service is a disaster. Took 1 hr to get a burger. Tables next to us have been waiting for 30 mins to even place their order. Rude and incompetent waiters. Avoid the place.

Stop for a quick pasta dish with my daughter , reception terrible , I have asked a particular table , she was super stressed and said she cannot look all over the place , requested a dairy fresh spaghetti al pomodoro the said said contain dairy , I requested the allergen chars and as I guessed no dairy , bread and olives arrived , and 30 seconds later the pasta , my dish was more sauce then pasta , my daughter dish was ok , to make it worse the staff started to fight and was very embarrassing, now a know why these place is getting worse and worse

We kwamen aan en werden meteen vriendelijk bediend.Ik had de berry ice tea genomen maar vond dit eerder water met een smaakje.. viel een beetje tegen. Als maaltijd nam ik de halve kip met P&P saus en kroketjes. De kip was lekker sappig maar het blijft toch maar een halve kip op m’n bord. De p&p saus was ook geen hoogvlieger. Bediening 7/10Eten 6/10
Goede kwaliteit burgers, zeer vriendelijke en attente bediening, redelijke prijs, leuke sfeer: een aanrader voor iedereen!
I and my friends had a wonderful evening at Middletons with delicious food and drinks. Ivan and Jade were very friendly and qualified. Thanks a lot for barmen coctails were amazing😍😍😍

We’re staying local to this restaurant so gave it a go. Yesterday we popped in for a quick lunch and the food was great. Service was quick and menu was reasonably priced for the quality of the food.We returned today and had an evening meal. The shared starter was really good, and our burgers were really tasty.If you’re in the area, I’d highly recommend this place.
Ze hadden glutenvrije broodjes! Frieten werden ook in apart frietvet gebakken. Ze wisten ook heel goed wat in hun producten zat (zoals de ingrediënten van hun veganaise).

Came here today for an early tea around 4 ish, I had the pomodoro pasta with a salad and my boyfriend had the diavlo pizza which I was told tasted amazing. My pasta was lovely and full of flavour. I ordered the garlic bread and I asked for it to be a starter but it came out with the mains, I think it was a language barrier problem but not really an issue. The food was lovely and the service was quick. I’ll definitely be back next time I’m in London!

I have been to many a Spaghetti House over the years and whilst I have never found any of them outstanding, in the past we have always had a most enjoyable meal.Not so this time. Three of us sat down at 7.35pm on a Wednesday night . We ordered drinks, nibbles and three pastas.The drinks and nibbles arrived reasonably quickly after about ten minutes but that was it. At 8.25 I asked the waitress where our food had got to and she went behind the bar, maybe to see the manager who wasn't there or look for the order , I don't know, then she ignored us completely, saying nothing . She started talking to another table's diners.The manager wasn't to be seen immediately although he was at the front of the restaurant talking to a customer.Another member of staff was approached by my wife and said he wasn't anything to do with the kitchen ( although he was a waiter) and frankly couldn't care less. I remonstrated with him to be told " good night, go!". I approached our waitress who studiously ignored me . I actually wanted to pay for the drinks we had had, but having been told to go already and having been ignored we just upped and left.This restaurant should be one of the jewels in the Crown for Spaghetti House being in a major tourist spot in London, only yards away from Piccadilly and Leicester Square. The service badly let the place down. I presume they had forgotten our order for some reason. However the place wasn't full and no explanation was offered. Other people who had come in maybe 20 minutes after us were served well before I complained.Having waited 50 minutes for three plates of pasta we were hungry and fed up. I appreciate the place will be full most of the time with unsuspecting tourists who won't know better but the Spaghetti House chain has lost one fan at least and we will never return. I have reviewed well over a hundred restaurants on Trip Advisor and this is the first time I have given only one star.A pity,

Besides the view and location there isn’t much else good about this place.  There were 6 of us and it didn’t look very busy.  We waited forever to order. When we finally ordered- the waitress was rude and she couldn’t be bothered.  One of us in our group ordered a gluten free bun and burger and she barely even knew what that was or cared. We received our order- and the gluten free burger was practically raw.  We brought it to the attention of the waitress and again she really didn’t care.  We had already eaten some of it.  she didn’t apologize-  it was more that she said we had eaten a bite. Well of course a bite was eaten-  that’s how we noticed it was raw on the inside. After we asked the 2nd time, she said ok- we can give u a free glass of wine.  It was just a terrible experience-  and by no means inexpensive.Don’t go here -  not worth it.  Try another place where they want your business.

We enjoyed breakfasts here during all our vacation in Lisbon.Also sometimes we ate salad with fish for dinner. Coffee and fresh juices was delicious, bakes was fresh and tasty. Staff was friendly and glad every timeCheap prices and lot of locals

We were given a voucher for Middletons last Christmas so decided it was time to pay our first visit to Middletons.  It certainly won't be our last.  It was early afternoon when we arrived and the restaurant was fairly empty.  The service was (as you would expect at that time) excellent and speedy.  We were delighted with the menu choices, and the food did not disappoint.  One of the tastiest steaks I have had for a long time.

Had a really good meal. Old school prawn cocktail to start which was full of prawns. 12oz sirloin perfectly cooked and then a really good lemon tart washed down with a very smooth Malbec.Great food great service would certainly recommend
É um ótimo local para se tomar o café da manhã ou um lanche à tarde. Local agradável e muito bem atendido pelos funcionários.
Toffe plek, lekker veggie eten ! Bonen urger en zoete aardappel wedges zijn top. Ook andere gerechten zijn lekker

They don’t have most of the food on the menu. I bought a bread with chicken, ham and cheese and fries. And I got a small bread with salmon and salad. It tasted okey but not fantastic. Not coming here again.

We visited Middletown’s for our don’s graduation. The young lady who served was busy but still took care of us and was really pleasant. The food was delicious, I had salmon, my husband had sea bass, the rest of the party had steaks. Oh my this food was so well cooked and presented. The desert menu was to die for. If you get the chance have the baileys and white chocolate cheesecake- I was in heaven!It is a popular restaurant and no wonder. It can be a bit noisy but this in no way detracts from the food.
Vraiment très très bon, la sauce Arrabbiata est très bonne et bien épicée. Les prix sont corrects et le service est excellent.

Recently visited Westfield London and returned to Spaghetti House on the "loft". Quality and service was superb. Real Italian food at sensible prices with wine by the carafe to suit your taste. Much better than the queues for suspect quality burger bars.TREAT YOURSELF!

Omdat we met ons kleintje een raphap wilden, besloten we te kiezen voor Jilles burgers. Na 5 minuten te staan wachten op iemand om ons een tafel toe te wijzen, gingen we zitten. Na 10 minuten hadden we nog steeds geen menukaart gekregen. Na verschillende keren onze vinger opgestoken te hebben en steeds luider "mevrouw" te zeggen, bleef de dame op het terras ons gewoon negeren. We vroegen de menukaart dan maar aan een jobstudent die net toevallig passeerde. We bestelden twee burgers met friet en twee drankjes. Dit alles kwam na een 25tal minuten op tafel en was echt heerlijk! Een van de beste burgers die ik ooit heb gegeten! Toen we de rekening wilden, begon het staaltje slechte bediening echter opnieuw. De dame op het terras keek ons zelfs niet aan en nadat we aan 2 (!) Verschillende obers de rekening hadden gevraagd en die nog steeds niet hadden gekregen, zijn we maar zelf naar binnen gegaan om te betalen.Jammer van de slechte bediening, want de burgers zijn hier heerlijk! Er is wat meer personeel nodig en een goeie structuur of organisatie. Toch kom ik hier nog eens terug! Als ik veel tijd heb en geen kindje bij me heb😊

Great meal and the food and service was delicious, the only downside to this place is if you are only two (we were a couple), you were sat down at the bar to Eat, this definitely ruined the atmosphere and romance element a little.
A melhor pizza que comemos em Lisboa, massa fina, divina !!!Esperamos cerca de 40 minutos, valeu o tempo que esperamos !!!!

We have been here a couple of times before and found it a great place to eat, so we were disappointed this time.They seemed rather short staffed, the waiter was  uncommunicative, and the floor under our table was very messy.My food was really nice but my husband said his was rather bland.

On a aimé : la nourriture, le service multilingue et efficace (très peu d’attente malgré une terrasse bondée), l’environnement. On a moins aimé : la quantité. Pour le burger, c’est correct (les gros mangeurs devront se serrer la ceinture). Pour les accompagnements (en supplément, voir ci-dessous), c’est  la limite du ridicule...On n’a pas aimé : les prix. Le burger parait être à un prix raisonnable mais aucune garniture n’est comprise. Il faut donc rajouter près de 4€ pour des frites ou du coleslow. Et près de 5€ pour des frites de patates douces. Bonnes, certes mais chères. Du coup, on reste à 3/5 alors qu’on aurait pu atteindre le 4/5 avec ce petit effort sur les prix...

Het eten was over het algemeen erg lekker: de kip lekker gekruid en niet droog en de frietjes krokant. Echter was de menukaart niet erg duidelijk en wist je niet helemaal wat je nou bestelde. Het personeel was vriendelijk maar het duurde erg lang voordat we het eten kregen terwijl er verder geen klanten waren.

Un restaurant spécialisé dans le hamburger maison, mais qui propose aussi d'autres plats. Le service est rapide et agréable. La cuisine est correcte et les prix ne sont pas excessifs. A conseiller, pour un petit repas pas trop cher, sur une belle place.

The restaurant was advertised as being an authentic affordable Italian experience. I would definitely recommend the three course meal option as it helps save a couple of pounds if you’re looking to have an appetizer with the main meal. The calamari was really fresh and tasty. The spaghetti plate included in the meal was really good and the noodles felt and tasted fresh. The sauce however was slightly a little too liquid but didn’t really ruin the plate itself. I had the panna cotta which was amazing topped with fresh mixed berries. Overall great experience at a restaurant centrally located near all the London attractions.
Genial, nos encantó todo lo que pedimos, las pizzas exquisitas, pastas y ensaladas buenísimas. Terraza muy agradable. Muy recomendable

Been a fan of Ellis Burger for a couple of years having been to the one in Brugges a couple of times as well as Antwerp. This Ellis was a bit of a disappointment as the service wasn't great and the food was ok.

We hadden een portie calamares besteld als voorgerecht. Onze hamburgers werden 5 minuten later geserveerd nog voor wij ons voorgerecht op hadden. Ze hebben ze terug meegenomen en warm gehouden waardoor deze niet zo best meer smaakte.slechte timing in de keuken !

The staff were friendly, the atmosphere was great, the gin cocktail was delicious but the food portions were small and overpriced. When a vegetarian Wellington arrived on its own on a big dinner plate and a cup of chips came separately, it was a bit of a disappointment. Having said that, the place was filled to the brim of people and some of the other dishes looked a lot better than ours. The waitress was very nice and the service was efficient.
Great food, the 4 cheese pizza is the best pizza I ate in London! Also good- the pastas and salads . Must go there again
The food, staff and ambiance were great. This was the best dining experience that we have enjoyed for a long, long time. Highly recommended for the whole family.

ade a mistake when stopping here for some lunch. It looked nice and the food itself would be ok..but...the service was unfortunately really bad....we hade to wait along time to first be able to order, then to actually get in the food...we waited over 40 min before the food came in, and by then it was cold..? well...it it a good way to get the customer to eat anyway because we were starving by then....as said..I like the concept...just not the service...

We booked early - 5.30 - in order to have the pre theatre set menu.  When we sat down, we were given the main menu but it was only when I mentioned this special menu, the waitress went and found it!!!  However, that being said, we had a very good meal.  We had the dough balls which were very soft with a delicious sauce and the mozzarella and tomato salad.  The mozzarella ball was the biggest I have ever seen!!! We both has the chicken Milanese which again was huge!!The ambience was good, it was very full and for 2 courses for £12.95, it was excellent value.  Just remember to ask for the early menu I forgot you go before 18.00!!!

Very disappointed with our visit actually. Service was incredibly slow ( 3 hours to finish an early bird sitting) Food very average and overheated, so became dry and unappetising. Drinks also slow to arrive. Appeared to be not enough staff?
Kipje was lekker, maar voor mij veel te weinig. Slaatje was helaas niet vers. Bediening was super vriendelijk!
qua menu keuze is 'The Beyond Burger VEGAN' een echte aanrader, de burger lijkt én smaakt als een burger doch je eet vegetarisch én lekkerqua bediening verloopt alles vlot
Good choice of burgers and beers in a lovely small square just off the main market square. Good selection of meat and vegetarian burgers plus other non burger choices. Great frites too.

Bem localizado, salão comprido feito um vagão de trem e bem decorado. Lugar legal. Dessa vez, no entanto, o arroz de polvo estava salgado e o tartare de atum sem graça. Serviço desatento, mesmo com restaurante vazio. Cuidado que a concorrência é grande.

We noticed the restaurant on our way to the hotel and fancied pasta so came back. This place is tiny! Maybe the size of a large living room, kitchen on one side and a handful of tables covering the rest of the space.Staff were friendly, service fast food wasn’t bad either. Not amazing but just what we needed.One problem was staff uniforms a couple of the wait staff were dressed well, 2 others I wasn’t sure if they worked there or had just lived upstairs, scruffy and non-matching.
Really tasty pizzas, compared to real Italian pizzas, they are really good ! Receipes are original : the Figs & Italian Ham one is wonderful ! The beers are really good too ! I recommend it !

We visited the steak house twice during a family holiday to Norfolk and it was the best meals we have ever had at a steakhouse. We visited as a family of 12 including 3 children. The staff were very friendly and helpful. The beef wellington is heaven. The only bad thing is there isn’t a Middletons steakhouse near Brighton

Been before still very noisy upstairs our steak orders where brought out incorrect waitress didn’t know what was which so meats not cooked to preferences had to order more bread for sharing dish as not enough supplied for 6 of us So overall once thought it was good but now do t think will return Better places to seek out

I will start with the positives- once it arrived, the food was fairly good. The servings were large, and my husband and I very much enjoyed the haloumi entree.The negative, however,  was that we had to wait over 20 minutes to have our order taken, and then another 40+ minutes for our meal to arrive. I ended up asking if our food was coming shortly, because it was 9pm and we were considering cancelling our order and looking for something quick elsewhere. The staff were lovely and very apologetic- I asked one waitress if they were short-staffed as we received our entreè, and she explained that they were missing people in the kitchen and out the front. We were also given a discount without having to ask, which we appreciated.We would have appreciated it even more, however, if we had been informed that there would be a long wait when we first asked for a table. While we understand that this may have resulted in lost business for the restaurant (we probably would have chosen to go elsewhere), it would have prevented dissatisfied customers!
Honestly the best burger buns I have ever tasted on burgers. The fries were also crispy :)Inside the ceiling was dripping at some spots though (condence)

Die Bedienungen im Jilles Beer & Burgers sind überdurchschnittlich schlecht! Um etwas zu bestellen muss man quer durch das Restaurant den Kellern rufen, damit dieser einen überhaupt beachten. Obwohl man ja zuvor bereits (wait here till you’re seated) an den Tisch begleitet wurde und die Karte entgegen geschmissen bekam. Das Essen ist leider genauso trocken und geschmacklos, wie der Service. - Überfrittiert (sehr wahrscheinlich zu altes Frittierfett)- trocken (die Burgerbanns haben keinen Tropfen Soße gesehen) - fertig soßen (sofern an die Soße gedacht worden ist) - fertig Patty, welches schwarze Sohlen hatte...-auf fast noch volle Teller, die abgeräumt wurden, kam gar keine Nachfrage ob es geschmeckt habeUnd das alles für einen abartig teuren Preis! NIE WIEDER! P.S.: wir waren nicht die einzigen mit den benannten Problemen. Während wir die Karte studierten und anschließen (leider) dort aßen, verließen mehrere Gäste ihre Tische im Restaurant, weil sie vergeblich versuchten einen Kellner zu bekommen, welches Ihnen schlichtweg nicht möglich war.

Parking can be limited/tight (make sure legal spot!) but once there a nice little spot given the much higher and "well known" surroundings. Menu reasonable and food quality. Draft and beer list could be expanded but ready to return!
This restaurant and prosecco deal was amazing but the whole experience was made by a young 19 year old called Alex. Lovely guy and very very helpful and accommodating! Would recommend!!

Goede prijs kwaliteit verhouding, zeker rekening houdend met de locatie. Buiten op het terras gezeten, goede ambiance.Met mijn vriendin de halve kip met tzatziki gedeeld met friet erbij. Portie is precies goed. Kip met rozemarijn en goed gekruid, zou dit zeker nog eens willen eten. By the way er staat boneless, maar bij de vleugels zit wel wat bot, maakt ook niet uit.. Friet was ook lekker trouwens. Oja en de homemade ijsthee erg lekker ook, precies goed: niet te zuur, niet te zoet, maar wel lekker fris van smaak.

Gorgeous burger. I had the blue cheese and my boyfriend had the Ellis special. They were both delicious. We also ordered fries which came with an amazing homemade mayo. The service was good and we sat outside in the sun! Would definitely go back.
Il ne faut jamais dire jamais. Je ne sais pas si je recommencerai cette expérience... en tout cas plus à la bourse. On m'avait parlé de ce concept et j'ai voulu essayé. Et je n'ai pas aimé

Vous savez comment ça fonctionne dans un endroit rempli de touriste... Donc pas grand chose à dire. les spaghettis flotte dans une sauce pas très bonne. Le prix n'est pas élevé. Donc si vous en avez marre des burgers ou des fastfood, vous pouvez essayer ne fus-ce qu'une fois. La terrasse reste agréable
Les burgers sont vraiment goûteux. Simple sans chichi. L'intérieur est un peu étroit mais chalereux.

Visited for 3rd time with my husband and 2 friends. Had the excellent value 3 course lunch for £9.95. The service from Jess and Kenzie was excellent and the food, cooked by Romeo and Travis, was delicious. The steak was cooked perfectly.
Staff were attentive and friendly.  Food was really good, and no pressure to finish and leave.  Would definitely go there again.
Enjoyed a fantastic meal, looked after by friendly staff. Very welcoming, great service.  Authentic Italian feel to the restaurant.

Visited here on the  19/4/19. Ordered ham and leek croquettes for starter which cane with some sort of dip. For mains I had prime middletons grill which included 6oz fillet steak, per peri chicken breast on the bone, lamb cutlet, sticky bbq ribs, onion rings & spring onion garnish. I had a jug of nice cold water on the table to drink and bottled coke. I think the total cost was around £35. First of all the building it's self is stunning and a really nice place with a chilled environment good for all occasions. I took my brother for his birthday who had been having a bad time and it Instantly put a smile on his face. The food came and everything was fresh and pleasant on the pallet with the starter. The main was really, really nice. I ordered mine with thick cut wedges. This meal is certainly not fair the smaller appetite! The chicken was divine, the lamb and ribs well seasoned and well cooked, onion rings on point. However the steak which was the star of the show was nice and still very juicy however just slightly over how I asked it for and the wedges a tiny bit sharp I. The mouth however don't let this out you off, the food here is killer. There was a large party there when we were there and the staff were more than able to keep up eoth all there requests by the look of it. Well worth a try.

Food was great, really tasty fresh we left feeling full however i did leave feeling a little annoyed that the service we experienced was poor. Our drinks arrived after we had finished our starters, asked the waiter for some more water which he rolled his eyes at. Generally very slow and inattentive. No upselling anything he thought would compliment our dish. Although food was good i wont be rushing back.
The food is very nice and the prices are reasonable.  The service is friendly and multilingual.Unfortunately the desserts are not at the same level of the main dishes.I will definately come back!
מסעדה איטלקית חביבה, חמימה, מצויינת. אוכל טעים מאד, שתי מנות הספגטי שאכלנו (בולונז ופסטו), היו טעימות מאד

I enjoyed Poule & Poulette so much - particularly the croquettes and frites - that I ate here in two cities in Belgium!  The chicken was very flavorful and was very reasonably priced. Of course, this is not fine dining.  It's really just a step above fast food, but the service was good and the decor is really cool.

I had the most amazing early dinner yesterday.Arrived very early in Amsterdam for a meeting and wanted a spicy Indonesian early evening.The Gastrobar is located in s small alley and is either in orjust next door to a department store called Hudson’ Bay.Stunning restaurant, I was served by a very happy, smiley, warm waitress. Food was amazing, I had the Sate Special and a Fried Rice to go with it. A glass of Reisling and a very good Irish Coffee as dessert.10/10 experience, cancelled my Sunday reservation at a 2 Star Michelin and will revisitRon’s this afternoon for a repeat  meal before I leave this lovely city.

Decided to have a meal at this restaurant. All of us had a lovely steak meal with dauphinoise potatoes. Excellent all round. Also our waitor  was very quick on seating us, getting drinks orders and delivering them. It was 6.30 on a Saturday night so getting busy in the restaurant. Overall we all had a lovely meal and experience there.

We had to wait 50 minutes to get 3 chicken pitas. The restaurant was not nearly  full and there was not even en effort from the waitress to the explain the long wait, let alone offer some compensation. Will not be coming back.

Catena tedesca di ristoranti di cucina italiana. La pasta è molto buona, quasi come quella italiana. I piatti sono abbondanti (90 grammi di pasta ogni piatto). La cucina è a vista dato che il ristorante è self service, cioè bisogna avvicinarsi al cuoco per ordinare tramite una scheda che viene fornita all'ingresso. Simpatico il cuoco di colore addetto alla pasta. Prezzi dai 7€ (pasta col pomodoro) agli 11€. Non comprate l'acqua, dato che è italiana costa 4€ la bottiglia più piccola.
We found this restaurant when we got off the hop on hop off bus and ate there 2 nights in a row!!! Great food, wine and service.
This was a 70th Birthday celebration and food, ambience, service all fantastic, a very enjoyable night and Sinita was fantastic so friendly, efficient and helpful.

Ever since Middletons opened in Leicester we have been visiting a couple of times a month for. Saturday lunchtime visit. Yes it’s that good!The three course was exceptional value, and yes it’s gone up one whole whole pound, but you’d still be hard pressed to beat it. The service, the staff, the food and value for money all got 10/10.Yesterday’s visit was lack lustre, service was far from attentive, sadly the new menu menu has lost the fantastic Tempranillo. The lunch time menu had changed too, but that never a bad thing, but sadly the fish and chicken (personal favourites) have been dropped - tried the chipolata with a honey mustard dip. Insipid looking sausages with a fat top sweet sauce- will not have that again. Mains; both had steaks where great!Deserts; the sticky toffee was lacking its sauce (shame) and I tried the Creme Brûlée - oh dear, this is my favourite pud ever! And it was scrambled. Sadly a chef that can not cook this should not be left in the kitchen, more so, they should know when not to serve certain food.Let’s hope it’s better next time.

We arrived here on a busy evening with 90 minutes before our theatre performance at The Palladium. We had plenty of time for our two courses. really flavoursome food, excellent pizzas and friendly staff. Was not aware of this chain, but we would return here and try other locations too.

Ik ging weg met de gedachte "zal wel vakantietijd zijn" het was gewoon slecht zowel het eten als de bediening.Ik kom hier minstens drie keer per jaar en was in een eerder artikel vol lof over de keuze aan hamburgers alsmede de kwaliteit.Maar mijn laatste twee bezoeken afgelopen week zijn voorlopig mijn laatste bezoeken geweest.Bij mijn eerste bezoek vorige week hun speciale kipburger uit india of zoiets heel droog en vermoedelijk uit India komen lopen.De tweede keer vorige week sloeg echter alles, slechte onnozele bediening met verkeerde gerechten en de beroemde ellisburger was verschrompeld en niet meer te eten en dus ook aan alles te duur getuige de omschrijving als speciaal rundvlees.
Bedienung sehr freundlich, Essen war sehr gut und reichhaltig. Das Preis-Leistungsverhältnis ist absolut gut.

Ghent was our first stop in Belgium so we had never seen Poule & Poulette before (there are several locations across Belgium). We wandered into the restaurant kind of late because it was one of the few places close to us that looked like it was still serving dinner and wouldn't take a long time. I loved the food! I had a chicken burger and croquettes (probably a little too much food, but I was on vacation!) My husband had the Vol au Vent and it was much better than the same dish I'd had the night before at a "nicer" restaurant for a more expensive price.  We didn't have any issues with service, but it may have been because it was closer to closing time and not as busy.  I liked the food so much that we ate here on our next stop in Mechelen.

Drie jaar geleden een paar dagen naar Antwerpen geweest en de curry gegeten. Nu, op stedentrip, weer dezelfde curry besteld. Hij was net zo lekker als toen (of zelfs beter ;)). Ook de meat lovers’ burger (die een vriendin bestelde) smaakte goed. Het was lastig kiezen voor ons, zo veel lekkere vegan opties! Er wacht nog een heerlijk vegan toetje op ons..Charlotte en Judith (personeel), bedankt!

Restaurante top, ya probé el de @Lisboa y ahora me falta el de @barcelona. Una cena buenisima. Personal atento, cordial y profesional, nos encantaron todos los platos y el ambiente acogedor. Probadlo ✌🏻🤙🏻

3rd time we have been there for Birthday celebrations,forgot how poor the service is,if you have 2-3 hours free that’s fine!I don’t have any problems with the starters or main courses but forget the desserts,a joke!There food is good but it is need of some improvement!I will go again as long as i know i don’t have to be in a hurry.

We were staying in ahotel in the vicinity and on our last night in Berlin, late in the evening we decided to have a quick Italian meal. Vapiano was the nearest walking distance Italian on TripAdvisor.The restaurant serves freshly prepared food for which you have to queue...it is a self service restaurant. The food is prepared at separate counters depending on whether you want a bowl of pasta, a pizza, a starter, a drink or lasagne (which is not served at the pasta counter but for some reason at the pizza counter...) BUT (and this is a big BUT)  there is nowhere any directions as to where you should queue and for what. So now you see why I suggest you dine alone and queue for one dish only. Otherwise you will spend another 20-30 minutes queueing again. Going there with a group expecting to eat together is impossible for different dishes are prepared at totally different speeds.We spent quite a while in there...queueing. The food was atrocious, the staff surly and uninterested, the bruchetta simply bread and tomatoes, the arrabiata bland and insipid and by the time my companion's pizza was ready we left it behind untouched and ran.By the way, you pay regardless whether the food is edible or not or whether you eat it or not.I suppose if you are hungry enough and stumble on this place by accident and it is the only place left open and you are alone, you way give a bowl of pasta a try. Otherwise avoid at all cost. Not only is it not worth going there, in my view, it is better to go hungry.

Una buena oportunidad para desayunar rápido con un buen café y dulces. O salados pues tiene una buena variedad para comer.No olvidar coger número a la entrada, pues hay dos filas: para llevar y para comer en el local.
Tudo muito saboroso. Adoramos a empada de galinha, o pastel de natal, o suco de laranja, os bolos e o café. Tudo barato para os padrões europeus. Ambiente agradável.
Vriendelijk, correct, niks teveel , Komen regelmatig vragen of alles in orde was Keuze uit menu kaart

Me and my mum visited Middletons on Saturday lunchtime for the first time and I can say that we will be back, we both had the mixed grill! If was delicious, the best I ever had! The service was fantastic too! Evelina was very polite and extremely accommodating. She also had excellent knowledge of the menu enabling her to give recommendations. We will see you all again soon! Thank you!

My partner had booked a table here for my birthday (Saturday 10th) this was the first time we had been here but it most definitely won't be the last! My mouth is watering just thinking about it. The service was exceptional and the food was delicious. One lady (sorry I didn't get your name) was so helpful and knowledgeable and although they were busy she just made time for us! Nothing seemed rushed or too much trouble. I can't wait to come back here. You don't get service like that around here very often. Thank you all 😀

I would highly recommend this restaurant. If you are in Porto and only have one night to eat out, go here. Extremely unique experience with diverse food and great drinks. Excellent staff offering wonderful service. The decorations and layout of the restaurant could not be any better.

Pizzeria à proximité de L’oceanario et de la tour Vasco de Gala.Très bon accueil, nous avons déjeuné à l’extérieur.Un peu d’attente mais c’est la rançon du succès .Les pizzas sont délicieuses avec une pâte fine.Service rapide.
Ellis is een keten dus je eet in elke Ellis hetzelfde. Wij houden wel van de Funky Chicken burger en de Jackets Potato!

Visited here Sunday evening. Both steaks were cooked to perfection. These were a 10 ounce rump and a 6 ounce fillet.The flavour in both were outstanding. Looked after by a young lady called Evie (who could easily make a fortune working in one of the top hotels/restaurants in London) She was friendly, informative and a credit to the chain. Equal credit to Chloe who I was told had cooked our steaks when I asked who had done them. Thank you team for a lovely evening that my husband and I really enjoyed

As soon as you step inside, you feel taken and welcome to some amazing restaurant in Asia! The cocktails (specially the Insane on the brain) are out of this world and the black tiger curry is to die for!

Visited here at 4 on a Saturday. Had dinner with Jess and my husband. Food was cooked to perfection. My chef husband always gets his steak wrong but this was cooked just right by Romeo. Service was really good by Evie. The ribs were a bit messy on eating but fell off the bone. There was a bit of a wait but for the precise cooking it was worth it. Well done team. Will return. Mr and Mrs Armes
Au vu de leur site Internet, je m'attendais à beaucoup de ce restaurant. Honnêtement,ce n'est pas bon et parmi tous les restaurants que j'ai faits, celui-ci s'inscrit dans les moins bons...

Came here for a birthday party which was nice but you're not really cut off from the rest of the restaurant. Food is ok, slightly greasy and everything tastes pretty much the same. We had creamy potatoes which were not creamy but more so a pot of oil. Its slightly jazzed up pub grub.

Ne mangez pas au greenway malgré les avis dithyrambiques, sauf si vous aimez manger au milieu de personnes qui prennent le métro ou encore font du shopping à côté de vous. Dans ce cas vous serez à votre aise dans la semi-cloison qui délimite l'aire de repas. Vous pourez dégustation des burgers monotexture, sans saveur ; le tout fabriquer avec des "produits" digne d'un potager de centenaire . Pour vous réhydrater Greenway met à votre disposition des bouteilles d'eau à seulement 3€ l'unité. On salive d'avance de ce plâtre fade.PS: ATTENTION à ne pas vous étouffer avec les patates.

We stumbled upon it by accident, we just wanted something small to eat, but ended up having a burger😃 but no regrets. It was really satisfying. I had Ellis special 2.0 burger and my girlfriend had vegan Beyond burger(some plant based patty, but tasted amazing!). And she really enjoyed hers aswell. Thanks

Bavet is een spaghettirestaurant. Het positieve is dat je eigen spagetti kan samenstellen: je kiest de pasta, de saus, de kaas, enz.. Ook de portie kan je kiezen.Alles wordt snel opgediend. De bediening is correct maar heel formeel. De keuze aan bieren is eerder beperkt.

My family and I visited the restaurant on Monday 5th August to celebrate my son’s birthday.It was my young children’s first visit as well as mine, my sisters, daughters and their families had been before and praised the food.We all...fourteen of us chose the three courses for £9.95, okay so you think at this price it will be possibly okay but not great.It was NOT the case, we all tried the different starters, they were served by a very happy, friendly, helpful and patient (fourteen of us) lady by the name of Kayleigh.She answered all my questions about the menu and kept my son’s birthday cake a surprise, hiding it away until after dessert. The minute steak cooked medium/rare to perfection, my son chose the steak baguette which he said was tasty and very filling, as well as the burger my daughter chose. We all ate, chatted leisurely as we do as a family and not once were we made to feel rushed or left unattended, which considering Kayleigh waited on all the tables mainly by herself and was rushed off her feet as it was busy for a Monday evening. The cake was brought out when I asked and our waitress Kayleigh sang along with us. I and my family and extended family will definitely be going again.

Tof idee die kippenrennen en dan stopt het ook. Het eten zelf te veel dezelfde smaak.Ook na het laten verwijderen van de koriander die echt overal werd opgedaan, bleef de smaak nog eenzijdig.Toen we opmerkten dat het niet lusten van koriander  (de zogenaamde zeepsmaak waarvan onderzoek aangetoond heeft dat het een genengeval is) een goede reden is om dat toch te vermelden op de kaart, werden daarover vriendelijk de verantwoordelijkheid bij ons gelegd. Wij hadden dit namelijk moeten melden, werd ons meegedeeld. Daar waar bv de betere Mexicaan dit wel op z'n kaart meldt. Naast de vlakke smaak, valt op te merken dat de aangeboden kaart niet bulkt van de creativiteit over mogelijkheden met kip. Er lijkt vooral gemikt op een zo laag mogelijke foodkost. Dit vertaalt zich duidelijk in menumogelijkheden en de smaak. Het interieur is tof maar van 'n interieur alleen eet je niet.

Read the reviews and decided to try Ellis.  For a buger joint the menu is surprisingly extensive with chicken, fish and veggie options as well as the usual and (and not so usual) meat options.The finger food and the sides offer good options also, the coleslaw, sweet potatoe fries and the calamari were excellent.  My buger was superpowers and the draft craft beer was very good.There are a lot of places to eat on this strip but this has to be up there for value die money and quality.

Was het niet van de vrouwelijke ober met meer rolleyes dan woorden, ik zou er 4 geven. Maar dit was echt er los over. Wel jammer. Want lekkere burger. Verder gehorige zaak. Muziek, gebabbel door elkaar. Je moet er tegen kunnen. Stoorde mij niet, anderen in het gezelschap wel.

This place lives up to the hype and then some! The veggie dim sum assortment was crazy good and the pad thai may have been the best I’ve ever had (and I’ve been to Thailand and live in SF!) Lisbon is lucky!
Je m'attendais à des plats quelconques mais nous avons appréciés les plats, tant visuellement que gustativement.Très beau cadre, au Jeune personnel très sympathique.

Op zoek om iets te eten,maandagavond is wat lastiger. Heerlijke hamburgers, met nacho's als voorafje,lekker met gesmolten kaas en 3 dips erbij! Zeer vriendelijke bediening,hamburgers waren erg lekker met bijpassend biertje. Gefrituurde uienringen waren ook erg goed! Leuke zaak,een aanrader!

Grote en ruime gelegenheid in centrum Hasselt met terras. Absoluut veel beter dan de klassieke hamburgerketens. Voordeel is de kaart met veel keuze en ook voldoende smaakvolle vegan en veggie opties. Snelle bediening.
Absolutely love the concept: Honey boiled wood fired bagels.  However the execution did not live up to the expectation.  Bagels were good but a bit dense.
We had a pizza and a salad here, and some late night coffees and cookies and cakes as well. Nothing special, but good value for money (especially for the food).
This Restaurant is really GOOD. Friendly & efficient staff provide EXCELLENT & FRIENDLY Service and food is delicious. So good - that we returned 2 days later -- Highly recommended.

I lunghi tempi di attesa ci hanno portato a chiedere di essere sistemati all' interno del locale anziché sulla piazza in cui il clima diventava via via troppo rigido.Abbiamo ottenuto un secco diniego e continuato ad attendere.Il personale è poco professionale, la cameriera che ci ha servito ha avuto difficoltà nel comprendere le nostre richieste in lingua francese e inglese.Le pietanze ordinate erano nella mediaÈ un locale da evitare!

We've been here several times.  We find the food is very tasty and reasonably priced.  Not sure what it's called, but we get this pasta dish with 4 cheeses (??).  They serve large portions so we share it along with a salad.  It is delish!!   Service is OK -- the staff are not overly friendly, sometimes it's like they just don't want to be there.  But they do know how to cook there, they take care of us and the food is served hot and pretty quickly.  So we just brush it off to the the fact that we're there late and the staff is tired!

I’ll jump straight in to the foodreview. I tried the asian pork and my company had the goatcheese salad. The flavor of my pork was very good. All in all I was really pleased with my food. The goatcheese salad looked good but was quite bland and a bit booring in flavor. But overall was ok. As for service. Well they were friendly and that’s about all the nice things I can say. Now for the bad part. First of it’s expensive for the simple fact that they don’t cook your food they just plate it up. To start with I was served the salmondish. I handen it back and within a minute they came out with my pork. Not because they accidently had it readymade in the back but because that’s how long it takes to put on a plate. Now on to my dates salad. It lacken dressing so We asked for more. It was missing pears which We had to ask about and got the explanation that ”pears was out of season”. Ok? How about explaining it before We order the food.  You might think that with all those problems it was a packed place or busy. But there was only us and one more couple in the entire restaurant. And we were the only ones eating. I might consider coming back for the pork if the lower the cost about 30kr and wanted a quick meal.
Have wanted to go here since it opened and finally did. What can I say? Outstanding from start to finish!

Nous avons réservé la formule EVG complète avec le repas et nous avons passé un super moment ! Super accueil de Yohan qui nous a accompagné tout le long de la soirée et toujours avec sourire ! Le repas autour d’une pierrade était très bon, de quoi nous mettre d’aplomb pour les activités (bowling, jeux d’arcade, billard). Nous avons bien rigolé, les défis au top et le gage très amusant ! Je ne peux que recommander ! 👍🏻

na een aantal positieve bezoeken, ditmaal een dikke tegenvaller: we kunnen niet anders dan de koude hamburgers en dito frieten terugsturen -wat een ontgoocheling als de nieuwe versie opnieuw maar "lauw" is! als compensatie stelde de dienster voor de frietjes niet aan te rekenen - bij afrekening werd eerst gepoogd maar 1 porti niet aan te rekenen - jammer - tot nogtoe maakten we veel reclame om een "deftige" burger met verse frietjes bij jullie te komen eten - we wilden binnen zitten en er werd (tegen onze zin) een plaats aangeduid vlakbij een grote betonnen paal en vlakbij een krijsende baby - een beetje later kozen alle anderen zomaar zelf een plaats.Als je hamburger wilt verkopen aan 18€ + extra voor de frietjes&mayo, mag je wel zorgen dat de hamburger niet voorgebakken (koud) is en het slaatje een beetje beter verzorgen (nu standaard preparé uit een grote kom geschept)
에*베이글 도**베이글 등 워낙 유명한 곳들이 있는데,저는 그곳보다 오히려 더 좋았어요. 웨이팅은 훨씬 짧구요. 무엇보다 베이글 자체가 간도 잘되어있고 맛있었습니다.
Staff was friendly but worse chickhen ceaser salad I've had ,did not enjoy it at all my daughter had penne arrabiata I do better at home

Went here for a late coffee/night cap, thought we would try a more local business as oppose to franchise down the road...We should have gone Starbucks. Both coffees were cold and the staff (tweedle de and tweedle dumb) were so disinterested. They were clock watching and couldn’t wait to close up and get to that tea party. MUST DO BETTER.
Best option to combine some meat with salad and vegetable. Self service, simply delicious, not expensive and fast available.

Le personnel ne sait même pas communiquer en français.Service déplorable. Pour l’aperitif, 1 convive avait commandé 1 fanta ; après 1 commande et 2 rappels et après une attente de 20 Minutes , il a été servi.1 autre personne a commandé 1 friture de patates douces en supplément ; commande que nous n’avons jamais reçue mais qui a été facturée.Déplorable et à éviter.
Our go to place for Sunday lunch when in Norwich. Friendly staff, though food can be hit and miss. When it’s hot and fresh it’s wonderful.

We couldn't fit in a dinner at the Olive Tree Restaurant, so decided to have a quick bite at this store while strolling through the square....it was delicious! A perfect on the go lunch and the ingredients are really fresh.
Visited with friends. Had to wait 30 minutes for a table. Food delicious . Premium burgers with lots of flavours. Service slow but staff helpful we would return but best to book a table in advance
La comida excelente y la atención también, en verdad es un lugar para recomendar y volver siempre. Tanto las pastas como la pizza me gustaron mucho.

Geweldig leuk concept! Je kan 1 van de spaghetti’s kiezen die de chef heeft samengesteld OF zelf een spaghetti naar keuze samenstellen. Je saus, pasta, toppings helemaal zelf kiezen. Erg aangename bediening, heel vriendelijk. Voor herhaling vatbaar!!
Amazing set menu with good selection of food , reasonably priced ..food and service amazing , very attentive...will be back

This restaurant has always been a 10/10 for me. The best food in Colchester town by far! All the staff are lovely (and i'm sure know me as a regular now) Nothing is too much to ask & i've always found the service great. I think the set menu is such a great idea, it's so affordable if you want to go out for food with friends often but don't want to constantly be spending £20+. I recommend it to everyone.
Really enjoyed the lemon cake and blueberry muffin! Really nice place to get a quick bite and grab on the train!

After a busy day in London took my 12 year old daughter here for an eve meal. Warmly welcomed, food delicious and staff very friendly :) Great choice on the menu and the option of standard or a small portion was perfect for my daughter. Garlic bread - she said this was the nest se had evert tasted!

My wife and I ate here on a Sunday evening. It is fairly local to us but we have not been for a while.The place was busy but not full, there were plenty of staff to wait on us, our particular waitress was Evie, who although young and only working there a few weeks was polite, professional and competent.We were not ravenously hungry, so opted for some shared nibbles of Olives and Pork scratchings as a starter.My wife had a steak with new potatoes, I had the seafood mixed grill with caeser salad and onion rings. Food was served hot and promptly with no real wait after our starters.We were both happy with our main dishes, but I was disappointed with the caeser salad. What was served was a good sized portion of lettuce with a caeser style sauce and a few very small croutons, not in my opinion what a proper caeser salad should be, as the egg, anchovies and parmesan cheese were missing.However this would not prevent us from going back, I may just choose a different side dish to my meal.
Top tent niet groot maar leuk ingericht .Het belangrijkste de kip is Heerlijk!!!!En de bediening is  zeer vriendelijk 😊👏

Employee who greeted us was rather abrupt and rather cocky. Other employees were pleasant. Asked to sit outside next to river and employee remarked, “it’s raining” I asked if we could sit in yard off back of restaurant and she again replied, “it’s raining”. It wasn’t raining just cloudy but pleasant. I felt they just didn’t want to serve us on their beautiful deck. Kitchen was open to restaurant and fascinating to watch. Decor was authentic and lovely. Food was delicious.
Leuke relaxte sfeer in dit restaurant.Mooie kaart met hamburgers die net anders zijn.Ook mooie kaart met (bijpassende) bieren.Vriendelijke en vlotte bediening.
Met the manager from Wales he was very welcoming. Had a fab spaghetti Bol it was very tasty. Fun buzzy place with great pasta dishes.

Bij binnenkomst bleek het restaurant een stuk groter dan verwacht. We werden naar een tafel gebracht waar de medewerker zonder iets te zeggen meteen weg liep. Na 5 tot 10 minuten kwam er iemand anders om een drankje op te nemen en we hebben ook meteen maar eten besteld.De drankjes duurde vervolgens nog even voor deze kwamen. Toen de burgers eenmaal kwamen bleken deze van een goed formaat te zijn. Hierdoor zijn ze echter wel lastig te eten. Ook de smaak kan beter. De saus ernaast was echt nodig om het smaak te geven. De bediening was verder met name ongeïnteresseerd en kortaf. Dit kan echt nog veel beter.Uiteindelijk maar geen dessert genomen.

Leuke tent met heerlijk ouderwetse muziek. Ook de menukaart is lekker apart.Het eten was heerlijk, het leuke er van is dat je je gerecht naaf eigen smaakt kunt samenstellen. Daarbij schenken ze ook heerlijke biertjes. Hier zouden we zeker nog een keer terug gaan.
Great place to sit, work, have a lot of coffee, juice, cake. Could stay here all day. Staff is best.

Me and my family arrived in this restaurant for dinner on a regular Tuesday night. We ordered drinks — which included a homemade ice tea. When the drinks arrived the server gave me two glasses of ice tea instead of one and wasn’t even fully loaded. Just half of the glass. For 3,5€!! The ice tea was good but that stops here. Ordered nachos but it arrived 15 minutes later: regular tortilla chips with Parmesan cheese on it. No tomatoes, guacamole, sour cream... just shredded Parmesan. Then, the chicken arrived. On the menu it doesn’t mentioned that it’s SOAKED in super super sugary barbecue sauce.  It was absolutely disgusting. 13€ for 3 chicken tacos soaked in barbecue sauce. Didn’t even include fries. Why isn’t it written on the menu that the sauce is sweet barbecue? It doesn’t say anything on the menu so I was expecting regular chicken with province herbs or something like that. My mom ordered salad but there was no dressing on it. Last but not least, the servers never asked how was the food, so we just couldn’t even tell them to bring dressing for the salad. I don’t know if you eat raw lettuce? But I personally but vinaigrette on it to add taste. Finally, when we paid they messed up the order and charged the ice tea twice and that was their error. Never coming back to this restaurant ever. It’s a shame.

Samen met dochter heerlijke tosti gegeten. De koffie was goed en mijn dochter wil nog een keer terug voor Tony's warme GUILTY chocolademelk met caramelsaus. Wat een goede sfeer hangt hier in het modern gezellig ingerichte restaurantje. De echte schommels zijn wel heel erg leuk en de stoelen prima. De presentatie van de gerechten  erg leuk.
bon restaurant de burgers situé à proximité des bassins et du MAS, pas de surprise mais choix de saveurs différentes

Mercredi soir qui est un soir d'aperos animés au châtelain on y vas pour la première fois ,ambiance glaciale avec une clim insupportable, et surtout une jeune gerante qui avait l'air limite angoissée qui a refusé de servir des clients à 21.30 car trop tard,et qui a empilé  toutes les chaises sur les tables à 22.00 pendant qu'on mangeait encore....
Virkelig kedelig salat med kylling  Kyllingen virkede ikke ordentlig stegt, så turde ikke spise det, og endte med at smide salaten ud. Spild af penge!

Passed this place many times and thought we would give it a try,Great value 3 courses, staff attentive but not hanging around behind you,Probably wouldn't park at the front next time as other cars make it difficult to reverse out, but that's other customers not the restaurants fault,Will certainly be calling back.

Vre-se-lijk... Ongemotiveerde jobstudente, traag, zelfingenomen en dan nog op de koop toe de meatlover nog rauw van binnen, en dit voor de democratische prijs van €15,50!!! In tegenstelling met Ellis is de Quick een luxe restaurant.

Il locale ha un bel giardino e la cucina con forno a vista di bella impressione .Entrando frigo con salumi italiani ( molto cari peraltro ) , poi un corridoio , una sala interna di fronte alla cucina e poi il giardino su due piani che affaccia su un parcheggio .Il menu offre per lo più pizze e spaghetti .Scarsissima e veramente poco " italiana " scelta di insalate .Antipasti pochi e carissimi ( un piatto piccolo con bufala e crudo 17,50 euro .) tra le scelte quella che si è dimostrata la più infelice è stata la panzanella , che , anziché proprie un piatto altamente tipico , era una rivisitazione e si presentava come una specie di pappa di pomodoro intrisa di pangrattato . Gli arancini avevano il riso all'interno crudo.La frittura di calamari era più una tempra di verdure con qualche ( pochi ) pezzo di calamaro .I prezzi mediamente tutti elevati per l'offerta e le quantità.L'ennesimo locale che " vuole fare l'italiano " a prezzi elevati , e senza l'onesta qualità , sfruttando un alone un po' snob come specchietto per le allodole .Nei bagni la luce scarsissima , varrebbe la pena illuminare un po' di più .

We waren er toevallig beland. Heel vriendelijk, gezellige zaak en lekker eten. We zouden er zo opnieuw naartoe gaan, maar we verschoten wel even van de rekening. Kijk zeker op de kaart als je een wijn besteld... 17pond voor 2 wijnen vond ik iets te duur.
Llegamos al restaurante a las 21:30hs, nos tomaron nota y hora y media después aun esperábamos por la comida. Nos fuimos sin cenar y sin una disculpa por parte del personal.

the starter boards are great for sharing and offer a good selection and sensible portion size when shared. Mains are good, with steaks medium-rare served exactly as such. Vegan options are present despite being a steakhouse.  The gnocchi is a little too olive dominated, though.Passion fruit cheesecake is mega!However, the post meals apertifs were dire. The espresso shot clearly not tamped enough before pulling the shot, the shot too short for a double and crema non-existant. Costa express service station bad. The espresso martinis were even worse. In fact, the worst I have ever had - the pre-made ones you get at music festivals are somehow superior. The ratio of vodka to coffee liqueur was way off (not even sure the latter was included) plus all of the pitfalls of the espresso shot that are mentioned above. This was amplified by using the wrong kind of glass that spread the non existant crema even thinner.
O local , a padaria muito boa, paes adequados, pequenas refeicoes muito boas com qualidade e preco justo . Peca no atendimento ao cliente , na chegada e na orientacao dos pratos.

The place looked like a typical Dutch Starbucks, but more affordable. My girlfriend had an apple pie and I had a piece of a delicious cherry cheesecake with an orange juice. We were really satisfied by our breakfast and we both enjoyed the warm atmosphere.

We visited Middleton‘s for lunch last month for my partners birthday. And was put in a pokey table in the corner right next to the food hatch. And it just went downhill from there! There was only four of us, we waited 15 minutes for our drinks and a further hour for our main meals. The gentleman serving us was polite and friendly enough but the waiting time was just ridiculous. We had only put two hours on our car parking ticket meaning we had to rush food and get out the door very very quickly. We were offered a £10 discount on our meal which was kind but rushing our food just ruined our meal! My partner visited again last night with a group of friends and was given poor service poor drinks and poor food. Very disappointing. We won’t be back !

We waited and waited and waited. Then they finally showed up to ask for our order. The starter appeared after about 15 minutes with the drinks. Nothing complex. Then we waited and waited and waited, then we waited some more. I finally got up to confront them as several people who had arrived and ordered well after us had received their orders. It finally showed up and it wasn't worth the wait. It was warm not hot. They are so disorganized .... Too many kids working. Go somewhere else and don't give them any business because the best thing that can happen for this restaurant is that it can go out of business.

Alles wat fout kon lopen, liep ook fout. Zeer onervaren personeel. Bij simpele bestelling van 7 cola's en 1 rode wijn liep het al volledig fout. Ze kwamen met te weinig cola's af en wat later brengen ze dan weer te veel.. Communicatie tussen het personeel ontbreekt compleet. Na 1,5u wachten komen ze zeggen dat er iets is misgelopen en dat ze net aan het eten begonnen zijn, maar ze boden ons wel elk een gratis drankje aan maar ook daar klopten de aantallen in het drinken weer niet... Ik had de taco's besteld en die kip was koud, bij de rest viel de smaak wel beter mee. Na de rekening te vragen bleek daar ook weer een fout in gekropen zijn,hadden ze ons 10 euro te veel aangerekend. Btw: op het eerste zicht lijkt het een niet al te duur restaurant, maar wil je wat frietjes/patatjes of wat groentjes bij je kip dan betaal je dat allemaal extra.
Quirky decor and friendly service.Burgers were very tasty. Chicken, beef, lamb and vegan. Recommend.

After waiting for half an hour to place an order we then waited for 45 minutes for our food. One of the meals was not the correct order, rather than taking the whole meal the fries were taken away. The wedges were then brought after having to ask again for them. The chips on the other meals had obviously been sat for ages and were hard, the wedges were not cooked enough. As for the sticky ribs, dry and tasteless. The restaurant was not busy at all and the staff were not attentive. Been here before and had fantastic food so this was a real let down for my daughters birthday meal.
Very nice family meal Very good menu and very good menu for gluten free people I had steak which was very nice Would happily revisit to eat again

Visited with friends for a lunch time treat but didn’t realise it would take over 3 hours !! Plus side , food was ok , not excellent but ok. Negatives , over an hour to get a starter , then 50 minutes to get a main dish followed by being told that half the sweets on the menu weren’t available. We complained but were told they were short staffed so not their fault. Wouldn’t rush back.

My family have stayed in Bruges on holiday a couple of times in the past few years... we often eat out at local restaurants... Yesterday we made our 1st visit to ‘Ellis Gourmet Burger’.We will not be visiting again!!!They must be short staffed as we only saw 2 people working... Actually we only saw one girl working (I must admit that she was very polite).To cut a long story short, the burgers arrived.. ‘funky chicken’ burger was tough, stringy and over cooked. The mayonnaise on the burger was like water!! And don’t ask me to tell you what the vegetables were that were inside the burger as they were unrecognisable!!! The ‘sides’ arrived without the dips, and as there was no one around, I had to go inside the restaurant to find someone to ask for a dip!When it came to paying, (the system is that you take the ticket given to you by the waiting staff at the beginning of the meal into the restaurant and pay at the till) I had to wait to get into the restaurant to pay and eventually had to say ‘excuse me’ to a staff member and his friend who were laughing and joking around in the doorway, completely oblivious of me trying to get in a young girl trying to get out!!!The owners of the restaurant are either unaware of the state of the food and staff, or just don’t really care, as the restaurant will continue to do well due to the amount of tourists that visit Bruges on a daily basis and the fact that the decor looks ‘trendy’ and attractive to younger adults and teens!!If you value a good meal, don’t eat here.

Every time that I come back to Belgium, I always come to De Burgerij to eat a burger because I find them really amazing! The quality of the burger is good and the price compared to the high prices of Belgium are really good. Nice place and you can sit both inside or outside. Really suggested!

Schöne Speisenauswahl,  jeweils mit Bierempfehlung,  so wie sich das für Belgien gehört,  und auch ein paar nette vegetarische Alternativen. Ambiente ist stylisch rustikal, ein Büffelkopf hängt mittig im Raum. Bedienung dezent zurückhaltend aber freundlich. Essen und Getränke haben sehr gut geschmeckt,  mein Wein allerdings war mit 0,33 ltr. ausgezeichnet,  gebracht wurde ca. die Hälfte...nachweislich weniger als 0,2 ltr. !!Die Bedienung darauf ansprechend, meinte diese: das wäre die Standardgrösse und immer so.....Ich find's sehr befremdlich,  hab mich geärgert,  und nur dafür gibt es 2 Punkte Abzug.

Por fuera el local tiene buena pinta, así que emtramos. El local es agradable, vas, pides y te hacen la pasta delante tuya usando pasta precocida de bolsitas que tienen ya preparadas. El sabor ni fu ni fa, muy normalito. Lo peor es que pedí un plato de "pesto rosso" y me dieron uno de pesto normal porque el que preparaba mi plato wstaba discutiendo con su encargada a la vez y con el ambiente que había cualquiera dice algo encima.

Great coffee and interior. Service is slow and poor, our waitress (slim dark haired girl) was miserable slow and sour. You have to pay for tap water - the pretext is that it’s filtered. But it’s tap water and you shouldn’t have to pay. We had coffees and were going to have lunch but decided against it. Not going back and would not recommend it. You can get everything you want elsewhere on the street and there’s no need to put up with poor service and a charge for tap water.
Once you've cracked the system, you can enjoy really good food and decent wine. I especially enjoyed their delicious baby spinach salads.

I met some friends who now live in  NZ and wanted a place with good food near Oxford Street where one could have a conversation without shouting.We had a bottle of Prosecco as it is my birthday week a d I had Pebble with 4 cheeses and they had  Calzone Classico and Tagliatelle Pollo with Asparagus a d we shared a  large green salad and had an apple tart with Ice cream as well as coffees. It was a most enjoyable lunch the service was good ,friendly and not intrusive and had a good catch up. Well done Spaghetti House

Tout est dit dans le titre. La nourriture est très bonne. Nous avons commandé un poulet qui a été flambé sous nos yeux. C'est assez spectaculaire.  Il était délicieux.  Nous regrettons simplement l'attente : pour la prise de commande et  l'attente entre les plats. Un plat a été oublié et pour éviter l'attente je ne l'ai pas réclamé.
