Nous avons réglé directement à l'intérieur du restaurant pour éviter l'attente de l'addition. Bref au final si vous n'êtes pas pressés foncez car les plats sont délicieux. Sinon...
Antipasti mangeable. Risotto horrible, comme une impression de manger des cailloux tellement c’était dur. Raviolis ricotta épinard, sans ricotta ...

Blijven beste brugers van Knokke, hoog op smaak, ieder detail doordacht en kwaliteit. Frietjes top, die mayo! Heerlijke cole slaw, milk shake. Zomer jobstudenten: supervriendelijk, hardwerkend en keurig beleefd. Reageerden zeer correct op vervelende franstalige (is het toeval?) klanten, die onredelijk en grof waren....

Had a great first visit, food was great and the service was excellent (served by Michaela). As it was a birthday celabration we decided to go all out and have the 36oz ribeye each (it's massive). We usually have ribeye medium rare, but next time we'd order it medium because it's so big the fat needs time to melt.We enjoyed the Chelmsford restaurant so much we went back a second time, this time having a burger and chips and the prime mixed grill. The mixed grill comes highly recommended and we will for sure be ordering that again.

This is a relaxed kind of place. Friendly young staff gave it a cool feel. There’s a good selection of burgers, for vegetarians and vegans too. I played safe and got the classic, and Mike got the Ellis Special 2.0 (special secret sauce and bacon etc) with onion rings and sweet potato fries to share between us. They were fab. And the dip we got with the fries and onion rings was to die for. A kind of mayo we think, very thick consistency and looked peppered. Lush. Great service and you just pay at the bar when you’re done. Perfect for a chilled night out!

Per chi non riesce a fare a meno della cucina Italiana anche in vacanza, in questa catena di ristoranti può trovare l'aria di casa. La qualità è nella media, nulla di eccezionale. Il posto è molto carino e da l'idea di un ristorante di fascia medio/alta ma per ordinare bisogna fare tutto da soli in quanto è un self service. All'ingresso viene consegnata una card che memorizza gli ordini effettuati che poi si consegna in cassa per il pagamento. Sarebbe opportuno che gli addetti spiegassero il funzionamento della card e come effettuare gli ordini perchè ho visto diverse persone in difficoltà nell'utilizzo di questo sistema.
Excellent service and food.  Never disappoints. Sits on top of hill with great views around you. Our go to place

Bij aankomst werden we al meteen vriendelijk ontvangen. Ook de bediening was top. Voor mij een verrassend aanbod van kipgerechten op het menu, smakelijk bereid en leuk gepresenteerd. Zeker een aanrader.

Big portions, to much for a single person but still you will try to eat it all since it is absolutely delicious. Took the holy grail in horse size and managed to eat it all, took a 2 hour nap afterwards....

Brabant staat bekend om zijn gastvrijheid maar dit restaurant is de uitzondering die de regel bevestigd. Om half vijf iets drinken met een borrelgarnituur is niet mogelijk, omdat de tafels al gereserveerd zijn voor het diner. Het moet niet gekker worden.
Came to London for first time with partner came here for some dinner. Was delicious and reasonably priced. Friendly staff. Would definitely recommend and will come again
Het concept van Ellis kenden we al uit Antwerpen. In Knokke dezelfde kwaliteit maar de bediening kwam niet echt op gang. Lekker gegeten maar wat meer schwung is de volgende keer welkom.

Kellner sind nicht besonders freundlich und das System wirkt etwas chaotisch.Burger sind unterdurchschnittlich, da fertig patty sehr trocken gebraten. Normale Fritten waren nicht durch, süßkartoffelfritten super. Zu dem Preis leider enttäuschend.Die Kinder-Spielecke ist top

Mahlzeit zusammen...Ich war letzten Sonntag mit zwei Freunden bei What‘s Beef und ich muss sagen das wir geschmacklich schon begeistert von den Burgern waren. Ist mittlerweile paar Jährchen her das ich dort war. Es war eigentlich alles super,bis auf die Preise,die halten mich wirklich davon ab hier öfter zu essen und sind auch Grund warum ich keine volle Punktzahl gebe. Wäre echt schön wenn sich in dem Punkt was tun würde.Mfg

Gisterenmiddag hier neergestreken voor een lunch naar aanleiding van verblijf in de buurt. Vriendelijk ontvangen door de kelner en steeds vriendelijk bediend van begin tot einde. We hebben spaghetti (verse pasta) bolognaise gegeten, lekkere saus die goed gekruid was. Als dessert een chocolademousse en tiramisu, aanraders!Toen we de rekening kregen waren we aangenaam verrast, lekker eten voor een schappelijke prijs!

It ,didn’t go well,when we got to check in,and my cousins booking was not on the system,she phoned and made the booking!She ordered blue,sirloin steak.It was certainly blue,but stone cold!!! Manager took it away,and got another,which was Luke warm,but certainly not the same thickness or quality of the first piece.Gosh,I had eaten my salad ,before her 2 nd dinner arrived,hopeless.The people on the table next to us,waited 40 mins,nothing arrived.

Service is terrible and the food is even worse. Waited over an hour for a burger that you could get in any street corner for less that €5. Not home made burger but frozen patty that they overcook for over €17 with no sides. The worst experience ever. I would be happy to wait an hour if the burger was nicely made. Amazing how something as easy as a burger can still be done terribly wrong.

Uno dei peggiori posti dove abbia mai mangiato, qualità scadente dei piatti (anche se ho ordinato due menù salati, non so del dolce) e oltretutto c'era anche un piccione che girava per il locale e beccava gli avanzi caduti dai tavoli.
Le Ellis gourmet Burger sert une large gamme de burgers, de viandes ainsi que veggies. On peut choisir l'accompagnement (frites, coleslaw, salade, ..). Le service est correct, rapide.

Partendo dal presupposto che sia una catena tedesca di cibo italiano, sarebbe più che normale pensare che sia una "troiaiata". Invece il cibo non era affatto male e il sapore era simile a quello di casa Italia, il prezzo nella media e consiglio in particolare la carbonara nonostante ci aggiungano un po' di cipolla. La pizza è piuttosto bassa e vi sono gusti particolari, ma per quel che pagate in Germania ci sta. Se avete bisogno di mettere qualcosa di veloce nello stomaco e pagare poco nonostante il metodo self service e pagamento attraverso una card d'ingresso ve lo consiglio ed è adatto anche a chi soffre di celiachia. Tempi di attesa un po' lunghi forse.

J'avais lu les commentaires positifs et négatifs au sujet de cet endroit et - étant dans le quartier - j'ai voulu le tester. Je rejoins, sans hésiter, tous les commentaires négatifs publiés sur la qualité du plat (spaghetti trop fins), sur les arnaques aux suppléments de toutes sortes et sur le personnel non professionnel qui semble considérer leur job comme un sacrifice...

I’m always coming for lunch because the set menu is great but last time when I arrived after a long time I saw something strange... They have changed the set menu. Before it was perfect and I don't really understand why you had to change something that is already good. Anyway please put back the mushrooms on the set menu. Everything else is great
Lekkere, speciale poke bowls. Voor mij mocht er iets meer dressing op, mijn vriend vond het zo goed. De mocktail met matcha vond ik zeer lekker en origineel.
Heerlijke burgers, echt lekker! Duurde wel lang totdat het personeel je had gezien,om nog iets te drinken.
We have a vegetarian daughter who had the nut roast. We had the pork and lamb. Great food and service.

Nice place & good locationFood can be a bit hit & miss I usually have the set lunch simple food but a good lunch & decent valueTried the Sunday roast twice now had lamb which was just small chunks of fat/gristle not many potato’s or veg apart from a big pot of sloppy cauliflower avoid at all costs Was going to tell waiter but he didn’t ask so figured be better to post here for others to read I’ll maybe cautiously try the normal lunch deal next time never Sunday roast again

Booked a table by phone last week for yesterday - my friend arrived before me and gave them my name - couldnt' find the booking anywhere!  Luckily they had a spare table. After I arrived our meal. Mine was a 'blue' sirloin steak. Cooked to perfection but stone cold, so the waiter told the manager and they said they would cook another. When they brought the second steak out, it was a fair bit thinner (!) and grisley..however, to avoid more hue har, I ate it. I think though the second steak was one that would have been cooked for their 'special' lunchtime deal whereas I had ordered a £12 sirloin. However I must say the manager was very good and didn't charge for the meal, but I feel this should be fed back so that they are a bit more diligent in the future. I could have got a much nicer steak in the local pub, but Middletons is supposed to be superior to the pubs ..... definitely not yesterday!  We are not after a free meal - we had one yesterday - just want the standard to improve. Then we will be back!The place is lovely and clean and the staff are lovely - just a real shame about the steak - hopefully this was a one-off.
Long story short, service is bad, too expensive and you'll wait too long. Save yourself some time and steer clear.
The best non-meat burger I've ever had!  My wife had the curry bowl and she thought it too was amazing.

Service très appréciable, les serveurs sont attentionnés sans être oppressants, pizzas savoureuses, cocktails délicieux ! Je ne peux que recommander l’intérieur comme l’extérieur chaleureux à la décoration soignée de ce restaurant italien !

1st time  been. Here. Very nice building. Staff friendly and helpful Starter. Fine. Main course. Fine nice  and hot and reasonable size  Desert. Very poor.  Ordered. Sticky toffee pudding with ice cream.   The portion sizes was very small.  The sauce  was just a frothy. Mess with no taste no thickness the ice cream was even a scoop. The pudding was problematic a third of a normal portion size.  Very disappointed.  My wife ordered the Middleton’s Sunday again very small.  Only 1. Bit bit of brownie and a little bit of sauce. No cream or anything again disappointing.
Het vlees was volledig uitgebakken tot op schoenzoolniveau en het vlees was van slecht kwaliteit. Je kan bijna beter vlees vinden bij een frituur!

We had friends coming over from Ireland and arranged to meet at Middletons for a meal and a catch up. Service was prompt and very good and the food was without fault. Fairly priced and i can recommend a meal here anytime.

My husband and I have eaten evening meals here in Norwich excellent. I wrote a glowing review in 2018 as we thought the Sunday roast was excellent.On 21st July my husband and I went for another Sunday roast. We like our veg not overcooked we started to eat the veg it was not cooked. Carrots parsnips broccoli they seemed raw hard. We were very disappointed, my husband said not eating there again. I said it's just a one off bad lunch, so today I was in Norwich so went for a Sunday lunch. Was really wanting it to be good so I could encourage my husband to come with me next week. The veg was raw again struggle to cut carrots broccoli. I saw someone at next table had left their veg, and the waiter was carrying another plate of beef to kitchen. I hate to write a bad review but what's happening to Middletons. You could always rely on good meal. Never had a bad meal in the evening always very good!!!

I’ve come to Bruges on an overnight stop with work and needed somewhere tasty and efficient to eat that isn’t far from the Novotel Centrum where I was staying. Fair to say that I was not disappointed with Ellis’ Burgers and they definitely lived up to their reviews on TripAdvisor! The food tasted fresh and was very well cooked! The staff were very helpful and also spoke good English which is always a bonus! I would definitely come again.

Ce « Best burger in town » aurait pu être mieux. J’ai pris le meatlover, qui est très bon, mais aurait pu être exceptionnel avec un bon pain. Les frites annoncées comme « vrai frites belges » ne le sont par contre absolument pas...  La sauce maison est par contre très bonne. Les nachos sont corrects. Le cadre est sympa.

è una catena, se ne trovano molti in giro. Abbiamo mangiato qui un pranzo. Toast buoni, di dimensioni giuste (ma eventualmente si può prendere doppio). Servizio lento, sono arrivati i toast e non le bibite. Quando sono andata a chiedere le bibite, mi è sembrato quasi di dar fastidio a chiederle. Però nel complesso un buon pranzo. Ottimo rapporto prezzo/qualità.

Was advised of this place as a vegan option after having brunch at Toast on arrival in Bruges. Good service, prompt courteous. English spoken very well. Good number of vegan options. Excellent selection of Belgian beers. Large portions of food. Burgers very nut based. Mine was hazelnut based. Pretty good with nice relish- we both enjoyed the burgers well enough but both felt a bit too nutty for our palate.

We tried Middletown’s for the first time on a Thursday night, it was quiet when we arrived but reasonably busy when we left. Service was ok - and so was the food, but we wouldn’t say it was great or good value for money. My sirloin was supposed to be medium well done but was just well done, dry and small. The chips and jacket potato  were ok and the mushroom and tomato very small. Overall it was just average and for the price we paid would rather spend a tiny bit more and go to Miller and Carter for a great steak and accompaniments!
Really good welcome for solo traveller and well fed. What’s not to like?!  Highly recommended for good value experience in Central London.

While visiting Utrecht we wanted to have ribs & burgers but not in a fast food restaurant where it’s all full so we decided to try Fridays out and see if same as abroad as the sitting area is bigger and more quieter .We had the lunch set menu selection for 14€ where you can choose a starter , main course and a drink and were not disappointed!it was just what we wanted without spending a fortune for lunch being on a day trip. mozzarella sticks, chicken fingers, fries and the ribs were excellent and tender!They also have kids menu with two small burgers which is perfect if kids not too hungry or want to share . Just the margarita for lunch was maybe too much but it’s one of the drink selections included in the price . Service very friendly and guest orientated especially the Greek server .And for those who likes sports you know there are always TVs around the restaurant. Toilets very clean
Caro, poca cantidad, mala calidad y parece que te perdonan la vida atendiéndole.Eso sí, 18€ por 4 desayunos simples u escasos
Wij hebben de ceasersalade gegeten , de taco’s en de frietjes en alles was heerlijk ! Wij komen zeker terug

I went to the Middletons Steakhouse & Grill Milton Keynes a few months ago and had an amazing meal.  I then took other family members there as well and they too commented on how good the food was.  Will definitely recommend it to others.

Stylischer Laden mit sehr freundlichen Mitarbeitern.Bestellung Cheesecore Double für 12,- €. Die selbst gemachten Burgerbrötchen sind perfekt und der 280gr. Pattie war sehr saftig und auf den Punkt medium rare wie gewünscht gebraten. Für mich dürfte man etwas mutiger bei der Würzung (Salz) sein.Diese Anregung wurde aber auch sofort angenommen. Werde sicher wiederkommen und "The Killer" testen. Danke an das Team!
Dean and David hat mich vom Geschmack und der Frische der Zutaten noch nie enttäuscht. Allerdings sind die Preise eher hoch.

Me suis dit «  vais aller manger un petit bout vite fait sympa «  parce que j’étais en ville .Les pâtes au fromages n’ont rien d’exceptionnel , la sauçe est ok et les pâtes était trop cuits....13€.Les nachos n’ont rien non plus de terribles...8€...et les sauces en supplément a 1,50€.La sauce Bolognaise est bonne.
Very bad service, rude people came to pay and a bold waiter shouted at me when I tried to pay                                                                         .........................
Προτιμήστε την κόκκινη μακαρονάδα με κρεμμύδι. Το service εξαιρετικό. Η πληρωμή μόνο με κάρτα! Η πλατεία υπέροχη.

Lunchtime meal for 2. Welcome was warm and friendly, service was quick and efficient. Food was fast and tasty. Beware...Portions are large! Although this is part of a chain, it feels like an independent restaurant. The staff seem to genuinely care about the wellbeing of their customers.  I was really impressed, willdefinitely visit again.

La comida no está mal pero no es de recibo estar esperando más de una hora para que te sirvan . Muchos de los camarer@s están vagando sin rumbo y sin hacer nada . Cuando por fin te traen la comida ni servilletas ni cubiertos , uno de los vasos rotos ..... no volveremos más

My Family and I have been to Middletons Kings Lynn on many a family occasion birthday’s and anniversary etc and have had an amazing time with great customer service however this evening for my birthday we have experienced the worst customer service I think I have ever seen or received and also some of the coldest meals. Our trouble started when we had our starters delivered and our garlic mushrooms were stone cold, we wait for about 5 minutes to see if a waiter/waitress would do a check back but no one could be seen I eventually when and found someone how took the mushrooms away and came back within 3-4 mins with piping hot ones  which I can only assume was ding technology at its finest however we gave them the benefit of the doubt as I said we had great times here. After finish our started we had to wait 30 minutes for them to be cleared and then another 15 before we had to ask where our mains were. After asking were they where if by magic they appeared ! We had the 2 steak and sticky’s and one fillet steak. The fillet steak was actually cook amazing however the rest of he meals we could not say the same... cold ribs and Luke warm steaks. When eventually a check back was done we did mention about it but were greet with I’m sorry to hear that and she then walked off. No though about a replacement meal or any type of way to solve a situation. After finishing our cold meals we then had to wait another 15 minutes for someone to come and clear our table, we asked for the bill which then took a further 10Minutes... However if the waiter had move that fast when delivering our food like he did collecting the payment from us I wouldn’t be writing this review... really disappointed.. even when we did complain the manager on shift disappeared and left the poor lad deal with it.

Booked for dinner before going to see phantom of the opera. We were served quickly and efficiently. Good choice on the menu and enjoyed my pasta very much. Prices are reasonable, nice busy atmosphere Would go again
It’s a very central place to eat food food. Iwas very positively impressed with the food and the friendliness of the staff.

We visited Middleton during our wedding anniversary getaway to Colchester. We have family here, one who is a chef, and they recommended the restaurant to us, which we thought was a good sign.My husband had the chicken wings for a starter, whilst I stuck to the mixed olives.For mains, my husband had the surf and turf and I had a bacon cheese burger. I did ask for the smaller patty, but got given and then charged for the larger burger. But I was happy, so didn't raise the issue.You get a choice of sides with your meal, and they are not just standard sides. For example, you can get dauphinoise potatoes, Feta salads etc. We were boring though and just got fries and sweet potato fries.We also ordered dessert. Middletones sundea and creme brulee. Now we waited over half an hour for these. For us, it wasn't an issue as we were enjoying the ambience of the restaurant. But the waitress insisted on taking the desserts off the bill, which was very thoughtful of her.All of this with 2 drinks would of come to just over £58. With our desserts taken off, we paid £47.Very good value for money in our opinion, and the food tasted great 👍

The stuff is very polite and helpful. Great communication in English. The menu is very simple but gives you numerous of choices. Had dinner there three time during the trip. The only negative (which is subjective) is the high prices.

Asked to be seated inside and was told there were no seats; later found out there was an upstairs section with loads of seats available. Waited a long time for our food; another couple who sat down after us were served before us. Between the 3 of us we had a burger, 2 servings of Tacos, 2 servings of fries, an apple juice (small) and a coke (250ml). The bill was over €50 which is ridiculously expensive. Avoid unless you like paying well over the odds for below average food and mediocre service

Food was a bit better than OK, which for lunch and a brew on the run in acceptable.  What is not acceptable is the bald guy who responded to the what is your name ? is "Waiter" He was rude and made a comment.  My burger came with a side of coleslaw, I asked for a fork,  Waiter said, "We don't put out forks and knives during "Pride week", or we will lose them all".   I ordered a beer, a .5L, it came with a foam head way below the .5 line, and I commented, so he almost threw another one at me.  We were disappointed with the whole experience.  They should not represent Amsterdam, plus service was slow, and they were not busy.
really good burgers with real french fries that we adored! the cabbage salad was also good. nice staff, maybe a little pricey, but worth it.
Do visit if you love chicken. You will like the food, ambience and service. Try the 1/2 chicken, lacquered and then flamed at the table.

A comida estava ótima atendimento super simpático, chegamos um pouco antes da hora da reserva e fomos logo atendidos. É verdade que se paga um pouco mais que o habitual mas vale bem a pena.O único reparo que tenho a fazer creio que as casas de banho deveriam ser um pouco melhores para o restaurante em si.

Visited for lunch Thursday 15August.  As we were having an afternoon tea we only wanted a small lunch and this was perfect.  Calamari and bruschetta was perfectLoved the marble tables.  There were clearly Italian tourists and also locals using the restaurant which is always a good signs.Just off Oxford Street and a good well run restaurant

Well the first of all the service was amazing today! Our waitress Jade Curley was incredibly attentive and made sure our drinks were always full and we had a smile on our face! The food was exceptional also! The bill came to about £140 for 4 but we had 2 courses each and drinks! All in all great the only thing is the bar can be a bit slow on drinks!
must try great food wanderfull setting areah the staff spek great english  and very helpfull with our orders keep the paper they give u with u r food its u r table number

We visited the Jilles Beer & Burger, at around 8:20pm. As you enter the outside area there is a sign to wait to be seated. We were waiting here for nearly 10 minutes before a young man approached us. He was moody all through out our visit and did not take us to a table just shrugged to choose a seat outside. We were not given menus until a different waiter noticed us and asked if we were okay. The food is quite expensive for what you get. A burger with salad and no fries starts at €15! We eventually had our order taken and our food came quite fast, but this might of been because they close at 9pm (which we did not know until googling) and the waiters began to rush around cleaning as we ate. Nobody told us they were closing. We were not brought serviettes or cutlery and they got my friends drink and food wrong. My friend ordered nachos  and they came with nothing on!! €8 for a bowl of nachos with no cheese or sauce? We complained and this was corrected. Although, the staff do not seem happy to help and act as though you are a burden. I ordered the cheesy nelson burger which had a revolting sauce that seemed like they had just plopped tomato pizza base sauce in a burger. The meat was chewy and I had a mountain of greens of ridiculous size in the bun too. Finally, the only time our waiter seemed happy was when I asked to pay. Overall, I would not recommend this place. We left annoyed as our total came to over €30 for what seemed like nothing.            A V O I D!!

Opted for a rump steak cooked medium rare which came with fries a mushroom and a half tomato.The steak was served medium and had little flavour. The tomato was a dwarf variety and the mushroom had so much salt  in it i think it had been caught fresh from the sea that day. The fries were fine!

2x een burger met frietjes en een bijgerechten besteld. Eten kwam pas na 45min, hoewel er amper volk was. Toen het eten er eindelijk was, bleken het twee foute burgers te zijn (als in: een volledig andere bestelling). Dit was misschien te wijten aan de ober die zo rap-rap onze bestelling had opgenomen dat we ons afvroegen of hij het wel verstaan had. Frietjes werden wel al op tafel gezet, wat een beetje raar is gezien die direct afkoelen. Kort daarna kregen we gelukkig de hamburgers die we besteld hadden, echter bleken deze lauw te zijn. Bovendien zat er geen crumble op onze asperges met crumble (die waren ze "vergeten"). De burgers (classic cheese bacon & beetroot) waren wel lekker. Spijtig van de nalatigheid bij de bediening/keuken.

I had submitted a poor review after an unpleasant dining experience in February. I was subsequently contacted by their Guest Relations Manager who to her credit very kindly offered a voucher so that we'd return to see if the promised improvements had materialised. In passing my son & I popped in for the fixed menu lunch on 13 July intending to use the voucher.The food was ok this time (compared with our last visit) but service was so slow. 2.5 hrs for 2 courses of the fixed menu is not ok & the manager didn't think so either. He appeared to share our frustration and after my explanation regarding the voucher he refused to accept it & remarkably gave us the meal for free & asked us to come back with the voucher another time. He & his waiting staff were trying their best to keep other patrons happy with free drinks and discounted bills but I've never experienced a situation where so many customers were simultaneously  complaining about either the food or their wait.Sadly we left after 2 courses & went to another restaurant for dessert. This restaurant has so much potential so it's very disappointing to have had another poor experience.

Visited yesterday with a friend and our children. My friend had been before several times and always enjoyed it so recommended we go there. We both had fixed price 3 course menu and the children had the kids 3 course meal, one big and two little kids. Starters were fine. My two children had the kids burger for their main course. Their meals were exactly the same despite one ordering big kids and one ordering small kids. Neither liked their burgers as they tasted burnt so just ate the chips. Maybe this is because they are chargrilled but I imagine most kids would prefer a burger which didn't taste burnt. My beanburger and chips was fine but very basic, no side salad or anything, you would expect a bit more from a restaurant like this. The desserts were a shambles. One child ordered chocolate fudge brownie with no ice cream but it came with ice cream. One child ordered build your own banana split which was supposed to come with sprinkles, choc buttons and chopped strawberries according to the menu. What arrived was half a banana, cut in half with a lump of ice cream. We had to ask for the other things and were told they didn't do choc buttons any more. One adult ordered sticky toffee pudding and custard and received the tiniest toddler sized piece of pudding, with ice cream, not custard. The manager did take the kids meals off the bill but it was still disappointing. The other adult pudding was also tiny. Maybe they were small because we had the fixed price menu but they really were smaller than a child's portion. Add to this the toilet lights were flashing like strobe lights and there was no toilet roll whatsoever, not even an empty tube in the bin so someone had obviously cleared it away and not replaced it. I won't be returning.

All the staff were charming, multilingual, helpful and generally lovely. The service, contrary to other reviews, was so quick that I'd barely started my drink before the food arrived. The food was as you'd expect, like a Belgian version of Nando's, ie quite good. I don't understand the complaints in other reviews - perhaps you get the service your attitude deserves.

Un très bon repas, un service sympathique et une pause agréable au centre de Maasmechelen Village!Nous en avons eu pour un peu plus de 50 euros pour deux des burgers les plus chers (agneau...), un poutine, des frites et la mayo faite maison ainsi qu'une bonne bouteille de vin. Je n'ai pas trouvé cela trop cher. La décoration est sympathique, les tables ne sont pas trop serrées et on est assez vite servi. D'un autre côté, il n'y avait pas foule. C'est vrai qu'il faut penser à commander l'accompagnement à part, il n'est pas compris.
Great food, novel lay out, good service and good prices, I have ate here 3 times while on business and always get a table, and always have enjoyed my food.
Very nice service, smiling, fastA nice little place to eat, with some tables outsideGood simple curry dishes

Hamburguesas muy ricas y platos vegetarianos también. Hay mucha variedad de platos.El precio es caro, pero vale la pena.El personal muy joven y muy competente.El local espectacular!Dejan entrar con mascota.

Stopped for lunch in this lovely street, Ellis gourmet burger is a lovely restaurant on the corner, we had cheesey chilli nachos and a chicken Caesar salad, very nice watching the world go by, whilst enjoying the sun and a cold beer, staff very friendly, would definitely recommend

Visited here last week on a trip to Belgium from England. Staff were very accommodating and offered us menus in English as well as allowing for me to have a student deal when I’m a student in the UK.The burgers were of outstanding quality and when I had a moment when I had a bad cough, a waiter was instantly at the table with a glass of water ready. Prices aren’t too bad, especially considering the location. Definitely recommend.

On passe commande à travers Deliveroo et malheureusement le driver souffre un accident. Lui même demande de pouvoir refaire une des commandes au restaurant car elle a été renversé suite au choc. Bavet ne croit pas ni le livreur ni nous mêmes qui finalement n'avons la commande qu'à moitie. Bavet répond au livreur "allez ailleurs, on a d'autres commandes". Toujours pas contents, Bavet demande encore au livreur "dites-nous, c'est quoi la vérité?" comme en l'accusant d'avoir mangé la commande car le livreur est un jeune garçon noir!!! Mais c'est quoi ce service et ces accusations!!!! Nous avons essayé de les contacter à travers du téléphone affiché ci-dessus mais quel hasard que c'est un répondeur et que nous n'avons jamais personne a l'autre bout du fil!!Un/e de ses serveurs tomberait et la commande se retrouverait au sol, ils en referaient une nouvelle directement, mais comme c'est le pauvre livreur qui a eu un accident, t'en pis!! t'en pis pour lui et pour les clients qui PAYENT pour un service qu'on est sensé donner jusqu'au bout!!!Et pour clôturer dire que qualité pâtes et sauces, médiocre et gras. On leur donnait une dernière opportunité mais là c'est fini!!!

Personale non male, buona l'opzione gluten free (pizza e pasta). Discreta la pizza e buona la pasta. Prezzi tutto sommato giusti per ciò che viene servito. Se non si hanno troppe pretese ci si può andare.
Lekker eten, vriendelijke bediening en geen lange wachttijden. Meer dan genoeg eten. Stonden ook open voor wat feedback. Voor een snelle hap een aanrader.
Gillar man mat som är torr och gjord igår besök denna restaurang! Vill man även sitta och vänta på att få beställa och betala så är detta stället för dig!!
Leuke gezellige zaak, lekkere burgersNiets op aan te merken eigenlijkKomen zeker eens terug.......

Prima hamburger met goede smaak. Niet teveel poespas. Goede combinatie van ingrediënten. Lekkere zoete aardappelfrietjes. Toen ik aangaf dat ik nog een trein wilde halen was dat geen probleem. Het eten was er vlot. Prima service.

Arrived to find restaurant half empty with several tables that had not been cleared of previous diners’ meals. Gets worse. Inedible starter of zucchine fritte. Described as crispy zucchini, arrived as cold, damp flaccid bits of zucchini in rubbery batter. As far from crispy as you can get. Garlic bread had no taste whatsoever. Main course of spag Bol (which I ordered because I though that this was pretty impossible to mess up) was luke warm, but passable. Just. Tried an afogato (again ... the safe choice?). Which arrived after the ice cream had melted. Honestly... you have to try hard to serve food this bad. Ps. Waiting staff trying their very best. The only decent part of the evening.
Très bons Burgess, goûteux et généreux. Patates délicieuses. Et jus nickel. Un bon fast-food végé enfin ! Venez en ouvrir un à Paris. 😋

Down in Watford for work, came across this place on a search, so glad I did.I'm still sat in the restaurant as I type, I opted for the seafood grill with new potatoes and salad. Very happy with the service I have received and the food was delicious. Would certainly recommend a visit.

Egentlig burde Bavet have 4 point. Personalet er hurtigt, venligt og professionelt. Selv de små portioner er rigeligt. Men vi var 3 gæster, og ingen af os nød maden. Den var frisk og spiselig, men en underlig smagssammensætning. Måske vi blot var for konservative,

En lekkere burger is niet ver weg in Gent veel zaken maar hier lik je jouw pollekes af lekker vlees het broodje wouw en na je bezoek kan je altijd een filmpje kijken in kinnepolis vlakbij dus met vrienden if gezin zeker aan te raden een lekker drankje derbij wat wil je meer tot later en geniet er van 👌👍😋😋😋

Gister met mijn moeder wezen eten door tripadvisor. Sfeervol straatje eerst buiten gezeten met onze favorite wijn nergens nog gezien. Later naar binnen gegaan in een gezellige sfeer. Eten was super lekker en de ovenaardappeltjes met zelfgemaakte saus was overheerlijk. Kon niet stoppen! De bediening ook erg vriendelijk en geven je de aandacht. Voor herhaling vatbaar!!

I selected Spaghetti House on Woodstock St for a quick lunch as I had never been and reviews were decent.Unfortunately, I was disappointed with the quality of the dishes. Whilst the food was cooked just fine, the dishes lacked any flavour. We had ordered the calamari and the breaded mozzarella balls as a starter, as well as 2 coke drinks. The mozzarella balls were fine with the sauce provided (probably the most flavoured item of our lunch) but the calamari was rubbery and tasteless. As our mains, we ordered a simple pesto dish and a meatball dish. It was as if an entire jar of pesto had been added to the spaghetti and yet I still had to add pepper and salt as this dish was bland. The meatballs seemed a bit raw in the middle but when we checked with our server, she said that the kitchen said this was how it was cooked. Again, the dish was bland. We eat at many restaurants and don't mind paying a bit more for good food but when the bill came, and it was over £53, I thought the quality of food was poor and not worth that at all. This disappointed me as I had selected the restaurant because I had a craving for spaghetti. Sadly, this did not satisfy my craving well. The only reason I did not rate the restaurant one TripAd circle was due to the friendly service. I know this is a chain but I thought the food would taste better and be better value for money.Disappointing.

Locale molto piccolo, dove ci siamo fermati per fare una piccola pausa colazione. Abbiamo preso dei croissant e del cappuccino e caffè. I croissant seppur molto semplici erano buoni, mentre il cappuccino e il caffè non mi ha entusiasmato. Prezzi nella norma.

This is set in a busy little square full of bars and restaurants and the traffic of horse carriages coming through. It’s great to sit outside when it’s sunny because it catches the sun perfectly and is great for people watching. We had drinks here, along with the Walhalla Nachos, which were amazing. The staff were very friendly and explained the concept for their pasta menu, the prices are good - it’s card only though, they don’t take cash so make sure you go prepared.

We were a party of 5 and had an enjoyable meal to celebrate my granddaughter's excellent A level results. The food was very good, the service efficient and the overall atmosphere of the restaurant was warm, pleasant and welcoming. Waiting staff were particularly helpful and friendly.

We came here last night for an early meal for 6 persons.Providing you are in before 6.00pm or 5.00pm on Saturdays there is a "Special Menu" to use. The staff ( ie Richard and the others) were excellent. Thank You
you like chicken ??? well look in here beautiful chicken and cooked to perfection any sauce any way with what ever you want mmmmm delish for you all

Our free walking tour guide suggested this restaurant to us, if we wanted a burger.  We visited on a Saturday evening and it was really busy.  There is a large selection of burgers and bottled beers to choose from.  if you do the free walking tour you will  get a voucher for a free bottle of beer to take away after your meal.Possibly the best burger restaurant in Bruges.
Pasta was goed maar mijn keuze was wel heel heftig, zwaar op de maag. Locatie is echt top. Leuk plein, heerlijk buiten zitten.
the place is nice food is rely good service is a bet slow some one need to be at the entrance so people will know if they are open other than that over all good experience

Helaas heb ik hier geen super ervaring.Heb 20 minuten zitten wachten op het bestellen van mijn drinken, wat vervolgens ook nog eens 15 minuten duurde.Het eten duurde 40 minuten voordat dat het er was, wat niet heel verkeerd was. Eten was er wel heel erg lekker!Maar ik ben zeker niet te spreken over de extreem lange wacht tijden. Dit was bij meerdere tafels het geval. Vervolgens vergaten ze ook die helft van mijn eten.Helaas was de sfeer al een stuk minder door de trage service.

Muy buena opción. Vi la critica en esta pagina y la verdad es que muy bien.Pedimos un wrap y una ensalada para 2 y mas que suficiente para cenar.El precio 35 euros con 2 cervezas. Muy buen sabor y tamaño

Heerlijke rijsttafel gegeten. Veel gerechten brachten de herinnering terug aan hoe mijn moeder dit vroeger maakte.Locatie aan de Amstel is leuk, maar met een joekel van een (lelijke) boot aan de steiger voor het terras, een stuk minder fraai.Eten was goed; jammer dat geen kraanwater wordt aangeboden. Bediening vriendelijk en attent.Parkeren (betaald) lijkt ver weg, maar is vlak achter restaurant.

Gekozen voor de fijnproeverij  dat bestaat uit 3 tosti's naar keuze. Zeer lekker brood en lekkere smaken en dit in combinatie met een mooie presentatie en een vriendelijke bediening. Kortom een echte aanrader voor lunch in de stad!

Yum wat een lekkere tosti’s hebben ze hier! Wij namen plaats op het gezellige terras en werden snel geholpen door de vriendelijke bediening. De tosti hebben lekkere en verrassende combinaties. Binnen hebben ze het leuk ingericht en kan je op een schommel je tosti opeten. Echt een succes!

Ontbijt gehad bij Happy Tosti vanmorgen. Je krijgt 100% waar voor je geld en echt uitstekende kwaliteit. Heerlijke tosti met een grote kop verse thee en verse jus met ook nog yoghurt met muesli erbij. Vooral de tosti chorizo is heerlijk. Echt een aanrader! En erg vriendelijk personeel. Aanrader!

Very sh*t! Abbiamo mangiato in 6 pagando 25€ a testa prendendo 1 hamburger, 1 patata fritta e una birra media a testa. Il prezzo non è un problema se si conta di mangiare bene. Ma in questo posto tutto si fa tranne che mangiar bene. La carne dell’hamburger era inqualificabile, gusto insesistente e la patatine dure come la pietra. Insomma, un posto da dimenticare, contando che si è in vacanza.

Better signage needed, saw a few saying ausgang but nothing else. When we were in the wrong queue, one chef shouted at as that we were in the exit then said ‘Jesus Christ’.....bloody rude (obviously doesn’t like the British or he’s just ignorant)!  Luckily this guy didn’t cook our lunch. Our chef was friendly and helpful. Food was basic but tasted ok. Bit of a wait for food but all ok in the end. Won’t be returning and won’t recommend.
Good simple food at good simple prices. It was a takeaway I had and not eat in but it was perfect. No silly prices either
Such good food, amazing service from Marta! Could not recommend this place enough! Had the set 3 course menu for £11!! Just stunning!
Amazing place for me (meat burgers) and my girlfriend (vegan burgers). Vegan is hard to find in some places and this is something different from other places. Highly recommended!

Hier eerder toevallig terecht gekomen. We hadden niet gereserveerd maar er waren nog tafels vrij. De bediening is ok maar ook niet meer dan dat. De spaghetti bolognaise was niet super. Ik zou hier toch niet speciaal voor omrijden. Misschien lag dit aan de keuze van de maaltijden.
Nunca me tinha acontecido antes comer uma pizza onde a sua base era horrível...Fica a dúvida se a pizza não estaria congelada... Porque escoria literalmente água...

Personne ne nous  a accueillie, au bout de 20 minutes, un serveur c’est enfin décidé à venir nous voir pour prendre notre commande. 5 minutes après, une serveuse est arrivée avec trois burger que nous n’avions pas commander car ils ont rajouter un extra bacon que nous ne voulions pas. 10 minutes après la serveuse est revenu avec les mêmes burgers en ayant juste enlevé le bacon. Ces derniers étaient froid. Nous avons fait la remarque au serveur pour les changer. Nos boisson nous on enfin étaient servis au bout de 45 minutes. Nous avons attendu pendant près d’une heure pour avoir des burgers chaud. Le serveur est finalement venu nous voir pour nous dire que nous pouvions partir, qu’il nous offre les boissons. Un service et un accueil lamentable !! N’y allez surtout pas !

My family had dinner here and it was an okay experience.The food was fine, those who had steak raved about it and those with bean burgers said it was fine. But two of us had Mushroom Wellington's and they were basically barely flavoured pasties. They weren't Wellington's at all, it was thick pastry and the wrong type of pastry. It was also just chestnuts and mushrooms in pastry, nothing special and 100% not value for money.The staff were friendly and on the whole attentive but they didn't appear to have assigned tables so it was sporadic service.Ivan on the other hand is welcoming, friendly, smiley and everything you want from someone working in a restaurant! He is the best thing about this restaurant, even more so than the food.I probably wouldn't go back, as in not convinced it's value for money but if I did, I hope Ivan serves us!

Where do I even start? And I’m not one to slate somewhere unless necessary- but seriously, do not visit this restaurant! I’ve always wondered why it’s pretty much empty most days- now I know why.Appalling, rude, unprofessional staff, average food (my chicken was rock solid, the potatoes were pretty much raw, the only bearable dish was the carbonara), overpriced- just so so awful. There are plenty of delicious Italian restaurants in London so don’t waste your time here. The Holborn staff are particularly bad, awful customer service. My colleagues and I work opposite but will never ever return!
Een aanrader. Heerlijk authentiek Indonesisch eten. De stijl en inrichting prima en prachtige locatie. Nadeel is de mogelijkheid van parkeren. Ron Blaauw is top!

Een heel geslaagde zomeravond op het terras. Zoals altijd perfecte en zeer vriendelijke service, mooie sfeer en... de nieuwe chef verrast met super lekkere gerechten (varkenskroontje met perfecte afkruiding).

Restaurante italiano muy próximo a Picadilly; cena de sábado por la noche. Sin reserva previa.No hay mucha variedad de platos pero lo que tienen esta bastante bien. En nuestro caso unos calamares fritos de picoteo y luego una pizza prosciutto y unos spaghetti carbonara. Los calamares bastante mejorables, sin embargo la pizza muy buena y los spaghettis perfectos. Algunos platos como los spaghettis los tienen en raciones medianas y completas; os recomiendo la completa ya que las raciones no son demasiado abundantes. Media docena de vinos (a precios de Londres claro); en nuestro caso un digno Montepulcciano a casi 26£ la botella. Cargan un 12,5% por el servicio.Muy simpática la camarera de Getafe, lo que siempre ayuda en tierra extraña.
Idéal pour une pause rapide et sans chichis. Grand choix de sandwich. Vous avez des formules tout fompris

Es war eines der besten Frühstücke die ich je gegessen habe Frischer Orangensaft, cremiger Kaffee, gezuckerte Gurkenstückchen mit würzigem Dip und das beste    der geröstet e Toast Es war himmlich IIch empfehle das Happy Breakfast Menu es umfasst alles für den Urlauber
Snelle en vlotte bediening, eigentijds, informeel en toch stijlvol. Lekkere hamburgers en leuke suggesties.

Poor service, cold food, filthy toilets. Poor poor poor. Staff were rude and we waited for ages to be served cold food. When I tried to complain I was told to wait. Ended up making my way inside to ask for fresh fries which turned up 25 mins after I ate the cold burger.We had to go inside to pay and decided to visit the loo. Omg. Toilet was tiny and dirty and also such I hadn’t looked right when I went into the loo. I caught a glance at the kitchen. Almost as bad as the loo.Felt physically sick!
Friendly staff, reasonably priced and the food was amazing. The music was fabulous also, Italian tracks that brought back a lot of memories and nostalgia

Their legendary burger is delicious! I was in Ghent for 4 days and had dinner at Greenway every evening. Also, their roasted sweet potatoes come with an amazing something something aioli sauce that blew my mind. These vegans know what they're doing.

Just been totally ripped off for €10, ordered a cocktail & waited ages. When it turns up it's in a small tumbler full of ice, all gone in about 5 sips. So worked out about €2 a sip. Absolute Rip off, will not be returning & strongly advise others to go elsewhere.

Locale tipo fast food, scegli dal menu, ordini e ti servono al tavolo. Buona proposta di piatti freddi e caldi, hamburgher, insalate, zuppe e panini, tutto molto buono. Ti suggeriscono anche quale bevanda abbinare al piatto che hai scelto. Davvero ottima scelta, ci ritorneremo.

If your restaurant is all about chicken then at least you would expect the best chicken ever. Beside the original interior( although to avoid on warm days cause it's hot inside due to the lack of aricon this together with the ovens make you feel like getting roasted ), the menu was not very precise. We ordered  a snack mix, chicken nuggets and maize with a dip.  What we received was tasteless fried mix and maize  with sauce all over it. Imagine the face of the kids when they saw sauce on the maize  It said maize  with a DIP . When I made this remark to the waitress she offered to remove the sauce ?!?!? Excuse me ? As far as goes my food knowledge ' a DIP' is always a sauce to DIP your food in else you call it maize  with sauce !  The chicken itself was plain boring chicken I can name much more places in Mechelen were you can eat chicken and at least the piece is bigger.A small breast  is simply unacceptable for  over 9 euro's and that is the price without side dishes but fair is fair a good chicken jus.

We zijn per toeval bij de Burgerij terechtgekomen. Daar samen met partner de burger Dolce Vita besteld.Niet gekeken dat daar ham in zat, (wegens geloofsovertuiging mag het niet) Eenmaal aangekomen zei ik dat ik een nieuwe wil  bestellen op mn eigen kosten. Deze kregen we alsnog van de ober. Echt super service wat een top beoordeling verdient.

Ositives: the service was good and the meal arrived quickly. It was lovely and hot. My husband enjoyed his breaded chicken and chips. It is very close to theatres.Negatives: my lasagne was slightly burnt on top and concealed go bottom of the dish. There was no meat in it at all (at least, none that I could find). It was basically a cheese and tomato sauce on a sheet of pasta. Nothing like a real Italian lasagne should be and definitely not worth £12.95. There are plenty of other restaurants nearby and several other Italians. I wouldn't go here again.
Slechte bediening, hamburgers (trio of Belgium) waren smaakloos. Frietjes waren ok. Lekkere zelfgemaakte ice tea, wel overprijsd.
Lekkere hamburgers. Fijn dat er aangepaste bieren op de kaart staan! Vriendelijke en vlotte bediening.

Piccolo self service (fa parte di una catena ben diffusa) in centro a Lisbona (300 mt da Elevador de Santa Justa). Nulla di eccezionale, ma abbiamo mangiato bene a basso prezzo (13 euro in 2) e senza troppa confusione. Fermata del tram 28 a pochi passi.
Uma esplanada muito agradável, pizzas muito agradável e produtos de qualidade.O atendimento foi simpático.Um local que irá merecer uma nova visita.

Visited to celebrate my sons GCSE results.  Was 18.30, so pretty early.  The service was great - especially Gallas (our waiter).  We ordered a couple Lobsters, a mixed grill and a vegetarian dish.  Not bad for Leicester, and a lovely building.  The food was ok, what made is special was the excellent service from Gallas (Rocco and Luka recommended him).  Credit to Middletons!!!

Small menu with various selection of meatballs. There are even vegetarian options. Prices are good and service was quick and friendly. We were a bit disappointed in their drink selection but all the menu is pretty small. We tried the beef meatballs stuffed with mushroom and truffle creme sauce and absolutely loved it. Would recommend as a snack.

Firstly service was rushed and you were made to feel they wanted your table back when on a Friday evening they had lots of tables free.   Food was really average I had a pasta dish which should of had asparagus and mine didn’t have any. I also ordered a mini dessert with coffee.  Well it was certainly mini, one very small mouthful.  Coffee Latte was cold and had to be returned with the waitress to be presented with yet another cold latte.The manager did apologise but by then I was not interested in having a coffee.  The whole experience was not enjoyable and I will certainly not be returning. Very disappointing.
Leuk terras, heel vriendelijke bediening en erg lekkere pasta.  Bovendien budgetvriendelijk.  Wij komen nog terug!

Op het dak van Hudsons Bay een prachtige ruimte, fraaie architectuur, open keuken en grote bar. Smaakvol ingericht. Rijsttafel zeer goed al miste mijn Indonesische partner nog wat raffinement bij de saté en de telor balado....Sympathieke ontvangst en zorgzaam personeel, de een wat meer als de ander. Wijnkaart wel erg prijzig gelet op het niveau van de wijnen. Maar al met al een smaakvolle rijke lunch!

Visited early on Saturday evening, were greeted by the friendly and professional young lady who led us to our table.  Drinks order taken and quickly delivered.  Our meals were soon delivered and well received.  The steaks, burger and ribs were excellent.  The only downside was the portion size of the salted caramel brownie, it was 1" square with a teaspoon of cream, and for £5.65 was extremely overpriced, we should have commented on it but didn't want to embarrass our guests.  Staff were attentive and the restaurant had a good atmosphere.

Very friendly restaurant and delicious food. People that frequent Spaghetti House are from all around the world. It's amazing and they have establish themselves in 1955 here in London. Well done amicos.

I think I’m really easy when it comes to pleasing me. Give me good food, great cari g service and you’ll win me over every time. Spaghetti House Cranborn Street has me when I went in. The gentleman who sat us was charming and friendly. We sat down stairs in the AC and had an excellent spot. Our server was a woman who spoke poor English, but that’s fine. She was a little gruff, but that was ok. I had a bowl of bread that was really good, and an excellent aperitif of Prosecco and peach purée. Our dinner came out slowly. My spaghetti with meatballs was excellent. So was my daughter’s. My wife and son had pizza and they were quite pleased.
Big shout out to Kayleigh that served our large group booking and managed to remain calm with a lot going on. Thank you Kayleigh we will be back soon.

I came to Peterborough, becuase my girlfriend is from there. We usually go to the Wildwood, but on Friday we decided to give Middletons a chance.I have to say, that was a very good idea. My girlfriend ordered steak and she was really happy with it, i got myself a Cheeseburger  and it was mad. Our waitress Martha made us feel very comfortable, she was very polite and made sure everything is fine. Will definitely come  back to Middletons, and I will recommend it to my friends.

went for a business lunch on a Wednesday afternoon and it was packed !however - we found a table and were left alone but with decent enough service.all the food was good and at reasonable prices. coffee not good.

Haben uns diese Location für ein Frühstück ausgesucht, da sie für uns während unseres Aufenthaltes im Babylon Hotel fußläufig gut erreichbar war. Draußen sitzt man bei warmen Temperaturen wirklich nett. Bis wir bestellen konnten verging bereits einiges an Zeit, trotz 4er-Besetzung und nur 3 bis 4 besetzen Tischen. Ebenfalls die Zubereitung der Speisen (hatten das komplette Frühstück mit Sandwich, Kaffee, O-Saft und Joghurt & die Joghurt-Bowl) brauchte sehr lange, das Personal schien insgesamt wirklich überfordert. Die Qualität des Frühstücks war okay, die Bowl ist aufgrund des Preises aber z.B.: nicht weiterzuempfehlen (eine kleine Schüssel Joghurt mit einer Handvoll Goji-Beeren, Chia-Samen & Äpfeln sind für knappe 7€ einfach zu wenig)! Aufgrund der langen Wartezeiten, der Qualität des Essens stimmt für mich persönlich das Preis-/Leistungsverhältnis leider nicht.
This was the first place that we ate in Amsterdam. The coffee is are great. My daughters really enjoyed the bitterballen, and I thought they made great salads and sandwiches.

Booked a promotion via Groupon, now you would think a promotion is to get you to return. They had a groupon special menu which consisted of at least  three choices  not even on the main menu, one a 5oz minute steak , one a roasted herb chicken which was in fact a half of a normal sized fillet and griddled. The desert  sticky toffee pudding was the size of a tooth pick.
We bestelden sticky wings en een bordje hapje. Het was lekker en smaakte naar meer. De volgende dag terug gegaan. Voor vol-au-vent. Een beetje kleine portie maar wel lekker.

Vi är extremt chockade över hur dåligt bemötta vi blev på denna resturang. Personalen tittade knappt oss i ögonen och gjorde även fel på vår beställning. Beställ aldrig carbonaran på zero zero, håll er till pizzan!!!
Food was very good and service too. Very comfortable seats are  in front of the restaurant.My family and me are very glad and will come back here/

Cute place to get a bowl of pasta. The menu lets you choose your pasta, your sauce, toppings, and any extras. We went simple with spaghetti and meat sauce with Parmesan cheese. It hit the spot after a long day of sightseeing. The beer was cold and the food was hot. Great decor and pleasant wait staff. After you eat pay at the bar. An affordable place with nice ambiance. A little cheesy saucy comfort food was just what we needed.

Visited with family for a late lunch..3 had the set menu..all of which was first class..I had calamari followed by a whole lobster which was Excellent..pleasant service..good value for money..RECOMMENDED

Obviously a popular restaurant as it was very crowded on friday night - and quite noisy!  We had starters - shared the mushrooms and the prawn cocktail - both good.  The steaks - sirloin and ribeye were all cooked to perfection.  The only irritating thing was this - and it happens in a lot of restaurants.  They gave us the menu, my friend chose Seabass, only to be told not available.  Why was this not mentioned when the menus were given out?  So then she had to re-choose quickly so we were not held up from ordering.  The wine selection was good.

My partner and I decided to stop for a bite to eat mid afternoon, as we sat down we waited around 15/20 minutes for someone to notice us sat on a table. When I finally grabbed someone’s attention he then snapped at me and told me I was sitting on a “drinks only table” He then noticed I had a bottle of water with little left in it sat on the table next to us. He then started telling me how rude I was bringing my own drinks to the restaurant and then proceeded to tell me I was disrespectful in front of the rest of the restaurant. When I explained i didn’t mean any harm and that the temperature Is Is 33 degrees and very warm and I had the water whilst my partner and I were walking around he told me that in Holland it Is disrespectful and proceeded to then begin to speak his own language, so god knows what he was saying about me. I haven’t had any one say anything to us the entire holiday (6 days) given the warm heat, and obviously I was going to order drinks along side my meal and had no intentions of drinking my half empty - now warm - bottle anyway I feel this was completely out of order and extremely rude and poor customer service. So we got up and left. Don’t waste your money.

I fail to understand why this place is still popular? The quality is not very good at all. When I ask for a well done steak, I do not expect blood in the middle. You would think a steak house would know what 'well done' means. Most people I know don't rate the very highly at all, yet Middletons still manage to get quite busy for some reason.
Cute place in the middle of the city right at the Plein. Delicious breakfast, great people....we will definitely come back.

We had an exhausting conference day, and finally ended up here. The staff was kind and welcoming, ellis special burger was definitely the best I had recently. They also have good beers to drink. You should try this place!
I really enjoyed my visit to happy tosti the service was good and I really enjoyed my food as well!!

Came here in a group of twelve. Given that they knew we were coming, our order still took a good half hour to arrive. BUT they were ready for our two vegans, and the food itself was absolutely delicious!! The staff were lovely and friendly and helpful. I would recommend this place.

We sat outside and each got a burger.  I liked mine, hubby didn’t like the beef he got.   Switched it up and ordered a baked potato to accompany mine.  There’s only so many fries one can eat.  I’d go back.

This a small place with a small menu. But everything we had was delicious. The staff was exceptionally friendly and helpful. They were patient answering dozens of questions from our son and going to the kitchen a couple of times to get him answers. We recommend the Tex Mex Chicken with extra cheese.
The ambiance and food far exceeded my expectations. Great place and I plan on coming back on my next visit.
The coffee is just as you would expect, really good. The place has a very nice and relaxed vibe. Nice place to chill out or work in silence

I already knew the concept through their first store in the Hague, but I hadn't been yet in de Pijp. The service was quick and complete for my friend and I! I ordered the spicy chorizo tosti but I'm not a fan off the spicy, so they immediately offered to leave it off. My friend ordered an almond milk cappuccino which they don't charge extra for. Lastly, because we were sitting outside and I had an orange juice unfortunately wasps where everywhere. That being said, the staff got rid of them as best as they could without angering them and otherwise offered to move us inside (which they did for other customers too). All in all a positive experience and a lovely lunch! I'd recommend it to everyone!

Per quel che mi riguarda non posso dire di aver mangiato male, anzi, non è un ristorante ovviamente, ma è un luogo dopo poter fare un pranzo veloce o una cena veloce senza troppe pretese. Ci sono 4 menu si parte dai 4.99 ai 7.95 il piu' caro a seconda da come è composto il menu e tutti i menu nel prezzo comprendono acqua o bibita piu' un ulteriore accompagnamento ..

We were told this place was great so we thought we’d try it out, we ate from the set menu the meals were exactly what you pay for (tiny and not great quality) My boyfriend had a burger that was over cooked and not great I had the goats cheese tart, it was burnt at the bottom and when I told the waitress she took it off my plate with her fingers and took it into the kitchen, leaving me with a few cold chips on my plate before returning about 10 minutes later to collect the rest of the plate, tell me it was the last one and offer me something else (no other vegetarian option available) luckily I just don’t love meat but I can and do eat it so I also had a burger, which wasn’t on the set menu so the whole thing became more expensive 😩 Cocktails were good though that was possibly the only saving grace! Because it was reccomended to us and I also work in the service industry we thought we’d try again as all places have bad days and mistakes are sometimes made.... 2nd visit wasn’t much better, the food wasn’t bad but we waited 45 mins for starters and our mains areived first, we then waited 10 mins for the starters and when the mains were brought back out they had just been under the hot plate! Not impressed and wont be returning By all means try this place the staff on the whole are friendly and the drinks are pretty but the food and overall service isn’t what you expect for the prices you pay!

We went for a birthday celebration dinner on Friday, we really enjoyed the wine and the food, but unfortunately for service I cannot say the same. It started okey, waitress did not kept us waiting and she explained how their menu works. We have ordered several plates from the dishes and sides for each person. They have brought first round of dishes but some of the sides were missing. Later on with the second round of dishes they brought the missing sides but we were already full. Also They brought the two dishes at the same time which made one dish to go cold, which really effected the taste. Waitress did not ask if we needed anything and she did not bring the tap water we have asked. At the end they brought ice-cream as a complimentary but they forgot 1 person.  Nevertheless, we have enjoyed Spare Ribs, Mussels, Brill, Langoustine, Steak Tartare. All the dishes were tasty and the ingredient quality is really high. The most loved dish among the all was the ice-cream near the dessert Surprise Egg. It was soo delicious. Also prices are okey when you think this place as a Michelin Star. Overall it was a good experience and good atmosphere with flowers hanging and nice out-door seating, recommended.
Zeer lekker gegeten. Hamburgers waren lekker mals en sappig. Toetje ging er ook lekker in, goed op smaak en meer dan genoeg . Heb zelf voor de meatlover gekozen. We waren beide zeer tevreden
Superleuke interieur en propere zaak. Vriendelijke en vlotte bediening. Lekker eten, goede starters, goeie burgers....
Lekker burgers goede bieren, vriendelijk personeel zeker een pluim voor jasper onze serveerder van de avond.

De ceasar salade was voorzien van koolsla, daar moet je van houden. Verder miste ik ingrediënten die daarbij horen. Vrij prijzig. Een plat water per glas bestellen ging niet, alleen een fles van een halve liter kon.
restaurant sympa , bien situé, temps d'attente long malgré un service souriant. Le poulet est très bon mais peut-être un poil trop chère

I and my family visited the place on Monday just because all good restaurants in the area were closed on that day. Big mistake! We choose to seat outside and were “welcomed “ by a miserable short girl with black hair (Anita) who just looked at us and continue to clean a table. Extremely rude and unprofessional. After the second attempt to order food I had to ask somebody else to serve us. Finally we managed to place the order. One of the starter came after the main courses. Chicken Caesar salad -disaster!  Margarita pizza-not too bad. Food just for tourists.   Will not visit again!
Prima restaurant met een gezellig buiten gedeelte. Bij eventueel kou zijn dekens beschikbaar. Pizza was gewoon GOED. De spaghetti carbonare was ‘anders’.

Nous sommes allés à quatre.Accueil froid et sans âme.Le pire étant la cuisine.une honte à la cuisine chinoise. Nous sommes allés spécialement pour le canard laqué. Quelle horreur. Le magret réchauffer à l'huile et tout sec.la décoration de l'assiette horrible. La sauce infect.  Le tout pour une addition horriblement salée. Le chef n'a certainement jamais goûté à un vrai canard laqué. Je lui recommande un excellent au Chinatown d'Amsterdam, pour un prix dérisoire.Un vrai de vrai celui-ci.Quelle honte et quel moment gâché en famille !!!!

Wij hebben hier 1,5u zitten wachten. Mensen rondom ons die later binnenkwamen werden bediend, wij hebben onze bestelling nooit gekregen. Tot 3 maal toe aan een ober gevraagd of ze ons niet vergeten waren, ze gingen het navragen maar geen één is ons nadien enige info komen geven. Na 1,5u hebben we dan gevraagd om onze drankjes te mogen betalen omdat we niet meer langer wensten te wachten.

I waited about an hour & a half to get my food.  all of the staff were nice & helpful apart from this one older lady who was screaming at other customers, constantly giving my mother horrible looks & making the other waiters/ waitresses do all her work. At first not all our food arrived but the lady we spoke to about it was so helpful (I wish I got her name because she deserves a raise) the chips were a bit cold & didn’t have much flavour & the burger was burnt & boring. Overall I wouldn’t recommend this restaurant, definitely a waste of time & money

Visited on a quiet lunchtime - we sat inside as restaurant had air conditioningFood was ok nothing special - we had the 3 course set menu with proseccoBoth had calamari for starters, not a lot of tasteBoth had chicken for mains which was quite hard to cut as it had been over cookedI had cheese board and my friend had tiramisu - these were lovelyFree flowing prosecco which was great, cold and bubblyBoth had coffees and a cocktail later while we were still chattingService was good, 2 waiters and a lady were attentive without being intrusive

36oz porterhouse was cooked and carved by Romeo it was excellent just as we ordered it, Jess our server ensured we had all our needs taken care of great place great food great Experience this was our first time at this restaurant but intend to return with friends and family

Eerste keer in Balls&Glory.  We wisten niet wat te verwachten, maar dit was een aangename meevaller. Lekkere ballen, met een koele Vedett op een leuk terras. Enkel al voor de vlotte en leuke bediening komen we terug:-)

Het is een lekkere glutenvrije burger! K heb alles op er zijn ook glutenvrije frietekes, lekker hoor! :)Bediening mag beter geinformeerd worden over gluten intolerantie en de gevolgen daarvan. Prima restaurant!!!

Bei einem Ausflug von der Aida sind wir bei Jilles Beer & Burgers eingekehrt.Das Restaurant ist in einem typischen Ambiente gehalten. Die Bedingung war freundlich und bemüht. Wir hatten einen Double Burger sowie je einen normalen Burger bestellt. Alles war frisch zubereitet. Das Brötchen traf nicht ganz meinen Geschmack und die servierten Pommes waren TK.Der Espresso war gut.Die Waschräume sind etwas zu einfach gehalten.Insgesamt einen Besuch Wert!

5 of us visited the restaurant as part of our annual MotoGP weekend at Silverstone.Round of drinks plus water.Fillet, rib-eye & steaks accompanied with ribs were ordered. Various sides (chips, sweet potato chips, salad, coleslaw)Cooked to perfection (most of us selected medium/rare)Cracking service with a smile (had a bit of banter too)Great value for money5 very happy customers who will most like revisit next year!

Los productos que ofrecen son muy buenos y están muy bien elaborados. Son muy rápidos en atenderte y en coger el pedido pero estuvimos esperando a que nos sirvieran más de 45’. Los camareros son muy atentos.Las hamburguesas son espectaculares así como el resto de bocadillos. Muy buenos los tés. Un lugar para recomendar.

Personnel débordé, mais fait de son mieux pour être aimable. Bonne sélection de bières, cadre sympa. Les burgers sont chers, bons sans être excellents. Une erreur dans notre commande a totalement gâché notre expérience - pas envie d'attendre encore un long moment pour avoir le burger correct...
Surprised to find traditional Italian food in this area.Both pizza and spaghetti was well prepared , with quite a traditional taste. Recommended.

Op een drukke zaterdagavond gereserveerd voor 2 personen. Toen we aankwamen zag je heel veel mensen duidelijk geïrriteerd met niets van drank of eten op hun tafeltje. Ik ging naar de toog en nadat er reeds 4 keer iemand van het personeels mij passeerde zonder zelfs een blik te gunnen werd ik toch aangesproken. We werden een tafel toegewezen buiten. Dit stond nog vol leeggoed van de vorige klanten en nergens  was er "gereserveerd" te lezen. Als je het mij vraagt gewoon geluk dat er nog 1 tafeltje vrij was. De vuile glazen en borden werden niet afgeruimd. Als er eens een bestelling naar buiten kwam wist de bediening nooit voor wie deze was en veel klanten werden kwaad. Daarbovenop was de bediening, het leken mij jobstudenten, de hele tijd commentaar aan het geven op elkaar. Luid zodat iedereen het kon horen. Na 5 minuten nog geen kaart ontvangen. 1 grote chaos en er leek niemand iets in handen te nemen. De hele zaak straalde negativiteit en miserie uit.Dan hebben we beslist om op te staan en te vertrekken. Een gezellig avondje uit kreeg een onverwachte wending. Ik vraag mij af hoelang we hier zouden gezeten hebben indien noet vertrokken. Dit leek mij geen momentopname maar eerder iets wat grondig fout zit. Ik geef het alleszins geen kans meer.

What a let down.  My friend ordered the beef wellington which was not available on the menu; instead ordered the ribeye steak medium rare.  This arrived looking more like a minute steak and very over cooked.  I ordered the chicken which was very average certainly not spicy as piri piri should be; this came with a tiny portion of coleslaw, nothing else.  The side dishes are very small and over priced.  The service was extremely slow.  Neither myself or my friend will be returning.
After wondering around looking for a 'snack' we just so happened to stumble on this place and we were so glad that we did. The food was beautiful and a great price too
Het eten hier is superlekker en zeker aan te raden. Daarnaast is de service hier perfect! Wij komen zeker terug

Hemos visitado en varias ciudades de Alemania este restaurante porque nos parece fabuloso el lugar, se come como nos gusta a nosotros y realmente tienen buen producto, hoy fuimos a cenar a las 21,00 hs , siendo las 21, 50 nos dijeron que a las 23 cerraban la terraza donde estábamos cenando, pasaron 20 minutos , a las 22,10 otra vez nos recordaron que cerraban la terraza y nos cerraron la sombrilla, nos echaron del lugar, nos sentimos realmente incómodos, por supuesto hablamos con el manager y le hicimos saber que no nos había gustado la situación que nos sentíamos echados, ya habíamos ido otra vez y nos pasó lo mismo pero pensamos que era porque no había gente, bueno, conclusión, muy mala atención, nos dio la impresión que deseaban irse, no trabajar, así no se atiende, viven de esto, desastroso!

Heerlijk gezellig met vriendinnen een pasta gaan eten, beter kan niet! Bavet is er de beste plek voor! Ik las in andere beoordelingen dat het personeel onprofessioneel was, etc maar ik denk dat de schrijvers hiervan gewoon niet goed thuis zijn in een meer huiselijk restaurant. Zeker voor de jeugd een aanrader!

Franchement très bon le classic burger avec bacon et cheese en supplément. Frites bonnes. Milk shake au chocolat super. Desserts bons. On est dans une restauration simple et avec un bon rapport qualité prix. Je conseille !

Nice restaurant right near Hyde Park, the staff is efficient, very friendly and ... Italian! Very good cuisine although my penne were a bit overcooked. I had a starter, a main course and a desert plus a bottle of sparkling water for 39£. Italian music playing in the background, nice atmosphere.

On arrival for lunch we were handed the menu. Having seen on the web-site that there was a £12.95/£14.95 set lunch option we asked to see that menu. We were told that it wasn't available. That left us to choose two courses off the main menu at a cost nearer £20. Afterwards I contacted the restaurant by e-mail to find out why the set menu was unavailable. The prompt response was that the menu was available, but offering no explanation as to why the staff were 'hiding it'. I guess in the short term it boosts takings, but this restaurant will now be in the sin bin for a while. It is not even as if the food is that special in a crowded segment of the market.
Very good food and excellent service. I would come back, when im in Hasselt again.Thank you to All of the persons arround the restaurant

Middleton's Steak House and Grill in Peterborough is brill. Its great location the centre of Queensgate (town), amazing customer service and of course its food is to die for!!My grandad have been coming to Middleton's alot for dinner together and have got to know Kayleigh (one of the managers) and Marta and also the lovely polish lady who is normally occupuing the bar when you walk in (sorry I can't remember her name) they are all really lovely and always make a point of coming over to speak to us even if they aren't serving on that particular day. As soon as we walk into the restaurant we are remembered which is really lovely and all the staff that have served/waitered us have also been lovely and have great customer service. Grandad and I usually go for the set menu which is available from 12-6pm Monday and Friday and 12-5pm Saturday amd Sunday where at £10.95 for a starter, main course and dessert is great value! On all the times we have been coming we can never fault the quality and taste of the food (which is good as elsewhere Grandad has complained about steak but he never has anything bad to say about the steak here) grandad also loves the middletons sundae and knicker bocker glory also and sometimes even has seconds!! We don't have a bad thing or can think of one to say about Middleton's Steakhouse in Peterborough-  the lovely welcoming staff that make you feel valued and at home and the scrumptious food here make us come back again and again and we will be sure to come back very soon! Keep up the good work Kayleigh, Marta and team!! 😁
Terrasse sympa dans le centre d'Utrecht. Rien de particulier à noter : bons burgers avec une certaine recherche dans les saveurs et service agréable. Une bonne adresse.

Sitio muy agradable. La calle Enrico Granados favorece la terraza por la tranquilidad y el verde al rededor. Buen vino pero comida impersonal. Comida: Aconsejo el MINI-BURGER VASCO 3.50€ (muy mini) y las TOSTADAS un poquito caras pero muy ricas. Nota negativa: LAS BRAVAS NO ESTÁN CRUJIENTES 🥺! Aconsejable por un aperitivo tranquilo 🌳🧘🏼‍♀️🍷

Very kind and friendly staff (Henrique), extremely quick service and really good food, we had the lunch menu, where I had the soup, pork steaks, cod fish, and a past is definitely nata and an espresso, and was very cheap and a beautiful view, overall very happy

Zeer geschikt voor het bijtanken na het winkelen of tussendoor. Lekkere cocktails, goed terrasje en verrukkelijke burgers! Locatie is perfect: precies in het midden van de winkelstraat tussen de belangrijke bezienswaardigheden van Brugge. Het enige wat naar ons idee tegenviel is bediening.

Went there for the second time last weekend, first visit a year ago was o.k., nicely designed, good food and I like the "the matching beer to every burger"-idea. This time the food was quite good as well but that's it with the positives. We arrived at 6.30, ordered our drinks and our food a few minutes later, got our drinks within another five minutes and the wait began. A long wait. Other guests came, ordered and recieved their food while our wait continued. A party at the table next to us arrived after us and they finished their meal while we were still waiting. After 65 minutes my brother went to the bar and asked about our food. We were told there had been a mistake at the kitchen and we would get our food five minutes later. Five minutes later we got our burgers (I think I got another burger than I ordered but this could have been a misunderstanding, after more than 70 minutes I wasn't sure about my order), minus the onion rings (they would have take another 15 minutes so we didn't want them any more). But the really bad thing wasn't even the delay, it was how it was dealt with. We waited for over an hour and during this time nobody cared to ask if everything was o.k. They didn't even ask if we would like to order another drink, my beer was finished after about 20 minutes. Nobody cared that everybody got their food except us. After it was obvious that they made a mistake, the only person who said "sorry" was our young waiter, no manager came to apologize, nothing. First time in my life I didn't tip t a restaurant...
Adorei tudo! Desde a entrada à sobremesa. Os pratos são maravilhosos e cheios de sabor. O tempo de espera foi muito reduzido visto quê chegámos muito cedo.Experiência a repetir! 😃

Took my husband with out children for his birthday, service was bad had to keep looking for someone to serve us and for drinks, food adverage at best, son had lobster it wasnt half as advertised it was tiny, husbands steak not cooked as ordered and very chewy.The service was not great and a long wait even thou only us and two others thereWould not go again

We were looking for somewhere new to eat and thought we would give it a try.We were seated very quickly by a friendly young man. The menu was varied and there was also a cheaper fixed price menu for day time which we didnt go for. Our waitress Hollie was very knowledgeable about the menu and told us about tasting menu they had been given so they could help customers with choices as it gave them an insight into the food. Wish other places would do the same. As my other half likes his meat extremely well done Hollie advised us that it would be a while for our food to come out and would we like some nibbles. I guess the warning is so that after 15 mins people aren't complaining about the fact they don't have their meal. I am of the opinion that if it's good food I don't mind waiting.The food was cooked to perfection my lamb rump was cooked rare and tasted amazing. The other half had mixed grill and all was cooked as requested. The only thing that caused a disagreement was the crushed peas...... I liked them.... he wasn't sure and eventually decided that he didn't like them!Thank you for a great meal and we shall be back!
