I went with a friend for first time Thursday after my teenage son said he really likes it there. Was clean, great service, served by Hollie, who was Lovely. We had the 3 courses set. Was better than expected for the price £10.95. Steak done to perfection! Toilet facilities really clean. Sink in each cubical. Loved the animal pictures outside toilets. Thank you for a lovely meal and Thank You to Hollie. Will definately be going back.

Siamo stati ieri sera a cena in questo ristorante, sperando di poter mangiare pasta dignitosa. Abbiamo preso spaghetti al pomodoro, piatto abbondante, buono il sugo ma la pasta era scotta (probabilmente a causa della precottura, visto che abbiamo ricevuto i piatti a meno di 5 minuti dall'ordine, e non puoi precuocere gli spaghetti!!!). La nota dolente è arrivata con il conto, dove, mio malgrado, ho notato un'aggiunta del 12,5% relativa al servizio... Dopo 6 giorni a Londra è stato l'unico ristorante ad inserire, per un tavolo di 2 persone, direttamente nel conto, il servizio (in Italia se lo sognano). Tra l'altro avrei dato molto più volentieri la mancia ai camerieri, così invece mi sembra molto scorretto. Da non frequentare.

Ambiente molto bello con personale gentile e disponibile.Cocktails ben fatti e materie prime di qualità.Consiglio vivamente la combination di frutti di mare e crostacei grigliati.Da provare ottima rapporto qualità prezzo.
Sat outside. Good menu but picked  the two course special, for £9.95. Glass of wine and small beer extra. Meal was tasty. Drinks expensive! Good table service!
Their pork meatball was awesome on a bed of mashed potatoes/veggies! Pairs perfectly with a view and the outdoor dining allows for great people watching and a view of the bourse

Let me start by saying that the restaurant was 3/4 empty on a busy Saturday afternoon so that probably should have told us something. We never actually got into the place to eat as we waited over 5 minutes to be seated. The place was empty and we were ignored at least 3 times by people working there so decided to leave.
Voor het eerst in Utrecht geweest en het was heerlijk! De mixed grill is echt een aanrader en de bediening is top! Tevens zeer zeer goede bediening (Kees)!!!

Chickens must be the most unlucky animals on the planet, as most meat eaters tend to eat chicken from time to time.  We -parents- had the crispy Thai chicken salad. The little one had chicken nuggets. It’s always a pleasure to come and enjoy a family dinner at Poule & Paulette in Mechelen.

We visited Middletons as had been there a year ago and were impressed.  However, this time the food was very disappointing and not cheap.  The portion sizes were poor  (and I am not a big eater) and the food lukewarm. The only reason we did not complain was as it had been chosen by a family member for a celebration and we did not want to make a scene.

Entgegen der anderen Meinungen hatten wir eine kurze Wartezeit und das bei sieben Personen am Tisch. Die Burger sind in Ordnung. Sehr gut ist, dass ein Beyond Meat Burger angeboten wird. Schade, dass bei jedem Burger automatisch eine Beilage dabei ist. Wäre schön, wenn man darauf verzichten könnte.
Um dos melhores sítios em portugal para se beber bebidas e cocktails de altíssimo nível. recomendo demais!

I reserved a table for 2 on a friday night using there booking service. I arrived on time for my booking to arrive to a queue of people all waiting to served. Four couples where offered a table right by the kitchen with a pillar right by the side of it meaning u had to sit next to each. Not opposite as most couples want. So they all turned down the table and left. When we where finally served I said I had reserved a table and they didn't say anything and just pointed to the same table they had just offered to the 4 other couples. I asked if there was another table to which they replied "no" the waitress said " if u dont like it leave". When I said I had booked a table. She replied this us the one reserved for us, which it clearly wasnt. I left and went to a properly tun restaurant round the corner. Want to book go somewhere else. Terrible service, staff where rude and a horrible atmosphere.

Spaghetti house london is " The Best Dining in Town ".The service there was wonderful and food taste was exceptionalWe tried the spaghetti and the pizza and they were amazing.All the best to the restaurant in the future..
Excelente atendimento, comida bem confeccionada e uma vista deslumbrante sobre lisboa.Muito obrigado ao Henrique e a todo o staff.

Na de tijd vergeten te zijn, en geirriteerd omdat er ook restaurants die geen tafel voor 1 persoon hebben kwam ik hier terecht.  Helaas gesloten, nou ja ze konden nog wel een burger maken als ik hem mee zou nemen.  Dat ook gedaan, op hotel kamer hem op gegeten.  Ik had de classic burger, nou klassiek was ie zeker niet ondanks dat ik te laat was ( ze waren al dicht) een verse heerlijke burger.  Zoals ze wel zeggen smaakt naar meer.   Maar dat komt goed ik kom zeker terug

Op een zaterdagavond komen eten met 4 kids en 4 volwassenen. Het eerste probleem was dat wij niet konden reserveren.Toch even gewacht, ondanks dat de medewerker zei dat het een uur ging duren. Na 10 min hadden wij 2 aparte tafels.Het restaurant was afgeladen vol en het personeel kon dat niet aan omdat zij onderbemand waren.Onze bestelling liet heel lang op zich wachten, er was amper bediening en de bestelling was ook een paar keer foutief.Bavetten werden niet aangeboden. We konden amper een drankje bestellen door de drukte.Online bestellingen werden sneller meegegeven dan dat mensen in de zaal bediend werden.De "beleving" was ver te zoeken...Het was voor onze vrienden de eerste keer, maar ik denk niet dat zij nog terugkomen.Jammer.

Absolutely amazing food. We visited the Middletons at Peterborough and wanted to try the one in Middleton. Absolutely amazing meal, cooked to perfection by Chloe and served by Jess who was fantastic and made our meal experience one to remember.
bien le temps de prendre un apéro, mais lieu et ambiance sympa et le poulet est delicieux.a refaire lors d'une prochaine visite.

That was a first-class flavour experience! It was the first time I have tried a frozen Cappuccino (that is not the very sweet frozen coffee-things from Starbucks) and it was so delicious :)Also the staff was friendly and the location is perfect, as it is right next to the beach.You could see that they really know what they are doing, books of latte art and roasted coffee to buy. It is quite pricy, but it was totally worth the price !

C’est pas mal comme bowling car il est grand, blindé mais l’endroit est très jolie, rénové, bonne ambiance. Seul hic : vraiment très long a servir les boissons .. on a commander au bar, on s’est installer, milieu de partie de bowling ils sont venus nous servir nos milk-shake.. 🎳 Ps : Bien nettoyer les tables à chaque passages réguliers pour ramasser les anciennes boissons des clients svp.. on nous a installer sur une table salle du début à la fin..
Spécialités de spaghetti à déguster avec une bavette (à demander on ne sait jamais!). Bel emplacement pour un lunch sans prétention, mais pâtes extra!

We arrived when the restaurant was in the process of filling up. The interior looks fresh, the vibe is cool and the seafood on display looks incredibly appetizing. After being shown to our table however our problems started. It seems like nearly every time we got served or needed something, a different person came to the table. Not per se an issue if they would talk to eachother...My partner asked for an alcohol free cocktail, and instead got served the same cocktail but WITH alcohol. Major mistake. We returned it, they came back to say they weren't sure about the first one so they'd make a new one, but we were then forgotten about and I had to go ask for our drink again 15 minutes into already having our meal. The other drink was a sweet white wine, we got the red instead even though we clearly didn't ask for it. This was also exchanged, but we still got billed for the red one instead.The service errors became frustrating, and in the end we just wanted to get out of there. Some of the mistakes made were inexcusable.Shame, cause the food was actually delicious.

Our visit this time was to celebrate a family members 80th Birthday. The mixed grill  and desserts were delicious. The restaurant was very busy but we received excellent service from Hollie. Looking forward to visiting again soon.

High prices with average food. Not really fresh ingredients for the food (many sauces are obviously from a can or long premade and/or mixed with mayonaise). It looks much better on the menu than in reality. For example, we order a veggie burger with mozarella and pesto, just to discover that it was not real pesto but some mayonaise with pesto dressing. On the positive side, they have good beers with a nice selection and a recommendation on which beer goes best with each burger.

Me and the husband decided to come and try out middletons and omg why haven’t we been before !! The meal was fantastic the steak was the best I’ve ever tasted melted in your mouth. We will definitely be coming back.

This Korenmarkt really offers all catering possibilities: from MacDonald's over Ellis Gourmet Burger to Du Progrès Restaurant. Poule et Poulette is an original concept somewhere in between. I liked the classic half chicken with fries, while my table companions loved the nachos. Friendly service. Only the house wine is amenable to improvement.
For lunch we walked over to Seafood Bar. While there was a wait for a table, it was well worth it. Calamari was great.  Great wine.
And the food as well. Recommended! Vegan/vegetarian plantbasdd options. Nice terras in a nice area in Antwerp.

Das Restaurant macht von außen einen sehr lebendigen Eindruck, da immer eine Wartezeit und jeder Tisch besetzt ist. Leider war die seafood Platte kalt und nicht das was wir für den Preis erwartet hätten. Das Ambiente kommt einer Bahnhofshalle gleich genauso wie der Service, der dem Preis einfach nicht gerecht wird. Würde das Restaurant auf keinen Fall weiterempfehlen, es war mit Abstand das Schlechteste essen in unserem Amsterdam Urlaub!
Great location. Great service. Great onion rings and fries. Awesome burgers!!! All things yes. Go. Treat yourself.

The pub is in a nice location and lots of parking. On arrival we had to wait a short while to get seated, which was fine. It became clear that there wasn’t enough staff as every table had not been cleared and we waited 20 minutes after sitting down and then had to track someone down to get some drinks and order my childrens food. We had water brought to the table but no glasses, so we had to ask. When food arrived, no cutlery. I had seafood platter which was nice (pic attached) but over priced. My wife had surf n turf. Prawns were not Peri Peri and over cooked. Childrens burgers were over cooked but fish fingers were nice. 3 stars only given as ‘Chris’, who I think was the manager, was very calm under pressure and apologetic. Every table around us were compensated in some way for the issues they had, but well done that man for keeping it together and some damage limitation implemented.Sadly, too bad to risk returning again.

This is really a good formula. Spaghetti in a nice way, bolognaise, Cheese sauce, meatballs, vegans balls, bacon, chicken, spicy, not spicy, extra cheese, and so on...For a correct price in a nice setting. Great choice of Belgian better beers like la Chouffe and Vedette IPA. No cash only credit cards. So tax wise, an honest restaurant. An example for the industry. I recommend fully if you want a nice quality pasta and no fuss.

Heel leuk concept, heel leuk ingericht. Het eten is lekker en personeel heel vriendelijk. Door de open ruimte heb je wel snel het gevoel dat het druk en wat chaotisch is. Een tip ook voor mensen die koreander absoluut niet lusten vraag erna want op de taco's en op de salade lag er vrij veel op.

Relatief nieuw restaurant en daarom nog een beetje onontdekt. Het eten is er heerlijk. Niet alleen frans, maar ook italiaans en Belgisch. het is mooi ingericht, op warme dagen  kun je er buiten zitten. Vriendelijk personeel

Pour commencer, la serveuse est incompétente. Attente de plus de 20 minutes seulement pour prendre 2 parties de bowling. Elle est obligée de prendre son téléphone pour faire une division par 2. Elle donne des chaussures bien trop petites alors que la bonne taille lui est demander. Les tarifs sont élevé quand on voit les pistes qui ne sont pas droites, il n’y a que quelques tailles de boules. Et pour en revenir à la serveuse. Nous sommes aller commander à boire des notre arrivée, à la fin des 2 parties de bowling soit approximativement 1 heure, toujours rien, en même temps compliqué de servir les clients quand on passe son temps sur son téléphone. Très décevant. Je ne recommande absolument pas.
Visited  for a Sunday Roast food  was brilliant fresh and homemade good value for money nice atmosphere good service friendly and welcoming staff will be back!

We were able to walk over to the Seafood Bar after visiting the Van Gogh Museum. They have minimum tables set aside for reservations and were unable to get one but they were able to seat us quickly.  The mixed seafood grill was absolutely delicious.  We ordered it for two with a side of salad and fries.  This was plenty of food for the two of us.  It included lobster, shrimp, mussels, prawns, scallops, dover sole, sea bass.  The fish/seafood was beautifully prepared, very fresh and service was lovely and not rushed even though there was a line up when we left.  Prices seemed reasonable.
The food here is OK looking at the prices, but it’s not the best steakhouse I’ve been to. The staff is good though and the food was server quite quickly.

We were traveling with her 10-year-old granddaughter and spent 12 days in Amsterdam. My wife and granddaughter had a hankering for a hamburger.  We were well satisfied and went back a view days later.  We mostly went to Dutch restaurants which were very good as well.

Na een dagje Antwerpen besloten om even “snel” een bordje spaghetti te gaan eten bij Bavet. Al eerder langs gelopen en het zag er goed uit. Eenmaal binnen kregen we snel een tafeltje, maar vanaf dat moment liet de service lang op zich wachten. Ze kijken niet of je nog een drankje lust en tafels afruimen gebeurt pas als er nieuwe mensen binnen staan. De spaghetti is wel echt een aanrader!!!

We had a really wonderful night at Ron Gastrobar.  Chef and sommelier extraordinaire, Hylke Burgers, looked after us so very well, and we can't thank him enough!We allowed him to choose our courses, and everything was superb.  The wines he chose were also a perfect match!Ambience was fantastic, and we couldn't have asked for more for a 'last night in Amsterdam' celebration!We will definitely return!
superleuk concept : kwaliteitsvolle burgers , lekkere vegetarische burgers, fris koolsalade en verse frietjes : aanrader !

You may not want to wait for your birthday or an anniversary (it was ours) to go to this lovely seafood restaurant...but if you do you won't be disappointed.  We had crab cakes and scallops (shared these) for starters, and each had 1/2 a grilled Lobster for our main course.  Shared the chocolate mousse & ice cream dessert.  Loved all of it.  As it was a special occasion for us (our anniversary when we ALWAYS eat lobster) we really wanted it to be perfect.  It was.  Ambience, staff, everything, just right.  Oh, and did I mention the Bloody Marys?  Spicy & came with an oyster!

I have been here a few times, and never been disappointed. Visited on Friday, and the food was delicious. I had my first experience of mussels as a starter, and they were lovely. For my main, I had the seafood mixed grill and the fish and prawns were divine! Hubby had the mixed grill and was equally impressed. Love the water bottle touch, and the service was excellent. Cant wait to return.

Went in and were received by a very polite and friendly waiter. However, as we sat we waited a while and no one came to take our order. Once we asked another waiter he replied very rudely. When we challenged the rude waiter he doubled back.... avoid if you want to have a pleasant meal.

Klant van het prille begin, 53 min wachten op bestelling, klanten (4 tafels) na ons besteld al bediend, dan komen zeggen dat het mijn eigen schuld was omdat ik mijn vlees goed gebakken wouw, dat is dan de eerste keer in al die jaren dat dat  de regels zijn.Zonder pardon, bij betalen niet van heeft het gesmaakt zelfs dat kon er niet meer vanaf. Bij toerist kan je die opmerking proberen maar niet bij vaste klanten. Hadden ze eerlijk geweest en niet zo arrogant kon ik er meer begrip voor opbrengen, nu helaas niet. NIET naar Ellis voor goed gebakken burger !!!!!
Had the set menu with my friend and tasted lovely. Portions are getting smaller, even the desserts. Just found out they have increased their set menu price too!
Zeer lekker gegeten en super bediening.Enkel aan de desserts mogen ze nog iets doen, geen aanbod.Leuke keuze die je zelf kan samenstelln.

We visited as a couple of friends on a Monday night. Only 4/5 other tables were taken and we got sat in a nice corner of the place. The main room is really nice with a feeling of a slightly posh restaurants but with paper napkins.Service was good and waiters polite and very helpful although probably overstaffed for a not-busy night so we got asked multiple times the same questions as the waiters were walking around.We hadStarters:calamari: not very tasty and slightly burnt 4/10Prawn cocktail: vert tasrlty with a very light and fresh sauce, decent portion 8/10Mains:Rack of bbq ribs: best ribs I tried in a really long time. As I took the first rib by the bone and pulled, the bone came off straight away. Super juice and soft, great taste 9/10Steak with lobster: great looking steak with lobster coming with a choice of sauces 9/10Dessert:Creme brulé: 8/10Drinks were nice and moderately priced although all meats are quite expensive. Will visit again
The food was great, the service excellent, and it is a nice place to sit outside and people watch as you enjoy your meal

Si a eso de medio día estás por la Museumplein y te apetece un pescaíto, este "bar" te lo pone fácil. Tienen de todo a la manera de Holanda, con un toque afrancesado, desde la sopa de langosta y el "fish and chips" hasta los más sofisticados platos de marisco. Buena carta de vinos, con un Rueda bastante bueno y un Albariño delicado. No te irás con hambre, pero tampoco es barato. Y a veces hay que hacer cola. Muy recomendable.

Ik werk zelf in de horeca dus weet dat het soms lastig en druk kan zijn! Vandaar dat ik extra tevreden ben van de vriendelijke en vlotte bediening deze middag! Top service en lekker gegeten, dus ik ben alvast een tevreden klant :)
Essen war gut, Service war mehr als top, sehr freundliches PersonalBurger und Bier sind sehr zu empfehlen 😉
Very busy and popular place, but the quality and range of seafood is much better in Vancouver, such as Joe Fortes, Provence, Blue Water Cafe. Fish soup should be more broth-like, not thickened.

Brilliant sea food if you love good food. Brilliant presentation and very helpful staff who make you comfortable in the restaurant. I really enjoyed my food and the environment. I think everyone should visit this place in Utrecht Holland
Delicious healthy option that was very affordable. I ordered the Mediterranean Wrap and loved it. If you order the bowls make you get enough dressing or it could end up being dry
Excelente, comida requintada e bem elaborada. Espaço agradável e bom atendimento.  O preço está coerente com a qualidade oferecida.
Erg lekker gegeten, eerst oesters en toen de mixgrill. De mixgrill is echt een aanrader. Gezellig en druk restaurant...

Hier eens komen eten, jammer genoeg.13,5 voor drie kleine taco's met kip die eentonig naar vermoedelijk koriander proeft. Ik detecteerde ook een lichte zeepsmaak al kan ik mij niet herinneren dat ik tot de ongelukkigen behoor die koriander proeven als zeep.Waarom er trouwens zoveel koriander in moest, is me een raadsel. De saus die op de kip was gedaan was ook eentonig van smaak (slechte smaak).Dit was een teleurstelling en eigenlijk te duur. Voor alles (vb frieten bij je taco's of andere gerechten) moet je bijbetalen.
Près de Oxford street, petite terrasse sympa.Les pâtes étaient très bonnes et les bruschettas aussi.Petite pause sympa!
Food was excellent and the service was quick and light hearted from Evelina, such a great waitress! Would definitely come back and the recommend it to others.

We had just finished the Heineken experience and were ready for dinner. Lovely way to finish up our stay in Amsterdam. Crab cakes for starts were perfect to share with 3.  We had fish and chips which was delicious and hit the spot. Although I wish we had more time to go back and try some of their seafood dishes and platters. Lots of ohhhs and ahhs from other diners as they were brought out and all were raving. Great bright spot. Give it a try for sure.

Heerlijke visplaat genomen onder het genot van een cava. Personeel vriendelijk en behulpzaam met sommige soorten op de juiste manier van hun schaal. Ondanks dat je op het station zit, toch echt het gevoel dat je op terras van een restaurant zit door de leuke aankleding. Ik kom hier zeker weer!
We called in here for an early supper and opted for one of their seafood platters to share. It was delicious, a great variety of different seafood all presented beautifully. Highly recommend fed.
O melhor dos frutos do mar num ambiente descontraído, recomenda-se reserva antecipada pois o local é concorrido e a espera longa

This restaurant could be fantastic.Wide selection of beers and great interesting  burgers really well cooked let down by slow and uninterested service.it seemed to us that the waiting staff just saw us as a number to get seated and deliver to with no warmth or sense of personalised care.We booked and were told out table wasnt ready and were shown to an empty table to wait.after 30 mins of no communication or opportunity to order a drink we managed to get a waiters attention.after about 45 mins it was decided that we could order and remain at this table.after about 75 mins we got our order but there was never any sign of polite apology or acknowledge ment of the multiple delays.I'm sure with some basic training the front of house team could match the standards in the kitchen

Went here for my anniversary the other day, and was very impressed.Steakhouses have a tendency to overcharge in the quest for a fancy dining experience, but Middletons offers a 10z rump steak for about £18 and that includes a side of your choosing. It would've sweetened the deal even more if the sauce was included, but I can forgive that.For an idea of a meal price, we both had starters, steak and shared a £25 bottle of wine and the entire bill came to £73. Not bad at all.The steak was lovely as was my starter (garlic mushrooms), they had a very comprehensive selection of wines and the service was rock solid. Barely had to wait any time at all for the food to arrive (admittedly this was a very quiet Monday).Decor is relatively no-frills if that's your thing; tidy but fairly unremarkable. But where it mattered most, Middletons delivers affordable steak dining, which there's a curious lack of in Chelmsford town center.
Prijzig maar zeker de moeite waard...en zeer mooie zaak ook.Ze hebben echt alles wat met vis te maken heeft.... Voor low budget zelfs fish and chips :-)))

Four of us had dinner here recently - we shared some of the seafood platters so that we could try different things.  All of the food was excellent.  Especially the fried fish, the king crab legs, and the clams.  The restaurant was completely full - so it is advisable to have a reservation unless you want to wait an hour for a table.  Service was spotty.  But that did not detract from a very enjoyable meal.
子供も食べることが出来る安心のバーガーだと思います。お肉は味のある美味しいお肉でした。フレンチフライも美味しかった。

Visited almost a year ago (see my previous report); and again recently, and the food was excellent, service was a bit cold by Russian Big Guy, but they this time put a £9.50 tip on the bill for serving us just the main course!! What the hell is going on in their minds? They just give you the bill including the exorbitant tip, with no option to remove it, We was there celebrating a special occasion, so I did not want to embarrass my partner, but rang head office the following morning to tell them of my disgust at their inclusive tipping, and guess what? They had the audacity to put me through to the big Russian guy, who’d served us, fortunately I’ve got plenty of grit, and told him to remove the £9.50 from my already paid bill, after a lengthy discussion he said he would have this amount put back on my card, and it was completed satisfactorily. But be careful if your of a timid nature?
Wat is het hier fantastisch, alles is kloppend! Het eten, de rijsttafel moet je echt proberen, de bediening, sfeer, omgeving! Toppertje.

On our visit to Amsterdam, we went to The Seafood Bar following the recommendations from friends. We didn’t have any reservations but they have a fantastic system in place where you can walk around and keep updated on the status of your wait. The menu is very diverse and our servers Julia and Fenne were so friendly and helpful! Every single item that we selected was outstanding. The seafood was so fresh!! If you visit Amsterdam, this is a must go in your list!

Under the roof above the Hudson’s Bay store dead centre Amsterdam, with a wide view over the city, another formula of Rob Blaauw opened shop. This time an Indonesian style cuisine. We visited for my son’s birthday on a Sunday evening. An elevator from the ally brings you to the top floor. The kitchen is in the middle under the arched roof, with tables around it all looking very nice.The food on the other hand was really good. We took the ‘rijst tafel’, all the dishes served in small portions. Also a choice for veggies. We eat quite a lot of Indonesian food but this is at the high end. Service is good. Sunday live music was a bit too loud for our taste, perhaps check beforehand if that is not your thing. Otherwise Hudson’s Bay is leaving so hopefully Ron’s can stay.

Leuk kader, propere keuken (als je naar het toilet gaat kan je in de keuken kijken) vriendelijk personeel, lekkere sharing plates...   De burgers zijn niet alledaags, lekkere combinaties, kortom heerlijk.....
This is a poor imitation of a steak house. It all feels fabricated. The staff were like zombies. The steaks were terrible and tasted like charcoal. I would not recomend.

We first ate in Amsterdam here. We were met by a friendly girl with good English explanations on the menu. At first we sat on the street to enjoy the street scene, but when the shower started, we asked the lady if we could go inside. And without hesitation, she helps us reload a table in a restaurant. We had a seafood day soup with mussels and fish, fried fish, fried fish and a selection of snacks with herring and other things. Everything was exceptionally fresh and tasty. The spice was perfect without compromising the freshness of the seafood. It definitely set the tone for our entire trip to Amsterdam.
De nieuwe ervaring : als drank Carlsberg 0% dat gaat maar een echte Carlsberg van 4% is lekkerder. De nuggets waren zeer lekker. De kip met Thaise groenten en kruiden ook zeer lekker.

The latest branch of Kricket owned by Will & Rick has opened next to Soho House in Television centre White City opposite Westfield. This large airy restaurant has an outdoor covered terrace. Kricket is usually Anglo-Indian but last night they had a special Anglo Thai Chef Series for September. We started off with a Thainapple Express gin cocktail so good we had a couple more. There was a set dinner starting with BhelnPuri with a caramel fish sauce very moorish and delightfully crunchy. Followed by a Lemongrass Tandoor chicken with mint yoghurt and tamarind, a wild mushroom and Buckthorn Nam followed along with a red curry fish cake with a cucumber sauce. Next course was wild boar curry with pickled gRlic and crispy shallots with pickled red onion sweet yoghurt and turmeric rice. Pudding was a coconut rice pudding with blackberries and butterfly sorrel leaves. We drank a Godello from Galicia and finished with some fresh mint tea. The flavours in this exeptional meal were remarkable, so interesting and intense. I am a great fan of Kricket and enjoy going to their other two restaurants in Denman Street off Shaftesbury Avenue and Brixton. All are well worth a visit White branch is truly delightful.

J'y suis déjà allée plusieurs fois et c'est toujours bons. Ils ont de bons sides et leur choix de burgers et bon aussi. La dernière fois j'ai aussi essayé leur nachos comme entrée et c'est aussi très bon!
Great fresh seafood.  The large mixed platters are incredible and good for sharing.  Portions are large

This is an outstanding restaurant.An original take on Indian Cuisine.The presentation is perfection and the taste exceptionally delicious.Very informal atmosphere.Bar sitting for two and more than that on their own table.Very attentive staff.A real find.Perfect plates for sharing too.I will be returning and recommending to friends.A delight m.
superb food, went for meal with family. cannot fault the place. friendly staff, relaxing welcoming atmosphere.will definitely eat here again.

Just around the corner from where I was staying in Utrecht was this delightful cafe.  I can rely on a good coffee here, made by a barista in a proper machine, not just press of a button.  There are plenty of choices for type of coffee and style. I like decaf and various non-dairy milks.  All my wishes were met.  Unfortunately, my wishes for gluten-free biscuits could not be met - but that is another story. It is nice to sit there in the morning sun and read the newspaper.
Fantastic!  We loved this place, a must do when in Amsterdam.  The seafood, the service and the atmosphere were tops.  Thank you to our server, Paula, for a wonderful meal.
Seafood bar is my favorite seafood restaurant in The Netherlands. Everything is really fresh and tasty and prices re not crazy. Well served.
Verser dan verse vis. Alsof je aan de visafslag zelf eet. Vakmensen achter de kachel, en voor normale prijzen een geweldig glaasje wijn erbij. Leuke bediening, spontaan en inhakend.
We enjoyed our dinner at this restaurant.The food was all made fresh and it was delicious. Thanks to Paula for taking good care of us.

Terrible service not to mention they charged us extra 12.5% for really bad slow service And refuse to take our money because they claims that old cash have the value of any paper and the refused to take it

bezoekje gisteren 3/9 niet goed bekomen : zelf bestek moeten nemen uit bakje op tafel ( hygiene ? service ?) , te warm bier waar geen schuim op kwam nochtans goed doorgeteld nl 3,10 euro voor Bolleke van 25cl, bamboe bord echtgenoot stond krom waardoor kip niet stabiel lag, alles is supplement : geen sla geen frieten alleen 1/2 kip maar dan van een zeer kleine kip !!! waterglazen op niet al te propere tafel omgekeerd gezet, personeel (5 personen) staan gewoon te babbelen in de keuken met deur open geen rekening houdende met feit dat klant alles ziet en hoort   ...geen ticket betaling visa bij betaling ? nooit meer!

Good service. Very prompt. There was a few items on the menu that were not available and in some cases only one portion was left (I.e. the beef Wellington) but we were lucky as they were not the items we wanted but would have been an issue for some people.The food was very good, hot, and nicely presented. The Lemon Tart was not the best very over baked so wouldn't choose that again.There was a nice atmosphere in the restaurant for a Monday evening  .It would be nice if the lighting was a little softer and maybe some candles on the table just to create a little more of a snug and intimate feeling especially as it is just a big building.Overall a good experience and for a special night we would go again.

Un locale molto pulito e moderno con camerieri giovani e molto disponibili e sicuramente dove poter mangiare del buon pesce fresco dentro il locale c'è in bella mostra tutto il pescato del giorno . Unico neo il locale è molto rumoroso.
Very good sea food restaurant, with a variety of shells, oysters and fresh fish, so you can choose as you wish, on ice, raw or cooked. Very tasty ! Good service, nice place.
Love this venue. So much history and a lovely ambience. Its good quality food at a reasonable price. Staff ate friendly too.

Having visited the fabulous Argyll St branch I was very disappointed by the restaurant in Holborn, which we had chosen for our third anniversary meal. We chose the location because of the outdoor seating, but were disheartened to find a rowdy pub next door which created a horrendous level of noise. We ordered a £26 Pinot Grigio which was revolting - tasted like nail varnish remover - and came in a warm bottle cooler with no ice. The spaghetti itself was so greasy we felt too bloated to go to a bar or anything afterwards and went home with severe tummy troubles. The people on the table next to us had to send back their pizza because it was stone cold. And all this for over £100. Huge waste of money, avoid at all costs.

Jeg fik en salat til 99 Kr. Vi fjernede kyllingen erstatede den med avocado. Det var til pengene en rigtig god salat. Jeg kan godt anbefale Sød Kartoffel pomfritterne til 29 kr. De smager rigtigt godt

I came here with a group of friends on Sunday for a roast, it was terrible. Drowned in gravy, chopped up meat, two roast potatoes and a quarter of a carrot. An absolute waste of money, not to mention it took over 40 minutes to arrive to the table! I thought you can't go wrong with dessert, the portion of the sticky toffee pudding could fit on my spoon. After asking several times, the bill came half an hour after asking. If I had no morals, I would have walked out. Honestly, if you're thinking of coming here, don't. I'm easily impressed so this is saying something.
No esta nada mal para comer un buen marisco y pescado en Utrecht. Servicio muy rápido y amable. Un poco alejado del centro.
Wonderful and worth every penny. The calamari melts in your mouth. A very upmarket restaurant serving beautifully cooked food

Came here with my husband and 12 yr old daughter for my Birthday treat.Table was booked for 7.15 and got taken to our table on arrival.We waited 1/2 hour for someone to take our drinks order and at that point we was also well ready to order our food.We waited until 8.45 before we eventually got our food and in the meantime we had to go up to the bar to ask for some drinks as no one even bothered to come over and ask 😟 food was good when it did arrive but the wait was far too long and the service not good at all.Will we return?only if i have 3 hrs to spare and maybe take a bottle in my bag next time 😐
We thought we would try this place for  our wedding anniversary meal. We had a fabulous meal. Food was superb staff were fabulous. Our waitress was called hollie and was so attentive and friendly.
Really fresh sea food for reasonable prices. We tried a lot of meals there, all was excellent:) Hope we ll visit this restaurant again.

Our group of four chose two seafood plates to share: fruit de mer (cold) and the mixed grilled plate. There was so much food! We realized we could’ve ordered the combination of both which would’ve been just right for four adults, unless your appetite is quite large! The seafood was fresh and delicious, the ambience was relaxed and friendly. Our waiter John provided great service! We will come here again the next time we are able to visit Amsterdam.

1e bezoek aan deze zaak. Ruim, luxe uitstraling, open keuken. Veel keus aan visgerechten en goede wijnen. Vriendelijk en attent personeel. Gerechten en de opmaak van hoog niveau. Aangenaam vertoeven. Ik kom zeker terug!

We had a few days away at end of August and for our first evening we wanted to go to here. We've been here several times on our visits to London and have always had lovely meals and great service. We were not disappointed I always have the meatballs and they are always lovely. My husband loves chicken and had crispy chicken with beautiful chips and rocket. It was gorgeous.  We had a lovely bottle of wine and had a lovely chat with the waitress who brought us a small glass of Limoncello on the house. Perfect, what can I say. We did go to a different branch on the Saturday in Kensington as it was nearer but was not as special as Duke St and the food was not as well cooked. So we will go back to Duke St every time in future. Arrivederci until next time

Es un buen lugar para pararse, por ejemplo, tras una larga jornada de visitas, llegando la noche, para poder disfrutar de algo de aire fresco en el entorno de la hermosa plaza en la que se ubica la terraza. Su carta es muy específica, no muy amplia, y centrada en los platos de este tipo de restaurantes, esto es, hamburguesas, ensaladas, alguna cosa de picar... Lo que probamos era de calidad y nos gustó. Sus jóvenes camareros nos atendieron con amabilidad también. Para estar con niños viene bien dada su ubicación, con espacio en la plaza Sainte-Catherine.

Een geweldige plek om lekker casual te eten. De menukaart is erg divers en gebasseerd op Amerikaanse lekkernijen. Het personeel is erg vriendelijk en snel. Wij komen hier vaker en hebben vaak de zelfde waitress die ons helpt en zij is echt top! Ook kan je hier terecht voor heerlijke cocktails of alcohol vrije drankjes.

Mijn man en ik wouden snel een hapje eten. Bediening was zeer vriendelijk. Prijzen zijn iets duurder. We hadden de onion rings, deze waren superlekker! En we hadden de nacho's, en alhoewel de gucamole enzo vers was, waren de nacho's koud. :-( Heb de serveerster erover aangesproken, ze was zeer vriendelijk en gaf aan dat ze eraan gingen denken.

I discovered Bavet by chance, and the 2 times I went there were delightful experiences.The food was good and the place is nice and well located. I prefer the outdoors tables, when it was sunny; however service there was slower than in the indoors area.

Absolutely superb Sea Food Restaurant . The Seafood set menu we had it was a mixture of cold and hot seafood . The selection was very generous and the price tag was pretty reasonable considering it was fresh seafood. The service itself was immaculate and very organized considering it was very busy . Overall we were very pleased with our visit and we will definitely go back next time we are in Amsterdam . A+++++
good food and good service very helpful had 5 small children with us  parking was fine and they could fit us in  and we could pre order  We came in and the carvery was excellent

Sono stata al seafood bar per il mio compleanno con il mio fidanzato, ci ero già stata precedentemente e sapevo che la qualità era eccellente. Il personale gentilissimo, il pesce freschissimo e cucinato in ogni modo desiderabile, il locale molto accogliente. Abbiamo ordinato uno champagne, pagato 65 euro, ottimo prezzo considerato che nelle enoteche è in vendita alla stessa cifra; abbiamo preso la degustazione seafood al costo di €40 a testa, praticamente regalata considerando la qualità ottima del pesce, i prezzi medi di Amsterdam e la grandezza del piatto!Infine, abbiamo ordinato anche un piatto da 6 ostriche tra le molteplici qualità che il seafood bar ha da offrire. Abbiamo concluso con caffè. Totale 180 euro. Sono super soddisfatta, è stato un compleanno perfetto. Ci tornerò sicuramente anche senza che vi debbano essere occasioni speciali, essendo i prezzi abbordabili e la qualità eccellente.

I have been there twice so far and really like the food. The first time I had the Thai salad and the second time the Pitta Poulette. As you can guess by the name of the restaurant, all dishes are prepared with chicken meat. The restaurant is in a nice, central location and has an outside terrace. Prices are reasonable and the portions are rather large.

Lekkere verse hamburgers op verschillende wijze tussen een lekker broodje , mooi geserveerd , leuke locatie , vriendelijke bediening , als je graag een hamburger eet met dat tikkeltje meer , vind je dit nuttig graag een duimpje

It takes skill to produce sauté potato that is so tough that your fork has difficulty in penetrating it. It takes effort to present a scallopini in such an unappetising manner. It takes preparation to plate a tagliatelle polo with the pasta so al to be almost beyond dente. To be able to maintain this level of QA,I suspect these meals are factory produced.But the real skill is being able keep a straight face as you hand the customer the bill.

Today we went for lunch and my husband had mussels and Dutch croquettes. A while after we left the restaurant started having abdominal pains and started vomiting for a while, he spent a very bad night and he didn’t eat anything after lunch.
整體氛圍很好,餐點美味,尤其是麵包,龍蝦濃湯很多人推,因此我們也點來試試,可能味道不是我們喜歡的,海鮮拼盤真的很推,物超所值,整體的氛圍真的很值得前來

Wat een ontzettend aardige jongens werken hier, het valt iedere keer op als ik hier een koffietje doe. Extra genieten met de latte macchiato die aan je tafel pas wordt ingeschonken en mooi wordt gepresenteerd. Verwennerij!

We wanted a table for two on a Monday evening and came in a little before 6PM. We were sat relatively quickly but the place was filling up. We ordered drinks and they came promptly but nobody came to take our food order for  ages. People that came after us were already having their food and we hadn’t even had our orders taken!Another thing that we didn’t like was that for other people the staff brought some bread and snacks ‘while they were waiting’ on the house and we didn’t get any! We simply were ignored.When the food came it was good and plentiful but the staff were quite disoriented and we got a different server each time. The shellfish was fresh and well prepared but we were quite disappointed with the service. I would avoid this place at peak times.
Good choice for vegetarian - especially gluten free - food! Good advice, tasty food - perfect for lynch
El local es pequeño y un poco ruidoso. El personal es muy atento pero escaso, no dan abasto lo cual repercute en el servicio.Las pizzas son estupendas de las mejores que he probado.

Wir haben es leider nicht geschafft, zu sechst einen Tisch zu reservieren. Glücklicherweise haben dann 4 Freunde sich breit erklärt anderswo zu essen.Trotz schönen Wetters haben wir am Abend aber auch zu Zweit keinen Platz im Freien ergattert.Wie es sich herausstellte war dies aber kein Nachteil. Auch im Inneren haben wir uns bei guter Termperatur wohl gefühlt!Die Fischtheken machen Appetit und die Karte lässt bereits deas Wasser im Mund zusammen laufen.Wir entschieden uns für einen Mixed Grill mit Muschln, Garnelen, Seezunge, Scholle und Hummer: man schmeckt die Frische. Die Zubereitung war tadellos. Für uns war es fast zu viel.Die passende Flasche Wein dazu war ebenfalls toll!

Fantastic and friendly staff! The restaurant itself is in a lovely and central location. The atmosphere is great, both inside (where we sat) and outside (where we watched). The food is great and a brilliant place to eat for anyone who enjoys a more interactive experience with their menus. Be prepared for big portions however, fear not as the place offers disposable containers for you to take your leftovers with you! Great place and a great place for either lunch or dinner.

Todo el mundo debería ir alguna vez a esta pizzería. De momento solo he probado la pizza Grosso y la Pig data pero las dos estaban más que ricas. Eso si, hay que reservar porque suele estar llenísimo incluso los días de diario.

I recommend the veggie lover and falafel burgers. Also if you get fries, it’s better to share them as the burgers are really filling.The atmosphere was nice and relaxed but it was quite loud. The staff were friendly but missed a couple of our orders. It’s a reasonable value for money.Overall, it’s a nice place with good food and I would recommend it.

Le poulet sous tous ses aspects ! Nous avons pris un apero mix puis un demi poulet / filet de poulet. Tout est bon. Poulet parfaitement cuit. Nous reviendrons gouter d’autres plats qui ont l’air tout aussi bons !Le service quant à lui est efficace et agréable.

Couldn’t fault the service by Jess and the food cooked by Chloe was fantastic, haven’t been here for a few years due to a couple of bad meals but with new staff and management brilliant and the surprise with dessert was an added bonus, brill Thankyou

We hadn’t been there for years but decided to go for our wedding anniversary. The service was quick and friendly by Jess. Food was delicious especially the sticky and spice, cooked by Chloe. They knew it was our anniversary and so decorated a plate for us. See below. Lovely touch to our evening. We will go back

We had lunch there today, after visiting the British Museum and Sir John Soane’s Museum. It’s a very nice restaurant, with great food and deco and Paul was the nicest waiter. We had the avocado bruschetta, bocconcini di mozzarella fritti and spaghetti al pesto and al pomodoro e basilico. Fantastic!

Other than that time we got the most fabulous gelato on a sweltering Rome day, this restaurant ranks as our best dining experience abroad. We made reservations easily online and were made to feel welcome by helpful and English speaking servers. I especially appreciated that they didn't try to pressure or shame us into purchasing alcoholic drinks. We had the razor clams, fish of the day with white asparagus, and mixed warm grill for one. The portion sizes were generous and having grown up in seaside towns, the quality was readily apparent. Of all the dishes, I recommend the razor clams the most. By the time we left about 2 hours later, I saw the razor clams had disappeared from the front-of-restaurant display - seems others enjoyed them, too! I honestly would love to visit Amsterdam again just to experience this restaurant.

Magari sono io, ma mi ha dato la nausea. Tutto. Falafel wrap ed una centrifuga mela, carota e non so altro, ma che sapeva SOLTANTO di zenzero. Ho dovuto buttare tutto, perché era immangiabile.€14 buttati.

Balls&Glory was ons zeker niet onbekend. Sinds kort zitten ze nu vlak aan de Stadsschouwburg in Antwerpen. Wat een locatie! Samen met vrouw en dochter daarheen. Heel vriendelijke ontvangst en het ouwe getrouwe concept met een paar extra formules aan toegevoegd. Kortom de ideale mix voor een gezellige middag uit eten. Na goed kijken zagen we dat de uitbater, Jasper, de vroegere chef was van Balls & Glory Gent. Tof om te zien dat jonge mensen met de nodige ‘know how’ de stap durven wagen om zelf in het het Originele verhaal van Wim Ballieu en Balls & Glory!Enorme aanrader! Hier zien ze ons zeker terug!
Love this place most of all love the upstairs looking down on them cooking Food is extremely good staff happy and polite any problems soon resolved toilets upstairs
I like this restaurant as the food is always good, and sometimes a little too much, and the service is always excellent.

Spinti dalla voglia di provare questa famosa aringa, ci dirigiamo in questo fastfood di pesce in centro. Chiamarlo fastfood è però riduttivo. Con 5€ si mangia un ottimo panino. Torneremo sicuramente, consigliatissimo!
Lekkere kip gerechten! Niet overdreven veel keuze, wel keuze genoeg.Mooi uitzicht op de gentse oudheid
Lekker, ik heb genoten en ik kom zeker vaker langs.Goeie locatie, goeie vriendelijke medewerker top
So good burgers, onion rings and fries. Clean place, nice staff and good lication. We recommend the “Meat lover” and fries with cheese and gravy.

Buonissimo!!! Ci è piaciuto talmente tanto che ci siamo andati due volte! Posto piccolino ma accogliente e poco affollato! Il mangiare è davvero buono e soprattutto ti allontani per un po' dal sapore del burro, presente in qualsiasi pietanza! Prezzo onesto per essere nel centro città. Abbiamo provato sia le insalate che il burger e la pizza! Tutto gustuso e anche sostanzioso! Straconsigliato!
Leuke vlotte bediening, prijs kwaliteit prima. Geen grote kaart..maakt kiezen makkelijk ☺️ heeft twee terrassen dus niet doorlopen als het bij de deur vol is

Via de site gereserveerd, waarbij stond ‘Open restaurant’. Dat blijken krukken aan de bar te zijn. Naar mijn mening de beste plekken; je ziet het heerlijkste eten voor je neus ontstaan. De bediening is super vriendelijk en kundig. De keuze is wat beperkter, dan het origineel in Ouderkerk, maar de smaken zijn er niet minder om. Die zijn werkelijk verrukkelijk! Op de zaterdagavond zingt er een hele goede live band, met entertainment rond de tafels. Wij kozen voor de taco en eend als voorgerecht en een rijsttafel als hoofd. Onder onze ogen werd het heerlijke toetje geprepareerd; een reusachtige pinda met ijs en crumbles. We hebben een avond lang genoten van het eten en alles wat er omheen gebeurde. Ben je in de buurt; gaan!
Heerlijk eten, gevarieerde hapjes met uiteenlopende smaken. Vers, goed samengesteld, en divers van smaak. Vriendelijke, meedenkende bediening. Goed ingespeeld op garnalen-allergie. Leuke atmosfeer.

For some reason, the vegetarian pizza listed downstairs on the window was not listed on the menu upstairs, and the next closest thing was not available. I tried the remaining pizza option and discovered it was quite good and far more food than I was expecting. Atmosphere is casual, friendly, open, and bright. It's a comfortable place for a solo traveller or a small group.

We went to this restaurant which is very conveniently located by Royal Haymarket Theater and Her majesty’s Theatre. We were sat at the front of the restaurant , the tables are small and cramped . We ordered our food and the starters arrived very quickly , and so did the main course ! This arrived before we were even half way through eating the starters. They tried to place the mains on the table and I pointed out that surely they can see we haven’t finished and were not ready . I asked for the mains to be taken away and had asked For them not to be  placed under the heat lamp  as this would dry out the pasta and burger we had ordered, to this I got told we are very busy and it cannot be helped  . I fully understand as it was pre theatre dining time , but surely a nightly occurrence being so close to two theatres.  We finished our starters and as the plates were cleared the mains were waiting In the wings !  Needless to say both dishes were cold & dry . The dishes were replaced with fresh but with no apology . Sitting on the table up against the bar area meant that any raised voices behind the bar can be overheard! And the young lady behind the bar should not be chewing gum it didn’t look professional .

Een weekendje bij Wings B&B (7/9) gecombineerd met een etentje bij de Gempemolen. Een meer dan gezellige avond met meer dan gewoon lekker eten! Personeel was oprecht vriendelijk, en een verkeerd dessert werd meteen rechtgezet.. Moeilijk kiezen tussen al dat lekkers.. Spijtig dat het zo ver is, al is het zeker de moeite waard om voor een etentje hier nog eens een B&B-nachtje bij te boeken! Dankjewel aan het hele team!

Not only are the food and drinks delicious here, but the atmosphere is just as good. They have live music, dancers, and they do a little bit extra to make sure the service is top notch. They came around taking polaroid pictures of us and handing out roses. The food is tasty.
The place was nice and clean. Interesting people all around and also food tastes very good. Service is on point.

Just got back from this steakhouse full to busting!  Food was delicious and staff lovely.  Brie wedges were a hit along with mussels for starters.  The steaks (rib-eye, fillet and 36 oz rib-eye) were divine, so tasty and succulent.  The pornstar martini wasn’t too bad either!  Special mentions go to Amanda (our server) and Romeo (our chef) for making the evening so good.  Thank you.
We love it. Only a pity it’s no secret anymore and tourists found this place.So make reservation in time 😉
Food was good  but service was not. We had to wave for attention and force our order on staff. Not great, wont be back

A repeat visit, and even on busy nights we always manage to get squeezed in, which make us feel welcome and valued. We sat upstairs for the first time, and enjoyed the balcony view.The food was just perfect again, and the catering for gluten free was no problem.We enjoyed the Prosecco, the Steaks, the Fish and the Chicken Burger.The desserts were good too, with Berry Pavlova, Baked Berry Yogurt and Sticky Toffee Pud.

Abbiamo mangiato con i miei genitori per cena...ci siamo ritrovati un piccolo angolo d'Italia nel gusto delle portate e del personale in particolare MariaAntonietta " la siciliana" brillante,simpatica e attenta.Torneremo sicuramente

Flew in from Copenhagen and needed a bite to eat. Great location right on the Canal. Greeted promptly, order taken, food and drinks served as requested. Our server was excellent and we will return for a quick burger.

Everything about the Seafood Bar worked for us. It was very near our hotel. We were able to get a reservation for our first night. The seafood variety and quality was exceptional. The Oysters Mixed Grill offering were delicious. Our server was knowledgeable, friendly and cool. Food was delivered promptly and beautiful presented. The dinner was so good we made a reservation for the next night with the same server and same great dinner and experience!

Spinazie-zalm burger was lekker alleen klein en  de nacho’s minder doordat er geen echte gesmolten kaas op zat maar eem soort kaassaus. De zoete aardappelfrietjes lekker krokant, kwamen alleen pas toen alles op was. Ze waren voor de drukte wat onderbezet denk ik.
El servicio y local muy agradable y actual.No esperes sabor del marisco Gallego.. Platos "amplios" cantidad y precio medio
Been to numerous Seafood restaurants around the world and I can categorically confirm that The Seafood Bar is the one of the best, both in quality and price. Highly recommended!

Truly one of the worst meals I've ever had the pleasure of paying for.Fried mozzarella for a starter - lukewarm mozzarella balls that were visibly leaking onto the plate, presumably the water from the cheese. Unappetising to say the least.Pizza with grease visible pooling in its crevices - it should be necessary to dab down your food before you eat it.They got one order wrong, and forgot to bring drinks on occasion - ordered water for the table at the start of the meal and it didn't materialize. From being seated to recieving our drinks took over half an hour.Over £30 per head, which isn't expensive but is not at all commensurate with the food.Will not be returning.

De black bean burger was dik in orde! De vinaigrette erbij was echt verrukkelijk !!De smaken hadden we niet verwacht maar toch lekker!!Het vlees misten we zeker niet!We zullen hier voor de derde keer weer komen!

Pedimos dos pizzas a domicilio y una de ellas no se correspondía con el pedido, pedimos la diavola y nos mandaron una margarita. Además, el pedido lo hicimos a las 22:00 y llegó a las 23:10. Con esas horas y el retraso en la llegada ni nos molestamos en reclamar que estaba mal el envío. Además las pizzas parecían un chicle y el sabor dejaba mucho de desear.

Came here with friends for Sunday Lunch and was not disappointed at all. I had all the 3 types of roast that they do and I just say it was Cook to perfection. The gravy is seasoned well and vegetables tasted fresh. Overall service is spot on, our waitress was really attentive but not intrusive. Highly recommended.

Voor een zakenlunch bij Christoffel gereserveerd op aanraden van mijn gesprekspartner. Het nuttige met het aangename verenigen. Nou dat bleek een prima advies. Heerlijk gegeten. De Vitello Tonnato salade. En de Chefs Salad. Erg smaakvol, verse ingrediënten en Bourgondische portionering. Zeer vriendelijke en attente bediening. Aanrader.

Eight of us stopped for lunch here and as this was my first visit I was pleasantly surprised by how reasonably priced the lunch was. We all ordered from the set menu and it was roughly £11 for 3 courses.  The food was nice and well presented and our waitress couldn’t have been more helpful. I would eat here again

In a really lovely spot in Antwerp, nice food and good service! We went to the MAS Museum and this restaurant had cleverly put a message on their restaurant we could see from the top of the museum  inviting to come to eat, so we did!

Voorgerecht was erg lekker. Hoofdgerecht was prima, maar ik had iets meer verwacht obv het voorgerecht. Toetje was echter weer uitstekend! Het personeel was erg vriendelijk. O.a. een vrouw die slecht ter been was werd vergezeld naar buiten, je jas wordt netjes voor je opgehangen.

Sono stato Londra con la famiglia e girando mi sono trovato Piccadilly e dei dei tanti ristoranti abbiamo scelto questo in quanto dando un occhiata all interno era di nostro gusto....Entrando ci siamo resi conto di aver fatto la scelta giusta ,siamo stati accolti dal personale i quali molto gentili e garbati ci hanno indicato il posto dove accomodarci ,e consigliato per il pranzo... devo dire che anche sulle scelte consigliate dai ragazzi ci siamo trovati benissimo...Complimenti a tutto lo staff continuate così...Grazie

Locale stile londinese ma cibo italiano. Sono stata con amici e abbiamo mangiato una carbonara buonissima e ottima carne.. Per nn parlare del personale tutti gentilissimi e professionali.. Ritornerò sicuramente appena torno a Londra
Locale carino e accogliente ...Personale gentile e disponibile ...Un ottimo piatto di pasta come si cucina in Italia lo cosiglio...

We received brilliant service from Kayli, the food was absolutely amazing and she was fantastic. she seated us straight away, took our orders and had our food out so quickly. It was delicious and Kayli made sure everything was okay for us. lovely atmosphere and friendly team. will definitely return and would highly recommend if you’re looking for quality food and service!

I am very sorry to have to write this review, following writing an excellent review for last Mother's Day.  We returned to Middletons for a birthday lunch, with high expectations, however, when our meals arrived, we were very disappointed to say the least  The 'roast beef' was not roast beef at all, but pan fried minute steak, which was so tough it was completely inedible.  To make matters worse, all of our meals were almost stone cold, so they all had to be returned to the kitchen.  We want to point out that this problem had nothing to do with the waiting staff, who were doing their best in the circumstances and absolutely fantastic as always.  When leaving, we were offered a discount off our total bill, which we were very grateful for, however, we feel that this level of food service from the kitchen is unacceptable.
Als voorgerecht hadden we een borrelplankje, daarna de hamburger. Alles was heerlijk. Vriendelijke bediening en beschaafde prijs. Aanrader!

We went shopping and had some amazing Italian food. We tried calamari fritti and bocconcini.  I was surprised about the big portions.   The Napoli salsa sauce very nice I even kept it for main course.For the main courses-Linguine clams white wine and Pollo Caprese Chicken were absolutely delicious!! They were recommended by the waiter and bar man  Alex and Jack who were both extremely helpful.  Lastly the desserts were delicious especially the classic Tiramisu. The Service here was excellent and the manager, Davide, was very friendly and helpful. You can enjoy Italian food and a great atmosphere, just like you’re in Napoli! Highly recommended
The restaurant was conveniently situated for our trip to see the show Six. Three course set menu very reasonably priced, generous portions and exceptional excellent service
Perfect ,very delicious,prices are mid level,in 5 days we have been 3 times,i reccomend ,calamar and soups the best

Waited ages for someone to ask if we wanted a drink , Place was Empty & we had pre ordered our food yet the seafood special had ran out of chilli prawns ! They forgot one main so by the time it cane we had all eaten , ran out of lemon tart & brownie for dessert , was a bit of a shambles to be honest considering they knew we were coming several days before , positive was what we did eat was very nice , cudnt understand the waiter, he didn’t speak very good  English ,  not the best service , we only had the one drink as he never asked if we wanted another ! sometimes rude with the way he spoke, not sure he even was a waiter seemed like he was filling in ?? gives your hot dessert but you have to wait while he goes off for cutlery , wudnt go again ...

My Wife and I ordered the two starters and two mains.The Brie starter is really a recommended option and the rump steak.But the sirloin my wife ordered was could, looks like it was prepared several minutes before. The good thing was when we let the waitress knows she fast sorted everything out. Hence the selling point of this restaurant is the service level.

This steakhouse has a good selection of food, and when it did come it was very nice, I’m afraid to say however that me and my partner were waiting 45 minutes for our food which was this places downfall as it wasn’t even that busy. For this reason we probably shall not visit again.

We had a family Sunday lunch at this restaurant all having the roast which was absolutely lovely.  Good size portions, food was lovely and a bonus to get cauliflower cheese.  Lots of meat, which was perfectly cooked, a huge Yorke pud which was lovely and light and also came with various condiments.  staff were friendly and helpful, nice ambience and decor. We will definitely be back.

Peccato.... eravamo stati al Seafood bar altre volte in passato e ci eravamo sempre trovati benissimo per il cibo ma anche per il  servizio cortese ed efficiente.Ma questa volta il servizio è stato allucinante, forse solo una serata sfortunata ma non vorrei che ingrandirsi troppo (siamo arrivati a 4 sedi) abbia portato ad uno scadimento del servizio. Già un anno fa nella nostra ultima visita (in questo caso nella sede di Baerlestraat ) avevamo avuto problemi: nonostante la prenotazione ed essere arrivati in orario, avevamo dovuto attendere quasi mezz'ora il tavolo.Ma questa volta è stato il massimo: ordiniamo un piatto con 12 ostriche, come antipasto ed a seguire un plateau per mia moglie ed un fish and chips per me, inoltre avvertiamo che mia moglie è allergica all'uovo ed alla maionese (ovviamente), quindi chiediamo di avere il plateau di mia moglie senza uovo o salse.Bene arriva prima il mio fish and chips e contemporaneamente le ostriche! Abbiamo detto al cameriere che avevamo chiesto le ostriche come antipasto e ci risponde che loro portano sempre tutto insieme.... (non  è vero ) vista la mia faccia, portano via il fish and chips (che chiaramente si sarebbe raffreddato mangiando prima le ostriche) e mangiamo le ostriche, davvero ottime, come al solito.Finite le ostriche dopo poco ci portano i due piatti principali, guardando quello di mia moglie notiamo che c'è anche dell'insalata di granchio con dentro maionese!Avvertiamo la cameriera che aveva preso l'ordinazione e l'avvertimento dell'allergia all'uovo, gli chiediamo conferma che nel granchio c'era l'uovo, verifica, torna, conferma e porta via il piatto... Dopo un pò arriva un altro cameriere con il piatto di mia moglie: incredibile non  solo c'è ancora il granchio ma anche una ciotolina con una salsa cocktail, ovviamente con la maionese!! Ennesima rimostranza, cameriera con faccia sconvolta, e finalmente  ci riportano il piatto senza uovo.Tutto ciò è gravissimo, se ci fossimo fidati e non avessimo controllato (una salsa è più difficile da notare di un uovo intero) mia moglie sarebbe all'ospedale! Con le allergie non si scherza ci sono persone che possono morire per queste disattenzioni.Inoltre credo che non si siano nemmeno resi conto della gravità... un responsabile poteva venire a scusarsi o a dare spiegazioni, non si è visto nessuno, se non la cameriera che confabulava con (credo) il capo sala, ma da noi non è venuto nessuno.Il livello del cibo è sempre buono, ma il servizio è inaccettabile.E non mi si obbietti che dovevamo dirlo al momento, la cameriera era al corrente di tutto, non è mia abitudine dare in escandescenze a ristorante, non si sono nemmeno scusati, semplicemente non torneremo più.

The food was very good although the beef was a little overcooked,  Service was excellant.The one critisism I have is that the dining area could do with a good clean.  The large light assembly is really dusty as are the small lights and supports above the tables.  This really needs taking care of as dust and dirt could fall into the food.

Six of us booked a table at this restaurant to have dinner before going to the theatre.  Myself and my wife have eaten here on many occasions, and have always been highly satisfied by the service and the food, so decided to take our friends to experience a meal here.  We all ordered three courses from the set menu, which we know to be excellent value.  We weren’t disappointed, and the service was just as good as when only two of us dine, and the food, as usual was superb.  Everyone agreed that the experience was first-rate and that they would all come back again.
Het was mooi weer dus konden we genieten van het ruime, gezelige terras. Vriendelijke bediening en uiteraard, hebben we lekker gegeten! Een aanrader!

It was a nice Friday evening spent in Seafood bar (Spui) accompanied by the lot of perfectly cooked fish.. A good staff services and the excellent work of the Chef's team makes this place as "must to get back again"
Gaan lunchen bij Ellis met ons twee voor de beyond burger te eten. Het was lekker, maar helaas was het eten lauw... De bediening was wel vriendelijk en behulpzaam.

Zaterdagavond gaan eten. Ik ben fan maar mijn vrouw kende gourmet burger nog niet. Gewoonlijk ga ik naar die aan het MAS maar we moesten toevallig in de Elisabethzaal zijn voor een voorstelling.De bediening was zeer vriendelijk en ze kwamen vrij snel onze bestelling opnemen. Na een 10 minuutjes kwam de serveerster terug aan onze tafel om onze bestelling opnieuw op te nemen (op papier) omdat haar PDA/GSM niet meer werkte.Wij hadden hier uiteraard begrip voor.Een kwartier later nog steeds geen drinken gezien (en scheurende honger) en onze tijd begon al weg te tikken. Gevraagd of we ons drinken misschien al konden krijgen waarop er blijkbaar wat paniek ontstond en er WEER iemand onze bestelling op kwam nemen. Blijkbaar was ons papiertje verloren geraakt.Goed, nog steeds geduldig blijven zitten. We hadden expliciet gevraagd of we nog op tijd ons eten gingen krijgen aangezien we intussen een uur later in de zaal moesten zijn. Dit ging geen probleem zijn.Na 15 min weer geen drinken of voorgerecht (pintje, hibiscus lemonade, calamares en onion rings, lijkt me niet moeilijk om even snel te frituren). Intussen hadden klanten die lang na ons waren aangekomen al lang voorgerechten en drinken gekregen. Hierop waren we het echt wel beu en zijn we nog even vriendelijk gaan melden dat het niet meer nodig was gezien ons tijdsgebrek. Er was duidelijk onbegrip voor, wat voor ons dan weer niet echt door de beugel kon. Als zij 3 keer moeten komen opnemen, dan gaan wij er ergens van uit dan onze bestelling naar voor geschoven wordt, al was het maar onze drank en voorgerechten. We hebben dan maar in de buurt snel een hamburger uit het vuistje genomen. Zeer spijtig want jullie hamburgers zijn geweldig.Jullie zaak op de Keyserlei zal ik alleszins vermijden vanaf nu want het bracht enorme frustratie mee.

il posto è molto carino ed accogliente. lo abbiamo scelto per caso gironzolando per Amsterdam. il pesce davvero ottimo e le porzioni abbondanti. consigliatissimo per mangiare del buon pesce in un ambiente carino

We were delayed and had to wait at the bar. Tried to get a drink but a non responsive bar tender, busy being busy. Start with very poor champagne, watered down gin tonic with a slice of lemon and kumquat. Poor cocktail. Starter decent dim sum taster, nothing outstanding. Main I had soft crab which was excellent, singapore noodles overcooked. Wine, SA sauvignon blanc, good and cold. Order second round dim sum as main was small portion. Interior the usual modern black, not my style, kitsch artwork on walls. Staff friendly. 180 Euro for 2. In order to be on an international level, like Hakkasan or Nobu, more steps are needed.

Lunchtime visit before going to the Heineken Experience. Not a planned visit - it just looked nice and the menu was interesting.We had a great lunch, nice service and very good value for the quality and size.4 people with different choices of fish and sales of preparation all excellent.Happy to recommend and we would definitely return.We didn't realise they had other branches until walking the city - presume they are all good.

Essen war super, ich hatte den veganen Salat, der super satt machte und vor allem mit Cous-Cous und Bohnen mal was anderes war zu den Salaten die man als Veganer oft bekommt. Mein Mann hatte die Pommes und die waren auch sehr gut, werden vor allem aus frischen Kartoffeln zubereitet.

Super grosses veganes Angebot, gleich 4 verschiedene Burger mit Haselnusspatty. Super für Leute wie mich die nicht so auf Fleischgeschmack stehen. Auch der Beef Burger, den mein Mann hatte war wirklich gut. Alle Getränke die vegan sind waren auf der Karte gekennzeichnet und ich musste nicht ewig googeln welches Bier jetzt geht. Service war super nett, Preise natürlich etwas gehobener aber für die Qualität durchaus ok.

Situato in una piazzetta graziosa di bruges, siamo riusciti ad accomodarci senza prenotazione (eravamo in 2). Buoni sia l’hamburger che la cesar salad. Il servizio abbastanza veloce e il prezzo nella media. La nota negativa di tutti i locali nel belgio è che nella maggior parte (e anche in questo) la cucina alle 21.30 è gia chiusa.

we order a big shared plate of see food and it served cold , of course their were no recommendation from the waitress on the special of that day and we didn't know the dish will be cold.   on the end of the meal when we told that we didn't enjoy the cold dish , no compensation wasn't  suggested - only coffee on the house!!!

Wow! There’s not much to say. The only going for this place is the location and the ambiance. The service was shocking! The waitress admitted to forgetting to put my order in, then tried to charge me full price for the meal when I finally got the bill. A shrimp and mango salad shouldn’t have taken an hour to make. And after all this, it wasn’t very nice. Far too oily, which detracted a lot from the flavours. I don’t think I’ll be going back.

Visited this place leaving work with colleagues, and although we did not book, which I would recommend, we were able to get a table for 11 of us, with no fuss, just good staff ready to go the extra mile.We all had different meals; fish was amazing, steaks were amazing, in fact we could not fault anything.  Well worth a visit and looking around everyone appeared they had been enjoying this place for a long time as we were the newbies here.  Thank you to all your staff for making our visit a WOW visit and compliments to your chefs that turned out excellent plates in a very short time.  Thanks all.
The seafood bar Ferdinand bol was excellent and very big for two. Nice atmosphere. Friendly staff. Thank you very much. We enjoyed our visit.
This is a gem, across the street from Kensington Gardens.Good food, good wine, friendly staff. A winner.

Enjoyed a good dinner here last night. Excellent service, great  French wine, and fresh seafood. Had the crab legs, mixed grill, lobster soup, salad, and fries. Mixed grill impressive and tasty. Crab legs were good but not as good as Alaskan King Crab. Lobster soup was a broth not a bisque. Fries were very good and the salad was very average.Would like to return to try other menu items.

We went to Middletons for a works meal (9 people) on Saturday evening, the table was booked for 8pm and we ended up leaving after the mains at around 10:30pm. I think we ordered around 8:30pm and starters arrived about 40 minutes later so it's not one for a quick visit! Starters were ok and the mains were really good, drinks menu is a bit limited but the cocktails were good.The standout from the night though was the waitress Kayleigh R, considering most of the group didn't have starters so were getting a bit impatient by the time mains arrived, she was an absolute star! She advised that the kitchen was really busy so food would be a bit slow as soon as we sat down, she made sure she was always around to get drinks and give us updates on the progress. She managed the evening with a smile and a bit of a laugh along the way, kept everyone's spirits up and we left having had a really good night. Great energy and she was the biggest reason that the night went off smoothly without any complaints about the delays.
Fui la semana pasada con mi pareja y estuvimos comiendo ya que estábamos por la zona. Nos sorprendió gratamente! Recomendado✅
Very good breakfast, the service is so good and breads are good and served high class style :) enjoyed it a lot. Thank you!
Locale nel centro dell'isola pedonale di Liegi con ampio dehors; servizio rapido per discreti semplici piatti; valido rapporto qualità prezzo.

Invogliati dalle recensioni ci siamo fermati per pranzo e non ha deluso....una pita buonissima preparata all'istante (puoi mangiare li, ma lo spazio è poco, oppure take away)...ti preparano tutto davanti agli occhi con ingredienti freschissimi...la patatine più buone mangiate in questi giorni.Ideale anche per bambini
Volveremos sin duda! Tienen un café realmente bueno. Un perfecto lugar donde pasar la tarde con amigos!
Many seafood choices you can eat!The prices there are reasonable and very good quality!There is a happy hours in the afternoon for oyster, only €1 ..... super ~~~~

Un espacio acogedor con un delicioso café, perfecto para acompañar con una de las mejores NY CHEESCAKE que he probado! Sin duda un lugar precioso con una calidad que invita a volver y seguir probando su comida!
JILLES Beer & Garbage Gent:slechte kwaliteit, vies en racist.ik zou liever eten uit een vuilniszak. echt niet proper!
Leuke zaak, met een ruim voldoende eet en drankenkaart. Snelle en vriendelijke bediening, aangenaam zitten. Reserveren is aan te raden.

Hier gibt es in Brügge den überall gehipten veganen Beyond Burger! Haben ein sowohl gutes veganes Angebot als auch Angebote für Fleischesser. Leckere selbst gemachte Limonade! Preis war für das etwas teurere Brügge super!

Absolutely outstanding !! Superb service and attention from Chris and Evie. A personal visit from Head Chef Chloe (who ran a 5 star kitchen service) added to a wonderful experience. Amazing steak from Travis. All 4 had such attention to detail that I can’t thank them enough. They went above and beyond to make it a special birthday. Highly recommended!! THANK YOU ! I didn’t take enough photos to show how great the food was ... I really suggest you try Middleton's and experience this for yourself.
La cuisine est excellente : Les burgers sont  énormes et délicieux , le bœuf angus est excellent mais la salle est très bruyante et le personnel pas très accueillant ni souriant, Dommage

Nous y sommes allés en couple et avons très bien mangé ! Il y a beaucoup de choix et le beer peering est un bon atout. Les frites de patate douces étaient bonnes mais un peu grasses et collantes. Sinon tout était parfait !

Прекрасное место со свежими морепродуктами, которые можно увидеть на прилавке перед кухней и при желании выбрать. Обслуживание замечательное. Единственное, из-за большого количества народу(я так думаю) нам сначала принесли не наш счёт.Так что смотрите, что оплачиваете.
Comida de muy buena calidad, marisco fresco, servicio atento y amable, local agradable y precio razonable. Un auténtico descubrimiento.
Great vibe, great food,  incredible atmosphere and experience.at the Seafood Bar. The half lobster was delicious.

Me and my husband visited on the 10th September after it being recommended to us by our host in Amsterdam. I can honestly say it is the one of the most wonderful restaurant experiences we have ever had, and both the decorate and food were exquisite. We had the rice table for two and each element was a little piece of heaven. We were only in Amsterdam for two days and didn’t do to much research before we arrived so I feel like we really struck gold by finding this little gem. If your visiting Amsterdam and are abit of foodie then please make sure you visit this restaurant as you will not be disappointed.

Habíamos leído muy buenas críticas acerca de este restaurante, y, aunque no está mal, esperábamos más.El local es muy bonito, pero no tiene aire acondicionado (en plena ola de calor lo hubiésemos agradecido).Nos sentamos en la terraza, que es chiquitita. Buen trato.En cuanto a la comida, no dejan de ser sándwiches. No están mal, pero no es nada del otro mundo.
We had a nice lunch at Spaghetti House. Quality of the food was great, everything was very tasty and the price was satisfying.

This amazing restaurant was the cherry on top of our dream day in Amsterdam. We enjoyed some of the freshest seafood we’d ever had, brought out to us in a breathtaking platter. We enjoyed the mixed, grilled and fresh platter, which gave us lots of variety. The dessert was phenomenal and paired perfectly with their unique and delicious cocktails. The only thing better than the food here is their service. All the staff are very professional and friendly, so we really felt at warmly welcomed and at home. Jessy in particular went above and beyond, and even gave us a list of fun places in Amsterdam to check out that are only a local would know to recommend! Thank you so much guys, and see you next time!

Hier een hamburger, classico, komen eten. Hamburger was goed gebakken en lekker.De frieten waren ook zeer lekker en zoals ze horen te zijn. Het slaatje erbij is wel niet zo groot, maar ook lekker.Kortom een geslaagde lunch.

We tried this restaurant recently and the waiters are really nice and welcoming there. You have a view of the kitchen so you can see the chef cooking which is great. Really liked the food as well ! I recommend this restaurant.
Hemos probado dos bowls, el resultado: están aceptables, eso si, si estás acostumbrado a probar comida vegana  rica no esperes sabores increíbles. Una opción para algo rápido en la ciudad.

Me and my wife enjoyed a lovely 3 course lunch at this restaurant today, for only £10.95 pp. My wife  had calamari for starter, And roast herb chicken for main- She enjoyed both.I had sticky BBQ ribs for starter, and the steak baguette for main. The ribs was nice n spicy, the steak was amazing- cooked to perfection, I was surprised how much steak was in the baguette- generous portion. We both had a nice dessert knickb glory and sticky toffee p both lovely and a cheeky cocktail additional of course. Our waitress Alex was brilliant from start to finish, very polite and very attentive- having spoke to her she said it was her 1st day- wow we were taken back, clearly a natural , amazing service. Alex is clearly going to be a great asset to the company. Myself and my husband also spoke to the manager afterwards to  complement the good service we had received from Alex. Not enough people speak up and comment on good service so I like to make a point of doing this when I receive very good service.
