De lekkerste vol-au-vent op aarde, dixit onze 10-jarige dochter! Butterfly-chicken met olijven en tzatziki was hemels! Bediening was super, heel attente, vriendelijke en vrolijke dienster. We rijden met plezier 100 km ver voor Poule et Poulette in Gent!

Heb in het restaurant zelf al gegeten, alles in orde. Top bediening en lekker eten. Thuis leveren is een ander paar mouwen. Ze brengen maar half de bestelling, ik had voor 53€ besteld en maar voor 15€ gekregen. Ik bel en krijg de verantwoordelijke aan de lijn. Die kon me niet verderhelpen en werd zelf bijdehand en onbeleefd. Het eten was bovendien niet meer warm en de frieten en onion rings zelfs slap en ijskoud.
Popped in for lunch and was greeted warmly by staff.Enjoyed a yummy lasagne.Will definitely return to try something else off the menu.

One of many coffee shops that will be erased from memories because it is just meh.A swarm of girl servers were pleasant and nor very efficient. I guess it is ok. It is summer time and we are in Haarlem.Oh, and the cakes were so so.
Super netjes en alles echt vers. Top kwaliteit. Het personeel is ook super behulpzaam en bekwaam. Een echte aanrader!

１９時頃伺いましたが、かなり混んでいたので２０分くらい待ちました。先にドリンクオーダーを聞いてくれるのでビールをいただきながら待ちます。２人で行ったので、シｰフードのプレート１人前と、スープを２種類注文しました。プレートは、１人前ですがかなりのボリュームです。１人前で十分でした。ロブスターやエビが何種類か、あとお魚２種類、そしてムール貝がたくさん盛り合わせてあります。味も美味しかったです。ただ店員さんが若干、雑という印象を受けます。滞在中に何度も食器が割れる音を聞きました。プレートを持ってきてくれた方も豪快にスープをこぼしていかれました。
Aten er de Bavet en Holy grail- spaghetti . Had meer verwacht. Gewoon lekker maar ook niets meer . Bediening is vlot , drank vrij duur en we misten wijnglazen.

Очень уютное место, обслуживание на высоте, подача! Сами блюда: большие порции, все очень свежее, выкладка рыбы просто бомба, выбрали рыбу с витрины, она очень большая на двух смело можно брать! И выходит даже выгоднее чем два блюда отдельно. Были компанией 6 человек, все остались довольны! Пока мы ждали заказ принесли свежий хлеб и соленое масло с зеленью, очень приятно!

Vrienden attendeerden ons op deze plek. Met onze dochter van 1,5 wezen lunchen en sindsdien komen wij er super graag. Altijd vriendelijke bediening, super gastvrij. Keuken geweldig en heerlijk eten. Ze zijn heel flexibel en meedenkend als het gaat om allergiën, mee-etende kinderen en andere bijzonderheden. Kortom wij gaan er geregeld heen voor lunch of diner. In de zomer heerlijk terras aan het water, en binnen is het ook super gaaf ingericht. Tot zelfs de muziek op de wc is top

Sitio de comida callejera bestial !!!!Patatas caseras, cortadas y fritas al momento!!!! BuenisiimasssssssNosotros las pedimos al queso , te las sirven con orégano, un poco de tomate y queso fundido por encima para chuparse los dedos, pedimos también un pincho de pollo , muy rico y una cerveza 10€ barato para lo que es brujas, pero lo más importante todo muy rico , nos atendió una chica muy simpática y hablaba español .  Visita obligatoria!!!!!!!!!

Met Groupon voor de lunch geboekt en het was een feestje, zelfs voor iemand met een schaaldierenallergie. De chef kwam ter geruststelling speciaal even langs. 7 van de 8 gerechten vormden geen probleem, alleen de nasi niet. De vriendelijke bediening bracht daarvoor vervolgens ook nog een alternatief. Top gedaan!
Quite a nice burger place, friendly English speaking staff, above average food, worth visiting. Can recommend it

Séjour à Amsterdam, grandes balades en vélo et.... Ouderkerk !Arrêtez vous chez Ron c'est parfaitDe la vraie cuisine indonésienne, présentée en plateau de différents plats !Succulents et préparés avec respect avec des produits fraisCarte des vins impeccable !A ne pas manquer, quitte à faire un détour :-)
The restaurant is very nicely decorated, staff is great, specially Paul who took care of us. The food is delicious, also the drinks.
Simply Beautiful restaurant amazing food customer service was on point highly recommend getting a seafood mix grilled..
Tried both locations. Both had excellent food. Can be a bit pricey, but had good customer service, even when super busy.

Food, service and wine not as good as expected.My 10oz ribeye was not very tasty, rare when medium to rare ordered and I just can’t see how it had ever been 10 oz bearing in mind it came out rare. The peppercorn sauce was very bland and I think the worse I’ve had. The bottle (£25) of Dona Paula Malbec was in my opinion weak and not like the Malbec’s I’ve previously had but maybe that’s how this one is. The sirloins served to two others were mixed up as to size and how cooked. The fourth persons order was completely wrong . The drinks waiter actually asked us if we wanted glasses when he plonked the bottle on the table! All took some time as well. Manager took off something for the wrong order and wine , we didn’t mention anything else. It was still expensive for what it was and I’ve had far better steak meals elsewhere, so doubt will return. Nice building though!

This is the third time we came to this restaurant, the first two times we enjoy a lot the food and the service as well. But this time, we were really sad. We pass around 19:30 to book a table for 22:30 and we talk with the manager in the restaurant, the man named Steve told us “no problem”. When we came back after the theater, inexplicably, the guy didn’t recognize us and told us it was closed. Was bad and We don’t understood why on Saturday night you close earlier...

Endroit sympa service nickel par contre le Burger pas terrible je m attendais à mieux surtout a ce prix sachant que les frites sont a part et qu une petite salade en accompagnement ne serai pas de trop... Peut mieux faire
A tad slow on the service, and the place was not packed, still excellent seafood at a not so high price. The platter was very fresh and the smoked fish delicious!
Het was geweldig. Goede keuken en fijne bediening. De kok is top. Mooi restaurant.Het eten uitstekend, prijs goed betaalbaar. Zeker nog een keer.

Small, cosy and very reasonably priced. Total bill for five people with wine, drinks and dessert came to EUR 170, which is very reasonable for Amsterdam.The food quality is great and the portions are generous. The staff are very friendly and responsive. My only quibble was that my clothes smelled oily and greasy afterwards, which is probably a result of the open kitchen.But it would not stop me from returning and enjoying another meal here in the future. Definitely a place to visit if you enjoy seafood of all varieties.
Sehr gut gegessen... hatten Spinat Lasagne und Thai Bowl ..und Limonade  einfache Ausstattung.. empfehlenswert

We make a point of eating here every time we are in Amsterdam.  We are always remembered and treated like regulars.  Food is top shelf (Peking duck is off the hook), music soundtrack is great, if you book for an early time they take 20 % off!If you love great food you cant get everyday at home, trust me.  Yum!

Loved everything about this restaurant...the decor, food, service & value!!  We ended up booking a 2nd dinner for our last night in Amsterdam.  The menu is huge with tons of choices.  We had delicious oysters, razor clams, steamed clams, lobster, crab legs, seafood platter and fresh fish that you see as you walk in and the hostess explains what's available that day.  One time we did whole john dory and another the sea bass.  Excellent price points on the wine and champagne by the bottle and full bar with great bartenders.  HIGHLY recommend this place and I already miss it.  If I lived in Amsterdam this would be my local haunt!

The feel, in the white on white interior, of this comfortable cafe is very good. Service is attentive, if not always aware, and welcoming. Awesome selection of high quality fresh seafood and shellfish. The cold platters and seafood towers are impressive. Portions are generous and you will not leave feeling hungry. Very good value by Amsterdam standards. Lobster bisque had plenty of real lobster meat in a creamless, but still rich, broth. Octopus appetizer is excellent and enough to share. Fried mixed platter was very good, although "Amsterdam Shrimp" were an odd choice. Only disappointment was the Mussels  -did not live up to menu description - eventually rectified with addition of drawn butter. All in all a good choice for business or date night dinner.

Amsterdam' da balık yiyelim diye düşünmeye başlıyorsanız hiç tereddütsüz geleceğiz adres burasıdır. Biz jumbo karides, mussle ve kalamar istedik, yanında bira ve şampanya aldık fiyatlar yemeğin kalite ve lezzetine oranla aslında iyi. Diğer restoranları dikkate alırsak biraz daha pahalı olabilir ancak bu lezzete değer
Interessanti proposte di varianti di hamburger in menù.Non particolare selezione di birre.Prezzi corretti.Pulizia e igiene del locale da migliorare.
This place serves fresh seafood! Probably the best meal I had in Amsterdam. Will recommend this to my friends and relatives.

Antonio served us, he was very attentive, he made us feel at home and the manager was lovely with us even though we were a bit drunk with a big party and a lot of noise. Her and the entire staff made our night special, with warmth, authentic Italian food and even a sneaky complimentary lemoncello. ;)

Les diverses formules sont top... de la plus classique à la plus originale.Divers formats d’assiette, selon l’appétit.Un service rapide, très attentif et agréable. Vraiment aux petits soins.Des prix plus que compétitifs.Je recommande l’endroit vraiment vivement!!Si vous faites abstraction du caractère un peu vieillot de l’endroit et du mobilier, vous serez ravis! ☺️👌🏻

The location is amazing but I was actually expecting more from Ron Gastrobar oriental. Unfortunately I am vegetarian and there are not so many options, this is the reason of my average rate.Good cocktails and wine though.Service is ok but it was a bit slow.Overall recommended if you are not full vegetarian.

10 minuten moeten wachten tot iemand kwam bestellen terwijl de zaak nog niet half gevuld was. Voor een hamburger van meer dan 10 euro verwacht je toch dat de hamburger zelf minstens de grootte heeft van 3/4 van het broodje, wat al niet veel is. Ik denk dat het net de helft was. Daar lag dan 1 dom kerstomaatje en een stukje augurk bij op het bord. Belachelijk.De frieten van 3,70 euro (!!) waren hard en koud.Bij het afrekenen heb ik dan zelf ook nog mijn wisselgeld moeten vragen want dat waren ze ‘vergeten’. Enkele jaren geleden was Ellis dik ok. Nu veel pluimen verloren die ze nodig zullen hebben met de vele concurrentie in Gent. Was voor mij zeker de laatste keer. Ander en beter in Gent.

This restaurant is almost a hidden gem.  At the end of a row of restaurants, it could easily be missed, but it's definately not one to be walked past.  We've eaten here several times, and the food is consistently good.  Their meat is delivered from Norfolk from their own butchers, and everything is made in-house too - all the sauces, marinades, desserts etc and you really can 'taste the difference' to coin a phrase!!!We both had the spicy bbq ribs to start which were juicy and tender, followed by fillet steak for me and a ribeye steak for my husband.  Both steaks had the most delicious flavour - but mine more so! We chose peppercorn sauce and blue cheese sauce to accompany our steaks - delish! The dishes always have a choice of sides too which is unusual in most steak houses.  There's more than steak here though, there's chicken, fish, mussels and the most amazing handmade burgers too.  There's also a fabulous set lunch which is incredible value.  The choice of wines here is good and we always have the house Portuguese rosé which is good and great value.  There's a good range of cocktails too.  Staff here are lovely - all knowledgeable and very friendly.  If you want fabulous food, all cooked to order, this is your place!

Local un poco oscuro y musica un pelin alta, mas bien ambiente de cenar en vez de coner.Nos han atendido rapido, muy amables, la pizza ha venido en tiempo record, pero con toda la base y los bordes quemados. Una pena, por que la pizza tiene buen sabor pero con un fuerte gusto a quemado.Por lo que he visto en otras mesas, todas están así. Sera que tienen el horno demasiado alto para sacar las pizzas demasiado rapido?En mi escala es un no me gustó- no volveré

We went here because we were in the mood for a dish of spaghetti. We looked at the menu and it said they-use SanMarzano tomatoes. That was a deal maker. They are the very best.We were seated at a table and ordered apps and pasta with drinks . I would expect drinks to come quickly, then apps, then entrees. It didn’t come that way.Apps came, I asked about drinks and was told they were coming. I asked for water and was told it was coming. FInally when we were close to finishing apps drinks were coming.Apps were ok.Spaghetti was good as expected.Service is very slow.Our server was poor.
Vi spiste skalldyrfat. Hadde gledet oss siden gode anmeldelser her. Det var lite tilbehør og brød og tørre skalldyr. Servicen var heller ikke spesielt bra. Ikke imponert.

Awful steak. Far too much gristle and fat (left on my plate and the waiting staff didn’t comment or take notice of this). Ordered a 12oz steak the person I was with had an 8oz steak and there was no difference at all. Sides were over priced. Customer service was ok apart from no one coming back to the table so we were left with one drink for the whole meal. Wouldn’t recommend and wouldn’t go back.
Great food, service and prices. All were nice. Fully booked all times. All staff friendly, the open kitchen is a very nice touch, the decor is friendly and the quality of food very good.

Whether you like your seafood fresh and raw or grilled or baked or seasoned or plain....whatever you want this place will deliver quality. It has a wide selection and variety of starters and entrees, and excellent wine offerings as well. We recommend it highly....but think about making a reservation to minimize wait time.
Small portions, lobster very small. The same an any other high street restaurant, just standard. Will just go pizza express next time, loads cheaper.
Jilles is al jaren een fenomeen in Gent en andere steden. Super lekkere burgers aan een juiste prijs. Vandaag de royal margaret genomen en die was zeer lekker
Je tiens une nouvelle fois à remercier Yasmine, une jeune fille courageuse et pleine d'ambition ! Ma fille et moi comptons revenir l'année prochaine !!

The staff are so lovely and friendly and the restaurant itself is so welcoming.The menu is fantastic and food we ordered from starters, Mains ! Deserts were fantastic! Every dish was cooked perfectly and the flavours were incredible!!! Highly recommend & we will be back frequently!!!Well done Middletons!!
Zeer lekker gegeten en vriendelijke bediening! Zeker een aanrader als je in de buurt bent! Lekkerrrrr!

Een keer proberen, kan geen kwaad. Met die instelling hebben we afgesproken in het ruim opgezette restaurant. Na het hebben ervaren van de porties en de kwaliteit schrokken we van de bon. vb: “homemade lemonade”, niets fancy, glas met stuk citroen, ijs en water: €5,15!! zijn ze helemaal van de pot gerukt?
Écolo, amoureux du vélo et qui ne mange pas de veau, venez vous infliger une petit assiette à 18€ healthy. Sinon... Il y a pas mal de friteries à côté...

My wife and I visited for dinner and had a good experience. The staff were extremely attentive and the choices on the menu were excellent.I had the Beef Wellington (pink) which was delightful, accompanied by the dauphinois potatoes and the goat cheese salad. My wife had the steak and sticky (rib-eye).Steak and sticky was slightly disappointing with the ribs lacking in flavour (although very tender) and the rib-eye had a burnt flavour (not to my wife’s taste).All-in-all a good experience and would recommend this restaurant.
Great 2 or 3 course options at a mid range price, steaks very juicy, good atmosphere. Make sure you reserve as it can get very busy.
Waren op zaterdag op de markt bij het theaterplein en hier een drankje gedaan met wat ballen van de dag. Bediening is okee, vlot en informeel. Ballen waren erg lekker. Leuke concept op leuke plaats

Enjoyed sitting outside with my friend having a fabulous lunch of olives, mushroom, artichokes pizza and green salad.  Also enjoyed a lovely glass of prosecco. Staff very attentive. Definitely recommend.
Vriendelijk personeel. Snelle bediening. Het was voor ons een aangename verrassing dat de toiletten op het gelijkvloers waren.

Has a wide variety of fresh seafood. Good place for seafood in Amsterdam. Would recommend friends to go. Combination platter of both hot grilled and cold serving portion. Ambience a little noisy, couldn’t hear serving staff audibly due to many loud & diners😃.

Went for a group dinner. Very popular destination as it was packed when we arrived and never really relented throughout the evening.The staff are very nice too. Helpful and pleasant. All steaks were great. I had to send mine back as it was a little cold when it arrived however it was remedied and everything was good afterwards. The way my steak, being returned, was dealt with was very reassuring and professional. This is an excellent restaurant. Very reasonable prices too.The only thing I had an issue with was that our server, who was excellent, was, I discovered, on one of these shifts as a try out for the job. She was excellent but she was working unpaid. I find this extremely unfair and exploitative actually. I hope they gave her the job. The restaurant however is Great! Highly recommended

The food was excellent and the staff were incredibly welcoming and friendly throughout the whole evening; even those who weren't directly involved with serving our food and drink. They were all the right amount of attentive without being intrusive and they all appeared to be 'on it' when it came to general tidying up and turning tables around. A very hard-working team and one of the best evening's customer service we've had in a long time. We never write restaurant reviews but this team have truly deserved this one. The customer service was too good to ignore.

We had a group 12 people.  All of us enjoyed the wine, whole fish, mussel, beer, service, the vibe and the hospitality.  The reception experience was decent.  Though we waited we’re still having good drink break before we sat down.  Great place to go for travelers.

Great restaurant. Real seafood restaurant feeling when you come in. We had soup to start with .... lovely. Both fish and the lobster.To follow we both had crab legs. 300gr each. Delicious.  All chased down with a lovely vino verde.Great food. Great service. Great all round. Cant fault. Well worth visit. Tram station almost outside making it perfect

A decoração fantástica. O staff simpático e eficiente.A comida...Entradas irrepreensíveis. Óptimas. Prato 1. Paletilha Confitada, não tinha sido de certeza, a textura da carne estava demasiada dura e fibrosa e o sabor normalíssimo. O arroz é esturricado não  queimado, foi servido preto até  3 mm de espessura. Lamentável Prato 2. Tranche de Robalo, peixe fresco e bem confeccionado os legumes passaram do ponto de cozedura e vinham meio papa.Sobremesas sem nenhum destaque. Como é possível um restaurante destes sem Chefe Pasteleiro? Restaurantes não tão pretensiosos em Lisboa já o têm, mas...Lamentável para quem foi em jantar de aniversário da esposa.Caro, mediano e bom para ver e ser visto. Pretencioso.
Lively atmosphere, sophisticated decor, nice food. Been here a couple of times and always enjoyed it.
Pollo preparato in tutte le maniere. Davvero un peccato di gola. Estremamente gentile il personale. Consigliato senza esagerare perchè le portate sono abbondanti.
在阿姆斯特丹有四間The seafood bar，各間餐廳的裝潢設計都讓人感十分舒適，有品種多樣的海鮮無點餐。它有自家品牌的網頁，所以可方便地根據行程預訂座位。我們點了mussels 和生蠔，品道一流！

Se encuentra frente al Begijnhot, a la llegada temimos no poder acceder pues estaba muy concurrido, pero demuestran una eficiente organización, entregándonos un número y tras una breve espera en la barra nos acomodaron.La sala la atiende un equipo joven, atento y muy pendiente del comensal.Ofrecen una Carta con variedad de pescados y mariscos, todo de excelente calidad y preparación, expuestos en vitrinas a la vista del público.Elegimos el “Plateau 8 Oesters”, compuesto de cuatro variedades de ostras, y el “Plateau Deluxe”, con raciones para dos personas. Un auténtico deleite. El maridaje lo puso un Chardonnay de Domaine Fevre Nathalie & Guilles, de la región de Chablis, un excelente acompañamiento a tan ricos manjares.El precio para dos personas fue de 118,50 euros, una buena relación calidad precio para el producto que ofrecen.Dada la magnifica experiencia en nuestra primera noche, decidimos que visitaríamos los otros dos establecimientos en Ferdinand Bolstraat y Van Baerlestraat en nuestro recorrido por la ciudad. Todos al mismo nivel de calidad, y que nos permitió ir probando otras opciones que ofrecen, confirmandose la recomendación de visitarlos.

4 of us ate here early evening on a Saturday & I was aware (from the online booking) that our table was ours for 2 hours for a party of 4. So I was expecting quick service, but when our starters arrived literally a couple of minutes after ordering, I was worried we were going to be rushed along too much. Happily the service for the rest of the evening was prompt but not too rushed, and our server was happy to go away & come back a bit later when we were choosing desserts. There seemed to be a lot of waiting staff compared to last time we visited.We enjoyed the food, but I didn't think it was quite as good as on previous visits -flavours for the steaks & ribs were really good as ever, but my piri piri prawns were a bit dry, the mixed grill had little broken pieces of rib bone & the sweet potato fries were rather greasy, as was one of our steaks. Nothing which made us feel like they should be returned, but it just wasn't quite as good as it has been. Hopefully a one off.

Situado en pleno Barrio de Salamanca, el sitio es pequeño pero acogedor, lo único malo es que tiene mucho tránsito de personas y a veces es algo caótico.Las pizzas su "plato estrella" están realmente buenas, no te dejas ni los bordes.Para repetir sin duda.
Had dinner at Glo and enjoyed it. Good portions and value for the price. Pretty large menu. The dining spaces are modern and well lit. A haven for Vegetarians in Reykjavík.
Great variety of choice, superb food. Loved it! Deliscious Seafood, I recommend oysters, not expensive at all, if you love them, this is the place to be
Fantastisk mat! Bra priser! Men hade önskat bättre öppettider, bara öppet till fem och stängt lördag och söndag :(

Nous nous sommes rendues à ce restaurant un Soir de semaine, un peu en désespoir de cause- car à 22h, il ne fait pas bon d'avoir faim, à Bruxelles, même à la place Flagey (jour de Marni Jazz).Nous avons été accueillies avec un grand sourire et une gentillesse générale de la part de toutes les personnes présentes.A noter que l'équipe se distingue par, à la fois, la jeunesse et la diversité!  Ex. le préposé en cuisine est un jeune irakien, celui qui ose dire que les étrangers ne viennent en Belgique que pour profiter du système, doit me trouver son équivalant en couleur 100% d'origine belge...Nous avons mangé de succulents hamburgers faits minute, la viande était super, les frites aussi.On "achète"!

At weekends it’s a little difficult to find a table but the food is so good that is worth the waiting. We went a Sunday evening and the next Monday afternoon because we missed it so much. Fresh and tasty seafood and nice service. You’ll love it.

Zojuist weer naar Poule en poulette geweest op de St jansvliet. Maar het speelt geen rol waar je naar toe gaat overal krijg je dezelfde lekkere kip in wat voor uitvoering dan ook. Ik geef de voorkeur aan tous fleux et flame terwijl mijn vrouw geniet van een filet met natuursaus en appelmoes. De bediening is snel . Goed en vriendelijk. De kwaliteit is top en de prijs blijft bescheiden.hier krijg je kip zoals het moet zijn en geen water plofkippen neen echte kippen wat men je ook verteld.Neem de kids mee zij vinden het heerlijk om in de boots te zitten. Doe zo voort jongens en meisjes.

Всё как всегда, при каждом приезде в Амстердам, посещаем это ресторанчик, здесь царит уют, как в домашней обстановке и изысканность блюд, всегда свежие морепродукты, а их количество вызывает уважение к хозяину заведения. Всё вкусно, рекомендую всем побывать в этом месте и насладиться прекрасными блюдами.

Het eten is formidabel. De kwaliteit is zo goed dat het de fouten in de service en bediening (nog) compenseert. Bediening is uiterst vriendelijk, maar er zijn wel te veel slordigheden die op dit niveau niet thuishoren. Te laat aan tafel (zelf melden dat we nog steeds aan bar zaten), (te) lang wachten op eten (ook niet vooraf wat kleins om eerste honger te stillen), 3 keer vragen om de bestelde drank. Jammer. Maar ondanks dat was het een fantastische beleving met heerlijk eten. Lieve mensen trek er lering uit, ga niet ten onder aan je eigen succes.
This stood out as a really nice restaurant. not too expensive but great friendly service and fantastic food. pleasant interior without being too overstated. Definitely i would like to return.

On était installé ds un hôtel sur Oxford street, et on voulait manger de bonnes pâtes . Malheureusement tt ce qu on a commandé était fade, aucun goût .Le service est très long , 45mn pour avoir nos plats. On a demandé un peu plus de sauce car les pâtes étaient immangeables . On a attendu 15mn, toujours rien . Mon fils n en pouvait plus. Il les a mangé quand même. Et voilà la sauce qui arrive alors k il avait fini. Et le reste toujours pas de sauce. Bref , un endroit à éviter.

The staff were very friendly and accommodating. The food was phenomenal and the wine was fab. Our waitress Telma was superb, funny and very friendly and helpful. The food was amazing and cooked perfectly. It’s in a great location and we would definitely recommend.

Went on a Sunday lunch with 3 family members. Ordered a combination fingerfood (for 2) and a mix grill for 2 (forgot the name of the dish). Waiter told us fish of the day, and explained the dish that we orderes. Seafood was fresh and nicely cooked. I am not a big fan of mussels because they can get fishy if not cooked properly. In here, every thing were cooked perfectly nice and enjoyable.Sadly we have to leave Amsterdam the next day, otherwise we would have a meal in the seafood bar one last time. Will definitely come back

Great staff they take the time to answers any questions and to make sure you are happy with your order! They have variety of plant based milk option, and to my surprise unsweetened is available! Big space, the bathrooms are up stairs with more seating space!
We had lunch at the restuarant, I had grilled mix and it was great especially the lobster, and the service was good too

Скажу честно, нам этот ресторан советовали, но наряду...с парочкой других. Мы выбрали морепродукты с долей сомнения: Утрехт на самый морской город, но любовь к устрицам и моллюскам пересилила.Но всё, что нам принесли было настолько свежим, нежным и вкусным, что обед превратился в пир гурмана. Выбор вин тоже отличный, тонко подобранный именно к рыбе и морепродуктам.Это место можно смело рекомендовать, в него с удовольствием вернёмся вновь при случае.

Amamos tudo nesse lugar! Desde a decoração, música, acolhimento e a comida fantástica. Atendimento TOP por Diego, Inês e Antônio Leitao, além de excelente profissionais são pessoas da melhor qualidade! Voltarei com toda a certeza!
Fresh and delicious sea food, nice staff, very popular restaurant among tourists. Price is not cheap but for good value. Will visit again when in Amsterdam.
Goede vlotte en vriendelijke bediening, zeer voorkomend, classic hamburger perfect klaargemaakt, leuke gevarieerde muziek

Been here twice this week and staff are amazing there. First visit had chicken Caesar salad and is one of the best I have. Second time I came had a 10oz steak with onion rings, the steak was cooked as I asked and was really juicy and amazing taste. I have been here many times and has been amazing There has been one time I came and I was not impressed with how the steak came out as it was to dry and didn’t taste great. I would recommend this place to anyone with family or friends
Wij kwamen per toeval langs in Ellis Gourmet Burger Gent.Wij waren positief verrast met de lekkere cocktails en Ellis cheese nacho's!

This was such a disappointing lunch How can some ruin chicken Caesar salad? Limp baby gem lettuce (not a cos in sight) Luke warm chicken and garlic mayonnaise!!I can’t believe They can call this Italian food and expensive too. If we hadn’t been on a rush I’d have sent it back.The decor and seating is lovely but that’s about it. Sorry I would recommend this place.

We had a fantastic night here. The views from the restaurant are brilliant and the decor is really lovely. The cocktails were fantastic. The entertainment was great. Our waiter was really informative, helpful and friendly. The food was absolutely delicious. I really don’t have enough superlatives. We had a great time and can’t wait to go back.
If you're interested in mediocre seafood and paying more than it's worth, then this place is for you.  While the selection is decent, the quality is not.

Siamo stati a cena venerdì scorso, previa prenotazione per evitare le attese.Personale gentilissimo e pesce molto buono cucinato in molti modi appetitosi e ben presentato. conto nella norma, considerando che si è ad Amsterdam. Fermata tram proprio di fronte
Nice lunch, restaurant and staff looked clean and professional. Very impressed with our waitress, Marta. Will go back.

I visited this place on Saturday night for an anniversary dinner and the table booked near windows was not given upon arrival and my steak had to be returned as not done as asked for and the second one arrived and I had to eat when the others in the party had finished, the manager had an attitude of couldn't care less even when we left.
Me and my wife got two delicious burgers at a good value . The place is nice also and welcoming. I would recommend this restaurant .

Locale molto carino sulla via principale alternativa al Malioboro, dove regna un po’ più di pace e tranquillità. Frequentato da occidentali soprattutto, presenta un menù internazionale (dagli hamburger alla cucina indonesiana tipica). Con annesso un negozio laterale (gift shop), ci fermiamo a fare cena. Tempi di attesa ridotti, prezzi leggermente superiori alla media, ma sempre super convenienti.Cibo buono e personale cortese. Consigliato se non volete cenare nei baraccotti di Malioboro.
スパゲティが少量サイズを選択でき、女性の私は、これと飲み物で十分でした。店員が陽気なイタリア人なのも、良かったです。「オペラ座の怪人」を見る前に立ち寄りました。

Os peixes e outros frutos do mar em exposição são uma atração à parte. A simpatia da equipe do restaurante é outro ponto forte. A comida é deliciosa. Destaque para o barman que fica logo na entrada do restaurante. A decoração é clean.  Tem filial em Amsterdã. Procurem experimentar.
Weinig keuze op menu, met kip kan je veel meer doenServeerster kon geen bijkomende info geven over de gerechten.Duur voor wat je krijgtNiet lekkerVeel verwacht maar viel hard tegen
Een echte aanrader voor de kip liefhebber! De prijs kwaliteit verhouding is verbazingwekkend goed. De bediening is snel, aardig en super beleefd.Wij hebben echt-genoten :-)
Свежие  морепродукты, быстрая подача блюд. Обязательно резервируйте время посещения, чтобы избежать ожидания у барной стойки
This little gem serves up delicious Greek food. Recommended by a tour guide he food here was great. One of the best gyros I have had in many years. Enjoy
Buenas pizzas originales y postres geniales. Buen servicio y la relación calidad precio correcta, incluso la supera.

We had a wonderful time sitting at the bar.  Max, our bartender, took great care of us.  We enjoyed the boneless spare ribs.  Our favourite drinks are the Thai Basil smash and the espresso martini.  We enjoyed our evening so much that we made another reservation for the next day to bring our colleagues here.

Visited here recently with some colleagues and had a great experience. The waited who was serving us was lovely, really friendly and attentive and the food was great. I had pizza while 2 of my colleagues opted for pasta dishes. We all throughly enjoyed out meals and would definitely return in the future.
Mooie ambiance en lekker gegeten. Maar ekaar verstaan lukt niet en de prijs/kwaliteitsverhouding kan ook wel beter.
Perfect meal , steak melted in the mouth, will  be going again waiter service spot on and very polite

Les pizzas sont absolument délicieuses et vraiment copieuses! Le service était très bien et les serveurs très sympathiques. Mention spéciale pour le jeune serveur marseillais :) Nous avons également reçu de bons conseils pour les vins. Vraiment, no regrets, restaurant à recommander!

Wij hebben enorm lekker gegeten, we hadden een rustig tafeltje in leuk gebouwde hokjes. Ikzelf had de kippen filet en die was heel lekker, goed van textuur en smaak. Niet zoals die industriële kip vanuit de winkels. En wat leuk is dat je verschillende side dishes kan nemen als je niet goed kan kiezen wat je wil.Maar wat echt heel goed was was de bediening! Professioneel, aangenaam, vriendelijk en niet pusherig....wat ideaal was voor ons diner. Zeker het compliment doorgeven aan jullie Team.Ik kom zeker terug!
Location easy to findAmbient nice & friendlyVery good foodService very promptI will certenly come again next time in Amsterdam

Food was not the best I’ve had considering the price, I had the 8oz sirloin which only comes with a mushroom and half a grilled tomato,you had to pay extra for your chips in Which you only got french fries in a little pot at an very high cost, they wouldn’t have even filled my 2 year old grandson..the rest had the Sunday lunch which I thought was expensive for a Sunday lunch, you got 1 peace of meat,Yorkshire,3 quarters of a roast potato and 3 veg, I go out for meals a lot and thought was very expensive for all, then on the bill they even add 10% service charge which I think is disgusting, if you want to leave a tip for the service then should be up to the persons paying.which I was going to give £6 tip but I payed what they charged. Also drinks were very dear as well £12 for a large wine and a bottle of budvar not budwiser went around corner after and got a pint and large wine for £7. Well I will not go again unless I really was forced.but the staff we’re very nice and polite.

I was lucky enough to get a solo seat at the bar on a very busy Saturday night. I had the French fish  soup , the seafood starter platter and and fries and a small salad. It was more then enough and the platter was phenomenal. Clams, muscles, razor clams, croquettes, calamari, fired fish... it was huge and was $29 and could be $39 and I wouldn't have flinched. The soup was a deep bisque with fish, shrimp and a a crostini and some creme. The platters and dishes being sent out were amazing and the staff were all great and responsive to me even though I was solo at the bar. I would highly recommend going here while in Amsterdam.
Love this place. The food is always fresh and taste amazing. Love the oysters, mussels, sole, raw scallops.....staff is super friendly and helpful.

Personal unfreundlich und unpersönlich und kurz angebunden. Bestellung an der Kasse. Blick auf sehr ungepflegte Zutaten für die Gerichte. Getränke selbst nehmen, Teller und Gläser und die ganze Einrichtung aus Plastik. Auf alle Gerichte kommt die gleiche Soße aus der Plastikflasche.Burger: kalt, undefinierbare Matsche als Belag, Brötchen trocken geröstet und trotzdem kalt.Wirklich nicht zu empfehlen.
A very good Seafood restaurant. Fresh taste, clean, and has a friendly staff. Smells seafood. Their fries isn’t recommended.
He ido hoy por primera vez para comer y probarlo y estaba todo muy muy bueno! Camarer@s muy amables, te lo explican todo y local muy chulo. Se ha de probar!!!

It’s a large restaurant so you don’t feel crowded at your table. The service was first class and there is a very large selection of seafood to choose from. We both had the basic fish and chips which was very good and quite reasonably priced. The seafood platter was served to people at the next table. It was expensive but huge and looked good.

I was a single visitor had booked a table and was made to feel welcome. Slightly slow in service although I did arrive early in the evening - 6.30 - but not a problem for me at all. My waiter was attentive and recommended a lovely red wine for me. The waitresses also kept an eye out for me if I needed anything else. The ambience was friendly and relaxing. Food was superb - I enjoyed each course - my Veal main course was extremely good and extremely large too ! I first came here just over 40 years ago and then used to come weekly with my late husband in the 90's - so a lovely memory to come back now - and I thoroughly enjoyed it and will return when next in London
Heerlijke hamburgers gegeten met daarbij een salade en patat. Alles was perfect in orde! Na de hamburger zit je wel goed vol ;)

Na een bezoek aan de dierentuin,  en voordat je de trein naar huis meent is dit een prima plek voor een goede hamburger. Frietjes en koffie waren trouwens wat aan de lauwe kant. Personeel prima, maar onderling in bijzijn van de klant niet echt aardig tegen elkaar.Storend en onprofessioneel.
Comida muito boa! Local pequeno , fomos cedo e não pegamos fila. Atendimento muito bom, preço razoável!

Нашли ресторан через TripAdvisor. Несмотря на отзывы о том, что столик желательно бронировать пошли «на удачу». Народу  было много, минут 30ть пришлось подождать, но ожидание явно того стоило, тем более пока ждали наблюдали за персоналом, который подготавливал блюда к подаче. Когда принесли 2х этажную тарелку мы немного обалдели от количества и разнообразия морепродуктов на двоих. Рыба на гриле, мидии в томатном соусе, устрицы, омар, лангуст, крабы, креветки.. Всё было свежайшее! Ресторан для ценителей хорошего вина и морепродуктов самое что ни есть то!

Unless the coffee machine was already clean and turned off, I could have a cup of coffee! Good service!The food is very good priced and delicious. Different from the ' standard' Italian food, even the serve also the most known Italian food. We ate dishes from a menu and al la carte. Very friendly waitress.

The food and wine was great! Service wise, last time the guy said he would check for a table and 15 minuted later he came back and forgot about us so we just left. Another time the food took like 50 minutes after ordering. This time I only went because my friend insisted, and now the food was quick, but it looked like 3 people were waiters for our table. We ordered food and two times after were asked ro order, same with drinks, and the waiter kept forgetting what we ordered.

Had been excited to try an all plant based restaurant in Reykjavik. I ordered the "Mexico" wrap to go. The menu indicated that the wrap included guacomole, salsa, and spicy mayo. There was not a hint of any of these three. I had to ask for them separately and only got the latter two. The wrap was something basic I could've made it home - it mainly consisted of rice and beans. On top of all of this, the staff were not friendly or welcoming. I will be visiting other restaurants next time.

First visit to Middletons , 10 of us from work all ordered different and everyone said how good it was . Prices reasonable and best sea-bass I’ve had in ages and decent portions . Definitely be visiting again. Four or fault the food or the service . Thank you
海鮮性價比十分高，食得出是超級新鮮，配酒之選項建議十分理想，座位舒適，服務態度十分良好，下次都會再來吃飯。
Lovely steak as expected. Restaurant pretty quiet. Would recommend the mushroom starter. The service from Marta was great, very friendly.

I enjoyed a very pleasant early dinner this evening with my family at the Spaghetti House  Duke St. I ask you, the reader, to please ignore negative reviews as I was witness to one of these naysayers stomping out of the restaurant in a huff. She said her waiter was rude to her. That's nonsense. She and her friend were already in a bad mood when they arrived & simply vented their mood on Freddy, our waiter. He did nothing to offend her - in fact I found him very attentive and pleasant to deal with. The food was excellent, the pasta cooked to perfection. So many Italian restaurants simply load on the garlic but such was not the case at the Spaghetti House. Everything was seasoned perfectly and I found the prices very reasonable. The desserts were perfect sized portions and the latte was also well prepared. Overall a very pleasant 5 star experience - with the possible exception of those rude ladies disrupting our lovely meal, threatening the manager with a negative review!
Wow. The food was amazing.  I had a pizza and partner had penne pasta with 4 cheese. Loved it all. Still not use to no ice and no bread with your meal but still amazing. Clean and friendly

If possible i would give 4,5  i know i am difficult when it comes to spaghetti...i mostly don't like it unless it s home Cooked. That said i really enjoyed my d'the Billy bunter' i took the dog portion (horse is biggen)It was tastefull it was large enough, as drink i had the hole made ice tea... also a winner. So enjoyed my eventing, India not order it but it is possible to order glutenfrree spaghetti...

Booked this restaurant for lunch and I'm so glad we did. The servers were fast and attentive, the food was divine, the environment was beautiful. A great place to celebrate any occasion, well worth a visit just for the experience. We will definitely visit again.

As a cis straight female I cannot stress enough how good and comfortable this place makes me feel. Strangers lifting each other up and a good variety of music each week? WHAT ELSE IS NOT TO LOVE?There's something for everyone and it's so nice that they keep that in mind instead of a routinary night out where you know what to expect.Believe me when I say if I could set a tent at Club NYX I freaking would.
Si sois amantes de las pizzas este es vuestro sitio. Pizzas caseras y de gran calidad, además de que los camareros son bastante agradables y serviciales.Experiencia inmejorable!

Llevábamos tiempo buscando restaurantes de pizzas caseras y leímos reseñas del restaurante, fuimos a comer y nos sorprendio muy gratamente, pedimos una pizza para cada uno y nos encantó la masa y el sabor, realmente espectacular, la atención de 10, siempre con una sonrisa, la verdad muy contentos con la experiencia. Repetiremos sin dudarlo.
Fui a cenar con unos amigos míos y pedimos unas pizzas y son únicas y están buenísimas por su masa cruejientita y por su sabor en sí no hay ninguna igual
Whenever I make my way to London, this Spaghetti House location is always on my list of places to eat.  The spaghetti bolognese is always excellent.  The garlic bread was the best I've ever had!
Toujours un excellent service et d'excellents burgers.J'appércie beaucoup cet endroit, surtout en fin de journée, quand le village est sur le point de fermer - c'est toujours plus calme.
The Seafood Bar was so good, we went the second night. The service, the sounds, the smells and the conversations were incredible.
Great service matched with excellent fresh seafood. Staff made us feel very welcome and they were very attentive. Prices very good too.

If you haven't visited this fantastic restaurant yet, I strongly urge you to go. The staff cannot do enough for you and the food is fantastic. I have been to Middletons several times and each time my steak has been perfectly cooked. I'm already looking forward to my next visit!
All over again. Must be ordered. The service is excellent. The food is wonderful. I always recommend it. very recommended, especially if you like seafood.

Almost too many choices, but we selected right.  Wonderful lobster soup and great grilled fish items.  Friends at adjoining table had a platter fit for royalty.Warm and friendly service.  Great selection of beers and wine.

This was my second visit to Middletons. The food was very tasty but on both occasions service was very slow. We had to ‘flag down’ someone to take our starter and main course order and although we were asked if we would like to see the dessert menus, these were not forthcoming so we eventually just asked for our bill. Staff were friendly enough but they could just do with more of them. Once ordered, the food came quickly but on a relatively quiet Thursday night that would be expected. We will go back as location and food great but not sure how many more chances we will give this place.

Aangename sfeer, goede service en goede producten.Korte stop omdat het begon te regenen, aangenaam verrast; veel leukere sfeer dan de andere gelegenheden in de buurt. Rustige muziek op de achtergrond. Uitgebreide menukaart.
It was an amazing discovery to find this place and have great quality meat and even some very original burgers , try the salmom one , and the special fries. dont forget the coleslaw :)

We had a great dinner here! We didn’t have a reservation but they were able to seat us and not at a tiny table in the back corner. The service was great and everything arrived in a timely manner. It was a very busy night in there and everything seemed to move smoothly.

Il locale ci è stato consigliato. L'ambiente è accogliente, arredamento informale. Noi abbiamo cenato con un' ottima grgrigliata di pesce accompagnata da un buon Cataratto fresco.  Il locale è molto frequentato, conviene prenotare per tempo, onde evitare tempo in attesa del tavolo.

We arrived around 8 pm after a long day sightseeing!  We had to wait 1/2 hour to be seated. (a very popular spot!!!)  We ordered a seafood dinner for 2 to be split between 3 of us.  It was more than enough!!!  Lobster, Clams, Sea Bass, Sole, Prawns and a yummy tomato sauce below!  What a treat!!!!  This was a very special dinner!!  Eat here again?  You bet!!!!

I am amazed by the popularity of truly below average food joints like this. A cheese toast can be brought to the level of beautiful simplicity, were you to find a top notch artisan cheese and sourdough bread. This, on the other hand, is a place that sells toasted pre-cut bread: what you would eat at a bar that otherwise does not have a kitchen. I was surprised to see many locals actually visit it for lunch! Yuck! Truly a waste of a fine location and an absolute gastronomic disgrace.
Service was very friendly here - we enjoyed a variety of favorite Italian dishes, including pizza, carbonara pasta, salmon, and lasagna. Decent portions and a comfortable seating area.
It was a good surprise to enter the restaurant!Good taste and pleasure, friendly and cordial service, clean and welcoming environment.Excellent food quality and fair price!
Slow service, mixed up orders, small portions, food served in phases.  The fries were good though. Skip it.

We love Middletons - the pricing on the Set Lunch Menu is brilliant and offers a good selection (although we're starting a campaign to bring the Garlic Mushrooms back!).It's been a rubbish week, so my daughter and i had a 'cheer-up' lunch. The food was of the usual high standard, and the service was fast without feeling rushed.We were served today by Ivan, who was an animated, friendly, professional and welcoming guy. Please keep doing what you do, Middletons Peterborough - we love you!

Came here for lunch, great service, great food, great steak Was served by Mark who was spectacular, well done to him.This is nice little establishment, I highly recommend it to anyone feeling hungry in town.

Si queréis comer en un sitio especializado realmente en pizza italiana, Grosso es la mejor opción. Nosotros comimos la Milagrosa, que ojalá la metan en la carta porque es un escándalo, la Borghese, buenísima, si te gusta la trufa. Y de postre no puede faltar la pizza de nutella. Increíble. El servicio, excelente.
Went with family and had their lunch time deal, 3 courses for under £11. No corners cut, everything was of highest quality and so tasty. Cannot recommend highly enough.

The staff were very friendly and attentive. Happy to leave us at the table while our late friend arrived. The food when we did order was great, come to perfection, we had a mix of steak, ribs and fish across our group of four and everyone was happy with their choices. I'll be going back again soon

Ron is goud. Alles wat hij aanraakt gaat tot nu toe goed. Formule: kleine bordjes eten tegen hoge prijs. De smaken zijn niet echt Nederlands-Indisch. Het is fashion food zonder hart en ziel. Jammer. Bediening is wel goed en attent. Zo attent dat ik een jampot vol sambal meekreeg. Gul. Maar terug komen: nee sorry. Dan adviseer ik: ‘mooi zeist’ in zeist voor ECHT Indisch eten.

Slechtste bediening ooit. Personeel weigert klanten terwijl terras leeg is op een ze er zonnige en drukke zaterdag. Ondertussen neemt het personeel rustig pauze aan het raam van de zaak volledig in het zicht. Ongelooflijk schouwspel, nooit gezien.
Blijf weg dan wordt je niet teuggestiuurd als er nog 50 % leeg is. wat een trieste zaak is dit zeg.i

Waited over 30 minutes for our meal.,was given 2 bottles of water but only had 1 glass. Was asked if we wanted any sauce with our meal before the food came. Was told it was one of the best restaurants in Norwich hate to think what the worst ones are like.

We came in here on the spur of the moment for a late lunch. Seated promptly and given the menus. We had the fixed price set menu two courses. The roast herb chicken and the burger. Desserts of ice cream and pavlova. All the food was very nice and with drinks the bill was £26. Very good for the money. The service was excellent and the waitress very polite. Would go again.

We were visiting Norwich with family who have visited before. We hadn’t booked but were found a table easily but the restaurant filled up quickly. Having had a hotel breakfast I couldn’t do justice to my meal but the steak and blue cheese salad was very good, cooked as ordered medium rare. The burgers were declared as delicious . Our waiter worked so hard and was very efficient , delivering water and sauces to the table. Good wine choice and good value at £61 with drinks .

Visited about 2 weeks ago and came again this evening.  The chicken and asparagus tagettalie in cream sauce is simply the best dish I've eaten in a long time. I know this is a chain however every staff member makes you feel special . It's just superb Eat inside or outsideYour choice
Good food, excellent service, a place to visit when you’re in town! Five stars food and service. Love it
Vriendelijke bediening en echt goede koffie!Verder ook lunch en ontbijt alles was lekker en precies waar we zij in hadden
Coffee is really tasty and the staff is friendly. Sitting outside in the secret garden in the sun is perfect.

De service vonden wij wel iets beleefder en warmer kunnen. Daarnaast hadden zij geen echte goede koffie, met daarbij bijvoorbeeld plantaardige melk. Het eten was redelijk, wij waren niet mega enthousiast. Zelf had ik een omelet met o.a. gamba’s en avocado, waar ik maar een gamba en 2 mini stukjes avocado op had. Zij staan redelijk hoog op tripadvisor, waardoor wij er wel wat meer van hadden verwacht. Het was het allemaal net niet. Een enthousiastere bediening met echt getrainde mensen en iets meer focus op het eten zou al een hoop schelen.
Alles is hier prima en word uitmuntend klaargemaakt. De koffie en taarten zijn verrukkelijk. Ook de binnentuin is een aanrader. Ik kom hier zeker vaker terug.

A modern, clean seafood restaurant with friendly staffs. Four of us came for dinner on a Saturday night during our trip. It was a bit of a wait but you can get a drink at the bar inside once they give you a number. For food, you can’t go wrong with Mussels wine garlic sauce, it was good and mussels were big. However the fried calamari was just so-so, go with Fritto Misto instead. It’s a mixed fried shrimp, fish and squid with different batter which was really tasty. I love the delicious tendered Razor Clams. And the Mixed Grilled was very flavorful with fishes, shrimps and shellfish. We enjoyed our meal and definitely recommend this place.
Vriendelijke bediening en de chicken tex-mex tosti was heerlijk. Homemade lemonade is ook een aanrader. 10/10 nog een keer bezoeken.
Food was excellent and the staff were great, our server Caitlin made sure every need was catered for

This being our 3rd visit, from the front of house welcome by Chloe to our friendly and efficient server Evie, we enjoyed a delicious meal, very good menu, plenty of choice, freshly cooked. Middleton's has a great ambience and we would recommend for all occasions or just for a pleasant evening out! Thanks to all staff!

Die Lage ist super. Wir saßen draußen auf der Brücke, das war sehr schön.Der Service war freundlich und schnell und die Burger waren auch lecker. Ich hatte einen Bollywoodburger, der nur begrenzt als Aktion erhältlich war und er war mega! :)

Los ingredientes no son malos, pero la coccion de las pizzas deja mucho que desaear. Tal vez porque fuimos en hora punta y había mucha gente, pero hubiese preferido tener que esperar 5 o 10 minutos mas y que la coccion fuera correcta. Lo dicho, los borde totalmente carbonizados (que no se podian comer) y la pizza por el centro cruda. Una pena, no creo que vuelva.

Family birthday mid week meal.Staff very attentive.Food was lovely. My lamb was a little under cooked for my liking, chef happily put back on grill for another minute👍.We felt we had a good value for money evening meal.

Turned up on a Saturday around 19.30 pm asked for a table for one and was seated straight away.Waitress was chatty,helpful and efficient. Food was served reasonably quickly considering there were quite a few people in the restaurant at this time.Food was cooked well and well presented,

Our first visit to a spaghetti house, but a very pleasant one. Just off Oxford street, with a terrace which we enjoyed. The maitre d' was a friendly and attentive and funny man. Further service staff was attentive and friendly, albeit maybe a little impersonal.We had a calzone, wich was good. The decaf espresso was delicious.
This place serves Beyond Meat burgers. The only one we came across in Bruges. Very tasty although some in our group thought there was too much ketchup in it. Definitely recommended.

Just very bad service. No difference to other spaghetti house in London. Waiter was in a rush and blunt. Hygiene also very bad they hold the tongs for lemon but actually using their hands where customers cannot see. Let me not start on the hygiene in the open kitchen.

My brother and I visited The Seafood bar at the suggestion of The Albus, and they did not disappoint! The restaurant was beautiful and modern and had fresh seafood on display in the entrance. We had the calamari and the fried shrimp and it was amazing! Eating here was definitely one of the highlights of my trip.

arrived at 7.00 waited 30 minutes foe drinks which just sat on the bar later after ordering more drinks had to wait 25 minutes for beer because it was apparently stored in the cellaroveall the starters and main course took two hours to be served received the first course two prawn cocktail covered in a thin watery pink substance tiny tasteless prawns totaaly covered in a very large amount of paprika almost inediblemain course arrived at 9.00 two hours after sitting down steak ordered medium arrrived almost raw no point in complaining as we didnt't have the timethe restaurant appeared to be in chaos with customers complaining all over the placewe were offered a free round of drinks and eventually 35% of the billthis did not make up for the fact that this excuse for a restaurant ruined a birthday eveningnever again a place to avoid
Muy buenas pizzas, con una masa riquísima. Los postres (mousse de chocolate y panacota) deliciosos. Nos quedamos con las ganas de probar la pizza de nutela. Servicio rápido y agradable.

Pedimos unos entrantes y unas pizzas, todo muy rico,recetas e ingredientes originales,el local es pequeño y acogedor aunque la luz es muy cálida y cuesta leer la carta, la música está muy alta y no puedes mantener una conversación normal,personal atento y amable,los postres también muy ricos.precios contenidos.
The service is good, the portions are large, the food is delicious! Fresh seafood, tasty wine.Give aprons not to get dirty!

Get really looked after by the staff and the food is amazing. The steaks are cool perfect and just melt in your mouth. Salad is amazing here aswell so would recommend coming twice or more even to try the steak and then a chicken Caesar salad
Una buena pizza casera con ingredientes frescos. No es la mejor que me he comido, pero la atención fue muy buena y no tardaron mucho.
I was looking forward to my takeaway for my family.Spent £72 and would have been better off getting chips from the chip shop !

Mi hanno consigliato questo posto è devo dire che sono rimasta molto soddisfatta.Il locale è molto carino e informale. Pesce fresco a vista.Abbiamo optato per un piatto con pesce grigliato misto.Consiglio di prenotare perché è sempre pieno.Servizio buono e prezzi in linea con quello che offre.

Pertinho de onde fiquei, na região dos museus, me indicaram essa casa.Fiz uma reserva, sem reserva é complicado, fui atendido pela simpatica Pean, que me deu o "password" para a pedida certa.Rapaz, uma prato sortido  com varios mariscos, quentes e frios, muito farto.Eu e a patroa adoramos.Recomendo!

A party of us for sister in laws birthday.Really don’t get how a restaurant can be so up and down with meals. The bad is starting to outway the good... majority of people had roasts . Meat not cooked to satisfaction. I had beef salad ... yuk... chips cold , replaced as well as 2 others who had cold chips. Salad didn’t state pesto dressing or dressing on sundries tomatoes ruined the whole meal. Children’s rolls for burgers rather well done as well as the burgers ... come on Middletons sort it out ... we are regulars does that not count for anything ?
Great food, very good service וn the heart of Amsterdam . We had the grilled seafood for two and there was plenty of food

We visited for a family celebration, as always food was delicious and service was good. It was a busy Friday night  so there was a lively atmosphere, it didn't feel like the wait for food was too long. I'm sure we will be returning again soon.

Nous nous y étions déjà arrêté il y a quelques années...et nous confirmons notre impression de l'époque: une très bonne adresse pour les poissons et fruits de mer ! Beaucoup de débit donc qualité au rendez-vous. Possibilité de commander un plateau de fruits de mers chaud et froid pour 2: homard cuit et froid, moules, huîtres,couteaux,filets de sole parfaitement grillés...spectaculaire et délicieux. Un must.Service jeune,efficace et souriant.Un cadre lumineux. Une très belle adresse.Réservation indispensable.

The burgers are pretty good. Nothing special but, in their own way, fine. However, when you order a burger it comes with nothing else. I had a burger made from lamb ("Guaco Waco Burger"). A price of 14 euros for a burger, with nothing else on the plate, is simply too expensive. I ordered a side order of fries. Edible but a bit on the hard side (perhaps overcooked?). The Dame blanche did not look great - too much cream and the ice-cream was frozen.  On the other hand, the service is quick and staff were kind.

We were looking for a place to eat sole (or the Dutch small version "slib tong"), one of those things I really like to have when visiting the Netherlands. Result was great. Wonderful fish, fresh, well prepared and all without enormous pretentions. Just right.There was plenty of other good looking food going past from the great see food menu.
I am not a vegetarian but still liked the place. Good soup nice burger and very w elcoming staff. Its a good option in Antwerp

Comí el "menú del día", era una pizza muy básica(tomate, queso, jamón york y champiñones, de estos muy pocos), de postre bola de helado de chocolate y de beber coca cola zero. La pizza superfina, estaba rica, pero como he dicho antes, muy básica. El helado de chocolate muy rico, pero no deja de ser una bola de helado. Todo por 11,50€, me pareció caro. No subo fotos porque la pizza daba lástima a la vista.
Just amazing. I recommend the time of visit between 14 - 18 hour, because it's not so crowded. It's not a cheap experience but totally worth it.
Echt een vis restaurant zoals een visrestaurant zou moeten zijn. Mooie visgerechten en leuk behulpzaam personeel.
Las hamburguesas están espectaculares y tardaron muy poco en traernos lo que pedimos!! Nosotros fuimos con un descuento de estudiante pero aún así, los precios son razonables!

Еда и Обслуживание на 4**** из 5. Обстановка внутри на 5***** из 5. Вечером бывает даже очередь на то, чтобы присесть. Выдают иногда какие-то номерки при входе ... зачем? Сами не знают. В целом все хорошо 👌 Лучше, чем в ресторанах вокруг))))

Этот ресторан - настоящий праздник желудка для любителей морепродуктов. Возможность получить огромное количество различных продуктов моря в одном заказе. Недешево, но стоит каждого гроша. Особенно учитывая отличное обслуживание

Whilst some of the dishes served were OK others were rather bland. The wine was rather expensive, even by the carafe. Also, because the table we were given had a large knot hole in the surface, a glass of wine was spilt all over one of our group. I suggest the table is replaced.

Popped in on Sunday for a roast. This was my first time and I'd heard great things so was excited to visit.On arrival the restaurant we were asked to wait at the bar for drinks for 15 mins so a table could be prepared. We waited for 10 mins before any acknowledgement for drinks and a further 5 after that, but alas no drinks before we were seated.A waitress took our drinks order and delivered 2 bottles of water, but no glasses. We requested glasses and after 5-10 mins for waiting for these we went to the bar and got some ourselves from the waiter behind the bar. We could also see our drinks order sitting at the bar undelivered for a good 5 mins. We ordered food and it came, looking good. Unfortunately we had no cutlery, we had to ask for some and waited some minutes for it (pretty sure the customer should not have to ask for cutlery..). We also had to query if we'd been given enough vegetables for 4 (we received 1 tray with the same amount as a table for 2). With a puzzled look, the waitress delivered us some more/the correct amount. One of the party had ordered the nut roast and realised that instead, without being informed, was given 2 unappealing vegetable burgers. On querying this, the waitress found out they'd run out and hadn't thought to ask or inform us.2 different waitresses then asked us if we wanted dessert menus and whilst waiting for desserts, one had to ask if we'd had them yet or not. We hadn't.So in short, the service was absolute calamatous. The staff were lovely but shouldn't need to apologise everytime they came to the table! The food was good (apart from the nutroast debacle). Seems like something went wrong at management level yesterday!

Нашли этот ресторан в путеводителе ViaMichelin. Ресторан расположен в центре Амстердама, что обычно, настораживает: бесконечные туристические потоки, очереди перед входом "расслабляют" сервис и кухню, Действительно, попасть в ресторан без предварительного резерва очень сложно. Но, оказавшись за столиком, становится понятно, что ожидание не напрасно, сервис на высшем уровне, а кухня - широкий выбор: крабы, устрицы, креветки, омары, рыба - выше всяких похвал! Надеюсь, Вы не разочаруетесь! P.S. mixed grill на 2 персоны достаточно и на троих!)

Ruined our family dinner , complained  & waitress didn't charge us for 2 of our dinners,  there was 4 of us , she  didn't want tell kitchen as they would shout at her ! After speaking to other people they have had the same experience,  without checking the bill they still charge £11 service charge!!!!!! Restaurant owners are on a down hill battle I'm afraid.

This is the 2nd time my family and I have eaten out at Middletons. Once again very good service. Our waitress Marta was an attentive host and very friendly. All the staff were polite and helpful. My daughter who is 5 had a great time and enjoyed her food. We ate from the fixed special menu and all of the dishes were of a high standard. The kids menu had big portions enough for two small kids to share and the banana split went down well. I highly recommend a visit.
The Food was delicious and super fresh. The ambiance of the restaurant was delightful and it was super clean

WE are in Amsterdam for the last layover before leaving for the States tomorrow morning.  Our Consierge recommended The Seafood Bar, which is about a 10 minute walk from our hotel.We hit the restaurant at exactly the right time -- before the crowds --we were seated immediately and had the most incredible meal.  I ordered the Asian stye mussels and my husband ordered the Fruits de Mer -- my dish was definitely the hit.  The sauce was a lemongrass, ginger and coconut -- and was superb!!  The icing on the cake for us was our waitress/hostess, Valeria Spataro, a 2nd year university student in Management at the University of Amsterdam -she recommended the perfect wine for the mussels,- and made multiple recommendations as to the best methods for eating both the mussels and the more varied dishes on my husband's menu.  She also mentioned that she makes a wonderful tea, which we didn't try.   Valeria really enhanced our dinner -- and when we come back to Amsterdam, we hope to see her again.Great restaurant -- huge portions.  If you're in the mood for the great seafood, this is the place to go!

Depois de caminhar por horas pelas charmosíssimas ruas de Amsterdam, eu e minha família resolvemos procurar um lugar para dar uma paradinha e recarregar as energias. Passando em frente ao Ellis, o lugar simples e aconchegante me chamou a atenção, especialmente pela vista: esquina de um dos canais. As mesinhas com guarda sol estavam espalhadas sobre a calçada, embaixo de uma enorme árvore, ambiente tranquilo e relaxante. Pedimos alguns pratos típicos da região, todos muito saborosos, mas o campeão foi o BITTERBALLEN (croquete holandês). Nunca comi um bolinho frito tão delicioso na minha vida! Massa extremamente leve, com sabor muito agradável, uma combinação perfeita.

We waiting at the front door while a server looked at us but never seated us. When we decided that maybe we were supposed to seat ourselves, after standing there for a while, another server(?) came out and acknowledged us and gave us some menus but never returned. All this while two other servers walked passed our table for another 10 mins.( they each had one table) We left. It was ridiculous.
La atención al cliente muy buena. Relación calidad precio bien. Buen ambiente, lo pasamos genial nuestra ultima noche en Ámsterdam.
Service was poor, some staff good some less soSteak was awful, fries were awful.I expected much better for the inflated price I paid

In september 2019 gegeten bij TGI Friday's met hoge verwachtingen. Helaas zijn deze verwachtingen niet waar gemaakt. Het voorgerecht, de nachos, waren helaas niet warm en voorzien van een erg vloeibare kaas. Helaas niet zoals verwacht. Daarna een lekkere hamburger gehad (vegan), welke royaal was belegd. Echter, de medewerkers waren niet gastvrij, het duurde enige tijd voordat we werden geholpen en de prijs-kwaliteit verhouding kan beter. Leuk om eens geprobeerd te hebben, maar (helaas) niet voor herhaling vatbaar.

Tegenover het MAS (aan de andere kant van het water) ligt dit restaurant met terras.Graffity op de buitenmuur refereerd aan de tijd dat hier bekende artiesten optraden.Plek met geschiedenis dus.Veel hamburgervarianten, prima eten, gezellige plek.

Wir waren mit vier Freunden am 22.09.2019 da.Das Ambiente ist modern, aber nicht kalt. Die Atmosphäre entspannt, die Bedienung freundlich und der Service schnell. Die Küche ist offen, noch ein Pluspunkt.Wir hatten alle verschiedene Gerichte, damit alle von jedem probieren konnten. Alle vier waren frisch und lecker. Das Kabeljaufilet perfekt, die Krebse eine Offenbarung... . Nachhaltig beeindruckt war ich vom Dessert, Mousse au Chocolat: intensiv, cremig und sehr schokoladig.
Les boulettes sont bonnes mais il n'y a rien d'extraordinaire qui justifie le prix excessif. Stoemp bon mais salade fade et sans saveur. Attente trop longue alors que le restaurant était vide.
食物品質還不錯，但服務人員態度很差，叫很多次都沒人理會，而且其中冷盤拼盤中的其中一樣貝類只有殻沒有肉，完全超傻眼，使我有很不愉快的用餐經驗。食物方面很推薦熱的燒烤拼盤，和深海小龍蝦。

We went for lunch with clients and it took 1 hour 45 minutes to be served a main. They had one server and one chef. I would suggest if you are hungry, do not go here. Such a shame because the food was pretty good

Decided to get a pre theatre meal here. The service was ok but the food was terrible.The spaghetti pommodoro must have had over a can of tomatoes in the sauce making it very very acidic. The spaghetti pesto was inedible due to it being drowned in so much pesto, my husband had to order a pizza as he could not eat the pasta and pesto. NO OFFER OF ANY COMPENSATION EVEN THIUGH WE SAID IT WAS INEDIBLE.There was a 12.5% service charge added to a bill which was not described as discretionary.Left feeling very very unhappy and will not be returning

This place is very busy -especially between 7pm to 9pm. So reservations highly recommended.If you arrive without a reservation you can wait in the front/bar area and outside where drinks and appetisers are served. The first time I was there (solo) I ordeered an appetiser and glass of wine and tI found the portion quite large so just ordered another appetiser and cancelled the dinner reservation.Second time - did not order anything and got a high table within 20-30 mins. Had the mussels and fries and salad. All delicious! Service is very good and friendly...After 9pm - no line up and much calmer. Great place for Seafood!

I recently moved to Leicester and have now visited Middletons 4 times! The food is really excellent, beautifully cooked and served. The wine list is also very good. The Malbec is a definite must to try if you like red wine. The staff are all very pleasant and helpful. On one of my visits with friends the restaurant was quite busy and the wait was a tiny bit longer than normal but the staff were so attentive and advised in advance there may be a slight wait that it didn't matter. It is when there is a wait and the staff ignore you that it is annoying, none of that here, from the front of house to the servers the service is good. The chefs prepare and cook really good food as well. The steaks are superb. I have also been for a Sunday lunch which was really delicious. I have a friend coming soon and we will definitely visit again.

La comida fue espectacular, pedimos camarones a la mantequilla y salmón tartare de lo más fresco y delicioso. Plato fuerte buen tamaño. El ambiente y el servicio genial!! Un lugar para visitar sin duda alguna!

No es el más bonito, pero las pizzas están buenas (eso y ensaladas es lo único que hay). De tamaño están bien y bien de precio 8-12€ la pizza. Postres solo aptos para muy golosos. Carta variada de cervezas. Buen servicio y atento.

We popped in for a pre theatre meal last night and the manager immediately took us to our seats and made us feel very welcome.  He said he would work fast to get us our food and drinks and he did not disappoint.  We were served our drinks within a couple of mins (which I always appreciate in a restaurant and my bugbear is being sat down and then left for ages) and our food came about ten mins later.  The food was tasty and plentiful. i thoroughly recommend this restaurant for a fast tasty efficient pre theatre dinner.

Came to Middletons for dinner with family. Ordered Sticky Ribs, Garlic mushrooms and Brie for starters, steaks for main courses. All starters and steaks were cooked perfectly. Waiters smiling, friendly and attentive. Would recommend as place to visit in Watford

My friends and I had a great time in Middletons, two of us shared their absolutely amazing 36oz which the chef presents to the table while the rest were happy with their choices too. The staff were very accomodating to food request (my friends can be picky -_-) and also made some great cocktails. Their buttered new potatoes really compliment the steak so well that I'll be back in a jiffy
Went to middletons for lunch last week with a few friends and I high recommend lovely food and lovely staff that work there

Looking for an old fashion hamburger and this was recommended. Staff are excellent-welcoming, helpful and good humor. Excellent and multiple (many menu pages) choices were creative and the results were perfect including the beer batter onion rings. Excellent home made lemonade, home made tea and home made ginger ale along with some choice beer and wine menus. We went back twice.
Amazing restaurant with excellent service and good selection of wine. Special sea food menu with best quality and logical price.
Super lekker snelle service en nog gezond ook! Ik zal het zeker aanraden bij mijn vrienden en familie.
Previously a favourite restaurant we were so disappointed in our last visit. The staff looked bored, there was no atmosphere and the food was bland and barely warm.
Very nice place to eat if you love fish. They have a wide variety of very tasty fish. The staff is very friendly and helpful. Prices are quite high.

Foi ao acaso mas fartos das duvidas que muitos nos deixavam ,um amigo meu disse,vamos comer massa nesse restaurante.Realmente foi o melhor momento de repasto que tivemos em Londres,porque será que os Ingleses adoram comer em Portugal. ☺Não foi só a comida que nos contentou mas sim o facto de termos sido atendidos por duas portuguesas espectaculares.Todo o nosso grupo quer deixar neste comentário do TripAdvisor a forma como a Telma mas principalmente a Rita Rosado nos atenderam e acompanharam de uma forma excecional durante todo o tempo em que estivemos no restaurante,grandes profissionais.É muito importante que restaurantes tenham além de uma boa cozinha bons funcionários.É um restaurante que certamente iremos recomendar ,qualidade preço e simpatia  ☺

Ever since I can remember we have been eating in Spaghetti Houses, firstly as a family on shopping trips to London and now as an adult, with family and with friends. The staff are welcoming, efficient and attentive. The food is always very good and a fair price for London. I do find even the smaller portions a little large, but that is just me and not a complaint.

The service here is second to none in the evenings. We felt so well looked after. The food is also fabulous. We all had fillet - some with the prawns, another with half a lobster and one just on it's own. The steaks were all perfectly cooked. The prawns and lobster were delicious. Unfortunately all the fries were overcooked considerably. Perhaps due to it being after 9pm. In any event, that was reported to the staff who immediately swapped them for fresh, lovely fries.This place is quite expensive but well worth it.
Highly recommended place. It's good breakfast with a low price. And their service is very nice too! Come here :)
This is the second time we have eaten here and can’t fault the quality and range of seafood on offer. The service was great, thank you Tessa for looking after us.
A little pricey but definitely worth it. The calamari was amazing and the serve was great. Quite small of a restaurant.

Everything was delicious! We went there 3 times (once just for dessert) during our short stay in London. The portions we received were perfect for sharing, but we didn't want left-overs so that may have contributed to the sizes being right for us.

I love the lively atmosphere at Seafood Bar and visited twice in three days.  Service was excellent.  Fresh seafood!  My family really liked the grilled cod and lobster.  Fried fish and fries were a little greasy- my only complaint.

My husband and I sat at the bar and had the most delicious oysters. The bartender was incredibly friendly and knowledgeable, we had a great time speaking with him and he gave us great recommendations for the rest of our trip.We’d like to come back another time and eat a full meal here as it looked delicious and was packed.

Popped in as menu looked great, we ordered a calzone.  Tasted good but was cold in the middle and the cheese wasn’t melted.  We both had an upset stomach the next day too.  Because of that I would not go back.  Wasn’t cheap either.

Выбирали ресторан морской кухни по Трипадвизору, по отзывам опасались, что в этом будет очередь и долго ждать. Мы пришли около 19, да, мест свободных не было, в очередь записывают, но только если ждать там же (не разыскивают). Мы подождали в баре и на удивление не долго и уже там было приятно: нам предложили на дегустацию устриц, мы даже не успели воспользоваться (доедали уже за столиком), как нас проводили к столику. Дальше был отличный семейный ужин: мы взяли большие комбонаборы, где были и холодные блюда и горячие - очень разнообразные блюда интересно попробовать за один раз, что-то пробовали впервые. Все было очень свежее и вкусное, удачно выбрали и вино, хотя оказалось из недорогих. Наша задумка на ужин в Амстердаме удалась на 100%. Современный ресторан с непринужденной обстановкой, отличным обслуживанием. Стоимость выше среднего, но оно того точно стоит. Мы очень довольны, это был лучший ресторан этого круиза, рекомендуем!

This quaint cafe was right next to our hotel, and after a busy day of sights and walking, was grateful to have food so close. Burger and desear salad was great, a selection of local beers. Burger had wonderful toasted bun on both sides with delicious sauce.

When we first arrived we were welcomed & shown to our table. The food was great, service impeccable. The seafood was just tasty & fresh. Close to Vondelpark.  Terrific meal but it’s popular so good idea to book ahead.

The food is excellent here.  Very fresh and well prepared and presented. Good sized portions.  Its very crowded with both locals and tourists, as the word is out that this is the place to go and be seen.  Its a bit noisy and the pace is franetic, but the servers do not rush you.  Its just not a quiet, relaxed place. Make reservations well in advance.

When going to one of the Ellis Burger places remember that you are also paying for the ambiance and the decor. I don't think the prices are justified in the taste or portions (contrary) but I do think that the mood this place sets is nice!I have gone to Ellis St. Catherine and Jourdan numerous times and was never really disappointed (except when the decided to remove the mini-burgers from the menu, that was definitely sad!).

We ate there two times in two days.  It was that great!    First day we shared the fish and shell fish platter.   A lot of tasty seafood.   The next day my wife had the fish of the day and I had the Dover sole.  A waitress willingly deboned both fish dishes and arranged it beautiful.   If you like fish,lots of choices, you need to go.   5 star.

Mijn vrouw had een Classic burger,spek,sla,tomatensalsa . Ik een kipburger met gegrilde groenten. Frietje erbij met een heerlijke saus en een lekker bakje rucola sla. ( menuutje voor tussen de middag) vriendelijk geprijsd .en huisgemaakte ijsthee.  Echt een toppertje!!
Ontzettend leuke en vriendelijke bediening. Goed advies en uitleg.De vegaburger was goed van smaak en cocktail ook.

Leuk om een broodje te eten op het terras. Menu is goed, niet bijzonder. Lekkere koffie. Vaak niet geïnteresseerd personeel dat een uitstraling heeft dat zij vooral graag naar huis willen. Jammer voor deze mooie locatie.
