Vanmiddag met mijn vriendin geluncht en wij vonden het eten enorm lekker.Ook de ijskoffie was lekker, de karamel geur zorge voor een glimlach op ons gezicht. De sfeer was erg gezellig en de bediening was vriendelijk.

Lekker én goedkoop ontbijt met heerlijke tosti, goeie koffie, verse jus en smakelijke granola-yoghurt. Maar de sfeer en bediening zijn hier het leukst; heel aardig, vaardig, teamgericht, klantvriendelijk. Fantastisch concept, top!

Met vrienden geluncht. Vier maal werd een Beyond Burger besteld. Volgens de kaart 100% vega en er zijn volgens het bedrijf mensen voor de gek gehouden: ze bestelden een gewone hamburger maar kregen een vega exemplaar. Niemand had het in de gaten. En wij geloven dit verhaal nu ook. De Beyond Burgers smaakten geweldig, niet van vlees te onderscheiden. Een absolute aanrader!!

Wir waren zu 4. dort und hatten vegane, vegetarische sowie Burger mit Fleisch bestellt und alle waren richtig gut. Der Service dort war super. Lediglich das Bezahlen am Ausgang war etwas umständlich, da man ggf. dann in einer Schlange warten muss. Am Platz zu bezahlen wäre wesentlich einfacher.

Myself, My Husband, 20 year old son, and 15 year old daughter ate here for dinner. The burgers were okay. However they were very overpriced. Definitely would be cautious of pricing when eating here. Nothing exceptional.
Idéal pour un repas rapide et sain !Rien à dire juste excellent et copieux ! Foncez ! Un régal pour les papilles !

After a very exhausting and long day, we were looking for a place like this for a food like they offer. It was instantly a match made in heaven and maybe this isn't an objective review as it perfectly fitted to our expectations.Didn't try much - two type of burgers, salad, "les frites" and some drinks - and nothing stayed behind! Can't give any further evidence. For our mood that night and for Leuven's central zone, it was exactly what we've needed and we've enjoyed each single bite.
Best steak in the city

Bavet - Made for friends... and lovers.....#bavet #belgianspaghetti #restaurant #madeforfriends #lovers #pasta #spaghetti #food #foodie #foodlover #belgianfood #yummy #delicious #lunchtime #withhim #mylove #love #bruxellesmabelle #bx #sprouttobebrussels #brussels #belgium #littlebelgiangirl #happyme bavet_spaghetti

So glad we stepped inside.  Very cozy decor with a library vibe.  Lots of 2 and 4 top tables but also a large conference table in a really nice back room for a family or group meal.  Well outside of the tourist zone, I had to request a menu in English.  I chose a delicious black lentil salad with roasted root vegetables, goat cheese and hazelnuts.  The price for salad, wine and sparkling water was under 20 euros and well worth the quality of the food, service and atmosphere.

De Amsterdã, pegamos 3 horas de trem (40 euros) e chegamos em Bruges. Parece um reino, com umlabirinto de ruas medievais, catedrais, palácios, canais (arrastem a galeria para ver!). .Dentre tantas cidades europeias, tá aqui uma das nossas preferidas. Bruges acalenta. Pequena, mas cheia de surpresas a cada vez esquina que se vira. E, ainda, tem o ar açucarado: as ruas têm cheiro de chocolate!.Para explorar, você pode alugar uma bike(a gente ama!), ou ir de barco, e ainda a pé. Pode vir curtir um amor porque a cidade é ultra romântica, ou pode vir com filhos porque aqui também é um lugar mágico e descomplicado. .Enfim, só venha com calma. Esqueça bate-volta, porque Bruges merece. Agora  algumas outras dicas :.🏫 Nos hospedamos no The Pand Hotel, que é lindo e tem uma localização maravilhosa, do lado da Markt e dos canais! Veja nos destaques o tour pelo hotel! Vale à pena de hospedar nele. .🍪 chezalbert: Melhor waffle que comemos na vida..❤️ Tem que ir (são todos locais que aparecem nas fotos da galeria) : Beguinage, lago do amor, Torre Belfort, Historium, Igreja Our Lady, Sint John Hospital. .💲💲 Preços: refeição 25 euros, waffle 3,5 euros, bkle 15 euros (alugamos no Koffienboontje, que fica do lado da torre de Belfort ).✈️ Como chegar: voamos de klm para Amsterdã e pegamos um trem..📞 Nosso seguro foi o assistencia.gta e o chip easysim4u.E obrigada adorofarm por nos vestir! ☝🏻☝🏻☝🏻 E quem tiver mais dicas, deixa nos comentários !❤️.#brugge #bruges #belgica #amsterdam #viagem #ferias #travelgram #travel

Belgium 🇧🇪. Reccos for day 2, I always start my holiday mornings with a coffee run and I recommend that you try peckbxl for the amazing coffee and breakfast. Went to a liquor store and had a private gin tasting of ginchurchills bobbysdrygin #buss509 a top shelf experience 😍😍😍Tried the atelierdepates for the handmade pasta and negronis, followed by a train ride to Brugge. Beers tried- Brugse zot blonde and double, Fort Lapin 8 and fort lapin 10 a strong dark Quadrupel before returning to my fave la Chouffe. Must dos - waffles at chezalbert , a brewery tour followed by the underground bar tpoatersgat followed by cocktails and gintos at barn.brugge . Also most of the bar reccos we had were closed on Monday. Caught the last train out. Safe to say it’s easy to fall in love with the quaint #Brugge ♥️

Everything looks beautiful and there are a lot of flavours to choose from. However, we noticed that it was harder to pick up on these flavours in the actual eclairs. Given the pricetag, we were a bit dissapointed.

Balls & Glory vroeg me hoe ze mijn ervaring nog konden verbeteren. Eerst en vooral: Balls & Glory maakt iets wat ik thuis niet meteen zou kunnen: gevulde gehaktballen. Dat vind ik persoonlijk top. Meatballs in the most innovative varieties! This is great stuff and will fill your stomach in a most pleasant way. Added points for the open kitchen where you can see ( and secretly learn) how the meatballs are made. You can even buy the meatballs to prepare at home. The service is quick and you can choose to either spend 20 minutes here or an hour. Prices are fair, especially as the food is truly fresh....which is not necessarily standard in the touristy area of Brussels. This is a great place to go for a quick bit or a relaxed sit-down.
Lekker!
Muy agradable.

Concept original mais pas à mon goût. On est loin de la boulette traditionnelle belge où l'on goûte la viande. Ici on a affaire à un produit très sophistiqué. J'ai pris la boulette à l'agneau: beaucoup trop épicée. Style fast food: on a à peine le temps de s'assoir que le plat est servi. Cela sent trop le réchauffer, l'industriel, le pas fait maison!Tout le reste est positif: belle grande terrasse, serveurs sympas, carafe d'eau à table ainsi qu'une pomme à croquer avant le repas !
Muy rico, comimos dos personas por 10.50 euros. Super bien y variado, nos encantó!

BAVET 🍝🎉

Hi Rita, alvast onze excuses dat je problemen hebt ondervonden met het doorgaan van onze kaart. Onze hoofdtaal proberen wij in het Engels te houden, maar dat zou er niet voor mogen zorgen dat jullie de kaart niet verstaan. Het feit dat we enkel met de kaart aanvaarden staat volledig in het teken van onze manager ter plaatse. We willen hen beschermen van fouten, diefstal en oneerlijkheden. De mensen zouden op voorhand de communicatie moeten krijgen dat we 'Cashless' zijn, dus dat zou geen probleem mogen geven. We geloven erin dat iedereen cashless kan betalen. Alvast heel erg bedankt voor jullie feedback. We hopen dat de spaghetti alsnog gesmaakt heeft?

Брюгге. Ставим ❤️ и читаем. ⬇️⬇️⬇️Небольшой, сказочно-пряничный городок Бельгии. Город-музей и город музеев. Чистые мощеные улочки, средневековые домики и многочисленные мосты через каналы - все это одна большая достопримечательность. Мы приехали в Брюгге на поезде, поэтому старт маршрута начался с ближайшего к вокзалу Озера Любви, которое облюбовали местные лебеди. Далее мы просто гуляли, доверившись интуиции и немного карте😁Советую задержаться на площади Бург, где расположена Базилика Святой Крови Христовой. А ещё здесь прекрасные мидии в ресторане Tompouce по 22€ за огромную кастрюлю🥘 + картошка фри, куда ж без неё🍟. Если планируете пить пиво, то посетите легендарную пивоварню De Halve Maan и выпейте там Brugse Zot или Straffe Hendrik🍻🍻🍻. Ну, а если потянет на сладенькое, то в помощь фантастические вафли chezalbert 🤤В общем, в Брюгге стоит залечь на дно , однозначно👌🏻

Day 5. 布魯日來比利時的旅人必遊的三個城市，就是布魯塞爾、根特和布魯日，布魯日的遊客明顯比根特多了許多，還有長長的商店街，一不小心我們也走了好幾個小時都走不出來😂午餐選擇了網路推薦必吃了百年老店Gruuthuse Hof，午間套餐一個人只要18歐，裝潢很雅致，小小的店坐滿了客人，在我們之後進來的客人幾乎都向隅。品嚐完湯正覺得味道不錯，慶幸還好我們有早點來時，主餐卻讓我們覺得踩到巨雷😣無論是牛排還是鮭魚肉質都柴得很，味道也很普通，我想它被推薦的原因純粹是因為便宜吧，但我們不推不推🙅‍♀️歷經午餐的驚嚇，路過鬆餅名店Chez Albert趕快買個鮮奶油鬆餅來壓壓驚，雖然沒有加麻糬但吃起來口感非常Q👍2be in brugge / The Beerwall啤酒博物館有各式各樣的啤酒，讓熱愛啤酒的胖胖非常開心，興奮度大概跟我走進精品店是一樣的。晚餐打定要吃奶油淡菜，靠著評價找了好久終於選定了Bistro Brugis，吃完覺得還是布魯塞爾的Chez Leon略勝一籌呀，雖然下次吃到不知道會是何時，但蒐集完三種口味也算是沒有遺憾，唯一有遺憾的大概就是健康報告上的膽固醇指數吧😂今天入住Hotel Academie 學院飯店，四星級含早餐一晚只要3200台幣，內部看得出來也有翻修過，是我們到目前為止C/P值最高的一間，就在美麗的愛之湖公園旁，距離景點鬧區也只要步行5分鐘，非常推薦👍

Honey Chocolate with HazelnutsWhite Chocolate with PistachioDark Chocolate with Cocoa CrispsUpdating Gaufre Liege, the famous waffles made with pearl sugar found on any number of Belgian streets, may seem a fool's folly given the traditions and expectations involved, but "Handmade in Bruges...ever since" Go.fre set out with just this concept in mind when launching it's made-and-dipped-to-order Waffle on a Stick concept, and judging by lines seen over the course of three visits to the city both locals as well as tourists seem to have embraced it.In reality a very tiny storefront, the clerk isolated to a space no larger than a couple square meters where hot irons and baths of liquid chocolate flank both sides allowing him to do his duties without taking a step, Go.fre ironically lies directly across the street from old-favorite Chez Albert and with prices starting at €2.50 for a naked waffle while dipped and topped options max out at just four Euros the competition for clients is undoubtedly fierce, each offering their own downfalls and benefits.Not accounting for authenticity as relates to delivery, but every bit on par with the better places in Belgium with regard to a stretchy batter cooked just long enough to melt sugar pearls and lightly brown the top, Go.fre waffles are offered pre-made and boxed for gifting to those interested, but having tried both there is no doubt that made-to-order is the way to go for those dining with chocolate still dripping, the Miel-Chocolate a definite winner for those looking for something sweet while the Dark Chocolate is not as bitter as some, though some of this may indeed have been a result of crispy cocoa orbs that added a strong textural contrast.

The 'gourmet' burgers didn't live up to expectations.  The patty did not have much flavor, and the blue cheese simply overpowered it. It was also unevenly grilled, leaving grey patches here and there.  The bun felt dry and  flavorless. Overall, it felt like the various ingredients were doing their own thing, rather than coming together as a cohesive whole.  I hope the chefs do some work on flavor-balancing. ik ben geen pro veggie persoon, maar ik probeer graag nieuwe dingen uit dus ben afgelopen weekend eens gaan kijken what the fuss is all about...het interieur is heel mooi en simple modern meets het bos. het eten is ook aangenaam. alleen spijtig van de hoge trappen aan de inkom. kan lasting zijn voor oudere mensen of jonge koppels met een kinderwagen.er is ook een groot terras aan waar je lekker in het zonneteje kan zitten bij goed weer. alleen minder dat het personeel geen bestellingen komt opnemen maar dat je alles zelf binnen moet gaan bestellen. het eten was lekker maar wel een beetje aan de prijzige kant. porties zijn ook aan de kleine kant maar nogmaals wel super lekker.de bediening is nog een beetje onwennig, ik vermoed dat ze nieuw zijn in de horeca. maar ze hun onwennigheid maken ze meer dan goed met hun vriendelijke en snelle bediening.IMPORTANT: dit resto gaat er van uit om met de kaart te betalen, dus vermijd hier met cash te betalen mits ze niet altijd even veel wisselgeld hebben.

I have been here for dinner. The place is very nice and cozy. Good selection of beers and burgers.
Heerlijke cheesecake!
Top burger, qualité et quantité. Bravo
Was een hele fijne plek. De burgers waren ok. Ze hebben de vegan beyond burger. Persoonlijk vond ik het iets te zoete ketchup op de burger.  Maar verder helemaal prima. :)

Super vriendelijk bediening . Heel lekkere burgers !!! Als side dish een gepofte aardappel genomen . Maar smaakte naar een gewone gekookte aardappelen in de pel :-( .  Mooie inrichting . Er was ook een vegan burger . Deze probeer ik volgende x
Lekkere smaakvolle hamburgers, vriendelijk personeel, gezellig eten, hier komen we nog eens terug.

The meatlovers burger is the BOMB here. Made from minced, pulled and crumbled beef, its gets the holy trinity of burgers right - patty flavourfullness, condiments and bun integrity. Highly recommended.
Binnen 1u hadden we voorgerecht en hoofdgerecht, zaak zat thans aardig volBurger was voldoende, goede service

Ronduit slecht! Wij zaten samen met nog 4 andere tafels op het terras te wachten op bediening. Na 20 minuten nog altijd niemand gezien. Uiteindelijk is een mevrouw binnen gaan zeggen dat er 5 tafels buiten wachten op bediening. 10 minuten daarna kwam er een ober, tegen die tijd waren er al 2 tafels terug weg. Na dan nog eens 30 min wachten en een keer binnen gaan vragen of ze onze bestelling niet vergeten waren, eindelijk onze drankjes en ijsje gekregen. Schandalig!
Service excellent food cooked perfectly.  Well worth a visit.
Good house grill, nice period surrounding.
Lovely food and very friendly staff.good value for money.
Super service, Great cusine. If you like Italian food I recomended
Excellent service. Food was gorgeous. Would definitely come again.
SPAGHETTI HOUSE, dooo doo
The food and the atmosphere are great. Getting the whole order was more difficult, some things were lost between the kitchen and our table.
Lovely food and quick service too.

Overpriced mockery of Italian cuisine.I don't really understand how this place got so popular over the years. My suggestion, if you want to try authentic Italian food stay away from a place that has spaghetti meatballs on their menu.
Service was very good. We had the set menu of which the main course of chicken and asparagus was perhaps the blandest Italian  meal I have experienced. Prices reasonable given the location

We really enjoyed our meal here - our first visit to a Spaghetti House. The menu had a good range of choice with lots of dishes available in smaller portions for children (or adults wanting a lighter meal). Food was excellent. We had a lovely large table. Service was attentive but not overbearing. I ended with one of the best decaf coffees I've ever had - so hard to find good decaf. We'll definitely go back.
A perfect Sunday Lunch in a restaurant atomosphere .Everything was very very good the beef was outstanding .Great service .
Fantastic food and a lovely atmosphere. Really enjoyed 3 course set menu.
Amazing food!
Fantastic food and super fast service
Essen war Ok. Leider sehr kleine Portionen, zu meinem Caprese Salat gab es 5 Tomatenscheiben.
Great place. Lovely people the salmon was great nice place and staff
Very nice location, tasty food and a menu for everybody
Food lovely, but service was dreadful. After being ignored for 20 minutes we put our coats on and made our way to pay - amazingly the waiter finally acknowledged us! Not good 🙄
Great food ..large portions good service 😁
Staff very friendly,plates could have warmed,do as to keep food hot,had a lovely mixed grill, by the time I came to eat the steak it was only just warm.
Had to wait over an hour for the meals to be brought out. One order was wrong, another order made one person ill during the night. Would never eat there again or would recommend it to anyone.
Lovely food, which you can tell by the empty plate. 😄 Stat are helpful and friendly.
Gorgeous food, great atmosphere, will deffo be returning.

We had a company dinner here and thoroughly enjoyed our meal. The staff were fantastic and went out of their way to make sure everything was great. I had beef Wellington with the veg and asked for the steak pink even though I wouldn't normally eat it that way. It was absolutely stunning. I really enjoyed the baileys and white hot chocolate cheesecake as well. My colleagues all enjoyed their meals too.
Very Good service, fine food and bar. Very nice all round.
excellent , good service , great value 3pm to 5pm
Food was rubbish, over priced better food at Hoby horse farm.
Went on a Thursday night and the steak was fabulous,went again on the Friday was so so busy steak wasn't quite as good.Very nice staff and service was good
Very good meal ..excellent service.. lovely friendly staff.
Food delicious, service quick polite.

Nice place with easy parking at lunch time and friendly staff. Wife's mussels were not the best and her steak was overcooked. It was replaced, but overall not a great experience for her. My ribs and steak were fine but no wow factor until the bill came!

Booked for lunch yesterday as a first time visitor.  Was not disappointed at all!! The fixed price menu was super value for money.  Plenty of food on the plate and plenty of choices. The waitress Paula was very pleasant and attentive to our needs. Would definitely recommend a visit.
Lovely meal good price
Great service, fast, friendly & very attentive - and the food arrived hot and cooked to perfection. All dishes arrived at the same time so no one in my party needed to wait.Thanks for a great night.
Amazing value for the afternoon set menu, with friendly staff.
Food was amazing. Service was friendly. Really enjoyed eating here

Had lunch there yesterday,  arrived at 12 noon. Place lovely and clean, had water immediately put on table. The meal was lovely, steak done to perfection.  Only draw back service was a bit slow, could have done with more waiting staff.
great steaks, great beer what else do you want?
Good food and a nice atmosphere
Always go for the prime Middletons. All the meat for me
Went for my husband 44th birthday Never been before Great steaks excellent service Would highly recommend
Great steaks great service from our waitress she gave a great service and good banter tonight all ways love going there
Awesome
Good menu, staff excellent as was the food. would go again.
Starter - high quality, un-notified substitutionMain - average steak, good chicken, ribs very toughUnfortunately below the usually superb standard expected
Food was stunning.. 😊 Well cooked, tasty and i would go back again.. the person serving us must have not been having such a great day tho.. ☹
Absolutely perfect steaks, great service and a good atmosphere. Here with my in-laws for my BIL's birthday. Wish we had one at home.
Excellent food, service was quick and very good prices will definitely go back there.

We had a lovely meal here on Good Friday evening. We hadn't booked as it was a last minute decision, but after a couple of minutes at the bar pursuing the menu, we were escorted to our table. The food was great, though we did have to wait quite a while for it to arrive. Our server apologized and rectified the problem very quickly, and offered us a complimentary dessert as recompense. We were delighted. The food was worth waiting for, and my medium rare steak was delicious. We all enjoyed the food and will be back soon.
First night got turned away at 20:45 didn't look busy!! Went back earlier next night lovely meal good friendly service
Cannot comment on the food as we just stopped for a coffee and a snack to break a long journey but we were very well looked after by the staff and will definitely stop there again if we go that way.

Prima sera in Peterborough e subito una gran buona cena. In ottimo hamburger innaffiato da un'ottima birra. Cameriera cortese che ci ha accudito in tutto e per tutto.First night in Peterborough and first great dinner. A very good hamburger with as far as the beer. Waitress very kindly that help us in everything.
Really nice food, great value, friendly staff
Great food, had the mixed grill & way too much food but eyes are bigger than my belly. Food was brilliant & good service
overpriced for the quality that they offer..

Had a lovely lunch with friends. We often meet for a catch up here. Alll had the 3 course set menu.Theres several choices for each course,all nice & very good value for money.Service & atmosphere are very nice too.
Waitress was excellent. The food was disappointing and took ages. I've had great past experiences so this one was quite disappointing.
My daughter treated us to an Easter Sunday meal here. The food was good and the service excellent. No hesitation in recommending this place. The steaks were awesome.
It was a very nice night out. Food a bit pricey but worth it !!!!
steak cooked to perfection
Very nice food and interior

Food was excellent. Staff friendly. Would have given 5 stars but at the end of the evening the staff were more interested in talking to each other and we had trouble attracting their attention to get the bill.

The menu is extensive, i had olives bread and calamari for starters. You need this time as you wait for the steak. To be fair i ordered 12oz sirloin and was still hungry, perhaps that is me. Thus came with chips. It would have been better if the steak was presented better, it was a little dull especially if you have to wait. Service is goodDesert tasty

After the MAS some nachos with bolognese and belgian beer. Excellent choice, super friendly service!
Service agréable.
Vrai restaurant italien Belle carte de pates Le tiramisu est à tombe
Specialty coffee place; great pour over coffee - many different origins. great cakes and super comfortable couches.

The first coffee shop we found that served decaffeinated coffee, it seems to be an unusual request in Amsterdam. We also had a slice of apple pie, that was very good and the hot chocolate was, hot, another unusual event pretty much anywhere. Wi-Fi was also available so what more could you want, oh yes the sun was shining!

This coffee shop catched my eye because of provide Hario V60 filter coffee which mot commonly seen in Amsterdam, and it also pretty good. Yes, it has only a few small tables but a long one can share, everyone feel free to spend their time.
Good coffee and nice location but the staff is little grumpy.

Wanted a table for one and they didn't want to seat me claiming that there are no tables available. When I asked about the open tables outside they still said no and claimed it's cold and they don't have enough staff.
This is not a place for a real foodie. I order a finish dish and it was horrible. It was full of cracked pepper an no real seasoning other then that.

In short. My experience at this restaurant was terrible. I ordered a hamburger and they did not ask how to cook it and gave it well done and burnt. It tasted like cardboard. Also, the waiter was annoyed when we asked for another bottle of water. The waiter was rude and talked to us as if we were ignorant. The dessert was good, but the restaurant was not.
If you are looking for an Italian pizzeria, please do not go there. Restaurant is run by romanians not italians. Prices are exaggerated, 12£ for a micro pizza is much to much.
Environment ok, too few staff, no one ever answers us, the food was very slow, and it taste just soso.
Trendy zaak, heel aardige bediening en lekkere koffie.
Geweldige plek om te ontstressen. Aardige en behulpzame kelners. Lekkere hapjes.
Hele fijne plek, alles klopt. Fijne correcte bediening, goede koffie en mooie karakteristieke inrichting.

Wij hadden aangegeven iets te willen eten en drinken. Toen de drankjes kwamen kreeg ik een kapot glas. Na een kwartier te hebben gewacht, hebben we de serveerster gevraagd of het normaal was dat we zelf om eten moesten vragen. Gastronomie betekent toch dat het personeel dit aanbiedt ? Toen we wilden afrekenen bleek het pinapparaat niet te werken. Er loopt genoeg personeel rond, maar die weten absoluut niet wat ze moeten doen. Een AFrader!
We had a lovely breakfast at the outdoor seating for a reasonable price. We both had the classic breakfast that had everything you would need.

Updated 22 April 2019: 3 starService has become abysmal.  We arrived for lunch at 2.00pm, a waitress came by to ask for our drink order, after which we were promptly forgotten. We didn't receive the menu, and so we moved to a different table with menus. We waited another 20 minutes for someone to take our order, trying to catch the attention of the lone waitress who was busy behind the bar. We were unsuccessful - we couldn't even place an order. This is the second instance of less than ideal service here, and this time, the experience was downright terrible. Do not recommend this anymore.Updated 9 November 2018: 4 starThe experience this afternoon was a lot less impressive compared to last time - the ratings have been downgraded accordingly. Our lunch order of two sandwiches took an impressively long time. The quality of the old cheese sandwich (which we also had last time) was sub-par. The sandwich was dry, missed the attention to detail and flavour that had left us impressed the last time. Our server made a mistake with our order (we received a flat white instead of a double macchiato - not the same thing), but tried to serve it anyway saying they were pretty much the same thing. They obliged and corrected the mistake when we made it clear that it was not what we had ordered. This is still a good cafe, however, not as exceptional as the first time around.Original review August 2018: 5 starLovely cafe, wonderful cosy interiors, delightful menu, one can tell that a lot of thought has gone into the food, delicious! Very friendly staff. Would go here again and again.

Altijd vriendelijk personeel, als je ernaar vraagt kunnen broodjes ook to go meegenomen worden. De koffie is bijzonder goed. Broodjes zijn wat aan de prijzige kant, maar er kan goed rekening worden gehouden met allergieën. Toiletten kunnen echt wel wat beter schoongehouden worden.
Best breakfast in Hilversum.
Scheltema heeft de mooiste boekenwinkel van NL en een hele fijne lunch cq koffietent. Bediening is goed en vriendelijk.

Bediend door een puisterige puber die van de hoed noch de rand weet. En dat terwijl het logo van Vascobelo een bolhoed is! Ook van koffie heeft het personeel geen kaas gegeten en dat terwijl ze prat gaan op hun koffieprut. Vragen naar een smaak die gewoon op de kaart staat, doet een vraagteken boven het hoofd van de bediening rijsen. Een persoon in de bediening, een die zich ontfermt over de broodjes en een die de drankjes laat druppelen. Je zou toch zeggen dat met een dergelijke taakverdeling een bestelling niet lang op zich laat wachten? Zeker niet met zo'n korte kaart. Maar de bestelling laat wel lang op zich wachten. Het opnemen van de bestelling vergt alleen al geduld. Misschien dat de lokatie, in boekhandel Scheltema, hieraan bijdraagt? Je kunt een heel oeuvre lezen voordat je bediend bent. Voor een tweede opname moet je zelf naar de bar, want de Belgische attentheid is niet meegekomen naar Amsterdam. De kwaliteit daarentegen, is wel de grens overgekomen want het brood is lekker. Uitgezonderd de croissantjes die verveeld op de counter liggen te wachten op een paar tandjes. Ook de taart is aantasting waard maar die wordt dan ook door een bekende banketbakker uit de Utrechtsestraat gebakken. Alleen betaal je er bij Vascobelo ruim twee maal zo veel voor. Komt vast door de dure bediening. Of de Belgische btw.
Erg smaakvol en hoge kwaliteit. Bediening arrogant en we moesten erg lang wachten op ons eten.
Amazing food and great service
The service was super fast and polite. The food was well prepared and good and te prives were very fair. Would definitely recommend it and go again
Chicken served in different ways. Good price. Creative use of space with double decked seating and scaffold poles!
Great atmosphere! Can't believe how busy they were for a Tuesday evening.  Steak was good, ribs were dry, not the best bbq sauce.  Food was ok, gin was good!  Worth a trip to try ..

A nice bar with a relaxed atmosphere. The design, alongside the food makes it a great place to visit. The food is tasty at a reasonable price. Although I am not sure whether vegetarian dishes are available, it's definitely a great place to visit if you are a meat lover. I'll definitely return there in the future!
Super!!!They also have vegan and vegetarian choice!!Perfect service!Kindest people.
Food fantastic. Company was appalling but not there fault.  I will be definitely going back.
Cadre original en rapport avec le nom.Bon rapport qualité prix
Great chicken for a fair price.
Zeer onbeleefd personeel, ze willen je zo snel mogelijk buiten.
super service et super bon
Superrrrrr lekkere kip , frietjes , mosterdmayo en koolsla jammieeee 👍🏻😉
Leuk concept en lekker eten. Het personeel is mega vriendelijk, heb gemerkt en gezien dat niets teveel is voor deze top crew. I just want to say we will be back soon!!!
Mmm lekker gegeten Sappig kipfiletje met kroketjes pepersaus en een dame blanche voor dessert
Prima service. Speciale goede kip met smaak!

We went with the family and took a friend of our daughter with us. Everyone found something to their liking (which is not a given ;) ).  We had some tacos, some chicken breast, some salad, some ... and it was all very tasty and brought to the table by very kind staff.

Great service. Good bier selection. Atmosphere/decor was nice and updated. They were playing some sweet 80's music (lol...go Europe!). Accommodating to people with young children. Fries and chicken were delicious. We were in Ghent 2 1/2 days. We ate/drank out 7 times. Came here twice..it was that good!
De nuggets zijn heerlijk !!Ze hebben geen nuggets als hoofdgerecht ... daarom: DE KIPPENBURGER. Nuggets tussen 2 buns met cowlsla + de overheerlijke speciale saus. Top!
Good food and service
Amazing
Perfect service and great food. Will definitely be returning
Nice place. Good food - if a touch pricey.Wine is very pricey for what you get.
Nice
Hmmmm! Super! 😋 genieten!

Zeer lekker en het speelhoekje voor de kids is een super idee. Mijn meisjes en ik zijn fan van de heerlijke hamburgers!
Niet alleen de burgers, maar ook het personeel waren een streling voor het oog.
Mooie locatie, verzorgde dranken, uitgebreide eetkaart.
Zeker geen 15€ waard. Amai, ga eens bij de concurrenten eten zal goedkoper en lekkerder zijn.
Aangenaam decor, veel keuze qua kwalitatieve hamburgers met lekkere frietjes en fris slaatje, toffe bier pairing en fijne bediening

Burger très bon, mais la salade en accompagnement du burger est à la pomme et céleri (pas très bonne). Le service est a revoir, 50 min d'attente pour être servi après avoir passé la commande, d'autre personne ont attendu plus de 1h .. serveusE pas du tout sociable, et tenue inaproppriée (mini-mini short), pour les serveurs services au top et bien trilingue
Veel te lang wachten en te weinig personeel op Paaswknd.
Service terrible. Waiters and waitresses keep getting wrong orders and ask you to wait for ages. Not recommended.
Héél lekker, vriendelijke medewerkers, originele concept & gezellig. I loved it!
Gezellig interieur, vriendelijke bediening en last but not least.... superl lekkere burgers 😍

I am not sure what I feel about this place. I had chicken sandwich and my husband got a burger with fries on the side. Both of them was super dry. Fries were not the best ones. Soft and greasy. I liked the way they serve the sandwich tho (see the pic). The cole slaw was quite delicious. Our server was very nice. But at the end would I ever go there again? Not sure. One burger, one chicken sandwich, two beers cost around 45 €. I think I can find better food in Gent for that price.
Tasty bread and sauce, but the meat was too thin and dry.
Lekkere hamburgers! Perfect combineerbaar met cinema (mits je besteld ten laatste om 18h30 voor film om 19h45) ze maken ook gebruik van combinaties/suggesties van goede bieren met hun hamburgers!
Rico pero caro ,teniendo en cuenta q son hamburguesa o una ensalada más 1 bebida 22 €
Als je houd van lekkere burgers en dit in zeer leuk pand zeker een aanrader!!
Lekkere burgers met een matching biertje erbij. Steeds leuk om na lange tijd eens terug te komen en het blijft even lekker.

Super leuke restaurantje met hele vriendelijke bediening. Heel fijn concept. Ook het eten was tip top. Echt een aanrader!!
Pricey but good

Terrible.  We went there last Sunday.  The roast was appalling with chewy and fatty beef.  There was also hardly any beef on the plate.  The vegetables were appalling.  Overcooked and cold.  The chef stood in the entrance to the kitchen with filthy trousers on.  I had calamari and a waldorf salad.  The waldorf salad had one grape in it cut in half and two tiny slices of apple and no nuts - funny sort of waldorf.  My whole meal was bland and tasteless.  The service was slow and when we did get someone at our table they were very condescending.  We would not put a foot in the place again.  Absolutely appalling.
Lovely meal in a great atmosphere. Waiter was extremely helpful.
Good food, nice staff. I had my little one with me and they have been very nice providing me some hot water to warm the milk and they have a changing table as well.

I’ve been a long time fan of Middleton’s, but have come in tonight to celebrate a special occasion and have had hands down the worst dining experience of my adult life. Ignoring the various problems my friends have had with their orders: We pre-ordered and it’s still taken 3 hours for 2 courses to be put in front of me; my steak was over cooked, the wedges undercooked and the asparagus was poorly prepared with the woody, inedible part of the stems being served.Sorry to say I really don’t think I’ll be back.

A fair option for a mid-priced meal but pretty much as you'd expect for a chain restaurant in a central location. The staff are reasonably friendly but nothing above and beyond - the menu is nice but nothing exceptional. I had the vongole, which was fairly tasty, but had some spectacular small clams and nothing to really write home about. Fine in a pinch, but ultimately falls closer to tourist fodder, and there are plenty of better options round.

5 star food, 1 star service.The food was absolutely amazing. Truly.  I don't want to over-hype it, but my wife and I both thought the food was fabulous.  We ate before seeing Phantom just next door. Simply delicious.Now...the negatives.  Worst service I have come across in a long time. The front manager seemed friendly enough, and the man who brought out the food was pleasant as well, but our waiter, Jorge, was the rudest person I've met in the whole of London.  He went out of his way to actually ignore us and treat us poorly.  This is not a miscommunication or a misunderstanding.  Maybe he was just having a bad night, but wow- I honestly can't think of a time when I've had a worse server.  He single-handedly turned an easy 5-star review into a 3 star.

We visited for lunch on Monday, we ordered a Mocktail (nojito) and a Peroni from a lovely older gentleman who was serving us, I even pointed at the nojito and he nodded saying a ‘non alcoholic mojito’. We ordered our food and enjoyed it even though it was a long wait between servings and the restaurant lacked staff. As I carried on drinking my Mocktail  I started to feel very nauseous. The reason why I ordered the Mocktail and not the alcoholic cocktail was due to being on a course of antibiotics that would react with any alcohol. Upon receiving the bill we were charged for a cocktail, once I raised my concerns with the older gentleman who served us, he looked at me in petty, put his hand on my shoulder and asked ‘ Do you feel ok though’ I was shocked and appalled for two reasons, one for being served something different to what I had ordered and two for the waiters behaviour when I highlighted the issue, I explained that I only wanted a Mocktail as I couldn’t drink and all he said was ''sorry, I will buy you a drink next time''. We were shocked and disappointed at the lack of professionalism and his attitude when it came to dealing with this situation. I have dined at Middleton's many of times but have never been in such a situation, I suffered severe sickness for two days to due being served something I did not order, and wish that both your staff and waitress could take greater care in such situations in the future. I will not be returning to the restaurant in the future as this has been a very disappointing experience.

I don’t know where to start. I have never before taken time out to write a review or complaint about an establishment but me and my partner’s experience definitely warrants one. We pre booked our table over the phone for 7:30pm on Saturday 2nd March 2019, being our anniversary.We arrived on time but were asked to wait at the bar whilst our table was being prepared.After 30 minutes we were seated with no apology. Once seated it seemed to take forever and a day for somebody to tend to us. When somebody finally came we order a bottle of Rioja. Unfortunately, the waiter who took the order must have fell of the face of the earth as this order did not arrive.Only after a further 30 minutes when my partner went to the bar in search for our drinks order, was a different waiter sent over to be reminded of what it was we ordered. Still, with no urgency from the staff we finally got our bottle only to be served along side 2 gin glasses to drink it from. We were told they had ran out of wine glasses only for the table directly next to us to be served a bottle of white wine, with wine glasses less than 5 minutes later. After one hour since arrival we were more than ready to order our food. We ordered mussels to share as a starter, I ordered a fillet medallion with dauphinois, mixed greens and a side of peppercorn sauce for my main.My partner ordered the vegetarian mushroom wellington with dauphinois and mixed greens also, for her main.We waited a further HOUR for our starter to arrive after asking staff multiple times when it might arrive. When it did arrive it was lovely. By this time I decided to time how long it would take for our mains to appear, we waited a further 90 minutes for this to happen. When they finally started to arrive my partners well done and over cooked mushroom wellington came out 5 minutes before my own main, which came with a side of chips rather than dauphinois and without peppercorn sauce. After sending it back to be corrected I finally got what I ordered, along side barely warm peppercorn sauce. All in this time my partner had almost finished her plate due to being so hungry. We ate our mains separately and with water as our wine had by this time long gone and didn’t want the hassle of ordering anything else! By the time we had finished our mains the kitchen had turned all lights off and the chef had left the building on his phone. We were near enough the last party in the restaurant. Once we had finished our plates very clearly unhappy, a waiter approached us with a half hearted apology and explained how they were in the middle of changing their team, which of course had nothing to do with us. All of this time the staff had no urgency toward us and seemed all over the place. It was almost offensive that on our anniversary night we were experiencing such a nightmare whilst staff were leaning against the bar chatting, we even saw 2 members of staff massaging each other’s shoulders and at one point a waitress twerked whilst waiting for food to deliver to her table. We had booked our table for the specific time of 7:30pm so as we could enjoy our night beyond our meal and go to a few bars. We left the restaurant at 11:30pm with our night completely ruined and in no mood to continue our night resulting in a taxi straight home. With our career’s and my partner being from Leeds and myself being from Leicester, we consider our time together very sacred. So to have such a disastrous night on our anniversary was very unsettling and upsetting.Overall, a total of 4 hours spent here that night, a catalog of errors and a disaster from start to finish! I feel as though my seven paragraphs do not mirror and stress the horrors we experienced that evening. We will most certainly avoid dining here ever again and I can’t stress how much everyone reading this should do the same. Especially if it is a special occasion! Avoid avoid avoid!

OK place for a quick stop for lunch. The vegan options is the beyond burger. The staff was not sure if the dip sauce was vegan. Ask for vegan mayo. It's not that good. We walked in last minute just before they closed the doors. Staff welcomed us with smiles. My wife ordered the vegan burger. My best friends and I ordered beef burgers. Food was on point and delicious. Staff was attentive even last minute. Atmosphere very New York. Clean place. You won't be disappointed.
Eten ok, maar slechte prijs kwaliteit verhouding.

We came in around 8 pm on a Friday and the host greeted us. We don't speak french very well, but he spoke English so it worked out great! We got our food to go and it only took about 10 minutes. We got back to our air bnb and couldn't believe our eyes at how big the burgers were! They tasted great, and the fries were good too. Would highly recommend!

Je met une étoile parce que je ne peux pas mettre moins. Je vais quand même remercié la gentillesse du personnel et c'est bien le seul point positif de cet endroit. Encore une chaîne de restaurant qui tente de faire des Burgers donc pourquoi pas. Mais proposer des Burgers aussi cher et faire payer en plus si on veut des frites avec c'est déjà exagéré. Mais les Burgers que nous avons mangés (et pas terminé) étaient digne de restauration de groupe. Donc quand on veut faire de la restauration de groupe on pratique les mêmes tarifs. Ce Burger ne valait pas 15 euros mais 5 tout au plus. Je déconseille donc fortement l'endroit à part pour passer dire bonjour au personnel très sympathique.

La décoration est sympathique, restaurant situé dans le centre, facile à trouver. Etant allé un dimanche midi, il y avait du monde mais on a eu la chance d'arriver au bon moment et avoir une table. Le personnel est serviable avec une tranche d'âge jeune, donc du dynamisme! Il y a un large choix dans la carte pour tous les goûts (même végétariens et 100% vegan, qui sont délicieux). Le service est rapide, les plats sont bons, rapport qualité-prix correct. Seul petit bémol la proximité des tables pour deux personnes, on entend toutes les conversations à côté et très peu d'intimité...Je recommande pour un bon burger!

📍Bruges - chezalbert🍴: Pause gourmande avec des gaufres, du chocolat maison et des fraises fraîches !! 🤤#bruges #bruges🇧🇪 #brugges #gaufres #pausegourmande #brugesbelgium #belgique #belgium #belgique #belgiumwaffles #bruggebelgium #igbrugge #visitbrugge #brügge #visitbruges #wafflefood #toast #thatstoastbruges #waffle #healthy #mangersainement #bienmanger #mangeravecplaisir #welovechezalbert #chezalbert
What’s a trip to one of the capital cities of chocolate without a daily dose of it 😋🍫Photocred to jessicalipkin 👏🏼👏🏼👏🏼

25 de abril de 2019 | 8:40 pm.⠀⠀⠀uma das coisas mais linda que pude ver e viver, durante minha viagem, um presente de despedida que me foi dado: pôr do sol refletindo sob a igreja, prova de que Deus está presente em tudo ✨⠀⠀⠀por que Bruges e não Bruxelas? da onde você tirou esse lugar? você quis dizer ‘Bruxelas’, né? foram algumas das indagações que eu recebi quando decidi ir para Bruges (ao invés de Bruxelas, a capital da Bélgica)... eu lembro de estar vagando pelo pinterest (lugar onde eu mais procrastino, entro lá pra procurar uma referência, quando vejo estou imersa em um milhão de coisas, rs 🤦🏽‍♀️), então eu vi uma foto da cidade fiquei encantada pelo estilo medieval, comecei a pesquisar e fui deixando tudo salvo, porquê um dia eu iria SIM... aí no ano passado a nanaths (ilustradora maravilhosíssima e 0 defeitos) fez uma #eurotour GRANDIOSA (em out/18, salvo engano), e adivinhem? ela foi pra Bruges e eu surtei, e aflorou ainda mais minha vontade, mas tudo no seu tempo, porquê eu ainda não sabia da minha viagem, então era um sonho pra daqui uns anos... o que eu eu não sabia é que, em breve, esse sonho seria real, graças aos meus tios e então, recebi a notícia da viagem e aí eu surtei real, porquê eu não tinha N A D A planejado, então eu comecei a trabalhar no roteiro que já estava pronto, porém guardado (mas logo vou ter que voltar, porquê ficaram alguns lugares pra segundo plano Kkkkkk) e deu tão certo, que não me arrependo de escolher essa cidade incrível! ✨⠀⠀⠀Bruges é uma cidade belga, capital da província de Flandres Ocidental, na região de Flandres e é também conhecida como a ‘Veneza do Norte’, por conta de seus inúmeros canais e no último ano recebeu 8 milhões de turistas, cês têm noção? você pode não ter ouvido falar de Bruges ainda, mas garanto que quem conhece/ouve sobre essa cidade, fica encantado... é inevitável! 💚⠀⠀⠀#Brugge #Belgium #EuropeTour #GirlTraveller #Wanderlust #Overposting 🗺🎒

Ben je in Brugge, en heb je zin in een superlekkere ‘waffle on a stick’?Ga dan zeker eens langs bij Go.fre!👌🏼Dankzij Go.fre mochten wij op teamweekend in Brugge genieten van een lekkere verse wafel met een ‘touch’. Welke soort chocolade, en welke topping? Dat kies je helemaal zelf! Je hebt keuze uit maar liefst 6 soorten chocolade en 25 verschillende soorten toppings.Of wil je iemand verrassen met een lekkere wafel? Dat kan ook! Er is ook énorm veel keuze tussen de kant-en-klare wafeltjes. Als je het aan mij vraagt...zéker een aanrader!😋Lotte😺

Had an awful meal last night. There were 4 of us. The 2 men had mixed grills, and were dry, overcooked and barely warm. Myself and my friend had the 10oz rump steaks. Both of us asked for medium rare. When they came, the steaks were both overcooked and the meals were cold. We sent them back. The men decided to keep their meals. When our replacement meals came, my friend had a fresh steak, and although not medium rare, she decided it would be ok. Mine however, was her original steak, that still had the small piece missing that she had cut off when it came out the first time! How your chef could have possibly thought that this was acceptable amazes me. Firstly to give me somebody else's returned food, and secondly to send me back a reheated steak that was overcooked in the first place. Obviously this was sent back, and l had to wait for another meal. By the time it came (and the steak was still medium and not medium rare) the others had finished their meals. I gave some of my steak to my husband, as it was tough and l couldn't eat it. They did take my meal off the bill, but l still find this to be awful service. We have eaten in your restaurant before and had lovely meals, so it will not put us off coming again, but if this had have been our first time, we would definitely not be back!

Hey Guys ! 😋We have been to Brussels several times and we love this place! And of course we love their French fries 🍟 and typical beer 🍻 ! We found one place very nice with a crazy cool crew that does amazing pasta combo !! And they have everything gluten free on request. It's call bavet_spaghetti 😍😍 It's situated in Place Saint Catherine and also in Rue de bailli ! Choose the closest for you 🙂Let's talk about their crazy menu: if you want to eat in, there are their signature pasta dish that you will discover by yourself 😉, they also have crazy vegetarian one called " OMG they killed Kenny!" With creamy tomato sauce 🍅 with thyme and mushrooms 🍄! Finaly , and the best for me was that I could choooose my pasta !! Anything I wanted 😍😎 For gluten free pasta 🍝 you have to add 1,5€ which is really raisonnable and the toppings are between 1 to 3 euros... You know what .... ?? all dishes are served with free cheese 🤤Send us pictures of your pasta that you eat at the restaurant or that you took away to eat in front of a nice movie 🎥 Don't forget, travel, eat & enjoy 🍦 ....#glutenfreebrussels #glutenfreebruxelles #bruxelles #brussels #glutenfreepasta #glutenfreelife #glutenfreerecipes #glutenfreerecipe #glutenfreefoods #glutenfreefood #glutenfreevegan #glutenfreepastarecipe #glutenfreemeals #glutenfreelunch #glutenfreediner #vegan #veganfood #vegetarianpasta #veganpasta

Het is niet leuk om je onzichtbaar te voelen. De zaak was maar half vol. Hoe hard we ook ons best deden om de aandacht van de 3 dames in de bediening te trekken, ze liepen ons telkens zonder te kijken voorbij. Alleen bij binnenkomst werden we opgemerkt. Bij elk drankje of gerecht dat we wilden bestellen, zijn we maar naar de bar gelopen. Erg onprettig om in gezelschap telkens bezig te moeten zijn met pogingen om iets te bestellen. Hoewel de pizza's prima zijn, gaan we volgende keer elders eten!

Det här med att ”det går snabbare att köpa med mat ute påväg hem” är inte applicerbart på matnördarna som älskar att ta bilder på allt de äter. Det kan jag bekräfta. Att laga mat hemma: max 10 min om jag vill att det ska gå fort (plus 10 min att handla). Köpa mat ute: 10 mins promenad till ställe, beställ, betala, ta hem det, lägga det på en fin tallrik, hålla upp vinet och lägga dit en fin blomma för syns skull. Sen välja och redigera bild för #IGflödet. Ja vi snackar 40 minuter. 🥳✨ Men jag vet ju att den här salladen från paniniinternazionale och levainbrödet från vetekatten är värt det! Trevlig kväll allihopa. 💚

Okunnig och otrevlig personal. Frågade om salladen var glutenfri, hon visste inte utan måste fråga en kollega. Blev inte erbjuden bröd till, så jag måste be om det. Hon tar då det glutenfria brödet med en mjölig tång. Jag frågar då om tången även används till annat bröd. Får då ett surt svar att de bara har en tång. Jag talar då om det då blir mjöl på det glutenfria brödet. Jag lämnar tillbaka brödet och går.Ni måste informera er personal om gluten och hur viktigt det är att det inte blir mjöl på ex det glutenfria brödet. Gärna ett trevligt bemötande också!

We most certainly won’t ever be going back

Excellent value at 9.95 for a 3 course meal from the set menu! Portion sizes aren't huge although it was the perfect amount for me! Very tasty food. The Minute Steak was served with fries and (optional) peppered sauce. The peppered sauce was lovely and creamy. A great compliment to the steak. The desserts were also nice. The servers were also attentive and supplied us with condiments quickly. There is a great selection of food being offered, so something for everyone. Would recommend to someone looking for good tasting food and value for money.

Definitely balls that you want in your mouth.  ...Good, sizeable meatballs (just get one).  They had a chicken, pork and veggie option, and we tried the first two.  Very tasty, and they were filled with gravy!  (Did not expect that. Side  salad and stoemp were good as well, and place was nice and clean, quiet, hipstery/minimalist.  Free lemon water and fruit (apples while we were there) on the table.  What a great place for a quick and reasonably convenient lunch break without being stuck in the heart of tourist epicenter. ...at least while we were there in mid-April.   Bathrooms were clean as well, a bit tight, serviceable.

I came here for dinner one night and had a fantastic experience! This restaurant is super clean, modern and minimalist. They have an inside seating area and some tables outside as well. The staff immediately greeted us and were super friendly. They were very accommodating with my husband's garlic and onion allergy and he was so happy that he could have something here. For dinner, I opted for the classic pork ball served on top of an arugula  salad with tomatoes and cheese with a light dressing. I also had the lemonade of the day which was so refreshing! The pork ball was unlike anything I have ever tasted before. The outside was crispy without being greasy and the inside was a delicious, savory, cheesy bundle of joy. A ball and side to eat in was 14.50 Euro, so slightly pricey but not too bad for the city and the quality is great. Overall, great food, decent prices, friendly staff, clean/modern ambiance and great location!

Essen war gut, da gibt es nichts zu meckern.Einen Stern Abzug gab es dafür, das wir zunächst weg geschickt wurden weil es angeblich zu voll ist. Obwohl Tische frei waren. Auf Nachfrage konnten wir dann ca. 20 Minuten warten und dann einen Tisch bekommen. Dabei war das Personal etwas unhöflich.

Na een half uur wachten zijn we de serveuse zelf maar gaan zoeken om te mogen bestellen. In een groep van 8 man zijn er maar 3 verschillende types burgers besteld, dus het is niet dat we een moeilijke groep waren.  Toch zijn jullie er in geslaagd om 1 persoon zijn burger kompleet te vergeten. Dan zou je minstens toch een sorry verwachten. Integendeel, de vergeten burger werd op tafel gesmeten. De extra frietjes die we besteld hadden hebben we helemaal nooit gekregen. Hetzelfde geld als je een glas vraagt voor je drankje...Dan zijn we nog zo lomp geweest om dessert te bestellen: 3 moelleux. Dit blijkt voorverpakte diepvriesbrol te zijn...en 1 er van is zelfs nog steenhard bevroren. Wederom geen sorry of zo hoor, gewoon weer op tafel smijten enkele minuten later. En de moelleux is nog steeds koud. Het paste wel bij de muntthee met rotte muntblaadjes natuurlijk...Ik weet terug waarom ik hier al jaren niet meer kom...
En lekkere burger, lekkere frieten, maar jammer dat we de bestelde salade nooit hebben ontvangen...

We just had some beers when we decided we needed some food. Suddenly we saw 'Beers and Burgers', so that was perfect. From te moment we decided we needed beers and burgers, strange things happened.... This restaurant has it's own beer: 'Rostekop' (redhead). Every redhead gets a little present, a free 'Rostekop' beer. Also, my name is Lucienne and there were 2 dishes with versions of my name: the 'Sweet Lucy' and the 'Lucky Luciano'. My last name is Van Os ('From Ox') and what was on the wall... A head of an ox! This is what they call 'destiny'. However, I had the 'Hot Gillian' burger, and it was delicious. The Rostekop beer wasn't that tasty though.
Amazing burgers, service was good, massive selection of beers. Would highly recommended

Het perfecte voorbeeld van 0,0% klantvriendelijkheid. Cash only, prima. Maar wanneer er door een fout van eigen personeel te veel gepind wordt door de klant, wordt beloofd het terug over te maken via de bank (de dag erna), omdat er niet terug gepind kan worden. Ik heb het geld nooit meer terug gezien (ook niet na meermaals mailen naar de klantenservice). Echt pure diefstal dus. Ik raad de buren met de gouden poorten aan. Daar is de klant meer koning dan hier.

’niet aanraden’ is een groot woord. Maar enkele dingen zouden beter kunnen: Heb hier een lekkere vegan burger gegeten (super dat ze die opties aanbieden). Als dessert bestelde ik ‘vegan appeltaart’ en mijn vriend een chocomousse. Eerst waren ze de bestelling vergeten.Na achter de bestelling te vragen kwam mijn appeltaart: MET IJS erbij?! Dit stond niet op het menu? Lekker dacht ik! Argwanend nam ik een klein hapje van het ijs: ja, het was roomijs van koemelk, dat proef je meteen. Dit leg je toch niet bij een stuk VEGAN appeltaart??? Na lang twijfelen sprak ik er toch een ober over aan om te vragen of het ijs ook vegan was. Vluchtig antwoord: ja goh het is erg druk, ik weet natuurlijk niet uit welke bak ze jouw ijs geschept hebben... Ik vraag: Oh hebben jullie ook vegan ijs dan? Hij twijfelend en niet overtuigend: ‘euh... ja ...’ . Hij stelde voor om een nieuw stuk appeltaart te geven (zonder ijs), maar dat was ook niet nodig. Er staat nergens op de kaart dat ze ijsjes hebben, dus zou me verwonderen dat ze voor vegans een bak soja ijs hebben om bij de vegan appeltaart te geven (wat niet op de kaart staat). Als dat wel zo zou zijn: super! Mijn ijs was 100% geen soja ijs, maar echt roomijs. Jammer dat hier niet over nagedacht werd en de ober niet goed wist wat te doen/antwoorden bij mijn vraag ‘want het is heel druk’. Dat het druk is, is geen argument. Na nogmaals naar de chocomousse te vragen kwam deze er ook aan. Argument ‘het is erg druk’ + heb deze zelf uitgeschept/gehaald in de keuken voor je’.

The location of this restaurant is great. As I was attending Phantom at the theatre next door I decided to pop in for a bite before the show began. Atmosphere: a great atmosphere, very romantic. It gives off the vibe of an upscale eatery. I enjoyed the dim lights and candle lit tables. Service: Service was good. We were seated right away (though they prefer you have a reservation. We were able to be seated upon walking in. Food came out fast and our waiter was attentive. Food: This is where the restaurant was lacking. It did not tase very authentic. I got spaghetti with meatballs. The meatballs were very dry and burnt on the opt smile the pasta was undercooked and poorly seasoned sauce. I was not a fan of their pasta least to say. The garlic bread was great though! I highly recommend it if you decide to come. Overall this was a convenient dining experience, though I wouldn't recommend their food.

Fantastic place for vegans and anyone looking for a tasty and filling meal. A place we will go back to during our trip and make time for in the future.As a vegan my family (wife + toddler) is always on the lookout for good food with more choice than a single dish. And when we find a place like Greenway with the entire menu being vegan, you have hit a jackpot.The food from here is great, we had the black bean burger, Thai curry with rice and their souo of the day. The burger is a must have and their Thai curry was delicious. My toddler drank up the soup in no time and wanted more. Their vegetable and fruit juice was good and they have plenty of dessert options.On top of this, the service is excellent! Very courteous staff/owners. When my toddler threw a tantrum, she was given toys that had her mesmerized and us relieved. It was most unexpected and we were pleasantly surprised.I would highly recommend visiting this place if you are a vegan or not. Great food, fabulous service and convenient location.

bavet_spaghetti Ixelles gets the real. deal in original design. While Bavet’s spaghetti meals may be loved for their familiarity, no two Bavet restaurants should look – or feel - the same. Bearing this in mind, real. space agency developed a truly unique interior and exterior for Bavet Ixelles. Take a seat and try to discover its varioussources of inspiration. Yes, an American diner is certainly one of them, with the neon fork, the diner booths and the takeaway window as clear hints.  However, you may also think of a classic butchery, as that is exactly what this location used to be. The steel plates on the façade, the plastic strip curtain, butchery-styled tiles, glasswork in the ceiling (Pulp Fiction-themed for the occasion) … are real giveaways in this regard. All of this is completed with some quirky, surreal elements, like a ‘red sauce’ floor, partially overpainted picture frames and café benches with engraved spaghetti patterns.  The whole concept is approved by Ixelles-born Audrey Hepburn, who overlooks the restaurant as its muse and patroness. And you can’t argue with Holly Golightly, right? #bavet #interiordetails #brussels #facade #americandinner #butcher #hospitalitydesign #brussels #ixelles #spaghettirestaurant #spaghetti #spaghettiforfriends #rawmaterials #art #restaurant #restaurant #redsauce #audreyhepburn #pulpfictionthanks wonka.photography for the photos

Located inside a food court in ORD Terminal 3. Got the buffalo chicken burrito bowl for dinner before my flight to LAX. Food seemed relatively healthy, but coming from California it was nowhere near the amazing burrito bowls you get here.
I was looking for a quick, fresh and light bite before my long flight. The salad I got was perfect! Good selection and fresh ingredients.

Just got the low carb bowl plus veggies. The chicken is super flavorful and I like the spring mix salad. The only downside to this place is that charge so many extras for items other than guac. For instance, if you want rice with that salad: extra. Veggies: extra. Quinoa: extra. Basically anything that isn't listed in the entree description is gonna turn that basic sounding/tasting $9 bowl into a $13 bowl.

Best place to grab food in O'Hare, there's a reason why the line is always long and full of airline staff lol.If you're keto they have a great option called the "low-carburrito"Only complaint is that they no longer serve the breakfast low-carb scramble, but the crew is friendly and always make me something that best resembles the old menu item which I appreciate.

This gets a 2 since it is in an airport and I expect bad food. The care of making the food and ingredients was relatively good in my burrito. I had the veggie veggie. However, try to find the salt shaker. There was no salt at all in the beans. No salt in the sautéed veggies. No salt in the other veggies. No salt in the rice. No salt in the salsa. If I had ordered a meat dish, it may well have been inedible. Taste your food!!!

My flight was delayed so I had the opportunity to grab lunch at the airport.  I saw pilots in line for Burrito Beach so I figured the food had to be good.  I ordered the Lo Carburrito (baby greens, grilled chicken, cheese, salsa, guac) and it was delicious. It had a little spice, and tasted very fresh.  I highly recommend!
Very fast easy and fresh fair prices! Good quality and friendly service! Lots of ingredients to choice from and it was nice to have a healthy meal and not have to pay 3 times the price!

Waiting for 15 minutes and my shrimp burrito was still not being made then I was told that I would have to wait another 15 minutes for the vegetables to be cooked firstI asked for a refund, the cashier ignored me and proceeded to ring up the next person then processed my refund with no apology, no response.

Fresh and tasty at a reasonable price for an airport. It has a long line because it is worth waiting for. Both burritos and bowls as well as tacos. For burritos, choose between a flour, whole wheat or spinach tortilla. 2 kinds of chicken, Chipotle marinated or Buffalo, o had the former. Excellent value got a major airport for court.

This time around I had a 5 star experience.. legit was happier to order.. I got a burrito this time and it tasted 10x better than it normally would because it was free thanks to the ppl at Dos Toros listening to my complaint on their other location. They gave me a cool card that allowed me a free meal. Aside from it being free the service was extremely better.. now I can give it the credit it should get... I know last time I said I wouldn't come back but they made up for that visit.. I'd gladly return... (Coronas are only $5 here too sooooooo... yeah, I'll be back)

These burritos were a generous size. I ordered the Cabo shrimp burrito. While the burrito was hefty and full of rice, beans and whatever else I added, I found myself wishing there was more meat. A combo burrito might have been nice instead. They do warn you of the 4 minute wait to grill up the shrimp, and it was still a very quick turnaround to get my food. My tortilla held together well with only a little bit of dripping. The foil wrapper kept it all from spilling all over me. I would make sure you're ready with what you want to order. They didn't really ask me what kind of tortilla I wanted, so I got the regular instead of the wheat. Then they started calling out several choices very quickly, so be ready to make several fast decisions so you don't feel the pressure of holding up the line. Also make sure to tell them what you want even if they don't call it out. They didn't call out the veggies or the quinoa for me, which was fine, but there was some other mixture next to it that I might have wanted. Of course, it probably would have made my burrito soggy, so probably for the best.

To begin with (literally), the lines are very long. However, due to the efficient and organized team, the line diminishes quickly. They have nearly identical menu options as Chip***le, and it's to the point. This also helps with the efficiency, considering there are only 3 options to order from. I recommend figuring out which of the 3 options you want whilst you wait in line cause it's pretty annoying when people drag at the counter. Anyways, food is great. A little salty but great. If food was all I was critiquing I would give it 5 stars. However, I don't appreciate how they hide spoons from you, until you specifically ask them for it. Employees also beware, there are no discounts for you.

I'm pretty picky when it comes to Mexican food! Has to have a lot of good flavor or else I'm out! These guys nailed it with the chipotle chicken burrito! Ask for hot sauce if you like it spicy! The hot sauce is really good with the amazing chicken! Priced very well, 8$ for my burrito!

Weather was perfect for the open air feel, they weren't overly busy and it was easy to snag a table. The food was great! Chipotle vibe where you create your own. Free tap water with cups in seating area. Only tables and seating for maybe 15-18 people. People were friendly, too!

My expectations of airport food court fare are low -- I've had too many expensive, not quite fresh, not quite hot entrees. But My baja chicken burrito at Burrito Beach was excellent. Tasty, fresh, and efficiently made to order. Portion was large enough for left overs, all at a very reasonable price. I wouldn't hesitate to stop in again the next time I'm at O'Hare.
The fish tacos were very tasty. However, the crispy quesadilla is NOT crispy and resembles a burrito. I would not recommend it. The service is good and fast.

The sirloin steak burrito is where it's at! There are plenty of breakfast, vegan and vegetarian options. They seem to have specials on their chalkboard menu like fish tacos. I don't think their prices are too bad to either my burrito is about $8.29 for the burrito. You have a choice of tacos, toast burrito, rice bowl, nachos or crispy quesadillas. I liked the beans and rice with the burrito and mild salsa was tasty. I say check it out I like it. I would totally have it again if I was at the Northwestern building heading to some doctor's appointment and wanted a bite to eat.

I will not visit this location anymore, it is RIDICULOUS! Staff - RUDE as hell, it's a lunch rush, so what. Also, they are priced fine overall but the guacamole portions are laughable, insulting even. $1.50 for a teaspoon of guacamole, WTF!?! Fix it. And learn how to wrap a damn burrito.

The owner clearly cares about this place and how it comes across to its customers. When we were here just after a procedure just this morning, my wife is allergic to onions and he offered to cut and give her just a plain half of an avocado. Additionally, they went in the back to find cilantro even though it wasn't one of their normal morning offerings. Come and eat here for reasonable price and great care of the proportion of your food!

Oh my goodness! I got a burrito bowl with everything I wanted included and it was so delicious. The Baja chicken was flavorful and the salsas and other toppings were all so good.  Service was quick and friendly and I felt I got a really good value for the portions.

1. It was delicious. The fish tacos tasted much healthier and were much more flavorful than you can find at most places in Chicago. 2. The employees are nailing it order after order and keeping a steady clip. Every single person was kind, smiling, and hard-working. I just received customer service that I didn't think was synonymous with a faster food place. There is an excellent hustle here. I'll be back!3. The music (playlist) has been one excellent song after another.  Lou Reed, Smokey Robinson, The Velvet Underground...one great song after another. Great taste in food and music at Burrito Beach!4.  Nice decor with pretty little floral arrangements on each table.  This did not feel like a hospital dining option...it was REALLY nice.5.  They also have custard.  Enough said.
I was craving a breakfast burrito and this was the perfect spot where I can build my own. I got the special but instead of bacon used chorizo. So good!!!
Good quality burgers.  However various items on the menu missing - (Sweet Potato Fries).  Very good service and atmosphere. Prices were higher than fast food, but competitive with surrounding area.
Restaurant convivial Spécialisé dans les boulettes (y compris végétariennes) Bon marché Personnel très sympathique
Super lekker
Assez cher pour les quantités. Accompagnement salade baignant dans la vinaigrette. Rien de fou mais correct
Goede service
Limanda eski tarihi anımsatan bir yerde yemek istiyorsanız tam aradığınız yer 😉
Great unique experience.
Une agréable surprise ! Très bon ! Cadre sympa ! Personnel souriant !
Simple, fresh food. The stuffings of meatballs could have more decided taste but the salad with fennel was delicious! Fair price, impressive interior, free tap water and fruits. Very nice service.
Popped in there for a drink not realising it was a restaurant. Staff were friendly and accommodating and welcomed us for a drink and a coffee. Have to try again for a meal !
Loved steak was perfect

My husband has been talking about coming here for a little while, so we decided to finally give it a try. On arriving things were fine, we ordered drinks which where lovely, we had room temp tap water on our table in bottles. We ordered our food, but soon noticed that another couple who arrived around 15mins after us got their mains before us and were half way through already and there was another family who had their mains servered around the same time we ordered, they had finished and had ordered their desserts and they were arriving yet we were still waiting for our food to arrive. My husband decided this was unacceptable and decided we should leave, so the waitress decided to inform us that it had only been half an hr then charge us for our drinks... I do beleive it was more on the 45min side, it's not so much the wait but watching everyone around us getting served while we twiddle our thumbs totally in the dark as to why we had to wait... Not that busy when we arrived either. 1st and last time we will visit your establishment.
Cracking grill 😀

Lovely lunch yesterday 5 June for my son's 18th. Even though it was extremely busy the service was swift and smooth. Special thanks to Stephen who took so much trouble to look after us despite how busy it was with much patience and work out how best to cater to my elderly mother's needs. Superb people skills 😊
Gooed. 😍

Lekker gegeten! Ook glutenvrije opties. En een heerlijke vega falafel burger.

Trevlig personal, trevlig miljö, fräsch mat, rimliga priser och utmärkt läge.
Maria som jobbar här är en fantastisk servicemänniska!!!
Great food, great quality, goos & fast service.

Hej hej från en lummig paus i solen👋☀️ Som småbarnsförälder har jag lärt mig att (stundvis) vara väldigt tidseffektiv - både för att kunna maximera tiden med barnen då jag jobbar om dagarna och att njuta och passa på att göra allt det där jag vill hinna med  kring mig själv när jag är iväg.🌱Så dagens lunchtimme har gått åt till att fylla på sommargarderoben med ett superfint linne (tradera, 20kr) och ta en springtur dit och tillbaka🏃🏼‍♀️💚 Har nu en kvart till godo att varva ner i solen med en smarrig sallad med äpple, nötter och bönröra från paniniinternazionale👌🥗 (Önskvärt förslag: mer pappbaserade take away-förpackningar🙏) Önskar er alla en härlig måndag! ☀️🌱#hållbartmode #hållbart #secondhand #återanvändning #lunchlöpning #veganskmat #vegansk #veggo #vegetariskt #lunch #sol #småbarnsförälder #småbarnsförälderpåvift #måndag #vardag #egentid #passapå

Een hamburger tent die probeert net iets meer te geven. Zo heb je naast de classic burgers ook een 'special'. Dat was deze keer een 'Bollywood Style burger'. Dan zijn er verschillende vegan / veggie burgers die er erg smakelijk uit zagen. En voor de mensen met gluten allergie kan je de burgers ook met een glutenvrij broodje of zonder broodje bestellen. Voor het eten zou ik 3 sterren geven maar voor voor alle specials op de kaart EN de zeer vriendelijke bediening een ster extra.

Voordien altijd tevreden in het verleden. Maar mijn laatste bezoek was enorm teleurstellend. Burger was niet voldoende gebakken (rauwe stukken), zeer weinig saus, etc. Prijs/kwaliteit waren uit balans.
Mooi concept - jammer maar burger was niet warm - borden met grote schilfers af zien er niet uit - voor 16 € mag men een top burger verwachten

Very nice burgers, the meat was ok but not ultra amazing. I would definitely eat again their burgers. It was a amazing combination of blue cheese, Emmental cheese, apple compote,light honey sauce and a very good bun. The drinks are amazing too especially the ginger ale. The place looks great and the seats outside were comfortable. The only bad point is the smell of the sewers, they are very smelly. And the toilets were not so clean. The staff was friendly and the price was ok.

Good food but poor customer service. I have been to this restaurant many times and used to like it as it offered good quality affordable burgers. It still does as a matter of fact but my last couple of experiences here have been tainted by the poor customer service and the wait for the meal. Already twice, and both times when sitting upstairs, I have had to wait substantially for my meal (more thank 35 minutes, which is a lot for a burger place). In both circumstances I had almost finished my drink by the time the food arrived (and let me add that when ordering tea, twice I received the wrong tea bag, had to wait for a new one and in the meantime the warm water became even milder). To add to the frustration was the fact that other tables received their food before I did although they had ordered later. There was one couple who ordered just before we did who waited almost 50 minutes for their food and then had to remind the staff that they had not yet received the sides to their meal. Having said that, these times I experienced delays have been when the restaurant was particularly busy; however, the rudeness of the staff did not help bear with the frustration: the table next to mine experienced a confrontation with the waitress; I had received no apologies for the wait, and to add to it all, when asked at the till if I had a good meal, I explained my frustrations and received as an answer "oh it is normal when it is busy" rather than an apology. Sad to see how poor staff training and an understaffed kitchen can affect what could have otherwise been a good meal.
Really lovely food. Very relaxed with great staff. Next time we are in brugges we will definitely be back.

What a waste of actual time! Firstly, the service is pathetic- practically non-existent. Secondly, we ordered nachos and a burger, the nachos arrived about half an hour after placing the order. We waited over 45 mins after the nachos arrived and still no burger! The waiter did not come and explain to us why there was a delay or state at the beginning that food would take a while because they are busy. We ended up leaving and cancelling the burger because we were at the restaurant almost 2 hours and still hadn’t received our food! Definitely do not recommend this place, especially because the service is just so awful!

As a study abroad student from the United States, this place was great regarding the staff, food, and prices. The staff was so friendly, our waiters were Mike and Fenya were the best, so make sure to ask for them when you eat there. Now the food, on another level. The pasta is very good, I highly recommend the Kenny pasta with veatballs. I went with a large group of girlfriends and a lot of them had the Kawak which they said was reasonably priced and tasted stupendous. Lastly, the best way to end your delicious meal here is with Lemon Chello!

Uitnodigend pand, oud herenhuis. Interieur met moderne en oude elementen wat gezellig oogt. De huisgemaakte cocktails, ice tea’s een verfrissende aanrader. Ruime keuze aan burgers. Voor ieder wat wils, veggie, zalm, kip, lam etc. Er is zelfs een speciale menu voor studenten. Enkel jammer dat iedere burger hetzelfde broodje heeft. Voor de prijs had ik daar graag wat meer variatie in gezien. Frietjes voortreffelijk, krokant, intense aardappelsmaak en ogen zelfgemaakt (geen diepvriesstuff). Bediening vlot en hartelijk. Bij binnenkomst word je een tafel toegewezen, betaling is aan kassa vooraan. Tip als je aperitieft best melden dat ze wachten met het brengen van de burgers tot die genuttigd is.  Men houdt daar namelijk geen rekening mee. Eten op het binnenterras is al even niet mogelijk, jammer. Plaatsjes vooraan buiten zijn meestal bezet. Blijkbaar is afhaal hier mogelijk.
Nice burgers and drinks

Eerste bezoek, met de collega's. Ik eet vegetarisch, dus ik ging enkel mee omdat er een veggie keuze werd aangeboden, wat ik op zich al apprecieer aan een restaurant dat toch op vlees gericht is.Bediening was vlot en vriendelijk, en de gerechten worden mooi gepresenteerd. De veggie vol au vent was voor mij niet zo super - iets te veel vleesvervanger en héél weinig champignons, en de algemene smaak van de saus was niet echt mijn ding. Lekker bladerdeegje wel.De collega's waren wel heel tevreden over hun gerechten, dus als je gewoon kip eet kan je hier weinig verkeerd doen. Een volgende keer zal ik een ander gerecht proberen (want iedereen verdient een tweede kans).

Dag två på jarvaveckan avslutades med dukade långbord och middag mellan nya och etablerade svenskar genom invitationsdepartementet 🍲🍲🍲 Fullt hus och härliga samtal runt borden, tack paniniinternazionale för en fantastisk middag och tack till de femtio personerna som kom till vårt tält och deltog. Bavet invited its friends for an after work & opening party at our newest restaurant on Rue du Bailli 97, Ixelles! We served our classic spaghetti bowls and introduced our new incredible meatless meat sauce, called ‘The impossible Bavet’! (More info about this later, watch this space!) This all combined with the thirst quenching beers of @vedett, old school vibes and atmosphere provided by the one & only DJ Serge (78 rpm dj) - we shook the entire building! Accueille d'un centre commercial, nous avions réservé et commandé nos plats 20 jours à l'avance et nous étions un groupe de 22 personnes (dîner entre collègues). après plusieurs partie de Bowling,.... au restaurant on a dû nous même arranger les tables pour former un seul groupe, Ensuite un serveur viens vers nous pour nous dire qu'ils ont pas trouvé notre commande,... pour finir les serveurs ont trouvés notre commande,..  ils commence à nous servir. mais le combles arrive, ils nous oublient 2 plats. Donc les un mangent et les autres attendent.Notre expérience au restaurant du bowling stone fut une catastrophe.  Je vous recommande pas du tout le côté restaurant de ce lieu.

Als erstes haben wir uns draußen hingesetzt aufgrund des schönen Wetters, jedoch haben wir so lange gewartet bis wir gedacht haben hier ist Selbstbedienung, also sind wir aufgestanden und rein gelaufen um dann zu merken dass hier verwunderlicherweise bedient wird. Auf den Café mussten wir dann 10-15 Minuten warten, obwohl es maximal zu einem Viertel voll war. Dazu haben wir 4 Chicken Classic Sandwiches bestellt auf die wir vergeblich 40 Minuten gewartet haben jedoch nie bei uns angekommen sind, beim zahlen mussten wir dann erklären wieso wir nur die Getränke zahlen. Eigentlich wollten wir uns nur kurz entspannt hinsetzten jedoch ist das dann zu einem nervigen Stress geworden.
